verse_text: Yesu Kristo mmbo akee wa ufyari lwa Davidi, akee wa ufyari lwa Abrahamu. Yelu ni uramba lwa ufyari lwakwe.
Abrahamu kaira Isaki, Isaki kaira Yakobo, Yakobo kaira Yuda na vanavamaye.
Yuda kaira Faresi na Zara na mayaawo ni Tamari; Faresi kaira Esrom, Esrom kaira Aramu.
Aramu kaira Aminadabu, Aminadabu kaira Naasoni; Naasoni kaira Salmoni.
Salmoni kaira Boas, nawe maye ni Rahabu, Boas kaira Obedi nawe maye ni Ruti. Obedi kaira Isai.
Isai kaira mangyi Davidi, Davidi kaira Solomon. Nawe maye ni nka ulya wa Uria.
Solomon kaira Rehoboamu; Rehoboamu kaira Abia, Abia kaira Asafu.
Asafu kaira Yosafati, Yosafati kaira Yoramu. Yoramu kaira Usia.
Usia kaira Yotamu, Yotamu kaira Ahasi, Ahasi kaira Hesekia.
Hesekia kaira Manase, Manase kaira Amosi, Amosi kaira Yosia;
Yosia kaira Yekonia na vanavamaye meendi vandu veefo veesamirywa kulya Babeli.
Na meendi vandu vansamirywa kulya Babeli Yekonia kaira Saltieli, Saltieli kaira Serubabeli.
Serubabeli kaira Abiudi, Abiudi kaira Eliakimu. Eliakimu kaira Asori;
Asori kaira Sadoki, Sadoki kaira Akimu, Akimu kaira Eliudi;
Eliudi kaira Eleasari, Eleasari kaira Matani; Matani kaira Yakobo.
Yakobo kaira Yosefu we mmi wa Maria. Mmbwe aleira Yesu yeto avaangwa Kristo.

Naasa kupookya Abrahamu fika Davidi marika akava ikumi na aana. Na kupookya Davidi fika meendi alya vandu valesamiryo kulya Babeli marika akaveva ikumi na aana. Na kupookya meendi vandu valesamirywa kulya Babeli fika Kristo marika akaveva ikumi na aana.
Naasa yoo maonikyony a Kristo kileenda u-le, “Maye ulya wakwe we Maria, eefinngywa ni Yosefu valandesanga ando amwi sha nndu na nka kamanyika mmbo akufingye kyuuka na Mumuyo Mweele.
Na mmi ulya wakwe we Yosefu akee nndu nsumanu nalakunde insuta karummbwa nanreu kirika.
Eefo akusaraa indo nsu wa Iruva kansheya efo yooryeny kaamba, ‘Yewe Yosefu kukee mwana wa Davidi! Nta kulairyee irwaa tindi wafo Maria, mashika elyi akufingye mmbo kyuukye na Mumuyo Mweele.’
Mmbo ashiira mwana wa womi na yewe kumfishye irina ni Yesu. ‘Mashika mmbwe akiraa vandu vakwe ngyulyamari tawo.’ “
Na kimaruma kikaenda indo, ni kirero kilya Nndumi alerera na kana ka nkisuku naambo kikooye iinukya kyeamba,
“Lla-te mwana wa kyeny akaa naire mwana wa womi, na irina lyakwe vammbaange ni ‘Emanueli’ (Kwaallwa kyaamba; Iruva asasangyi neese).”
Naasa Yosefu kakwiipoo rony, kandetana kilya nsu ulya wa Nndumi ammbia karwaa tindi ulya wakwe.
Nta nalasange nawe kutani afika kyeeri kya iira mwana nawe kammbaanga irina lyakwe ni Yesu.
Llya meendi Yesu alewonika kulya Betilehemu ya Yuda fyeeri filya Herode etiri umangyi vakasha vandu vauka na taari ya ngama vakafika Yerusalemu.
Vakaamba, “A mangyi yeyo ya Vayuda aleirwa akee kwi? Shamashika mmbo lulelollya nyinyiri yakwe kulya taari ya ngama neese mmbo lwasha lushemfirya-ndi.”
Naasa mangyi Herode ekiita indo kasavaa kimwi na vandu woose va kulya Yerusalemu.
Kasanyiria vakohani vaniini woose na velosha mavavaso evasunundaa mbony ta Kristo kundo ashewonikyaa.
“Vakaamba ni kulya Betilehemu ya Yudaya. Shamashika ni kindo kikee kireiye ni ulya mwauya fisuku kaamba,
‘Na yewe Betilehemu ya Uruka lwa Yuda nshi kukee nndu kwanyiiya vashilyi va Yuda-fo. Shamashika efo kwafo kwiikaa kuuke-fo mangyi ashiisaa vandu vakwe va Israeli.’ “
Nalyo mangyi ilya Herode kavaanga vaanga valya kirisi. Kavasununda vammbye kyeeri valelollya nyinyiri ilya.
Kavaruma veende kulya Betilehemu kavavia, “Kweenngye mundevesa waarya kya mwana yeto. Mukankooya sheenngyeny mbony, na yeny shiveenda indemfiirya-ndi.”
Naasa, vekiita kilya kya mangyi vakakweengya. Nalyo pariparii nyinyiri ilya valelollya kulya taari ya ngama ikasha ivasongoya shia. Ikaenda ikatana yairisha efo uwe usumanu na ando mwana ulya akai.
Naasa elyi valollya nyinyiri ilya vakatirwa ni nsia nniini nnu.

Vakaanga na efo mmba vakakooya kimwana kilya ando amwi na maye; vakamfiiryandi vakamwoolokyasi vakawuya vakaporomwa findo fyawo vasurummye fya usuri. Vakansimba findo fyawo fya pya fya wuuru uniini, ni saabu na ubani na manemane.
Vakoorwa ni Iruva efo yooryeny valaviire kyaaro na kulya kwa Herode, kya indi vawuye na kulya urukeny lwawo veshiiraa shia ingyi.

Naasa elyi vaanga valya varie shia yeewuya, nsu wa Nndumi kasha ikoora na Yosefu efo yooryeny; kammbia, “Wara shia kweenda kwirye kimwana ekyo na maye kunderishia kulya Misri kundekaa-fo; shitani shakuvia-se shamashika Herode arie iruuya kimwana yekyo nakirumate.”
Nalyo kawara shia yeenda arie kimwana kilya na maye elyi kio. Karishya kulya Misri kandekaa-fo. Herode katana afwa.
Na kilya kikee kirere ni Nndumi na kana ka ulya Mwauya fisuku naambo kikooye iinukya; kyeamba, “Ni kulya Misri mfo shilevaangya mwana wakwa.”

Nalyo Herode ankooya allembwa ni vaanga valya karooywa n'ngoo nnu. Karuma vana va kyuumi kulya Betilehemu na va kulya minyanuny koose vawaawa. Kupookya valya va myaaka ivii na valya vawuya-wuya numa; kyuuka na kyeeri kilya alesununda vaanga valya.
Nalyo kilya kikee kirere ni ulya mwauya fisuku Yeremia kiveinukya indo elyi aleamba:
“Ni unyanga luleitiwa kulya Rama, ni kiiyo na ikwaalala kyuumu. Ni Raheli akee iiya vana vakwe, nta naleve iviirya muu nyelyi valakiiyo-se.”
Naasa Herode ekimaa ifwa, nsu wa Nndumi kasha ikoora na Yosefu efo yooryeny kulya Misri.
Kammbia wara shia kweenda kurie kimwana na maye kundefika kulya urukeny lwa Israeli, kimmba valya valesia muu wa kimwana yekyo valemfwa.
Nawe kawara shia keenda arie kimwana kilya na maye kandefika kulya urukeny lwa Israeli.
Naasa ekivywa ni Arikelao atiri umangyi ando a ndeye Herode, kairyaa yeenda-fo, koorwa ni Iruva yooryeny kawara-se shia kandefika kulya myuungony ya Galilaya.
Kashesamya muri uvaangwaa Nasareti, na kilya kikee kirere nivaauya fisuku naambo kikooye iinukya elyi vaambaye, “Ashevaangwa Nndu wa Nasareti.”
Naasa fyeeri fikee filya-da nalyo Yohane Mmbatisi kafummya vandu akapaa weele kulya kasa ka Yuda kaamba,
“Kuryeny ngyulyamari tany, kimmba umangyi lwa Iruva lwammaafukya.”
Shamashika mmbwe eambaywa na kana ka nkisuku ulya Isaya eeshaambaa, “Akalu unyanga lwa nndu akapaa weele efo kasa eeshaambaa, ‘Songosyeny shia ya Nndumi!’ Sumaniseny miko yakwe.”
Nawe Yohane muni eraa soori tikee shooke; ta mafwaa a ngamula, kakufinga na ukova lwa shony efo mwiniiny. Na shoonga takwe ni nrie na ukyi wa mbakony.
Nalyo vandu vakamweengya va kulya Yerusalemu na kulya Yudaya koose na va muungo wa Yordani woose.
Vakandebatiswa mmbwe efo mureny wa Yordani veparaa ngyulyamari tawo.

Kyasia kalollya Vafarisayo veengyi na Vasadukayo vensheyaa naambo vabatiswa mmbwe, “Nawe kavavia yeni ufyari lwa shoka, a ni vi alemwiikimba shaasa musheturuunyaa unyafi lwa Iruva yelo lukaa luwoye ulana?
Oreny kyuuka na mashora any mwalashike mirima!
Nta mulakusare mwaambe, Nde weeru luntiri ni Abrahamu! Mmbo shamuvia, Iruva ashiidimaa iparya Abrahamu vana navaute naakwa kunu maweny.
Na kyaara mmbo kyammaa ivikwa sindeny ya miri. Naasa wo nri wiiyo ulavikaa ndunda shisha mmbo umanywaa undeerwa murony.

Kyakwa yeny shamubatisa na mura mukooye yaalashika efo nriminy. Indi yeto ashaa numa yakwa mmbo atiri finya kashiilanya. Na yeny nshimaa nta shintare fyaaru fyakwe-fo. Mmbwe ashemubatisaa na Mumuyo Mweele na muro.
Nawe arie nndeeva na woko lwakwe na efo muunguny wakwe asheaiyaa-fo kwiile peru. Na nganu yeto nataallye efo mbesheny yakwe na muulu yeto nandeuvivya murony ularumikaa.”
Nalyo Yesu kasha auka Galilaya kafika kulya Yordani kwa Yohane nandebatiswa mmbwe.
Nawe kakunda imwiima kammbia, “Yeny mmbo shisumani ibatiso ni yewe, na yewe kwasha na kwakwa?”
Yesu kammbia, “Ra! Ulaalu kikuviiyeny indo! Mashika ni indo kilusumanyi; naambo lwiinutye efyo Iruva akundye fyoose.”
Naasa elyi Yesu ammebatiswa kauka efo mureny. Nalyo efo iruveeu kukanraukya kalollya Mumuyo wa Iruva ashoolokaa akee sha mbeta kasha inkaya.
Nalyo akakalu unyanga lureraa luuka iruveeu lukaamba, “Yeu mmbwe mwana wakwa nkunde, mmbwe shilensauwa.”
Nalyo Yesu kaorwa ni Mumuyo wa Iruva neende kulya kasa, nandeeswa-fo ni mmbishwa.
Kamaa-fo mikonu makumi aana kio na nsanyiny nalakomba nta shoonga, elyi numa katirwa nshaa.
Naasa mmbishwa kansheya kammbia, “Kwakooya mmbo kukee mwana wa Iruva ambaany mawe yaa nawe mikate.”
Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Kindo nndu akirya-u nakyo muu nshi shoonga tupu-fo, ni wo kirero kyauka efo kaniny ka Iruva.”
Nalyo mmbishwa kamwiipoo kamfita kulya muriny mweele kanseleesa alya urorony lwa mmba ya Iruva.

Kammbia, “Kwakooya mmbo kukee Mwana wa Iruva killyany si, shamashika kikee kireiye kikaambawa, ‘Ashevavasya vasu vakwe va iruveeu mashika afo yewe, vashekukamaraa na mai, kulasheekapa nta urende lwafo iweny.’ “
Yesu kamwaallwa kammbia, “Nta kulaese Nndumi Iruva wafo!”
Naasa mmbishwa kamwiipoo lyingyi, kamfita ando a ifumbuny yaasha kamoora ngyumangyi ta ulana toose na usuri lwa vayo.
Kammbia, “Akati shikuniinga toose, kwakooya kwakutuula si neshoolokya ng'undeny.”
Nalyo Yesu Kammbia, “Shuuka satana! Mmbo kikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Ni Nndumi Iruva wafo mmbwe kushemoolokya nawe mmbwe muni kushemwiindyaa.’ “ "
Nalyo satana kanra-u, na vasu va Iruva vakansheya vakamfurukannya.
Naasa ekiita mbony ta Yohane sheelyi amfingwa, kookau keenda kulya Galilaya;
Kasama kulya Nasareti kandekaa kulya Kapernaumu mbaambaa ya yeeve kulya myuungony ya Sabuloni na Naftali.
Naambo kilya kikee kirere na kana ka nkisuku ulya Yesaya kikooye iinukya llya aleamba,
" “Yewe uruka lwa Sabuloni na Naftali kundo kwiirye shia yeefika yeveny kulya kwa kulya ya Yordani, efo Galilaya ya vandu va masanga.
Wo ni vandu vakee ireeminy vakawuya ilollya sa niini. Ni vandu vakee urukeny lwa vafu vakawuya ifummywa ni sa.”
Naasa fyeeri filya llyo meendi Yesu alepooka ikapa weele na irera, “Kuryeny ngyulyamari tany, kimmba umangyi lwa Iruva lwammaafukya.”

Naasa eefo arua-ruaa kulya mbaambaa ya yeewe ilya ya Galilaya kalollya vana va nka vavii, ni Simion ulya avangwaa Petro, na mwanamaye we Andrea. Nawo veefo vashoolotaa mireiyo yaawo yeereiya makunga mashika vekee veereiya makunga.
Nawe kavavia, “Ndifony mushilatye! Na yeny nshemwaallwa veereiya vandu.”
Nawo lyo yeni vakatiiya-u mireiyo ilya yaawo vakallatya.

Naasa alla na mbee kalollya vanavanka vengyi vavii ni Yakobo akee mwana wa Sebedayo na Yohane akee ni mwanamaye. Nawo vakee efo ngalaveny na nde-yaawo, we Sebedayo veefo vasongosya mireiyo ilya yaawo. Nawe kavavaanga.
Nawo lyo yeni vakatiiya-u ngalava ilya na nde-yaawo, vakallatya.
Nalyo kava mwisengetya kulya Galilaya koose eeloshaa efo mmba tawo teeterevya, na yoongoya vandu nrumi ya nsia, yeyo ya umangyi lwa Iruva. Kaveshiisa na wo ndwari na wo unana lwa efo vanduny.

Nalyo nnduma wakwe ukaenda ikwaana kulya Siria koose. Na vandu vakamweengya yewo woose velwee ndwari shive na shive na yewo velyilyiswa kyuumu, na yewo vatirwa ni mimuyo mikasha, vasukwa na fitongororo malungo. Nawe kavakira.
Vandu vakallatya matorito meengyi vauka kulya Galilaya na kulya muungo wa miri ikumi; na Yerusalemu na Yudaya, na kulya kwakulya ya Yordani.
Naasa elyi alollya vashe ikuumbya-fo nsemu mwiingyi wa vandu, kandesaama kulya ifumbuny kakaa-fo rembo. Na valya vakiloshyony vakakaa yoo kufii nawe.
Nawe kapooka ivalosha eshaambaa.
“Ngoma yewo va mirima mikiva, mashika mmbo umangyi lwa iruveeu lwava lwavo.
Ngoma yewo vatirwa mfyoova, mashika mmbo vakaa vaviirywa muu.
Ngoma yewo vafoo, mashika mmbo vakaa vatire uruka luwe ding'u yaawo.
Ngoma yewo vatirwa nshaa na nyura ya usumanu mashika mmbo vakaa vawuutiswa.
Ngoma yewo velyillya vandu mashika mmbo vakaa valyillywa.
Ngoma yewo vatiri nrima mwaa mashika mmbo vakaa valollye Iruva.
Ngoma yewo veende ufoo mashika mmbo vakaa vavaangwa vana va Iruva.
Ngoma yewo varishiswa kimaruma kya usumanu mashika mmbo umangyi lwa Iruva lwava lwavo
Ngoma yeni kwakooya vandu vamwaarara na imurishisa na imufinngya wo kindo kikasha kyoose kikee kya wongo elyi mukee vakwa.
Fureny-dwa muvelooka mashika iviiri lyany mutiri efo iruveeu lyava iniini. Mashika ni indo verishisa vakisuku valya vamusongoye.”
“Yeni mmbo mukee mmbala wa ulana yelu. Indi kwakooya mmbala wammba iturya, a kindo ushewuyaa iroliswa nakyo nkyo ki? Mmbukivaa-se-fo, kulaore ni indeerwa efo poo uvavarwa mmbandu.
Yeni mmbo mukee sa ya ulana. Muri ukee mmbike ando a ifumbuu-ny mmbushiidimaa ikusuruma-fo.
Nta nkwiifoo nndu ashataa taa efo mmba kawuya iisikya-fo. Mmbo aivika ando a uwe ikamikya yewo woose vakee efo mmba.
Veny sa efo usanguny lwa vandu woose, nawo vakooye ilollya efyo fya usha mutanaa, vaute-u ing'anisa Nde waany wa efo iruveeu.”
“Nta mulakusare kindo kilesheende ni ishefullwa mavavaso ao vakisuku-fo. Nshisheeye ifullwa-fo ni iinutya.
Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Iruveu na ulana fishiraa indi efyo fikee fireiye nfishiraa-fo, na ikava mbekye imwi nsi, nkuti fiinutyo fyoose.’

Naasa nndu akara ifullwa mavavaso yoo naakwa ni elyo lyikee idu ya engyi, kalosha vandu indo, mmbo akaa navaangwa n-du-wa-woose efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu. Indi yeto atana na yaafunda mmbo akaa navaangwa nniini efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu.
Mashika shamuvia kwakooya kulaore usumanu yelo lwany lwiilannyi yelo lwa velosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mmukooyaa yaanga efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu-fo.”
“Mmbo mwiitye valya va mbee valevio, ‘Kulawae!’ Na nndu mwiwaa ammba nndu mwiutywa uvingo efo kwa veerumbwa mwaandu.”

Na yeny shamuvia, “Nndu katirya mwanamaye unyafi ammba nndu mwiutywa uvingo lwakwe efo kwa veerumbwa mwaandu. Na nndu kavia mwanamaye, ‘Yewe ni mbafu, ammba nndu mwiutywa uvingo efo ikwaanuny lya masiingo. Na nndu kavia mwanamaye Iruva akusuuye ammba nndu mwiutywa uvingo lweenda yeerwa murony wa Gehena.’ “
Naasany kwafika yeende kiraso kyeeniinga Iruva, kwakyeende na alya ando eerasya, kwamfikau kwakumbwa mwanamau atiri mwaandu neewe,
rau kyaanu kilya kyeeningya Iruva kupooke mbele inderera na mwanamau kusange nawe. Naasa kusheny kusheningya Iruva kyaanu kyafo.

Va nndu mwaanguya yeto atiri mwaandu neewe kyeeri muriani nawe shia. Na nkiduva nalandeekurambikya efo maakony a nniini yeto wa mwaandu, na yeto nniini wa mwaandu nandekurambikya efo maakony a nsero yeto wa poo, kundeerwa kifingyony.
Ni kya dede shakuvia, “Nta nkushuukaafo-fo kutani kwataa na senti ya kiparwe.”
“Mmbo mwiitye valya va mbee valevio, ‘Kulatuuse nta kulashetuuswa.’
Na yeny shamuvia, wo nndu allola nndu nka kya illanga mmbo ammaa ituusa efo nriminy.
Na kwakooya iriso lyafo lyishekweengyee nsindara lyiillwe kulyeere efo! Mmbo kyakuviiya kisha mmwasi ilungo lyafo lyimwi lyikakurekya, na mwiili wafo moose ukyie yeerwa murony wa Gehena.
Na kwakooya woko lwafo usha lushekweengye nsindara lurummbwe kulweere efo lukuuke. Mmbo kyakuviiya kisha ilungo lyafo lyimwi lyikakurekya na mwiili wafo moose ukie yeerwa murony wa Gehena.”
“Mmbo kilererwa-se kyeamba, ‘Nndu kalakana na nka wakwe kuti nanniinge barua ya ilakana.’
Na yeny shamuvia, ‘Wo nndu alakana na nka wakwe kwakooya kulaore ni kimaruma kya utuusi, mmbo amwaallwa nave mwituuswa.’ Na nndu arwaa nka mmi allakana nawe mmbo amwaallwa nka ntuusi.”
“Na kingyi-se valya va mbee valevywa, ‘Nta kulalye mboo, mmbo kushefityaa Nndumi ekyo kuteerye kullye mboo.’
Na yeny shamuvia, ‘Nta mulakulyise mboo’ mwaambe, ‘Swa iruveeu, mashika nng'u kirembo kya Iruva;’
Nta mulalye mboo mwaambe, ‘Swa uruka! Mashika nng'u aekyerya marende akwe. Nta mulaambe swa Yerusalemu! Mashika muni muri ni mangyi nniini.’
Nta kulalye mboo kwaambe, ‘Swa nrwe wakwa! Mashika elyi kulashiidimaa yaalwa nta ufii lumwi luve waa ao uu.’
Naasany kirero kyany kive, ‘Ee!’ Ao ‘Ode!’ Kyairya efyo ni efo kwa yeto nkasha kyuukye.”
“Mmbo mwiitye kilya kileambawa, ‘Iriso lyitawa ni iriso, na iyoo lyitawa ni iyoo.’
Na yeny shamuvia, ‘Nta mulasalale na nndu nkasha. Indi nndu kakukapa woi lwa yuundu lya woko usha mwaluye na yelyo lyingi.’
Na nndu kakuvaanga mwaanduny nandekusoka soori yafo ya mwiiliny, neewe nreeye na yeyo ya yeerya.
Na nndu kakwiitikya kweende nawe kyenga kya shia neewe enda nawe ando a fyenga fivii.
Nndu kakutereva kindo nniinge. Na nndu kasha ikwaakwa nta kulamwiimi.”
“Mmbo mwiitye kilya kileambawa, ‘Kunda nndu uroo na nkiduva wafo kunsue.’
Na yeny shamuvia, ‘Kundeny vakiduva vany, na yewo vemurishisa muvevaterevya efo kwa Iruva.’

Naambo mukooye imanyika mmbo mukee vana va nde yeto waany wa efo iruveeu; mashika we ava mwiirosa mwi wakwe ukavaiya yewo varavi na yewo vesha. Kaveva mweende mmbwa yakwe ikakapa kwa yewo va usumanu na kwa yewo va kiila.
Mashika kwakooya mwakunda yewo vemukunda veni, a isina musheonisaa llyo kyi? A vadedemi nshi indo-da vatanaa?
Na kwakooya mushiidikiraa vanavamaye vany tupu, a kindo mwatana kya mmwasi nkyo kyi? A vandu va masanga nshi indo-da vatanaa?
Naasany veny vandu vasongovisi shaasa Nde yeto waany wa efo iruvee-u akee nsongovisi.”
“Kwiiseny efyo fya usumanu mutanaa mulasheefitana efo fisanguny fya vandu mukooye ilollyo mmbo. Kwakooya kulaore ni indo, nkukiiyo-se isina mutiri efo kwa Nde yeto waany wa efo iruveeu-fo.

Naasa elyi kwiifo kuniingya kyaanu kya vakiva nta kulakunde ikapywa wombe lukwiirye mbee shaasa vakunang'ari vatana efo mmba teeterevya neefo shia tikwaannyi naambo vakooye irumishwa. Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Isina lyawo alyo vammeelyiwarya.’
Indi elyi kwiifo kuniingya kyaanu kya vakiva, kulare woko lwafo umuso lumanyi ekyo woko usha lwiifo lutanaa.
Na kyaanu kyafo kyeeninga vakiva kive ni kirika na ndoo yeto alollye fya kirika akaa nakutae.”

“Na elyi kwatereva Iruva nta kulave sha vakunang'ari. Wo mmbo vakunndye itereva vasalali efo mmba teeterevya na efo shia tikwaannyi ta efo muriny naambo vakooye ilollywa mmbandu. Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Isina lyawo alyo vammeelyiwarya.’
Indi kyafo yewe elyi kwatereva Iruva ira na efo kirieny kya mmba yafo kya nnang'ani kuveraya na mwaango, kutereveny Ndoo efo kyaminy kukai. Na Ndoo yeto alollye fya kyama akaa nakutae.”
“Na elyi mwatereva Iruva, nta mularere ura-ura sha vandu va masanga; mashika wo mmbo vaishi kindo vashiirikywa ni elyi marero awo ava meengyi.
Naasa yeni mulave shawo; mashika Nde yeto waany aishi yekyo mwatura kulaore mwammutereva.
Naasany yeni tereveny indi, ‘Nde weeru kukee efo iruveeu; irina lyafo lyivikwa yeele, umangyi lwafo lushe.
Kindo kyafo kukundye shaasa kyatanyika efo iruveeu na kunu urukeny kivetanyika indo.
Luniinge inu shoonga teru tilufye.
Kulusarye ngyulyamari teru shaasa na yese lwasarya valya valulyamarya.
Kulalurwaa efo kyeesyony, indi kulukire ekyo kivishwa. [Shamashika umangyi ni lwafo, na finya, na usuri, meeri moose allung'ani. Amen.]’
Shamashika kwakooya yeni mushefwaayaa vandu kya efyo vamulyamarye, na Nde yeto waany wa efo iruveeu ashemufwayaa.
Indi kwakooya yeni mulafwaaya vandu na Nde yeto waany nta nnashemufwaayaa kya efyo mullyamarye-fo.
Na elyi mushekootoyaa nta mulave sha vakunang'ari. Mashika wo mmbo vakusha fisangu naambo vamanyike efo vanduny mmbo veefo vakootoyaa. Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Isina lyawo alyo vammeelyiwarya.’
Indi kyafo yewe elyi kukekootoya amba nrwe wafo mafura kuvesangya kisangu.
Naambo kulamanyike efo vanduny mmbo kwiifo kukootoyaa. Mmbo kumanyikaa yefo kwa Ndoo yeto akee efo kyaminy. Na Ndoo yeto alolye fya kyama akaa nakutaa.”
“Nta mulave vekusanyirya masaa kunu urukeny. Mfo kurukuru ilyaa na kurere na manyinyi akasuma mmba akaiva.
Indi kusanyiryeny masaa efo iruveeu kundo kulaifo kurukuru ilyaa nta kurere, nta manyinyi nalaifo asumaa mmba akaiva.
Shamashika ando kusurumyi umasi lwafo na ngoo yafo nng'u ando ikai.”
“Naasa kwakooya iriso lyafo lyikee isha na mwiili yeto wafo mmbo ukaa na sa.
Indi kwakooya iriso lyafo lyankashaa, na mwiili wafo mmbo ukaa na ireema moose deny. Naasa sa yeyo ikee nnang'ani yafo kwakooya yammba ireema, a paa ireema lying'ani.”

“Nkwiiyo nndu ashiidimaa irundya vanndumi vavii-fo. Mashika ndesa ashesua yeto umwi na ikunda yeto wa kavii. Ao ndesa ashetiraa yeto umwi namini yeto ungyi. Nta mmushiidimaa irundya Iruva musande na irundya masaa a ulana elu-fo.”

“Kimmba ni indo, neeny shamuvia nta mulasaukwa kya muu yeu kindo mulyaa ao ina, nta kya mwiili kindo muraa. A muu nshi kindo kiniini kikailanya shoonga, na mwiili wany nshi kindo kiniini kikailanya masara eeraa?
Loleny ndeye ta efo nginiiu-te nteera nta mbeu nta yuulula-fo, nta yaalya mbesheny-fo. Lyo Nde yeto wa iruveu eefo atilelaa. A yeni nshi mutiilanyi kya mmwasi?
A mmbo kwiifo nndu kunu kwany ashiidimaa yeengerya waasha lwakwe naakwa ni ando a irambo lyimwi nsi na kasaukwa inda?
Na kya masara yoo nkikyi elyi musawukwaa nng'u? Kufundeny na fivaro fya efo mbuven-te shaasa fimmyaa filavinaa filashooka nta soori.
Na yeny shamuvia, ‘Nta Solomon na utore lwakwe loose, nneeree nisha sha kimwi kya vayo-fo.’
Naasany, mare a efo mbuveny aiyo inu na ndesi akandeerwa iyeny, kimmba Iruva amfyaambika indo afikaany yeni mukee va kikusiryo kidu nshi ashemweengeryaa?
Naasany nta mulasaukwa mwaambe, ‘A lukalya-kyi ao lukana-kyi ao lukaraa-kyi?’
Shamashika fya ngata yeyo ni vandu va masanga vafilalakyaa. Shamashika Nde yeto waany wa efo iruveeu we eeshi mmbo mutinnyo mfindo efyo.
Pookeny mbele iruuya umangyi lwa Iruva na usumanu lwa vayo, na efyo fingyi fyoose musheerywaa-u fya ngyeerya.
Naasany nta mulasaukwa kya ndesi, Shamashika nkonu wa ndesi usawukwaa nkya vayo. Wo nkonu utiri ngatara ya vayo iwumaa.”
“Nta mulautye vengyi uvingo, naambo mulashyeyuutywa muveni.
Shamashika mirumbuye yaany mwanrumbuya vandu, nnyo musherumbuywaa. Na myeesye yaany mwameesya vengyi, nnyo musheesyoo.
A yewe nkyikyi elyi kwalola kinaana kikee irisony lya mwanamau na ikongo lyikee irisony lyafo yewe kulalyimanyi?
A ni inda kushevia mwanamau, ‘Ra nkweekye yuuta kinaana yekyo kikee efo irisony lyafo, na efo irisony lyafo kumuni ni ikongo lyiifo?’
Yewe nkunang'ari pooka mbele yuuta ikongo yelyo efo irisony lyafo, llyo kushelolya nisha kwiidimi yuuta kinaana ekyo kikee efo irisony lya mwanamau.
Nta mulasheeniinga fite ekyo kikee kyeele, nta samana tany mulateerye nguvefo, naambo tilasheeitivavara na imwiindukya timuratwe.”
“Tereveny, neeni musheniingwa, syeny neeni musheonaa, kakapeny mwaango neeni musheruywaa.
Shamashika wo nndu atereva mmbo aniingwa, na yeto mwisia asheonaa na yeto mwikakapa mwaango mmbo asheruywaa.
A ni vi nndu wa kunu kwany mwana wakwe akooya intereva nkate nawe nanniinge iwe?
Ao katereva ikunga nawe nanniinge shoka?
Naasany yeni mukee varavi kwakooya mwaidima iniinga vana vany simbo shisha, a Nde yeto waany wa efo iruveeu nshi asheengeraa isimba yewo vatereva mesha?
Naasa findo fyoose shaasa mukunndye itanywa mmbandu neeni veny vetana indo kimwi shawo, mashika ni indo ivavaso lyikai amwi na veawuya fisuku.”
“Angeny ngiriny mwilatya shia yeyo shisiise, kimmba ngiri nshilandari na shia iifo itiri mwaanya nniini ni yeyo ishemufitaa uretiny na yewo vailatya vakava veengyi.
Mashika ngiri ii-fo ikee shisiise na shia iifo nshisiise yeyo imufitaa muuny, na yewo vailatya vakava vaangu.”
“Kwiiseny na veawuya fisuku va wongo, mashika wo mmbo vafika kwany varee masara a moonri na efo kimmba vakava mafite eerutwarutwa.
Ndunda tawo vavikaa nto tishevaparaa sengye muvamanyi nato. A ndesa vandu vayaya ndunda ta misabibu efo miingeny ao marwaa efo nrwen?
Niindi kikai; wo nri nsha mmbo uvikaa ndunda shisha na nri nkasha ukavika ndunda shikasha.
Nta nkwiifo nri nsha ushiidimaa ivika ndunda shikasha-fo, nta nri nkasha ushiidimaa ivika ndunda shisha-fo.
Na wo nri ulavikaa ndunda shisha mmbo ushemanywaa na yeerwa murony.
Naasany ni ndunda tawo vavikaany nto tishevaparaa sengye muvamanyi nato.”
“Nshi wo nndu ashivia, ‘Woi Nndumi, Woi Nndumi!’ Ashekooya yaanga yefo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu-fo, kulaore ni yeto atannyi efyo fikundyo ni Nde yeto wakwa wa efo iruveeu.”

Nkonu yeto ukamfika, vengyi vasheshiviaa, “Woi Nndumi! Woi Nndumi! A nshi lweefo lweshaauyaa fisuku na irina lyafo? A nshi lweefo lweshaanta mimuyo mikasha na irina lyafo? A nshi lweefo lwetanaa fya wiidimi fiingyi na irina lyafo?”
Llyo nshevaviaa paa, “Yeni nshimwiishi-fo. Kwiipony yaa shikai yeni vetana fya kiila!”
“Kyasiany wo nndu mwiirannya marero yoo akwa na yaatana kaatana mmbo ashevaa sha nndu nnrango aletana mmba yakwe kaiveiya ando a iweny.
Nalyo mmbwa ikakapa na mifu ikasoka na ngyuraato tikadina, tikakapa mmba ilya, nayo ilawunduke. Mashika uvasha lwavayo lukee uveiye iweny.
Na wo nndu mwiirannya marero yoo akwa kara nalaatana mmbo ashevaa sha nndu itondo aletana mmba yakwe, kaiveiya nsangeny.
Nalyo mmbwa ikakapa, na mifu ikasoka, na ngyuraato tikadina tikakapa mmba ilya, nayo ikawunduka. Na mmbundukye wa vayo ikawa pu.”
Naasa kikava elyi Yesu ammanda irera marero yoo, nkuka ulya wa vandu vekuumbye-u vakeesing'ang'a kya ufundo lwakwe.
Nyeelyi aleva mwiifunda sha nndu atiri ushilyi nalaloshe sha velosha valya vawo va mavavaso.
Naasa elyi eefo asholookaa auka kulya ifumbu-u vandu vakallatya matorito meengyi.
Nalyo kasha nang'u nndu alwee ivave kamoolokya ng'undeny kaamba, “Woi Nndumi kwankunda kushiidimaa isheeremuta.”
Yesu kaorwa woko kampaana kaamba, “Shankunda, eremukany.” Nalyo yeni keeremuka ivave lyilya lyentiri.
Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Nta kulavie nndu! Mmbo kusheenda kundekoora efo kwa nkohani, kundevika kyaanu kwa Iruva kilya Mose avavasye, kive nkyo ukureeki kwawo.”
Kikasia, elyi afika kulya Kapernaumu, kasheywa ni nshilyi wa vasikari iyana, kamooshora,
kammbia, “Woi Nndumi shitiri ishinga lyakwa lyilele kyeny lyikee yuumu malungo, lyiifo lyivavywaa kyuumu.”
Nawe kammbia, “Nsheendaa shindenkira.”
Nshilyi ulya wa vasikari iyana kaallwa kammbia, “Woi Nndumi yeny nshimaa kutani kwafika efo si ya kai ka mmba-kwa-fo. Ammba irero lyimwi nsi na ishinga lyakwa lyisheshiaa.

Shamashika neeny mmbo shikee kwasi ya ushilyi lwa vengyi shivetiri na vasikari vakwa, neeny ni nniini waawo; naasa shavia eto umwi, ‘Enda’, mmbo asheenda, shavia eto ungyi, ‘Osho’ nawe mmbo aveshaa. Shavia ishinga elyo lyakwa, ‘Tana kindo kive! Lyikavekitana.’ “
Naasa Yesu ekiita indo kikantamba kavia valya veeiyo vevandami nawe, “Ni kya dede shamuvia, nta kunu Israeli nshindelollye kikusiryo king'ani indo-fo.”
Na yeny shamuvia, “Kusheshaa vandu vengyi wooka taari ya ngama na ya nkwaany vashelya shoonga vasasangyi na Abrahamu na Isaki na Yakobo efo umangyi ny lwa Iruva.
Na veni umangyi wo vandeerwa poo efo kuwoye ireema na ikwaalala na irafunnya mayoo.”
Naasa Yesu kavia nshilyi ulya wa vasikari iyana, “Kweenngye! Kivekuviiya indo shaasa kukusirye-u!” " Nalyo ishinga lilya lyakwe lyikashia kyeeri kilya kyeni.
Nalyo Yesu kandefika kulya kyeny kwa Petro kalollya maye-a-nka alele kitareny elwee iseng'u.
Nawe kampaana woko, iseng'u lyilya lyikammbuka. Kakwiipoo kapooka infurukannya.
Na elyi kwammiila vakamweenngye vandu vengyi vellyiswa ukiva mmimuyo mikasha. Nawe kaanta mimuyo ilya mikasha eshaambaa kirero kyeni. Na valya veeiyo valwee kavakira woose;
Naambo kirero kilya kindekooya iinukya shaasa kilererwa ni nkisuku ulya Isaya kikaamba, " “Mmbwe aleipoo ngyunana teru neekurika ndwari teru.”
Naasa Yesu ekilollya nsemu wa vandu vansha ikummbya-fo vakanndingitya nawe kavavasya vanderuuka mbai ilya ingyi.
Nalyo mwaarya wa fitabu umwi kamweengya kammbia, “Llori shikundye ikulatya wo ando koose kusheenda.”
Na Yesu kammbia, “Maparwe mmbo atiri mbanga ta vayo na ndeye ta nginiiu tikavetira fifuri fya vayo. Indi mwana yeto wa nndu nnatiri ando asheekeryaa nrwe wakwe-fo.”
Na ungyi akee nnang'ani ya valya vakiloshyony kyakwe kasha kammbia, “Nndumi shiniinga mumu mbele shikweengye inderika nde wakwa.”
Indi Yesu kammbia, “Shilatya, kureeye vafu varike vafo vawo.”
Naasa Yesu kasaama ngalaveny valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakasaamafo nawe.
Naasa elyi veefo kukasha uraato uniini. Ngalava ilya ikatana yasikywa ni matundulu. Nawe eelele rony.
Vakanserikya vakamwaanta vakammbia, “Woi Nndumi lwaauwe lwiifo lusiaa.”
Nawe kavavia, “A nkikyi elyi mweereiye indo? Mmbo mukee va kikusiryo kyaangu nnu.” Nalyo kasalala kakyeemmya uraato lulya na yeeve ilya kukava kimammya sau.
Naasa vandu valya vakatambiswa vakaamba, “A nndu yeu ni wa kwi, kutani uraato lwamwiirikya na yeeve yeyo!”
Naasa ekifika kwakulya ya uruka lwa Vagerasi kakwaanannya-fo na vandu vavii vatirwa mmimuyo mikasha vauka fifuny vakee vanyaasi nnu, nta nndu nalaidimi iira shia ilya.
Nawo akakawo vakoongora vakaamba, “Yewe mwana wa Iruva nkyikyi lutiri na yewe? A mmbo kulesha kunu kushelusisya kulaore kyeeri kyeru kyamfika?”
Naasa kwaasha na yoo ando vekai kweifo ironda lya nguve lyishiiswa-fo.
Nalyo mimuyo ilya mikasha ikantereva ikaamba, “Kwakooya kwalwaanta lurumi lundeanga irondeny lya nguve yeto.”
Nawe kaivia, “Kweenngye!” Nato akakato tikapufuka-fo tikandekweera efo waangeu. Tikasiiya efo yeeveny tikafiiya efo mureny.
Naasa veesi valya vakarisha vakatana vafika kulya muriny. Vakandeongoya-fo mbony tilya toose na ta vandu valya vatirwa mmimuyo mikasha.
Nalyo akakava vandu va kulya muriny vakakuruka-fo woose vakasha ikwaananya na Yesu. Vekillolya vakantereva naambo nauke efo myuungony yaawo.
Nalyo kasaama neefo ngalaveny karuuka yeeve ilya katana afika kulya muriny kwakwe muni.
Nalyo akakau nndu akee kitongororo malungo vakamweende eeriwa na kitara. Na Yesu kalollya kikusiryo kyawo, kavia nndu ulya muumu malungo, “Wuiyo mmuu mwana-kwa, kwambutwa ulyamari lwafo!”
Nalyo akakava velosha mavavaso vaiyoo maata verera efo nriminy wawo veshaambaa, “Yeu mmbo anruma Iruva.”
Yesu kamanya makusaro awo kaamba, “Naambo ki elyi mwakusara ukasha efo miriminy yaany?
A kyaangu yaamba-u nkingakyi? Ndesa ni yaamba, ‘Kwambutwa ulyamari lwafo ao ni yaamba, kwiipo kweenda?’
Manyiny-te Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo atiri ushilyi kunu urukeny lwa yuuta vandu ulyamari, naasa kavia kitongororo kilya, ‘Salala ipoo kitara kyafo kukweengye kyeny.’ “ "
Nawe kakwiipo kakweengya kyeny.
Naasa mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu vekilollya kive indo, vakatirwa mbwerei, vakaitikisa Iruva elyi aniinga vandu ushilyi uniini indo.
Nalyo Yesu eshiraa kulya kalollya nndu akee rembo efo mmba yeededemya avaangwa ni Matayo, kammbia, " “Shilatya!” " Nawe kakwiipoo kallatya.
Kikava elyi eefoo alyaa shoonga efo mmba kwa Matayo vakasha vadedemi vengyi na valyamari vakasha nau vakalya shoonga ando amwi na Yesu na yewo vakiloshyony kyakwe.
Na Vafarisayo vekilolya indo vakavia valya vakiloshyony kyakwe, " “A kyavaany inda elyi llosha waany alya shoonga ando amwi na vadedemi na valyamari?”
Nawe ekiita indo kavavia, “Nshi yewo vakee vesha vatiri isiiyo mwaanga-fo; indi ni yewo valwee.
Kweenngye mukandekulosha kilya kikee kirere kyeyaamba, ‘Kishisenyi ni ilyillya vandu nta nshi irasyo-fo.’ Shamashika vandu shisheye ivavaanga nshi yewo va usumanu-fo ni yewo valyamari.”
Nalyo valya vakiloshyony kya Yohane vakansheya vakaamba, “Yese lwava vekootoya na Mafarisayo kiwo, na yewo vakiloshyony kyafo valakootoye. A kimaruma nkyoki ndesa?”
Na Yesu kavavia, “A vandu va walyi vashidimaa inda ikapa kiiyo meendi muni walyi asindi nawo? Indi ikaa ishe mikonu vashesokwa muni walyi; llyony vashekootoyaa.
Nta nkwiifoo nndu afumyaa soori shikuu kirami kiiya-fo, mashika yekyo kiveiyo-u mmbo kyawuya yuuka-u na yoo kurandukye kwengere ing'ana.

Nta mmbasurumaa mfinyo mwiiya efo mbolokony shikuu-fo, Kwakooya mmbo kyava indo mboloko yeto mmbo tiriikaa, na mfinyo upusuke. Indi mfinyo yeto mwiiya mmbo wasurumwa mbolokony shiiya nafyo fi fivii fikaa nisha.”
Naasa eefo ereraa indo nndu nshilyi umwi kasha nau kamoolokya ng'undeny eshaambaa, “Shitiri mwana wakwa wa kyeny amfwa ulaalu indi. Indi woi mbee osho kundemwekerya woko llyo ashewuiyoo m muu.”
Nalyo Yesu kakwiipoo kaenda aryani nawe na vakiloshyony kyakwe.
Nalyo nndu nka alwee ndwari ya kyika ando a myaaka ikumi na ivii kasha numa yakwe kapaana ikedu lya soori yakwe ya uwe.
Nawe mmbo arera efo nriminy wakwe, “Naakwa shapaana soori yakwe sheni nshekushiiyaa.”
Nalyo Yesu kainduka kallollya kammbia, “Wuiyo mmuu mwana-kwa, kwammekusirya-u indo, nkyo kyakukira.” Nka ulya kashia llya yeni.
Naasa kafika kulya kyeny kwa nshilyi ulya. Kakooya-fo vekapa fivale na vandu vengyi nkuka vakuumbye-fo vekapaa kyoorongye.
Nawe kavavia, “Kwiipony-fo mwana yeto nshi afwa-fo mmbo alele rony.” " Vakanseka.
Naasa vandu valya vekuumbye-fo vekimaa yaantwa-fo, nawe kaanga neefo mmba kantira woko; kimwana kilya kikakwiipoo.
Naasa mbony tilya tikakwaana kulya urukeny koose.
Nalyo Yesu kakwiipoo keenda na mbee. Naasa vandu vafu miso vavii vakallatya numa vakaonisa unyanga veshaambaa, " “Woi mwana wa Davidi lusarye ukiva lweru!”
Naasa elyi ammaa ifika-u kaira na efo mmba. Na vafu miso vakansheya; nalyo Yesu kavavia, “A mukusirye-u sheelyi nshiidimaa itana kindo ekyi?” Vakammbia; “Ee-da Nndumi.”
Nalyo kavapaana miso alya awo eshaambaa, “Kivemuviiyany indo, shaasa mukusirye-u.”
Naasa miso alya awo akatarambuka. Nalyo Yesu kavavia na finya kaamba, “Manyiny kulave nndu akimanya.” "
Nawo vakakwiipoo-fo vakandekwaanisa mbony yeto efo urukeny koose.
Naasa elyi wo veefo vesheendaa vakasha vandu vakamweenngye nndu akee mbimbi atirwa mmumuyo nkasha.
Mumuyo ulya nkasha ukaantwa nalyo mbimbi ilya ikawuya irera na vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vakasongololo vakaamba, " “Nkundeonike nndu kunu Israeli akee shawe-fo.”
Naasa Vafarisayo vakaamba, “Ni ngaya ya yeto nniini wa mimuyo mikasha nnyo aanta nayo mimuyo mikasha-te.”
Na Yesu kasengetya miri yeyo miniini na yeyo midu myoose eeloshaa efo mmba tawo teeterevya na yoongoya vandu nrumi ya nsia yeyo ya umangyi na ishiisa vandu ndwari ya wo ngata na unana lwa wo ngata.
Na elyi alollye ironda iniini lya vandu vakuumbye-fo kavavyo mmuu kyawo mashika vakee vakapekape mariinga vakee veere efo vavakye mburu tilatiri mwiisi.
Nalyo kavia valya vakiloshyony kyakwe. “Fya yuulula mfiingyi fiifo, lyo veerundya-u vakaangwa.
Naasa tereveny yeto muni irema narumi varundi efo mailullyony akwe.”
Nalyo kavaanga vakyiloshony kyakwe ikumi na vavii, kavaniinga ushilyi lwayiitorya mimuyo mikasha naambo vayaante, na ishiisa ndwari ta wo ngata na unana lwa wo ngata.
Na marina a vakyiloshony kyakwe ikumi na vavii akee ule, Wa mbee ni Simion avaangwa Petro, na Andrea akee mwanamaye. Yakobo akee mwana wa Sebedayo, na Yohane akee mwanamaye,
Filipo, Bartolomayo, Toma na Matayo yeto akee nndedemi, Yakobo akee mwana wa Alfayo na Tadayo,
Simion akee wa yewo vakaari iringa ngata ya Kiyuda, na Yuda Iskariote yeto alenndiingya.
Yewo ikumi na vavii Yesu mmbo alevaruma kavavavasa ashaambaa, “Nta mulaire shia ya vandu va masanga. Nta muri wa Vasamaria mulaange nafo-fo.
Enderuuyeny vandu va Israeli yewo varekye sha moonri.
Na elyi murie shia endeny mwiikapaa weele mwaambe, ‘Umangyi lwa iruveeu lwamaafukya.’
Yewo valwee vashiiseny yewo vafu varuteny, yewo va ivave veremuteny, mimuyo yeyo mikasha yaanteny; mwankiniingwa kya ruu, kevekiniingyeny-fo ruu.
Muleepoo saabu nta fesa nta ukova lwa iiniva kisiny;
nta mulakamare mboloko ya shia nta soori ivii, nta nsengye. Nndu nndundi mmbo asumani iniingwa shoonga yakwe.
Na kwakooya mushaangaa muriny wa vandu ukava nniini ao ni n-du lolen-fo warya nndu eefo asumani mfo kundo mushekaa kutani mwakwiipoo-fo.
Na elyi mushaangaa efo mmba iidikireny.
Kwakooya ni mmba isumannyi kiidikiro ekyo kyany nakyo mmbo kisheikayaa, na kwakooya kulaore isumannyi kiidikiro ekyo kyany, mmbo kishemuwuiyaa.
Na kwakooya nndu ara nalamuwarya, nta yaaranya marero any, somukeny efo mmba yeyo, naakwa ni efo muriny yeto mwiikakapaa kiluulyi efo marendeny.
Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Ekyo kya uruka lwa Sodoma na Gomora kishangwaa nkonu yeto wa mwaandu ngota kya muri yeto.’ “
“Llen-te mmbo shamuruma mukee sha moonri akee nnang'ani ya fite fya ngoroshony. Veny sha shoka tikee shirango, muveva sha mbeta tilashevikaa ntambo.
Na yeni kwiiseny na vandu. Mmbo vashemurambikyaa efo ikwaanuny lya masiingo, na efo mmba tawo teeterevya vavemukapa na ngova.
Naakwa ni efo usanguny lwa vashilyi vaniini na vamangyi musherawaa-fo kimaruma kyakwa kive nkyo ukureeki lwa efo kwawo na kwa vandu va masanga.
Na kyeeri vamurambikya-fo nta mulasaukwa kindo mushaambaau. Mashika kyeeri ekyo kyeni mmbo musheniingwaa kya yaamba-u.
Mashika veerera-u nshi yeni-fo ni Mumuyo wa Nde waany, mmbwe areraa-u akee efo miriminy yaany.
Kya indi mwanamaye wa nndu akaa nanderambikya-fo mwanamaye nandewaawa, na ndeye wa nndu nanderambikya-fo mwana. Na vana wa nndu vakwiipoo kya isua vamiku vawo vandevarambikya-fo vandewaawa.
Na yeni mushevaa veesuwa mmbandu woose kimaruma kya irina lyakwa. Indi yeto asisirya-u kafika mafurummyony, mmbwe akirwaa.
Naasa kwakooya vashemurishisaa vamwaante muriny mmbe, enderishyeny ungyi. Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Nta mmushekwanisaa miri yeyo ya kunu Israeli-fo, kulaore Mwana yeto wa nndu ansha.’
Na nndu wa kiloshyony nta nnairye llosha wakwe-fo, nta nndu kishinga nnairye nndumi wakwe-fo.

Mmbo kimaa nndu wakiloshyony kwakooya ava sha llosha wakwe; na nndu kishinga kaveva sha nndumi wakwe. Vantana vambaanga yeto muni kyeny Belsebuli afikaany kya va kyeny kwakwe nshi kishiiryaa kilanya?”
“Naasa nta mulavairyae-fo shamashika nkwiifo kindo kikee kisikye kire kilalollyo-fo. Nta kindo kiifo kisurumi kire kilamanyika-fo.
Ekyo shamuviiya ireemeny endekyaambeny efo seny. Na ekyo mwamiita muvereryo kuriny endekyaambeny musaamye mmbeeu.
Na yewo vewaa mwiili yeto wa nndu nta valashiidimaa iwaa nrima yeto nta mulavairyae! Kilanya mmbo mushiiryaa yeto aidima ireta nrima na mwiili fi fivii firekye yefo murony wa Gehena.
A ngyuruu ivii nshi tikumbwaa senti imwi? Nta lumwi lwa vayo lluwaa si kulaore Nde yeto waany aishi-fo.
Na yeni naakwa ni fii ta efo nrweny wany mmbo tikee sheekeni toose.
Naasany nta mulairyee! Mmbo mwiirye ngyuruu na tikava shiingyi.”
“Naasa wo nndu ankureekaa-u kyakwa efo fisanguny fya vandu, neeny nshevekureekaa-u kyakwe efo kisanguny kya Nde wakwa wa efo iruveeu.
Na wo nndu ashikana efo fisanguny fya vandu neeny nshevenkanaa efo kisanguny kya Nde wakwa wa efo iruveeu.”
“Nta mulakusare mmbo shisheye yeende ufoo kunu urukeny. Kindo shisheye yeende nshi ufoo-fo ni usu.
Mmbo shisheye ilakanisa nndu na mwana na mwana wa kyika na maye, na mwalyi na mammi wakwe.
Na yewo va kyeny kwa nndu vaveva mmbo vakiduva vakwe.
Na yeto mwiikunda ndeye ao maye ngota yen, we nshi nndu ashisumannyi-fo. Na yeto mwiikunda mwana wakwe wa womi ao wa kyika ngota yeny, we nshi nndu ashisumannyi-fo.
Na yeto nalakurika nsalaba wakwe neeshilatya, we nshi nndu ashisumannyi-fo.
Yeto mwiikuwonisya muu wakwe mmbo asheuretaa. Na yeto mwiikuretya muu wakwe kikava ni kimaruma kyakwa mmbo asheuonisaa.”
“Na yeto amuwarya efo kyeny kwakwe ni yeny ashiwarya. Na yeto ashiwarya yeny mmbo awarya yeto aleshiruma.
Na yeto awarya nndu nkisuku aishi ni nndu nkisuku, mmbo aniingwaa waavi lwa nndu nkisuku. Na yeto awarya nndu nsumanu aishi ni nndu nsumanu mmbo aniingwaa waavi lwa nndu nsumanu.
Na vandu yewo vafwafwa naakwa ni yeto umwi nsi nndu kanrita mura mweni na aishi mmbo akee wakiloshyony kyakwa, shamuvia kya dede waavi lwakwe llukaa lureke-fo.”
Naasa Yesu ekimaa ivavasya valya vakiloshyony kyakwe ikumi na vavii, kakwiipoo kulya vakai nandelosha vandu na iwoongoya mbony efo miriny yaawo.
Naasa elyi Yohane akee kulya kifinngyony kashevio mbony ta mashora Kristo aifo arundaa, naasa kanrummya nrumi karika vakiloshyony kyakwe vavii.
Kandemmbia, “A yewe mmbwe ulya avereyo nashe ao lukavereya ungyi ndesa?”
Na Yesu karouwa kavavia, “Kweenngye mundevia Yohane kindo mwamiita na ikilolya.

Vandu vafu miso veefo valolaa, na vandu vakee miketekete veefo vasheendaa, na va ivave veefo vasheeremukaa, na vandu vafu maarwi veefo vashiitaa; na vandu vafu veefo varutwaa, na vandu vakiva veefo vashoongoywaa nrumi ya Iruva ya nsia.
Na ngoma nndu nalautau nsindara yaa kwakwa.”

Naasa elyi vandu valya varie shia yeewuya, Yesu kapooka irera na vandu valya vakuummbye-u kavavia kya Yohane kaamba, “A kimaruma mukakwiipoo kyeny mukandefika kulya kasa nkyoki? A ndesa ni indelola ikongye lyivivitwa-vivitwaa ni uraato?
A kindo kilemuuta kikammufita-fo nkyokyi? A ndesa ni indelola nndu aree soori shisha! Vandu varee findo fisha ekawo vakee efo mmba ta kimangyi.
A kilemuuta kulya kyeny kikammufita-fo nkyokyi? A ndesa ni indelola nndu mwaauya fisuku? Ee-da na yeny shamuvia mmbo aveng'ani kailanya nndu nkisuku.
We mmbwe ulya akee mwaambe efo mareiyony meele kaambawa, ‘Akau nrumi wakwa shanruma nakwiirye mbee, nandekusongoya shia yafo.’
Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Nnang'ani ya vandu woose valembonika kulandekwiipoo-fo nndu ang'annyi Yohane Mbatisi-fo. Indi efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu, nndu aifo akee n-du ya vengyi mmbo amwiirye.
Na kipookya fyeeri efyo fya Yohane Mmbatisi fika ulaalu, umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo lwatirwa na finya, na vandu vaafinya vakava velurakwa-u.
Kimmba veawuya fisuku woose sanda na uvavaso, mmbo valeva veamba fisuku kumande Yohane.
Na mukakunda iirikya we mmbwe Elia ulya akee nteerye nashe.
Nndu atiri maarwi a yaaranya navearannya!’
A irika elyi lya vandu yeva shilyiinanise neekyi? Mmbo lyifwanani na vana vadu vakaa ando a singira vakavaangana na wooroyaawo.
Vakaamba, ‘A elyi lwamukapya fivale neeni mulafini? A elyi lwakapa kiiyo neeni mulakape mbafu?’
Yohane mmbo alesha nafo nalakee nndu mwiilyaa nta mwiina, nawo vakaamba, ‘Mmbo atirwa mmumuyo nkasha.’

Mwana yeto wa nndu kasha nafo akee mwiilyaa na mwiina vakauya yaamba, ‘Akakau makilya na makina mfinyo, kaveva na mbuya ya vadedemi na valyamari,’ kikava waarya lwa Iruva mmbo lukooya ivinga, kyuuka na efo mashoreny a vayo.”
Naasa kapooka isakira miri ilya kundo kuleutikya mashora akwe a wiidimi meengyi, na vandu nta valaute-u yaalashika efo miriminy.

Kaamba, “Oshiny lwafo yewe Betisaida! Mashika kulya Tiro na Sidoni, kwee mmbo kuleutikya mashora a wiidimi sha alya aleutikya efo kwany, kwee valemaalashika efo miriminy kasha na iraa masara a ukiva na ikoollya ifu,
Indi shamuvia, ‘Ekyo kya Tiro na Sidoni mmbo kishangwaa nkonu yeto wa mwaandu ngota yekyo kyany.’

Na yewe Kapernaumu kuleroswa kwatana kwakooya iruveeu, mmbo kushoolotwaa kufike ando a vafu! Mashika kulya Sodoma kukooye mmbo kuleutika-fo mashora a wiidimi sha alya aleutika kwafo, mmbo verewaa-u vafike nkonu wa inu.
Indi shamuvia, ‘Nalyo ekyo kya Sodoma mmbo kishangwaa nkonu yeto wa mwaandu ngota ekyo kyafo.’ “

Naasa kyeeri yekyo kyeni Yesu kaalwa kaamba, “Shakwaarafuma paa woi Nde kukee Nndumi wa efo iruveeu na wa masanga, kimmba mbony yeti kwatisuruma vandu vaarya-reu, na yewo varango, kwawuya itirambuya vakoku.
Ee-da Nde, ni indo kilevekusenya.
Mmbo shilerambikywa findo fyoose ni Nde-yaakwa. Nta nkwiifo nndu aishi Mwana-fo kulaore ni Nde. Nta nndu aishi nde-fo, kulaore ni Mwana, na nndu yeto Mwana ankunda inrambuya.
Kusheyeny na kwakwa yeni moose mwivinaa, mukee varovye mmario, na yeny nshemwiimurisaa!
Endeny raare neeny mukufunde kwakwa, shamashika shikee mfoo shavekunyiisa na nrima, llyoo-ny musheonisyaa mirima yaanga kiimuyo.
Mashika raare yakwa ikee shisha na irio lyakwa likava yaangu.”
Kyeeri kilya Yesu kaira mareminy a nganu elyi lya nkonu wa Sabato. Valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakalyiwa nshaa, vakapooka yuurushwa fyaa fya nganu vakasisasisa vakalya.
Naasa Vafarisayo vekilolya vakaamba, “Lla-te vakiloshyony kyafo mmbo vatana kindo kilatiri mumu weetana nkonu wa Sabato.”
Nawe kavavia, “A mmbo mulandesomi shaasa Davidi aletana kyeeri eetirwa nshaa we na valya eeryani nawo?
Shaasa aleanga na efo mmba ya Iruva vakalya mikate ilya ya kideesyo, nayo nta we nta wooroye valeetiri mumu weelya, kulaore ni Vakohani veni?
A ndesa mmbo mulandesomi efo mavavasony kya vakohani yewo elyi nkonu wa Sabato mmbo vaimbwa Sabato nta valatiri uvingo.
Na yeny shamuvia, ‘Ekyi kyikee yaa mmbo king'annyi mmba ya Iruva!’
Na kilya kikee kirere kyeamba, ‘Kishisenyi ni ilyillya vandu, nshi irasyo-fo, kwee mwenkimanya shaasa kikai, nta mmweekundaa idenga vandu yeva valatiri uvingo-fo.’
Shamashika Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo akee Nndumi wa Sabato.”
Nalyo kakwiipoo alya vakai kafika efo mmba yaawo yeeterevya.
Nalyo akakau nndu aifo atiri woko lukee kitongororo. Nawe vakammbesa vakaamba, “Kwiifo mumu-ro weeshiisa nndu nkonu wa Sabato?” Nyeeli vasia kyeenkumba.
Nawe kavavia, “A mmbo kwiifo nndu kunu kwany atiri mburu yakwe imwi nsi kakooya yamooloka kiroriny elyi nkonu wa Sabato, kara nalayuuta-fo?
A nndu nshi we ailannyi mburu deny? Naasa mmbo kuveefo mumu-da weetanya vandu mesha nkonu wa Sabato.”
Nalyo kavia nndu ulya, “Orwa woko lwafo!” Nawe kaorwa. Lukawuya iva usha sha yelo lungyi.
Na Vafarisayo vakasomuka vakandenruvya shila vasie mwaanya wa immamita.
Naasa Yesu kamanya kakwiipo-fo.
Vandu vakallatya veengyi nawe kavashiisa woose kavavia nta mulasheevia nndu.
Na kimaruma kikeenda indo ni kilya kilererwa ni nkisuku ulya Yesaya kyeamba,
“Akakau nndundi wakwa shilensauwa, mmbwe nkunde wakwa ashisetye nriminy, neeny nshemmbikya Mumuyo wakwa nankaye. Nawe ashoongoyaa vandu va masanga ngaa ya songosiny.
Nawe nta nalashaandwa myaandu nta nalashekoomaa. Na unyanga lwakwe nta lulashiitiwa efo shia.
Na irere lyikee ibobore nta nnyashelyifishaa-fo, na uruu lufumbyaa nsu nta nnyashelurumyaa-fo. Mmbo ashekapannyaa efyo fya usumanu fivinge.
Na irina lyakwe llyo vandu va masanga vashelyivikaa nsia.”
Nalyo keengyo nndu atirwa mmumuyo nkasha, avekee mfu miso, kaveva mbimbi. Nawe kankira. Nndu ulya mbimbi kawuya irera na ilola.
Naasa vandu valya vakuummbye-u mamwiingyi vakaising'ang'a. “A ndesa yeu mmbwe mwana ulya wa Davidi?”
Na Vafarisayo vekiita kiirerwa indo vakaamba, “Yeto nta nnyaanta mimuyo mikasha kulaore ni elyi aekywa ni Belsebuli yeto akee nniini wa mimuyo mikasha-fo.”
Nawe kamanya makusaro alya awo kavavia, “Wo umangyi lwiifo lukaraukana lukakukapa weni mmbo luwaa. Na wo muri wa vandu wiiyo naakwa ni mmba ikaraukana ikakukapa sheni nnyikaaufo.
Na kwakooya satana ashaantaa satana urooye, mmbo araukana kakukapa muni. Naasa umangyi lwakwe mmbo lushidimaa ikaa-u inda?
Na kwakooya yeny mmbo shaanta mimuyo mikasha sheekywa ni Belsebuli, a vana yewo vany wo mmbo vaanta vaekywa mmbiny? Kimmba ni indo mmbo vashemuutyaa uvingo.
Indi kwakooya shaanta mimuyo mikasha sheekywa ni Mumuyo wa Iruva, akakakyo mwammaafukywa ni umangyi lwa Iruva-te!”
“Ao ni inda nndu ashiidimaa yaanga efo mmba kwa mwaafinya nandekamara-fo fiiya fyakwe, kwakooya kulaore ampooka ifinga mbele mwaafinya ulya? Llyony ashekamaraa fya efo mmba kakwe nafimaa-fo.
Nndu nalakee wa kyaalu kyakwa mmbo akee nkiduva wakwa. Na yeto nalasheekyaa isanyirya mmbo anyanyataa.
Kimmba ni indo shamuvia, ‘Kya wo ulyamari lwa nndu na kya wo kyaararo kya nndu mmbo asheonaa ifwaaywa. Indi kya kyaararo kya yaarara Mumuyo Mweele, kyeekyo nnaonaa ifwaayo-fo.’
Kwakooya nndu arera kya imina Mwana yeto wa Nndu asheona ifwaaywa. Indi kwakooya nndu arera kya imina Mumuyo Mweele, ekyo kyo nnaonaa ifwaayo-fo, nta meendi a ulana yelu nta yelo lwiishaa-fo.”
“Allweny nri uve nsha na ndunda ta vayo tiveshia. Ao allweny nri uve nkasha na ndunda ta vayo shikasha.
Yeni ufyari lwa shoka a ni inda mushiidimaa irera kisha mummbe vakasha? Mashika efyo fiishwe efo nriminy mfyo kana kafirera.
Na nndu yeto nsha efyo fisha asurumyi kaveva mwiiutya vandu fisha.
Indi shamuviany Wo kirero kya ngula vandu varera mmbo vashekireellywaa nkonu yeto wa mwaandu.
Shamashika marero afo nng'u kusherumbuywaa nang'u kwiivingaa, na marero afo-se kusherumbuywaa nang'u kwiivingwaa.”
Nalyo velosha va mavavaso vaiyo maata na Vafarisayo vakaallwa vakaamba, “Llosha, mmbo lukunndye lulollye wende kwafo!”
Nawe kavavia, “Irika elyi yeesi llyiraiye utuusi mmbo lyilanngye lyoorwa wende. Nta llyikaa lyiniingwa wende-fo, kuuta ni wende lwa nkisuku Yona.
Mashika shaasa Yona alekaa efo ndewuny ya ikunga lyilya iniini kamaa-fo mikonu iraru kio na nsanyiny Mwana yeto wa nndu ni kiwo-da ashevekaa efo si namae-fo mikonu iraru kio na nsanyiny.
Vasero va kulya Ninive mmbo vashekwiipoo vasalale-u nkonu yeto wa mwaandu amwi na irika elyi valyuutye uvingo, mashika wo valekurya llya valeongoywa mbony ni Yona.

Mangyi ilya ya kyika ya kulya taari ya sinde mmbo ashekwiipoo nkonu yeto wa mwaandu nasalale amwi na irika elyi nalyuutye uvingo. Shamashika, we alesha auka kishingony kya masanga nandearanya ufundo lwa Solomoni. Na ekyi kyikee yaa akakyi nkiniini kikailanya Solomoni.”
“Na Mumuyo yeto nkasha kwakooya vansomuka nnduny, mmbo uraaraa kundo kulatiri mura wiisyaa ando a iimuya ulaoni.
Nalyo ukaamba, ‘A shindewuya na mmba ilya kundo shilesomuka.’ Ukasha nang'u ukakooya ilelwa ikee shaaiye na ishopwa.

Nalyo ukaenda ukandeende mimuyo ingyi mikasha mfungare ikee myeesi ngota to mweni. Ukasha uryani nayo, nayo ikaanga nafo ikaallwafo kwekaa na mbony teefurumya ta nndu ulya tikakashaa ngota tilya ta mbee. Na kya irika elyi yeesi ni indo-da ekyo kya vayo ni indo kisheendaa.”
Naasa eefo areraa indo na vandu valya vakuumbye-fo nkuka, akakava maye na vanavamaye vansha nau vasalali yoo poo vakunndye irera nawe.
Naasa nndu umwi kammbia, “Akakawo mau na vanavamau vasalali yoo poo vakunndye irera neewe.”
Nawe kaalwa kavia ulya ammbia, “A ma ni vi? Na vanavama?”
Kooroya vakiloshyony kyakwe woko, kaamba, “Yeva mmbo ma na vanavama.
Mashika wo nndu atana efyo fisennyi Nde-yaakwa wa efo iruveeu, yeto mmbwe ava mwanama na mfwama na ma.”
Naasa nkonu ulya mweni Yesu kasomuka efo mmba kandekaa rembo alya mbaambaa ya yeeve ilya.
Na alya akai nsemu mwiingyi wa vandu ukandekuumbya-u. Nawe katana asaama na efo, ngalaveny kandekaa-fo rembo. Na nsemu ulya wa vandu ukuumbye-u ukasalala yoo waambeu.
Nawe kavavia mbony shiingyi asheera fyaaso kaamba, “Akau nndu mweera mbeu alekwiipoo kandeera mbeu takwe.
Nalyo eefo asheeraa tilya maata tikooloka yoo mbai ya shia. Na ndeye tikasha tikalya tikamaa.
Na tilya tingyi; tikooloka ando iwe lyikwaalye si, alatiri uteri wiingyi. Tikamya na kyaangu, neelyi tilatiri uteri lufikye si.
Indi elyi mwi ulevaa tikaya tikanaa, neelyi tilasotye miraarii si tikauma.
Na tilya tingyi tikooloka ando a miingeny. Miinga ilya ikarwa, ikatisisira,
tingyi tikooloka ando a uteri usha, tikaraaka fimu. Kimwi kikavika iyana, na tingyi makumi arindaru, na kingyi makumi araru.
Na nndu atiri maarwi earannya navearanya!”
Naasa valya va kiloshyony kyakwe vakasha na yoo akai vakammbia, “A kimaruma kwarera nawo kusheraa fyaaso nkyokyi?”
Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Yeni mmbo mwaniingwa imanya mbony tikee shirike ta umangyi lwa iruveeu. Indi kya yewo wo valaniingwa.
Kimmba nndu atiri kindo mmbo aniingwaa fiingyi katana afumbukywa. Indi yeto nalatiri kindo, mmbo asokwaa na kilya akooya atiri.
Nkyo kimaruma sharera nawo shisheraa fyaaso, mashika ilola valolaa valalollyaa, na yaaranya vaarannyi nta valaite nta iitumuso.
Na kisuku kilya kya Yesaya nng'u kyainukya kyeamba, ‘Yaaranya mushearannyaa mulamanyaa na ilola mulole mulalollyaa.

Mashika vandu yeva ngoo tawo tammba shuumu. Nawo vakava varoo yaaranya. Na miso awo vakasingira, naambo valakooye ilollya, nta iipuye kindo na maarwi awo, nta iipuye kindo na ngoo tawo wooke efo shieny tawo na yeny shivakire.’
Indi yeni miso any ava a ngoma mashika alollye kindo, na maarwi any, mashika aitye kindo.
Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Vakisuku veefo veengyi na vandu va usumanu velangye ilollya yekyo mulollye yeni, valalollye, na iita yekyo mwiitye yeni valaite.’ “
“Naasa yeni arannyiny-te kyaaso ekyo kya mweera mbeu shaasa kyikai.
Wo nndu aifo ashearannyaa kirero ekyo kya mbony ta umangyi lwa Iruva nalaitumuso mmbo asheywa ni yeto nkasha. Kasherakwa-u mbeu yeyo sheere efo nriminy wakwe. Nto mbeu tilya tilewa efo shia.
Na kya yeto tileerwa ando iwe lyikwaalye si. We mmbwe nndu mwaarannya kirero ekyo. Nalyo yeni kakyiwarya na nsia nriminy.
Na kindo atura ni miraarii. Mmbo akee nndu wa veru-veru. Kwakooya ashaatarwaa ao irishiswa kimaruma kya ndera yeyo, nalyo yeni kauta-u nsindara.
Na kya yeto tileerwa efo miingeny, we mmbwe mwiirannya ndera yeyo kandetirwa ni ngyusau ta muu yeu na ilembwa ni masaa, nafyo fikansisira na ndera yeyo ikakaa indo ilavika kimu.
Na kya yeto tileerwa ando a uteri usha, we mmbwe nndu mwiirannya ndera yeyo kaitumuso. Naasany kandevika fimu. Umwi kavika iyana, ungyi makumi arindaru, ungyi makumi araru.”
Na kyaaso kyingyi kaveera kaamba, “Umangyi lwa iruveeu lulesha ifwanana na nndu aleenda yeera mbeu shisha efo ireminy lyakwe.
Naasa elyi vandu valele rony nkiduva wakwe kasha nau. Kaera mbeu ta mamburu nnang'ani ya nganu tilya, kakweengya.
Kyasia, elyi mbeu tilya tamya tikava mooro na iraaka, nalyo mamburu alya akavelollywa paa.
Naasa mashinga a nndu ulya muni irema akansheya akammbia, ‘Ale Nndumi! Yewe kuleera mbeu shisha efo ireminy lyafo-ndi? A kundo lyoota mamburu alya nkwi?’
Nawe kavavia: Ni nkiduva alekitana. Mashinga alya akammbia, ‘A ndesa kwakunda lundesanyirya?’
Nawe kaamba, ‘Ode, elyi musanyiryaa mamburu yoo, naambo mulaillwe nganu mutisande nang'u.

Reny fing'ani fii-fivii ando amwi fifike yoo maveiyony. Na elyi kwamfika maveiyony, neeny mmbo nsheviaa yewo veevyaa Pookeny isanyirya mamburu alya mufinge fikonde fikonde andevivyo murony. Na nganu to tivikwa efo mbesheny yakwa.’ “
Na kyaaso kingyi kaveera kaamba, “Umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo lufwanani na mbekye imwi ya haradali. Nndu mmbo aleiipoo kandeyeera efo ireminy lyakwe.

Nayo mmbo ikee shinnywa ngota mbeu toose. Indi kwakooya yang'ana ikava niini, ikailanya mare alya akee maronge-fo eelonga shoonga, ikava nri mweni. Na ndeye ta efo nginiiu tikatana tasha ishevika fifuri fyavayo marambeny a vayo.”
Na kyaaso kingyi kaveera, “Umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo lufwanani na kinruwo kitarang'aa kyeefumbisa nswa. Nndu nka kakiipoo kakisanda na nswa fideeva firaru. Nato ukatana wakwaana itarang'a deny.”
Naasa mbony yeto toose Yesu alevia vandu valya vakuummbye-u aveeraa fyaaso. Nta nalavavie kindo kulaore aveera fyaaso-fo.

Na kimaruma kikaenda indo, ni kilya kilererwa na kana ka nkisuku ulya Yesaya naambo kikooye iinukya-u kyeamba, “Nshetarammbwaa kana kakwa sheere fyaaso shipare mbony yeto tekee shirike uka mapookyony a ulana yelu.”
Nalyo Yesu kasama vandu valya vakuummbye-u nkuka, kaenda efo mmba. Valya vakiloshyony vakasha ikuumbya yoo akai, vakaamba, “Lukapye nsuka wa kyaaso yekyo kya mamburu a efo ireminy, mbee!”
Nawe kaallwa kavavia, “Yeto mweera mbeu yeto shisha ni Mwana yeto wa Nndu.
Na irema elyo ni ulana yelu. Na mbeu yeto shisha ni vana va efo umangyi ny. Na mamburu yoo ni vana va yeto nkasha.
Na nkiduva yeto aleera ni mmbishwa. Na mailullyony ni yoo masiiyony a ulana yelu. Na veelula ni vasu va Iruva.
Nasaany shaasa mamburu asanyirywa akandevivywa murony, na yoo masiiyony a ulana yelu ni indo-da kishevaa.
Ni Mwana yeto wa nndu asherumaa vasu vakwe, vandesanyirya yewo veende misindara woose yuutwa efo umangyi ny lwakwe, na yewo vetana fya kiila.
Nawo vavaere efo irininy lya muro. Nafo kushekaa-fo kiiyo na irafunnya mayoo.
Llyo yewo va usumanu vashevaa paa sha mwi mweni; vekee efo umangyi ny lwa Nde-yaawo. Yeto atiri maarwi earannya navearannya.”
“Lyingyi umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo lufwanani na masaa akee masurumyi ando a ireminy. Nndu kaakooya, kawuya yaalyikya. Na elyi atirwa indo ni nsia kandekumba fyoose atiri kandeura irema lyilya.”
“Na lyingyi-se umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo lufwanani na nndu mwiikapa mbusha aruuyaa samana ta ngata shisha.
Naasa kakooya samana imwi ya uuru uniini. Kaenda kandekumba fyoose atiri kasha iyuura.”
“Na lyingyi-se umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo lufwanani na nreiyo wa makunga uleolotwa efo yeeveny ukaummbya wo ngata iifo.
Ukaishwa vakawoomuya na efo waambeu. Vakakaa-fo rembo. Alya mesha vakasanyirya efo fiiyeny fyawo. Na alya maporu vakaeera efo.
Na yoo masiiyony a ulana yelu ni indo-da kyishevaa. Ni vasu va Iruva vashekwiipoo vanderauwa-fo yewo veesi vavaute efo nnang'ani ya va usumanu.
Nawo vasheveeraa efo irininy lya muro. Nafo kukaa-fo kiiyo na irafunnya mayoo.”
“A ndesa mwaitumuso efo fyoose?” Vakaamba, “Ee-da mbee.”
Nawe kavavia, “Kimmba ni indo, naasa wo mwiilosha mavavaso aloshywa kya umangyi lwa iruveeu, mmbo avakye nndu muni kyeny asurumyi masaa akwe, kava muuta-fo fyeesimba fiiya na fikuu.”
Kyikava elyi Yesu ammanda yeera fyaaso efyo kakwiipoo efo akai.
Kandefika kulya muriny wakwe kundo alelelyo. Kavaloshya efo mmba yaawo yeeterevya. Nawo vakaising'ang'a vakaamba, “A nyira nndu yeu nkwi autye urango yelo na fya wiidimi efi atanaa?
Yeu nshi we mwana wa mwiipasha firi? Na maye nshi we Maria? Na vanavamaye nshi wo Yakobo na Yosefu na Simion na Yuda?
Na vamfwamaye nshi wo yewo vakee kunu kweru woose? Naasany nkwi nndu yeu autye findo efyo fyoose?”
Naasa vakatirwa nnyinyira nawe. Na Yesu kavavia, “Nndu nkisuku nnaminwa kulaore ni efo muriny wakwe muni na efo kyeny kwakwe kweni-fo.”
Naasa nafo nta nalatani-fo fya wiidimi mashika elyi valera valekusirya nawe.
Fyeeri efi fyeni mangyi ilya Herode kaita kilya kishaambawaa kya Yesu.
Naasa kavia vasero va efo poo kwakwe, “Ate yeto mmbwe Yohane mmbatisi? Mmbwe muni aleruka auka kwa vafu. Nkyo kimaruma findo efyo fya wiidimi fikatanyika efo kwakwe.”
Nyeelyi Herode entira Yohane, kamfinga kandemweera efo mmba ya vafinge kimaruma kya Herodia ekee nka wa mwana-maye, we Filipo.
Mashika Yohane emmbya, “Nkutiri mumu weenrwaa-fo.”
Nawe kaamba nammbwae, kawuya iiryaa vandu vashekuumbaa, neelyi vaishi Yohane ni nndu nkisuku.
Naasa elyi kwanfika nkonu weekummbwa llya Herode alewonika mwana ulya wa kyeny wa Herodia kafina yoo nnang'ani yaawo, kasennya Herode.
Nalyo kanteerya kyaasa elyaa mboo nanniinge kindo ankitereva na kyikava-kyi.
Nawe kasha nau akee mwaaye mmaye kaamba, “Shiniinga nrwe wa Yohane mmbatisi wekerwa yaa ndeeveny.”
Na mangyi ilya kating'wa. Indi kimaruma kya valya akee nawo rembo alya shoongeny, naasa kavavasya nandeniingwa.
Karuma Yohane nanderumbuwa nrwe kulya kifinngyony.
Naasa nrwe wakwe ukeendwa ukee nndeeveny ukaniinngyo mwana ulya wa kyeny. Nawe keenda ariiye maye.
Nalyo valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakasha nang'u vakaipoo nnying'a ulya vakandeurika. Vakaenda vakafitya Yesu mbony tilya.

Na Yesu ekiita kakwiipoo-fo kirisi kaenda na ngalava. Kafika kundo kulalelwa ekee kyaanya kyakwe muni. Na vandu valya vakuummbye-fo mamwiingyi vakakiita, vakansora-fo vesheendaa na marende vauka kulya miriny yaawo.
Naasa eekifika mbai ya nruva, kooka ngalaveny, kalollya vandu vasheye ikuumbya-u nkuka. Kavavyo m muu, kashiisa vandu yewo vawo valwee.

Naasa elyi kwamiila valya vakiloshyony vakasha na yoo akai vakaamba, “Kunu lukai ni kasa koomu, nalyo kwammiila. Naasany tauwany mamwiingyi yeu wa vandu vakweengye efo miriny yaawo; vandekuurya-fo fyeelya.”
Nawe kavavia, “Mmbatiri kimaruma kya yeenda-fo, yeni vaniingeny fyeelya.”
Nawo vakaamba, “Nta llutiri kindo yaa-fo kulaore ni mikate iraanu na makunga avii nsi.”
Nawe kavavia, “Sheengyeny findo efyo na yaa!”

Naasa, kavavasya vandu valya vakuummbye-u vavikwa rembo yoo mareny. Kawarya mikate ilya iraanu, na makunga alya avii. Kalla efo iruveeu kaana Iruva. Kaifisha-fisha fyenga. Kaniingya vakiloshyony kyakwe mikate ilya. Na vakiloshyony vakandeavya vandu.
Vakalya woose vakawuura. Vakaveipoo fipereshu filya fyasaa, ikaishwa mikusha ikumi na ivii.
Na valya valelya ni womi vafye sha fiku firaanu kuuta-fo vaka na vana.
Naasa karika valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vandesaama neefo ngalaveny vandesongwa iruuka vafike kulya kwa kulya, nawe natani asamana na vandu valya vakuummbye-u.
Na elyi ansama mamwiingyi ulya kandesaama na kulya ifumbuny, nandeterevya-fo Iruva ekee kyaanya kyakwe muni. Kukafika kweela ekee-fo we muni.
Naasa na ngalava ilya yamfika efo nnang'ani ya yeeve ilya, yeefo ishaatarwaa m matundulu mashika uraato lweesumani nawo.
Naasa elyi kukee kufii ikya, kasha na alya vakai asheendaa yoo uwe ya yeeve ilya.
Vekilolya ashendaa indo uwe ya yeeve vakasavaa. Vakaamba, “Ni nndu wa kwa vafu.” Vakairyaa vakafua uwui-uwui.
Nalyo yeni karera nawo, kaamba, “Wuiyony muu, ni yeny, nta mulairyae-fo.”
Naasa Petro karouwa kaamba, “Nndumi kwakooya ni yewe shivavasyaany shishe na yefo kukai shisheendaa yo uwe ya mura.”
Nawe kammbia, “Kusheye!” Petro kooloka efo ngalaveny kaenda efo uwe ya mura, kasha na alya Yesu akai.
Naasa elyi alollya uraato lwaira-u na finya kawuya iryaa. Kapooka irekya kafua, kaamba, “Nndumi shaauwa!”
Nalyo yeni Yesu kaorwa woko kantira kammbia, “Kukee nndu wa kikusiryo kidu! A nkikyi elyi kwatirwa nnyiinyira?”
Vakasaama na efo ngalaveny uraato lukamalallya.
Na valya va efo ngalaveny vakasha na yoo akai; vakamoolokya si. Vakaamba, “Ni kya dede yewe ni Mwana wa Iruva.”
Naasa elyi valemaa iruuka kwa kulya vakafika uruka lulya lwa Genesareti.
Naasa vasero va ando alya vekimanya mmbwe, vakaruma kulya kundevaangwa vandu va muungony kwawo woose. Vandu vakasha nang'u ishemweengye vandu valwee woose.
Vakamooshora nta vakupaanyi naakwa ni nse wa soori yakwe ya yeerya. Na valya vaiyo vapaana woose vakaveshia.
Nalyo Yesu kasheywa ni Vafarisayo na velosha va mavavaso vauka kulya Yerusalemu. Vakaamba,
A nkikyi elyi vakiloshyony kyafo vava veimmbwa ngyufundo ta vakuu? Mashika vara valasangya maako elyi valya shoonga.
Nawe kaallwa kavavia, “Nkyiki elyi yeni mwava veimmbwa ivavaso lya Iruva kimaruma kya ngyufundo yeto tany?
Shamashika Iruva mmbo avavasye kaamba, ‘Indya ndoo na mau. Na yeto aruma ndeye ao maye iwaawa nawaawa.’

Na yeni mukaamba-le, ‘Kwakooya nndu amina ndeye ao maye, Kavavia efyo mweewarya kwakwa fyeemulela, akakafyo shammefivika five waavi lwa mmba ya Iruva! Naasa, nndu yeto nalakiindye-se nta ndeye nta maye-fo.’
Na yeni mukaniinga ivavaso elyo lya Iruva lyikarewa mutewa ni ngyufundo yeto tany.
Mmbo mukee vakunang'ari, Yesaya kamuronga ninsha elyi aleawuya kisuku kilya kaamba,
‘Vandu yeva ni firomu fyawo vashiinndya nafyo, indi ngoo tawo tikakaa kwaasha neeny.
Mmbo vashiinndya kikee kya ruu deny, mashika miloshye yaawo valosha ni mavavaso a kivandu.’ “
Naasa kavaanga mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu naambo vashekuummbya yoo akai. Kavavia, “Aranyiny mwiitumuso!
Kindo kireveesa nndu nshi yekyo kishangaa na kaniny-fo, ni yekyo kishuukaa kaniny, nkyo kindo kireveesa nndu.”
Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakasha na yoo akai, vakaamba, “A ndesa kwamanya Vafarisayo vamiita kirero ekyo vakauta-u nsindara?”
Nawe kavavia, “Wo kindo kivaakye kiiyo kulaore kyammbaaywa ni Nde-yaakwa wa efo iruveeu mmbo kishiiluwaa.
Vakureeyeny-te! Mmbo vasongoye vafu miso shia vavekee vafu miso wo veni. Na kwakooya mfu miso asongoya mfu miso uroye shia, mmbo vashoolokaa irininy vee vavii.”
Naasa Petro kaallwa kammbia, “Lukapye nsuka wa kyaaso ekyo, mbee!”
Nawe kaamba, “Na yeni-da fika ulaalu nta mulandeipuye kindo?
A mmbo mulandeitumuso sheelyi wo kindo kishangaa na efo kaniny, mmbo kishoolokaa na ndewuny kikauka-fo kikaenda irininy?
Indi efyo fishuukaa efo kaniny mmbo fisomukaa fyuuka efo nriminy. Nafyo mfyo fireveesaa nndu.
Shamashika efo ngoony mfo kundo kushuukaa makusaro meesi, na fya uwai, na fya utuusi, na wiivi, na fya urui, na fya ukureekyi lwa wongo, na fyaararo.
Mfyo efyo fireveesaa nndu. Indi nndu kalya shoonga na maako alakee masangye nshikyo kireveesaa nndu-fo.”
Naasa Yesu kakwiipoo warya kooka-u, kafika kulya myuungony ya Tiro na Sidoni.

Nalyo akau nndu nka wa Kikanaani ansha nau, auka urukeny lwa kufii-fii. Kaonisa unyanga, kaamba, “Woi Nndumi kukee mwana wa Davidi, shisarya ukiva lwakwa! Mmbo shitiri mwana wa kyeny atirwa mmumuyo nkasha ukamwaaruva kyuumu.”
Nawe nalanndouwe nta kirero. Naasa, vakiloshyony kyakwe vakanserikya, vakantereva, vakaamba, “Ntauwe mbee, mmbo afua nnu yoo numa yeeru.”
Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Nshilerumwa kundo-fo, kulaore ni kwa vandu va Israeli varekye sha moonri.”
Nawe kasha nau kamoolokya si, kaamba, “Woi Nndumi sheekya kima kyakwa-te!”
Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Nshi kisha nndu nasoke fivana shoonga yaawo neerye fite-fo.”
Nawe kaamba, “Ee-da Nndumi. Indi naakwa ni fite fikulyiiyaa fipereshu fishaangaraa fyuuka efo meseny a vanndumi va vayo.”
Nalyo Yesu kaallwa, “Ee nka, kwankusirya-u kiniini-dwa. Kivekuviiyany indo shaasa kwakukunndya!” " Nalyo mwana ulya wakwe kashia kyeeri kilya kyeni.
Naasa Yesu kakwiipoo-fo kandefika kulya waambeu lwa yeeve ilya ya Galilaya. Kasaama na kulya ifumbuny kakaa-fo rembo.
Naasa vandu vakamweengya matorito meengyi varie yewo vakee miketekete, na vafu miso, na mbimbi, na fitongororo, na va ngata ingyi veengyi, vakaveera yoo marendeny akwe. Nawe kavakira.
Vandu valya vakuummbye-u vakasongololo elyi valollya valya fitongororo veshiaa, na valya vakee miketekete vesheendaa, na valya vafu miso velolaa. Nawo vakauta-u ing'anisa Iruva wa Israeli.

Naasa Yesu kavaanga valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakuummbye yoo akai, kaamba, " “Mmbo shavavyo mmuu kya nsemu yeu wa vandu. Mashika kwammiira-u mikonu iraru sele vesisirye yaa kwakwa, nta valatiri kindo kyeelya. Nta nshikunndye ivasama indo valakomba kindo-fo, mmbo valemmywaa efo shia.”
Valya vakiloshyony vakammbia, “A yaa kasa lukai, nkwi lushuutaa mikate miingyi indo yeewuutisa vandu yeva vamiingifwa indo?”
Na Yesu kavavia, “Mikate mutiri ni iinga?” Vakammbia, “Ni mfungare, na fikunga fiifo fyaangu.”
Naasa kavavasya vandu valya vakuummbye-fo mamwiingyi vakee rembo.
Naasa kawarya mikate ilya mfungare na makunga alya. Kaarafuma Iruva kafisha-fisha fyenga, kaniingya vakiloshyony. Valya vakiloshyony vakandeavya mamwiingyi ulya.
Vakalya woose vakawuura vakaveipoo na fipereshu filya fyasaa, mikusha ikaishwa mfungare.
Na vandu valelya vafye womi fiku fiina kwauta-fo vaka na vana.
Naasa kasama mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu. Kandesaama na efo ngalaveny. Kandefika kulya myuungony ya kulya Magadani.
Naasa Vafarisayo vakansheya na Vasadukayo vakasha imweesa. Vakantereva nawoore wende luuka iruveeu.
Nawe kaamba, “Nkwaany mmbo mwaamba, ‘Kwiifo kwiishaa ngesa, mashika efo iruveeu kufwani nsoru.’

Na elyi ngama mukaamba, ‘Inu kwiikapaa mmbwa ya maruruma.’ Mmbo kufwani samu efo iruveeu kukafumba-fumba. Kikavaany fwana ya efo iruveeu, yo mwaidima iimanya indi ngyende ta meendi yaa to mulatimanyi,
Irika yelyi yeesi lyiraiye utuusi lyisyaa wende. Nalyo nta llyisheniingwaa wende-fo, kulaore ni wende yelo lwa Yona. " Naasa kavara-u kakweengyany.”
Naasa elyi valya vakiloshyony varuuka vakafika kulya kwakulya, vakakooya vanrekyo iipoo mikate ya kishau.
Nalyo Yesu kavavia, " “Manyiny mukwiise na kinruwo kitarang'aa ekyo kya Vafarisayo na Vasadukayo!”
Nawo vakaumburana wo veni na veni. Vakaamba, “Ni elyi lwarekyo iipoo mikate.”
Nalyo Yesu kamanya kaamba, “Nyira vandu va kikusiryo kyaangu a ekyo mwaumburana kya mikate ilya mwarekyo iipoo nkyokyi?
A mmbo mulandeipuye nta kindo, nta ikummbwa mikate ilya na vasero valya fiku firaanu na mikusha ilya muleishura fipereshu mmbo yekee iinga?
Nta mikate ilya na fiku filya fiina na mikusha muleipoo shaasa yeefye?
A mmbo kyava-se inda elyi mwarekyo iipuye kindo sharerya nshi kya mikate ilya-fo! Naasa kevekwiiseny na kinruwo ekyo kitarang'aa ekyo kya Vafarisayo na Vasadukayo.” "
Nawo vakaitumuso, ate nshi akundye ivavia vakwiise na kinruwo ekyo kitarang'ashaa mikate-fo, mmbo akunndye ivavia vakwiise na ufundo lwa Vafarisayo na Vasadukayo.
Naasa elyi Yesu afika kulya Kaisaria ya Filipo Kavesa yewo vakiloshyony kyakwe, kaamba, " “A vandu varera inda kya Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo akee vi?”
Nawo vakaamba, “Kwiifo vaamba ni Yohane Mwiibatisa. Vengyi vakaamba ni Elia. Vengyi vakaamba ni Yeremia ao ni nndu wa vakisuku umwi.”
Kavavesa, “A yeni mmbo mwaamba yeny ni vi?”
Simon Petro kaallwa kaamba, “Yewe ni yewe Kristo kukee Mwana wa Iruva yeto muni muu!”
Yesu kaallwa kaamba, “Ngoma yewe Simion wa Yona! Mashika kyakurambuya ekyo nshi nndu wa vandu-fo Nde-yaakwa wa efo iruveeu.”
Naasa neeny shakuvia-le, “Yewe ni yewe Petro, na yaa iweu elyi ntannyau mmba nnyo siri yakwa. Nalyo nta finya ta ufu ntilyiidimaa-fo.

Mmbo nkuniinngyaa ngyufunguo ta efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu. Na kindo kwankifinga kunu urukeny, na efo iruveeu ni kiwo-da kyaveva kifinge. Na kindo kwankiporommwa kunu urukeny, na efo iruveeu ni kiwo-da kyaveva kiporommwi.” "
Nalyo kavavasa yewo vakiloshyony nta valandevie vandu vaambe we mmbwe Kristo.

Naasa fyeeri filya fyeni Yesu kapooka yoora valya vakiloshyony kyakwe mmbo kikee kirummbwe, nandefika kulya Yerusalemu nandelyisyo-fo ukiva wiingyi mmasiingo a uruka na Vakohani yewo vaniini, na vaarya va fitabu. Na iwaawa navewaawa, na elyi lya nkonu wa kararu narukeny.
Nalyo Petro kanrwaa na mbai. Kapooka inkeemmya kaamba, " “Ekyo Iruva nakiite kwaasha nakamwi! Kindo sha ekyo kilakuwonise-fo!”
Nawe kainduka kavia Petro, “Kwiipoo wuya numa yakwa Satana! Mmbo kwava nsindara-akwa! Mashika ekyo kikee nrweny kwafo nshi ekyo kya Iruva-fo, ni ekyo kya kivandu.”
Nalyo Yesu kavia yewo vakiloshyony vakwe, “Kwakooya nndu akunda ishilatya kuti nasue mwiili wakwe muni, nakurike nsalaba wakwe, nashilatyeeny!”
Mashika nndu yeto akundaa ikira muu wakwe mmbo asheuretaa. Na nndu asheeraa muu wakwe sakyeny kwakooya ni kimaruma kyakwa, mmbo ashuuwonisaa.
Mashika iviiri nndu ashuutaa-u nkyokyi kwakooya asheonisaa ulana loose luve mbusha yakwe, karetya-fo muu wakwe? Ao kindo nndu avikaa kyeewouwa muu wakwe nkyokyi?
Mashika mwana yeto wa nndu isha asheshaa aree usuri lwa Ndeye aryani na vasu vakwe va efo iruveeu, nalyo nandetaa wo nndu kiinani na mashora akwe.
Ni kya dede shamuvia, “Vandu vasalali yaa indi kwiifo valashoshaa ufu kulaore valollya Mwana yeto wa nndu ashe akee na umangyi lwakwe.”
Nalyo kukaira-u mikonu irindaru, Yesu kaipoo Petro na Yakobo na Yohane we mwanamaye wa Yakobo, kavasaamisa kundo kwa ifumbuny yaasha vakee kyaanya kyawo veni.
Nalyo kaalashika fwana yakwe valollye. Kisangu kyakwe kikamika sha mwi mweni. Na soori takwe tikava shaa pyai sha sa sheni.
Nalyo akakava Mose na Elia vansha nau ikoora nawo, vakarera nawe.
Naasa Petro karouwa kavia Yesu, “Nndumi nkisha elyi yese lukee kunu! Kwakunda ntanaa matengo araru, lyimwi lyafo, na lya Mose lyimwi, na lya Elia lyimwi.”
Arera indo nalandesyado akalyi ifishi lyitiri sa lyikavavikya kirishe. Akalu na unyanga luvaangaa luuka efo ifishiny lukaamba, “Akakau Mwana wakwa nkunde, yeto shilensauwa, mmbwe mushemwaarannyaa!”
Naasa valya vakiloshyony vaita kiireraa indo vakawa si na fisangu vakairyaa nnu.
Yesu kaserikya nau kavapaana, kaamba, “Kwiipony-te! Nta mulairyae-fo!”
Vakainuya miso na uwe valakilollye-se nndu, kuuta Yesu muni.
Naasa elyi veefo vashoolokaa kulya ifumbuny, Yesu kavavavasa kaamba, “Kindo ekyo mwamoorwa nta mulandeekivia nndu, na mutani mwafika kyeeri ekyo Mwana yeto wa nndu annduka auka kwa vafu.”
Naasa yewo vakiloshyony vakammbesa, vakaamba, “Mmbo kyikee inda elyi vaarya va fitabu vaammbaye, ‘Elia kuti napooke isha mbele.’ “
Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Elia isha ashaa-da navauwe findo fyoose fishie sha elyo mbee.”
Indi yeny shamuvia, “Elia alemmeesha nta valammanyi. Vakantannya shaasa vekundye. Na Mwana yeto wa nndu ni kiwo-da, we kuti navelyiswa ukiva mmbo.” "
Nalyo vakiloshyony vakamanya mmbo arera nawo kya Yohane Mmbatisi.
Na elyi vansha na efo kundo vandu vakuumbye-fo nkuka kasheyo ni nndu kashemoolokya ng'undeny.
Kaamba, " “Woi Nndumi! Sarya mwana yeu wakwa ukiva. Mmbo atirwa ni usukwa, kava mwiivavyo kyuumu. Mashika keengyi awa murony na keengyi kavewa efo mureny.
Na yeny shamweengye yewo vakiloshyony kyafo, nta valaidimi inshiisa.”
Na Yesu kaallwa kaamba, “Apaa irika lyilemmyi ikusirya-u lyikaenda mbai. A shikae neeni shifike kwi? Mweende na yaa shikai-te!”
Naasa Yesu kankeemmya, nalyo mumuyo ulya nkasha ukamuuka. Na mwana ulya kashia kipookya sa ilya sheni.
Nalyo vakiloshyony vakakuumbya yoo Yesu akai vekee kyaanya kyawo, vakaamba, “A elyi yese kulaore luleidima iwaanta nkikyi?”

Nawe kavavia, “Neelyi kikusiryo kyany kyava kyaangu! Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Kwakooya mwatira kikusiryo na kikava kyaangu sha mbekye imwi ya karadali, mmbo musheviaa ifumbu yelyi, kwiipoo yaa kuteshuke-u, nalyo lyiteshukaa-da.’ Nta nkwiifo kindo kilashiidimikaa kwany-fo. [
Ngata yei nnyishuukaa kulaore ni elyi kwatereva Iruva ando amwi na ikootoya-fo.]”
Naasa elyi veefo vashiira-iraa kulya Galilaya, nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Mwana yeto wa Nndu eefo anderambikyoo maakony a vandu.
Nawo vashemmbwaa. Na elyi lya nkonu wa kararu asherukaa. " Nawo vakasokywa mfyoova nnu.”
Naasa elyi vamfika kulya Kapernaumu, valya veesana ukamba lwa mmba ya Iruva vakasheya Petro, vakaamba, " “A llori yeto waany aniingyaa fesa ya mmba ya Iruva? Petro kavavia, ‘Avikaa-da!’ “

Naasa kaanga na efo mmba. Yesu kalava irera nawe, kaamba, “A mmbo kukusarye inda Simion? Vamangyi va masanga mmbo vashuutaa udedemi na ukamba kwa vandu vangava? Ndesa ni efo kwa vana vawo, ao ni efo kwa yewo vengyi?”
Nawe kaamba, “Ni efo kwa vengyi-te!” Yesu kammbia, “Naasany vana yewo mmbo vakee vaute-fo-sho.

Indi yese nta lulavateve vaute nsindara kweru. Naasa enda efo yeeveny kundeolota kiminya ekyo kya ngorori kyeereiya makunga. Na ikunga yelyo kulavaa ilyuuta-fo mmbo kushelyiipoo kulyitarammbwe kana. Llyo kushekooyaa-fo fesa imwi. Yuute-fo kundevaniinga ando akwa na afo.”
Naasa sa ilya sheni valya vakiloshyony vakasha ikuummbya yoo Yesu akai, vakaamba, “A yeto akee nniini wa wooroye efo umangyiny lwa iruveeu ni viiny?”
Nalyo kavaanga kimwana na yoo vakai. Kakivika nnang'ani yaawo.
Kaamba, “Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Kwakooya kulaore mwaaluka mukava va ngata ya fivana, efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu mmukooyaa yaanga-fo nta-fo!’
Naasany nndu kakwaalwa n-du we muni, kava wa ngata ya kimwana yekyi, yeto mmbwe nniini wa wooroye efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu.
Na wo nndu aiyo moose awarya kimwana kya ngata yeyo kimaruma kya irina lyakwa, mmbo ashiwarya yeny.”

“Na yeto ammba nsindara weetuula yewo vafwafwa vakusirye neeny, naakwa ni yeto umwi tupu, kya nndu yeto kyava kisha kilanya nafinngyo isewe lyirungutwaa ni nshungu efo singony yakwe, nandeolotwa efo uroony lwa yeeve.
Oshiny lwa ulana yelu kimaruma kya misindara iifo. Kya misindara isha kuti ishe. Indi oshiny lwa nndu yeto nsindara ushaa weendwa mmbwe.

Na kwakooya woko lwafo ao urende lwafo lushekweenngyee nsindara, lurummbwe kwalweera efo! Mmbo kyava kisha kilanya kwakooya kwaanga na efo muuny kukee kisaya ao kitongororo, ngota elyi kwatira maako ai avii na marende ai avii kwandeerwa efo murony ularumikaa.

Na kwakooya iriso lyafo lyishekweengyee nsindara, lyiillwe kwalyeera efo! Mmbo kyava kisha kilanya ikwiirya na efo muuny kukee nndu wa iriso lyimwi, ngota elyi kwatira miso ai avii, kwandeerwa efo Gehena ya muro.”
Manyiny mure mulamina yewo vafwafwa nta umwi! Mmbo shamuvia, vasu vawo efo iruveeu mmbo valollye kisangu kya Nde-yaakwa wa efo iruveeu kyeeri kyoose. [
Kimmba Mwana yeto wa nndu kindo asheye yuuta ni ishekira ekyo kirekye.]
A mmbo mukusarye inda? Kwakooya kwiifo nndu atiri moonri iyana kakooya lyimwi lyanreka-u nawe nare nalatiiya-u alya makumi kyeenda na kyeenda nandepara na efo mafumbuny asyaa lilya lyirekye.
Ikava pule yakwe kalyilollya, nkya dede shamuvia, mmbo afuraa nalyo kilanya ngota kya alya makumi kyeenda na kyeenda alarekye.
Na efo kisanguny kya Nde yaakwa wa efo iruveeu nawe-da nnakunndye yewo vafwafwa vareke-u nta umwi-fo.
“Na mwanamau kammeelyamara enda kumoore ulyamari lwakwe mwiiyo muveni. Kammekwiirikya mmbo kyava iviiri lyafo, kwankooya mwanama-u.
Kanra nalakwiirikya enda kundeende nndu umwi ao vavii-se, kushe nawo wo kindo kirumbuke kisunundwa nkana ka vakureekyi vavii ao vararu.
Kallema ivairikya wo enda kundekyoongoya siri. Kallema iirikya siri, naasany nakuviiyeeny sha nndu wa masanga na n-dedemi.”
“Ni kya dede shamuvia, wo kindo mwankifinga kunu urukeny, na efo iruveeu ni kiwo-da kyaveva kifinge. Na kindo mwankiporommwa kunu urukeny, na efo iruveeu ni kiwo-da kyaveva kiporommwi.
Na kingyi-se shamuvia, ‘Vandu vany vavii ao vararu vakandeeryana kya wo kindo vakitereve efo kwa Iruva, mmbo vashewonisaa kyuuka na Nde-yaakwa wa efo iruveeu.’
Mashika ando kwankuumbya vavii ao vararu kikee kya ikummbwa irina lyakwa, na yeny mmbu ando nkaa nnang'ani yaawo.”
Nalyo Petro kaserikya yoo kufii, kaamba, “Ale Nndumi! Mwanama mmbo ashirenngyaa keenga na yeny shive mwiimfwaaya! A ndesa shifike matorito mfungare, naasany?”
Yesu kammbia, “Shakuvia, nshi matorito mfungare-da-fo. Mmbo kufikaa matorito makumi mfungare ka mfungare.”
Nkyo kimaruma umangyi lwa iruveeu lukashefwanana na nndu mangyi akundye yeekena siye takwe na mashinga akwe.
Apooka yeekena kaengywa nndu wa sye atiri sye yakwe ya talanta 10,000.
Kakooya nalatiri fyeetaa, naasa nndumi ulya wakwe kavavasya nandekumbwa nasandwa na nka na vana, na findo fyakwe fyoose atiri, sye ilya indetawa.
Naasa ishinga llya lyikakweera si, lyikamweererya, lyikammbia, “Woi Nndumi, shisisirya, shikaa shikutaa-da.”
Naasa nndumi ulya kalyillya ishinga llya kalyilekeya. Na sye ilya katana alyireeya shoose.
Naasa ishinga llya kasomuka na efo poo. Kakooya mashinga wooroye, ulya umwi, atiri sye yakwe ya dinari 100. Kantira isanga, kammbia, “Shitaa sye yakwa kutiri!”
Ishinga llya uroye lyikammbia, “Shisisirya shikaa shikutaa-da!”
Nawe kalema fushu kandenrwaa kifingyony natani ataa sye ilya yakwe atiri.
Elyi mashinga wooroye valollya kive indo, vakasukywa nnu, vakanderuuya nndumi ulya wakwe mbony tilya tatanyika toose.
Nalyo nndumi ulya wakwe kammbaanga, kammbia, “Kukee ishinga yeesi! Sye ilya yakwa mmbo shilekureeya shoose llya kuleshyeererya.
Afikaany yewe nshi indo kivekusumanyi isarya ishinga uroo, shaasa yeny shavekusarya yewe?”
Nndumi ulya wakwe karooywa nngoo. Kanrambikya efo maakony a vetuurwa vandu, na natani ataa siye yakwe atiri namae piny.
Na Nde-yaakwa wa efo iruveeu ni indo-da ashemutanyaa yeni, kwakooya kulaore mwasaryana wo nndu na uroye efo miriminy yaany.
Kikavaany elyi ammarisya irera marero yoo moose, nawe kawara shia, kauka kulya Galilaya. Kaenda kyaaro kya uruka lwa Yudaya ashiiraa shia ya kwakulya ya Yordani.
Vandu vakallatya matorito meengyi, nawe kava mwiivakirya-fo.
Naasa Vafarisayo vakansheya vakamweesa vakaamba, “A ndesa nndu nndumi atiri muumu weelakana na nka wakwe kwakooya kwawonika kiteve kya ngata shoose?”
Nawe kaallwa, “A mmbo mulasommyi kya yeto aleumba vandu mmbo alevaumba vakee nndu nndumi na nndu nka uka elyo mapookyony?”
Kaamba, “Kimmba ni indo nndu nndumi ashuukaa kwa ndeye na maye nandekutira na nka wakwe, nawo vee vavii vashevaa mwiili umwi nsi.
Kikavaany nshi vakee-se vavii-fo, mmbo vava mwiili umwi nsi. Naasany kindo Iruva allunga we muni, na nndu nta nalakirauwe-fo.”
Nawo vakammbia, “A kyavaany inda, elyi Mose avavasye nndu naniinge nka barua ya llakanu nalakaniny nawe?”
Nawe kavavia, “Ni kimaruma kya mirima yaany ikee myuumu indo nkyo kileniinga Mose kaniingya muumu weelakana na vaka vany. Uka elyo mapookyony nshi indo kyeekai-fo.”
Neeny shamuvia, “ ‘Nndu kalakana na nka wakwe kwakooya kulaore ni kimaruma kya utuusi kaora ungyi mmbo atuusa.’
Naasa valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakammbia, ‘Kwankooya ekyo kya mmi na nka kikae indo, mmbo kyevaa kisha kilanya kwakooya nndu ara nalaalyika nka.’
Nawe kavavia, “Nshi woose vamanya itira kirero ekyi-fo, kulaore ni yewo vakee vaniinge.
Mmbo kwiifo valashiidimaa yoora uka elyo veerwaa, kukavekaa-fo vakee vaallwe indo mmbandu, kukavekaa-fo vakwaaluye indo wo veni kimaruma kya umangyi lwa iruveeu. Mwiidima itira kirero ekyo nakitire.”
Nalyo keengywa fivana nafyeekerye maako navefiterevya efo kwa Iruva. Na valya vakiloshyony vakavakeemmya.
Na Yesu kavavia, “Reny fivana efi fikusheye na kwakwa, nta mulafiimi! Mashika vakee va ngata yaawo mmbo umangyi lwa iruveeu lwava lwawo.” "
Naasa kafyeekerya maako. Kawuya kakwiipoo keenda.
Nalyo akakau nndu ansha nau kammbia, " “Llori, a fisha ntanaa mfyokyi shikooye muu wa llung'anu?”
Nawe kammbia, “Nkyiki elyi kwashivesya kya efyo fisha? Yeto aifo akee nsha ni umwi-da! Indi kwakooya kukundye yaanga na muuny wa llung'anu va mwiiringa mavavaso!”
Kaamba, “Nng'u angaa?” Na Yesu kammbia, “Kulawae, nta kulatuuse, nta kulaive, nta kulavike ukureekyi lwa wongo.
Indya ndoo na mau. Na nndu uroo kuvenkunda ndesa kukukunndye kumuni.”
Naasa nndu ulya, kammbia, “Efyo fyoose mmbo shileva mwiifiringa-da-te. A kindo kyashyaanguya-u nkyokyi?”
Yesu kammbia, “Kwakooya kukundye iva nndu nsongovisi deny, enda kundekumba efyo kutiri, kufyaavye vakiva. Llyo kushetiraa masaa efo iruveeu. Kwammaa oshoony kusheshilatya.”
Naasa nndu ulya eeta indo kasokywa mfyoova, mashika elyi ekee nndu atiri findo fiingyi.
Naasa Yesu kavia valya vakiloshyony kyakwe, “Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Nndu isimba atiri ngatara nnu yaanga umangyi ny lwa iruveeu.’
Na lyingyi-se shamuvia, ‘Nkyaangu kilanya ngamula iire na mmbweny ya sindanu,’ ngota nndu isimba ashaangaa neefo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu.”
Naasa valya vakiloshyony vekiita indo, vakamatuka nnu, vakaamba, “Kwakooya ni indo, a nndu ashiidimaa ikirwa ni vi?”
Naasa Yesu kavalola karii, kavavia, “Kunu vanduny ekyo nkishiidimikaa-fo, indi efo kwa Iruva mmbo fishiidimikaa fyoose.”
Nalyo Petro kaallwa, kammbia, “Lla-te mbee! Yese mmbo lwiisityo-u findo fyeru fyoose, lukakulatya. A ekyo lusheonisaa-u nkyokyi?”
