Na Yesu kavavia, “Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Yeni mushilatye mmbo mukooyaa elyi kwamfika meendi findo fyuumbe fisheviirwaa wiiya, elyi Mwana yeto wa nndu ashekaa rembo yoo kitiminy kyakwe kya itumbe, neeni mmbo mushekaa rembo fitimeny ikumi na fivii mushillye ngyufyari ikumi na ivii yeto ta Israeli.’

Na wo nndu aiyo areeye vanavamaye ao vamfwamaye ao ndeye ao maye ao vana ao marema ao mmba kwakooya ni kimaruma kya irina lyakwa, we mmbo awaryaa ando a kimwi naniingwa ka iyana, navewarya na muu wa llung'anu uve ding'u yakwe.
Indi yewo vesonngwa veengyi vakaa vaaluke va numa, na yewo va numa vaaluke va mbee.”
“Umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo luvakye nndu muni kyeny alekwiipoo ngama nraasi nanderuuya varundi va efo nndeny wakwe wa misabibu.
Kadeeryana na varundi valya kya urundi, nkonu umwi navaniinge weesi lwa nkonu, kavarika efo nndeny ulya wakwe wa misabibu.
Kawuya kakwiipoo lyingyi elyi kwamfika sa isaru, kakooya vengyi vasalali kulya singireny valarunda mashora.
Nawo kavevavia, ‘Na yeni keveendeny efo nndeny wakwa wa misabibu. Mmbo nshemuniingaa ekyo kisumani.’
Vakaenda. Kakwiipoo lyingyi elyi kwamfika sa irindaru, na sa keenda, kavetana indo,
Na elyi kwamfika sa ikumi na imwi kavekwiipoo kakooya vengyi vasalali indo, kavavia, ‘N kikyi elyi musalali indo nkonu piti mularunda mashora?’ Vakaamba,
‘Llwaona nndu aluvika varundi-fo.’ Nawe kavavia, ‘Na yeni keveendeny kulya nndeny wa misabibu.’
Naasa elyi kwamiila nndu ulya muni kyeny kavia ulya amweekya ikallya findo fyakwe, ‘Vaanga varundi valya kuvaniinge weesi lwawo, kupooke valya vafurummya isha, kufike valya valava isha.’
Valya va sa ikumi na imwi vakasha. Vakawarya wo nndu weesi lwa nkonu.
Valya va mbee vakasha, vakakusara kulakooye wo vashewaryaa kilanya. Nawo-da vakavewarya indo, wo nndu weesi lwa nkonu.
Vekiwarya vakakunung'unnya ulya muni kyeny.
Vakaamba, ‘Nkyelola yewo vafurummyi ni sa imwi nsi varunda-u, na yewe kwawuya ivainanisa neese. Neese mmbo lwansisirya mavina a nkonu piti, na ikorwa mmwi.’ “
“Nawe karouwa, kavia ulya umwi, ‘Mbuya yakwa nshi shakutannya kindo kilasumani-fo. A mmbo kulaore kwairikya ludeeryanaa kyaasa kya weesi lwa nkonu?
Kamarany ekyo kyafo kwakweenngya! Mmbo shikunndye indo iniinga yeto afurummyi kiinani na ekyo kyafo.
A findo efyo fyakwa mmbo shilatiri mumu wa itana nafyo ndesa shankunda? A mmbo kwanying'a elyi yeny shitiri maako?’
Naasa ni indo kivaa, yewo vafurummyi vaaluke va mbee, na yewo va mbee vaaluke vefurummya.”
Na elyi Yesu eefo arie shia yeenda irwa na kulya Yerusalemu, karwaa valya ikumi na vavii mbai, llya vekee kyaarony, kavavia,
“Llen-te lwiifo lwiirwaa na kulya Yerusalemu, na Mwana yeto wa nndu asherambikywaa maakony a vakohani vaniini na velosha mavavaso, nawo vashemmbutyaa uvingo nandewaawa.
Mmbo vashenrambikyaa maakony a vandu va masanga, nandeteendwa na ikapwa na ngova na ikapyo nsalabeny, na elyi lya nkonu wa kararu asherukaany.”
Nalyo maye wa vana va Sebedayo kasha na yoo akai, aryani na vana valya vakwe vavii, kamoolokya si akundye intereva kindo.
Nawe kammbia, “A ekyo kwakunda nkyokyi?” Kammbia, “Ammba vana yeva vakwa vee vavii vavandami neewe efo umangyi ny lwafo, umwi nakae uvari lwafo usha, na ungyi uvari lwafo umuso.”
Na Yesu kaallwa kaamba, “Mmwiishi nta ekyo mwatereva shaasa kyikai-fo! A ndesa mushiidimaa ina upata lwakwa shiifo shinaa?” Vakammbia, “Lukwiidimmya-da!”
Nawe kavavia, “Ina upata lwakwa mushenaa-da. Indi iniinga vandu ando eekaa yoo uvari lwakwa usha ao umuso, ekyo nshi kindo kyakwa yeny-fo.” Vandu vaniingwa-u ni yewo valemmeekideesyo ni Nde-yaakwa.
Naasa valya ikumi elyi vaita indo, vakasua vana yewo va nka vee vavii.
Na Yesu kavavaanga na yoo akai, kaamba, “Mwiishi yewo veshillya vandu mmbo vavaafinya. Na yewo vaniini vawo vakavalammya.
Indi kunu nnang'ani yaany nshi indo kivaa-fo. Indi nndu kakunda ing'ana kunu nnang'ani yaany, we kuti nave nndundi waany.
Na nndu kakunda iva wa nrwe kunu nnang'ani yaany, we kuti nave ishinga lyany.
Niindo-da kivekai, Mwana yeto wa nndu nshi asheye irunndyo-fo, mmbo asheye we nave nndundi navevika na muu wakwe uve kiraso kyeewouwa veengyi.”
Na elyi veefo vashuukaa kulya Yeriko vandu vakallatya nsemu mwiingyi.
Nalyo akakava vandu vafu miso vavii vakee rembo yoo mbaambaa ya shia. Vakaita Yesu mmbo eefo eshiiraa-u vakaonisa ngyunyanga vakaamba, “Woi Nndumi lusarye! Yewe kukee mwana wa Davidi!”
Na vandu valya veefo mamwiingyi vakavakeemmya vamalallye. Nawo vakaengera ifua, vakaamba, “Woi Nndumi, Mwana wa Davidi lusarye.”
Na Yesu kairisha, kavavaanga kaamba, “A mmbo mukunndye shimutannyi inda?”
Vakaamba, “Woi mbee, ni miso yaa eru naambo alole!”
Naasa Yesu kavalyilya, kapaana miso alya awo, nalyo yeni vakalola. Vakallatya.
Naasa elyi Yesu na vakiloshyony kyakwe veefo vashaafukyaa Yerusalemu vamfika kulya Betifage, alya ifumbuny lya miri itiri ndunda tikamwaa mafura, nalyo Yesu karuma-u vakiloshyony vavii.
Kavavia, “Endeny efo muriny usumani na yaa mukai. Mukamfika-fo llyo yeni mushekooyaa-fo nshungu wa kyika ukee mfingye ando uryani na ngashe ya vayo. Endeny muuporommwi, musheenngye.
Na kwakooya nndu amuvesa, mmbieny, ‘Ni Nndumi aukunndye, nalyo asheweekeyaa.’
Na kimaruma kikaenda indo ni kilya kikee kirere na kana ka nndu ulya mwaauya kisuku naambo kikooye iinukya-u kyeamba,
‘Endevieny muri wa Sion, akakato mangyi yafo eefo ashaa na kwafo akee mfoo, asaammyi mungo wa nshungu na ngashe ya vayo, ikee mwana wa kindo kyeenga mario.’ “
Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakakweengya vakavetana indo, shaasa Yesu avavavasya.
Vakeende nshungu ulya na ngashe ya vayo. Vakawuya vakaala soori tawo ta uwe efo mungony wa vayo. Vakansaamisa-u.
Naasa vandu valya vakuummbye-u vaifo mamwiingyi, veengyi vakakuuta soori tawo ta uwe. Vakaala efo shia. Na valya maata vakandemanya maramba a miriny, vakaveala efo shia.

Na valya vaifo mamwiingyi, valya vaira mbee vakasanga na valya valatya efo numa, vekapa ukoru veshaambaa, “Hosiana yewe kukee mwana wa Davidi! Kundearafumwa yeu asha arumwa ni Nndumi! Hosiana efo kukee uwe ya findo fyoose!”
Na elyi amaanga na kulya Yerusalemu vandu va muri woose vakasavaa, vakaamba, “A nndu yeu ni vi?”
Na mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu ukaallwa, “Mmbwe Yesu, we nkisuku wa Nasareti ya kulya Galilaya.”
Naasa Yesu kaanga neefo mmba ya Iruva, kaanta-fo woose valya vekummbyaa-fo na yuurya-fo findo. Kafullwa mesa ta valya veshaalashaa fesa na fitima fya valya veekumbaa mbeta.
Kavavia, “Mmbo kikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Mmba yakwa mmbo ivaangwaa mmba yeeterevya,’ lyo yeni mukayaallwa mbanga ya veala shia.”
Nalyo kasheywa ni vandu vafu miso na yewo vakee miketekete ekee alya poo ya mmba ya Iruva, nawe kavakira woose.
Naasa vakohani valya vaniini na vaarya va fitabu elyi valollya efyo atana filandelollyo lyingyi, na vana vekapaa ukoru efo mmba ya Iruva vashaambaa, “Hosiana yewe mwana wa Davidi, nalyo vakasswa.”
Vakammbia, “Kwiitye-ndi ndesa vakeamba? Indi Yesu kavavia, ‘Ee-da!’ A mmbo mulasommyi kilya kikee kyaambe, ‘Ni efo kaniny ka vakoku, na yewo vashoonga nng'u kukudeesye nnduma wafo?’ “ "
Nalyo kavara-u kaenda kipoo auka kulya muriny. Kafika kulya Betania, kandelala-fo.
Na elyi lya ndesi ngama arie shia yeewuya na kulya muriny katirwa nshaa.
Kalollya nkuu umwi yoo mbai ya shia. Kandeulola, nalakooye-u nta kindo kuuta maru meni. Nawe kauvia, " “Yewe kulakivike-se ndunda-fo na kufike llung'anu.” Na nkuu ulya nalyo yeni ukariika.
Naasa yewo vakiloshyony valollya kive indo, vakasongololo. A kyava inda elyi nkuu yeu wariika indo na lyimwi nsi?

Na Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Kwakooya mutiri kikusiryo, nta mulatirwa nnyinyira, nshi ekyo kya nkuu mushekitanaa-da-fo.’ Naakwa mwavia ifumbu yelyi, ‘Iluka yaa kukai kundekweera efo yeeveny, mmbo kisheutikaa-da.’
Na wo findo mwamfifuuya Iruva yoo ando mwaterevya mukusirye nawe mmbo mushefiwaryaa.”

Naasa elyi vamfika efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva, eefo aloshaa, kasheywa ni Vakohani vaniini na masiingo a vandu, vakaamba, “A mmbo kutiri mumu wa ngata ingai elyi kwatana findo sha efyo? Na yeto akuniinga mumu yeto ni vi?”
Na Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “A neeny shimuvese mbony imwi, mukanshivia neeny shimuvie kya mumu yeto shatana nato findo efyo mmbwa ngata ingai.”
“A ubatiso lulya lwa Yohane luukye kwi ndesa? Ni efo iruveeu ao ni kunu vanduny? Naasa vakarera-rera kikwawo veni.” Vakaamba,

“Kwakooya lwaamba, ‘Ni lwa efo iruveeu, mmbo asheluviaa, kikavakyi-se mulakunde ikusirya na Yohane?’ Indi kwakooya lwaamba, ‘Ni lwa kunu vanduny, ekakato nkuka yeto wa vandu mmbo walweerese mashika mmbo valollye Yohane ni nkisuku.’ “
Naasa vakaallwa Yesu vakammbia, “Yese llwiishi-fo.” Nawe kavavia, “Nta yeny nshikimuviaa kya mumu yeto ntanaa nato efyo mmbwa ngata ingai-fo.”
“Mwakusara inda?” Kweefo nndu etiri vana vavii. Kaenda kwa ulya wa mbee kaamba, “Mwana-akwa, inu enda kunderunda efo nndeny wa misabibu.”
Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Nshikunndye-fo. Elyi numa kakuria, keenda.”
Naasa keenda kwa ulya wa kavii, kavemmbia kiwo-da. Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Nkisha mbee! Lyo nalaende.

A vandu yewo vavii nndu aletana ekyo kisenyi ndeye ni ungau ndesa?” Vakaamba, “Ni ulya wa mbee-te!” Yesu kavavia, “Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Vandu vadedemi na vaka va shia mmbo vakeemusongoya yaanga efo umangyi ny lwa Iruva.’

Mashika llya Yohane Mwiibatisa alesha na kunu kwany aira shia ya usumanu, neeni nta mulakunde inkusirya. Indi vadedemi wo sanda na vaka va shia mmbo valekunda inkusirya. Na yeni mukalollya kive indo, nta elyi numa mulakurie mukunde inkusirya.”

Kyevearannyiny kyaaso kingyi, “Kweefo nndu muni kyeny aleronga nnda wakwe wa misabibu. Kauringitya na uvare. Kasuma-u ando eekammya misabibu. Katannya-fo nnara weeringa. Kaara-fo varemi. Kaenda kyaaro.
Naasa elyi kwamfika kyeeri kya yaaya ndunda karuma mashinga akwe kulya kwa varemi valya vandewarya waavi yelo lwakwe lwa ndunda.
Naasa varemi valya vakatira mashinga akwe. Ulya umwi vakambondora, ulya ungyi vakammbwaa, ulya ungyi vakankapa na mawe.
Kawuya karuma mashinga engyi meengyi mmwasi ya valya va mbee, nawo vakavevatannya indo-da.
Elyi lyefurummya kavarumya mwana wakwe, kaamba, ‘Ni mwana wakwa muni, mmbwe vashenreremyaa!’
Naasa elyi varemi valya valollya mwana ulya ashe vakarera kikwawo, vakaamba, ‘Akakau muya ding'u! Ndifony-te lummbwae, yese luve veni ding'u!’
Vakantira vakansomuta kipoo ya nnda ulya vakambwaa.
A mwaambany inda? Elyi muni nnda ulya wa misabibu ashaa, mmbo ashetanaa inda na varemi valya ndesa?
Vakammbia, ‘Vammba indo vakasha mmbo ashevarumataa, na nnda yeto wa misabibu naare-fo varemi vengyi, yewo vashenrwaayaa waavi lwakwe lwa ndunda elyi fyeeri fya vayo fyamfika.’ “

Yesu kavavia, “A mmbo mulandesomi kindo kikee kirere efo mareiyony kyeamba, ‘Iwe yelyo vetana mmba valelyimina, llyo lyilewuya iva iwe lya ndumbeny. Mmbo kileva indo kyuuka kwa Nndumi muni, kikava kindo kyeesongololo elyi lukilollye na miso eru.’
Elyi kikeeny indo neeny shamuvia, ‘Mmbo mwiikaa musokwa umangyi lwa Iruva lumuuke lundeniingwa vandu va uruka yelo luvikaa ndunda tikwaani nalo.’ [
Na wo nndu awa iweny yelyo mmbo afika-fikaa. Na nndu kalyiwoya mmbo lyishensaa-saa.]”
Naasa vakohani valya vaniini veefo na Vafarisayo elyi vamiita fyaaso efyo, vakamanya mmbo arera kikee nkyawo veni.
Vakasia mwaanya weentira, lyo vakairyaa mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu, mashika to nyelyi wiirikye sheelyi Yesu ni nndu nkisuku.
Nalyo Yesu karera lyingyi esheraa fyaaso kavavia,
“Umangyi lwa Iruva mmbo lufwanani na nndu alealyikya mwana wakwe nka.
Naasa kanderuma mashinga akwe andevaanga valya vakee vaarye nrumi vakavaangyo walyi lulya. Nawo valakunde isha.
Kawuya karuma mashinga engyi, kavavia, ‘Endevieny valya vakee vaarye nrumi, shoonga takwa akati shantideesya. Shau takwa tanshishwa na nrasa takwa. Na findo fyoose fyandeesyo. Kusheyeny na walyiny.’
Vakamina vakakweengya kyawo, ulya umwi efo ireminy lyakwe, na ulya ungyi efo mbusheny yakwe.
Na valya vengyi vasaa-u, vakatira mashinga alya akwe, vakavaila, vakavawaa.
Nalyo mangyi ilya karooywa nngoo, karika vasikari vakwe, vakamamita vawai valya neekora muri ulya wawo.
Nalyo kavia mashinga alya akwe, ‘Kya walyi lwemmba, lyo valya vekee vaarye nrumi mbalekisumanya-u-fo.
Naasa kwiipoony mundefika efo shieny eto niini, na wo vandu mwambakooya-fo muvavaange vashe walyiny!’
Nalyo mashinga alya akakwiipoo, vakafika efo shieny eto. Na wo vandu valevakooya, vakavasanda woose, na ulya nkasha, na ulya nsha. Na efo walyiny kukaishwa vandu veny.”
“Naasa mangyi kasha nau ishesengera veny valya. Kakooya-fo umwi nalaree soori ya walyiny.
Kammbia, ‘Mbuya-akwa, a niinda kwasha na kunu, kularee nta soori ya walyiny?’ Nawe kafulukywa deny.
Nalyo mangyi kavia valya vefurukannya-u, ‘Mfingeny marende na maako, mundemweera efo ireeminy lyiwoye efo poo. Mfo kundo kushekaa kiiyo na irafunya mayoo.’ “
Kimmba veevaangwa mmbeengyi na valya vasauwe vakaangwa.
Nalyo Vafarisayo vakanderuvya shila, vandereiya Yesu na marero.

Vakanrummya vakiloshyony kyawo varyani na vandu vatiri mbuya na Herode, vakaamba, “Ale llori! Lwiishi mmbo kukee nndu mwiirera fya dede na shia ya Iruva kwaveifunda kya dede, kulalolaa nta fisangu fya vandu.
Naasany luvie mmbo kukusarye inda? A ndesa yuutya Kaisari usanu ni kindo kisumani ao ode?”
Na Yesu kamanya uravi lwawo, kaamba, “A kimaruma mukasha isheesa nkyokyi yeni vandu vakunang'ari?
Keshooreny fesa ya usanu-te!” Vakamweenngye.
Nawe kavavesa, “A ufwanu elo lwiiyo llwa vi na kireiyo ekyo?”
Vakarouwa, “Ni fya Kaisari.” Nawe kavavia, “Naasa, niingyeny Kaisari efyo fikwaani na Kaisari. Na efyo fikwaani na Iruva muvefiniinga Iruva.” "
Naasa vekiita indo, vakasongololo, vakanra-u vakakweengya kyawo.
Naasa nkonu ulya mweni, kasheywa Vasadukayo, mmbo vandu veshaambaa nkwiifo iruka lya vafu-fo. Vakammbesa,
" “Ale llori, Mose mmbo aambaye, ‘Nndu kafwa nalareeye-u mwana, naasa nka yeto wakwe, noorwa-se mmwanamaye nave nka wakwe, nawonisye mwanamaye ngyeeri.
Naasa kunu kweru kweefo vanavanka mfungare. Ulya wa mbee kaalyika kafwa, nalareeye-u mwana. Kareeya mwanamaye nka ulya wakwe.
Na ulya wa kavii kiwo, na ulya wa kararu kiwo-da, tana vasia woose mfungare.
Na elyi lya numa ya woose nka ulya nawe kafwa.
A elyi kwamfika yoo marukyony a vafu, nka yeto ashevaany wa ungau ndesa? Kimmba vemmoora woose?’ “
Naasa Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Mmbo mwarekwa deny, mashika elyi mulaishi nta mareiyo nta finya ya Iruva.
Mashika elyi kwamfika yoo marukyony a vafu, mmbakyaalyika-se-fo nta yaalyikwa-fo. Mmbo vashevaa sha vasu va iruveeu.
Na kya iruka lya vafu a mmbo mulandesomi ekyo Iruva amuviiye kaamba,
‘Yeny ni Iruva, wa Abrahamu na Iruva wa Isaki na Iruva wa Yakobo. Naasany, Iruva nshi akee wa vafu-fo, mmbo akee wa vamuu.’ “ "
Kyasia vandu valya vakuummbye-u elyi vamiita indo vakaising'ang'a kya kiloshyo kyakwe.
Naasa elyi Vafarisayo vamiita amfindikira kana ka Vasadukayo, nawo vakandekuummbya ando amwi.
Na umwi waawo akufundye mavavaso kasha immbesa amweesaa,
kaamba, " “Ale llori! A efo mavavasony ivavaso lyiifo lyikee iniini lyikailanya engyi llyingalyi?”
Nawe kammbia, “Mmbo kushekundaa Nndumi Iruva wafo kunkunde na ngoo imwi nsi, na nrima umwi nsi, na makusaro amwi nsi.
Llyo ivavaso iniini lyisongoye engyi.
Lya kavii lyiifo lyifwanani nalyo, ‘Mmbo kushekundaa nndu uroo shaasa kukukunndye kumuni.’
Na mavavaso yoo avii nng'u arie mavavaso engyi moose na vakisuku.”
Naasa elyi Vafarisayo vakuummbye-fo indo, Yesu kavavesa,
Kaamba, “A ni inda mukusarye kya Kristo? Akee mwana wa vi?” Vakaamba, “Ni wa Davidi-te!”
Nawe kavavia, “A kikavaany inda elyi Davidi ammbaanga ni Nndumi?” Mmbo aambaye afundwa ni Mumuyo wa Iruva kaamba,
“Nndumi alevia Nndumi wakwa, ‘Kaa rembo yoo woko lwakwa usha, shitani shaara vakiduva vafo si, kuvaekerye marende afo.’ “
“Naasa elyi Davidi ammbaanngye ni Nndumi, ni inda ava mwana wakwe?”
Nalyo kulawonike-fo nndu aidima imwaallwa, nta nndu nalakarye immbesa kindo uka nkonu ulya.
Nalyo Yesu karera na ironda lilya lya vandu na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe, kaamba,
“Velosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mmbo velosha mavavaso a Mose.
Naasa fyoose vamuvia mufitire muvefiringa. Indi kya mashora awo nta mulatani shawo. Mmbo varera valatani.
Nawo vakava vefinga mario maroo, vakaekerya vandu meeveny awo. Indi wo veni nta valakunde yaasembera na nni.
Na mashora awo moose vakaatana vakooye ilolwa mmbandu. Mashika fingova fyawo varee elyi vatereva vakafilambara, na mise ya soori tawo ta uwe vakaing'anisa.
Nawo vakasia marembo a mbee ando a shoongeny, na fitima fisongoru efo mmba teeterevya.
Na fiidikiro fya vandu efo singireny, na ivaangwa valori mmbandu.
Indi yeni nta mulavaangwa valori mashika llori yeto waany aifo ni umwi, neeni moose mukainana.
Nta mulavaange nndu ni Nde waany, kunu urukeny, Mashika Nde waany aifo ni umwi, ni yeto wa efo iruveeu.
Nta mulavaangwa vasongoru, mashika nsongoru waany aifo ni umwi-da, we Kristo.
Indi yeto akee nniini waany, we kuti nave nndundi waany.
Indi yeto mwiikung'anisa we muni mmbo akaa nanyiiswa. Na yeto mwiikunyiisa we muni akaa nang'aniswa.”

“Indi yeni veelosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari, oshiny lwany! Mmbo mwaraya mwaango wa iruveeu mukeema vandu yaanga-fo. Shamashika nta yeni muveni mmushaangaa-fo-fo, nta yewo vakunndye yaanga mulavalekeye vakaanga-fo.” [

“Nyira veelosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari, oshiny lwany! Shamashika elyi mwava veemira mmba ta vaka va ding'u mukawuya itereva Iruva na marero maasha kikee kya ukunang'ari. Kimmba ni indo mmbo musheonisaa uvingo uniini nnu.”]

“Yeni veelosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari oshiny lwany! Mmbo mwasengetya yeeve yeyo niini na uruka uumu naambo mukooye-fo nndu amulatyaa umwi. Na kwakooya ammba nndu amulatye mukawuya imwaallwa nndu wa gehena ngota yeni kavii.”
“Yeni vasongoru vafu miso, oshiny lwany! Mmbo mwaambaye, ‘Nndu kalya mboo na mmba ya Iruva, nkitiri mwaandu-fo. Indi nndu kalya mboo na saabu yeyo ya efo mmba ya Iruva, we allyamara.’
Mmbo mukee vakunang'ari mukaveva vafu miso. A kiniini ni kingakyi? Ni saabu yeyo ao ni mmba yeyo ya Iruva iniinngye saabu yeyo ikava kindo kyeele?
Mukaveamba-se, ‘Nndu kalya mboo na ando eekorya firaso nkitiri mwaandu-fo. Indi nndu kalya mboo na kiraso ekyo kikee kyeekere-u, we allyamara.’
Mmbo mwava vandu vafu miso. A kiniini ya kingyi n kingakyi? Ni kiraso ekyo ao ni ando eekerya firaso anniinngye kiraso ekyo kikava kindo kyeele?
Naasany, yeto alya mboo na ando eekorya firaso, mmbo alya mmbo nang'u kasanda na fyoose fikee fyeekere-u.
Na yeto alya mboo na mmba ya Iruva, mmbo alya nayo mboo kasanda na yeto akaa-fo.
Na yeto alya mboo na iruveeu, mmbo alya mboo na kitima kya Iruva kasanda na yeto akeeu rembo.”

“Yeni veelosha mavavasyo na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari, oshiny lwany! Mmbo mwavika firaso fya findo efyo fyeefwamisa na fyeerolisa na fyeelonga shoonga. Indi efo mavavasony findo fiiyo finiini fyo mukawuya ifira, ni irummbwa fya songosiny na ilyillya vandu na kikusiryo, efyo mfyo fyeetana, nta efyo fingyi mulafire-fo.
Mukee vasongoru vafu miso! Mmbo mufifinaa mbu, mukawuya imira ngamula.
Yeni veelosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari, oshiny lwany! Mmbo mwasangya kikombe na kideeva kunu kipoo, na efo mmba fikaishwa fya usoki na uraami.
Yewe Mfarisayo mfu miso! Lava mbele isangya kikombe efo kimmba-te, na kunu kipoo kuveva kwaa.

Yeni veelosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari oshiny lwaanyi! Mmbo mufwanani na mbanga ta vafu tikee shaambe yeela, kunu kipoo tikalollyo mmbo tikee shisha, na efo kimmba tikaishwa maffwa a vafu na uravi lwa wo ngata.
Na yeni ni kiwo-da, kunu kipoo mmbo mulolywaa mukee va usumanu, indi efo kimmba mukava vandu vaishwe ukunang'ari na kiila.”
“Yeni veelosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari oshiny lwany! Mbanga yeto kundo vakisuku vakee varike mmbo mwatannya-u mmba, na efo kundo valya va usumanu vakee vaare mukaatokopa.
Mukaamba, ‘Kwee ni yese lweefo meendi alya a vakuu veru, yese llweeshaakanaa nawo iirita samu ya vakisuku valya-fo.’
Kikavaany mwavika ukureeki lweekuvinga muveni, mukamanyika mmbo mukee vana va valya valewaa vakisuku valya.
Naasa neeni keveishuryeny-fo ekyo kilerewa kyenga ni vakuu valya vany!
Yeni shoka mukee fivana fya mashoka, a ni inda mushaashukaa uvingo lwa Gehena?

Kimmba ni indo, lleny-te, shiifo shimurummyaa veawuya fisuku na vandu vaishi reu na veelosha mavavaso. Na yeni yewo maata mushevawaa, neevakapya nsalabeny, na yewo maata mushevakapaa na ngova efo mmba tany teeterevya, muvevarishisa muri ku muri.

Naambo mukooye isheywa ni samu ya vandu va usumanu shoose ipookya samu ya nndu ulya wa usumanu Abeli, fika samu ya Sakaria we mwana wa Barakia, yeto mulemmbwaiya efo nnang'ani kavii ya mmba ya Iruva na ando eekorya firaso.
Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Efyo fyoose mmbo fishewoyaa irika elyi lyiiyo.’ “

“Woi Yerusalemu! Woi Yerusalemu! Mwiiwaa veawuya fisuku, na yewo kwarummywa kwaveveera mawe. Ni keengyi na keengyi sheekunndye yuummbya fivana fyafo, sheelyi nguku yawummbya fivana fya vayo ikasikya na maaru. Na yeni mulakunde!
Llen-te mwiikaa mureeywa mmba yei yeanga ive irama.
Mmbo shamuviany, ‘Mmukaa mushilollye-se kipookya ulaalu-fo,’ na kutani mwaamba, ‘Kundearafumwa yeu asha na irina lya Nndumi!’ “
Nalyo Yesu kakwiipoo auka efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva, arie shia, valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakakuumbya yoo akai vamoore mmba ta mwiindye.
Nawe kaallwa kavavia, “Mulollye yoo moose-ndi? Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Kunu nkwiikaa kurewa-u iwe lyakweekerya iwe uroye lyire lyilasambuwa-fo.’ “

Naasa elyi ameenda ikaa rembo alya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura, valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakashekuummbya yoo akai, vakee kyaanya kyawo, vakaamba, “Luvie-te meendi kwiikaa kuutike indo, na wende lweemanya yoo masheyony afo na masiiyony a ulana yelu.”
Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Kwiiseny nndu nalamulembe!
Mashika veengyi vakaa vashe varee irina lyakwa veshaambaa, ‘Yeny mmbwe Kristo!’ Nawo vaevete veengyi.
Na kingyi-se mushekooyaa iita kya fira na fyuulaalu fya fira. Manyiny mure mulaereve! Mashika mmbo kikee kirummbwe kyeende indo. Indi yoo masiiyony a ulana nnyandefika-fo.
Mashika uruka lumwi lushekwiipoo lukape yelo lungyi, na umangyi lukape yelo lungyi. Kuvekaa-fo na shaa shiniini, na fidinasi kundo na kwiingyi.
Na efyo fyoose mfyo mapookyony a fyuure efyo fyeefurumya.
Nalyo llyo vashemurambikyaa-fo mulyisywaa ukiva na iwaawa. Na yeni mushevaa veesuwa mmbandu woose va masanga kimaruma kya irina lyakwa.
Nalyo veengyi vashewonisaa nsindara na iriinngyana na isuvana wo veni na veni.
Na veawuya fisuku veengyi va wongo vavekwiipoo-fo vasheevetaa vengi.
Na elyi fya uravi fisheengerekaa indo nkyo kisheniingaa ukundi lwa veengyi lusheangwa.
Naasa yeto asisirya-u nafike yoo mafurummyony mmbwe ashekirwaa.
Na nrumi yeyo ya nsia ya mbony ta umangyi yo isheendaa yongoywa kunu ulaniny koose, vandu va masanga vawonise ukureekyi woose. Kikamfika yoo llyony kwamfika yoo masiiyony.”
“Naasa elyi meendi mushelollyaa uravi lwiilannyi kyeeso usutu lulya lweeallwa ando kweele irama lwansha nang'u lulya lukee waambe ni nkisuku ulya Danieli (na mwiisoma-u nakummbwe!)”
“Llyo yewo valele kunu Yudaya vanderishya mafumbu-u.
Na nndu akoyaa akee mmbeeu, nalaoloke-fo nandeipoo fya efo mmba kwakwe.
Na nndu akooyaa akee efo ireminy, nta nalainduke nawuye na numa nandeipoo soori yakwe ya yeerya.
Indi vaka yewo vakooyaa vakufingye fyeeri efyo na yewo vashootaa vana, oshiny lwawo!
Indi tereveny Iruva, kyeeri ekyo kyeerisha kilave ni kyeeri kya mbeo, nta nkonu wa Sabato!
Shamashika meendi yoo kushekaa-fo fyuure finiini. Nta uka elyo mapookyony a ulana fika ulaalu kulandekae-fo fing'ani indo-fo. Nta meendi a numa mfishekaa-fo finiini indo-fo.
Na fyeeri efyo kukooye kulaore fyeefiiswaa, nkweekiaa-fo nta nndu-fo. Indi kimaruma kya yewo vasauwe nkyo kisheniingaa fyeeri efyo fifiiswa.”
Na fyeeri efyo fikamfika, kwakooya nndu amuvia Kristo akakau yaa, ao, “Akakato efo, nta mulairikye-fo.
Shamashika kushekwiipoo Vakristo va wongo na veawuya fisuku va wongo, nawo vandeora vandu ngyende shiniini na findo filandelollyo lyingyi, na kukooye kyeevaa naakwa na yewo vasauwe verekaa.
Akakyo shalava imuvia.
Naasany, kwakooya vashemuviaa, ‘A ulya kulya kasa! Nta mulaende isaiya-fo! Akakato aovye efo firyeny nnang'ani ya mmba! Na yeni nta mulairikye!’
Mashika shaasa kimwii kimikaa kyuuka taari ya ngama kikatana kyafika taari ya nkwaany, na yoo masheyony a Mwana yeto wa nndu ni indo kisheendaa.
Na kundo kukee nnying'a na mamutony mfo kundo ashekuumbyaa.”
“Naasa fyuure efyo fikamiira llyo yeni mwi yeu ushaalukaa ireema, na mwiiri mmbusheendee-se sa yavayo-fo. Na nyinyiri tishoolokaa tyuuka efo iruveeu. Na finya yeto ta efo iruveeu tiverinyiswa.

Nalyo llyo wende lwa Mwana yeto wa nndu lusheonikaa efo iruveeu, na ngyufyari toose ta vandu va ulana tishekapaa kiiyo. Nato tishelollyaa Mwana yeto wa nndu ashaa ariwa mmafishi a nginiiu akee na wiitori uniini na itumbe.
Nawe asherumaa vasu vakwe, na mbembe tikapwa na finya. Nawo vandeummbya-u yewo vasauwe vakwe vavaute efo ndumbeny tilya iinya vepookaa marayony yoo a ngina vafite marayony yoo engyi.”
“Naasa efo nriny wa nkuu uten-fo wende lwekulosha. Iramba lya vayo lyikamfumbisa lyikaora maru, neeni mukamanya meelulyony amfika kufii.
Na kya findo efyo na kiwo-da. Mukammeefilollya fyoose, kevemanyiny, mmbo ansha kufii na yoo mwaangony.
Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Irika elyi nta llyishiraa kulaore findo efyo fyainukya fyoose-fo.
Efo iruveeu kwiikaa kurumake, na kunu ulaniny, kilarumakaa ni marero akwa.’ “
“Indi kya nkonu yeto mweni, na saa yeyo sheni, nkwiifo nndu aishi-fo, nta vasu va efo iruveeu, nta we Mwana-fo, kulaore ni Nde we muni.
Indi shaasa kyeekee fyeeri filya fya Noe, ni indo-da kisheendaa elyi kwamfika yoo masheyony a Mwana yeto wa nndu.
Mashika vandu valya veefo meendi alya kulaore yeeve ilya niini yansha, shaasa valeva veelya na ina na yaalyika, na yaalyikwa, vakatana vafika nkonu ulya Noe aleanga na efo isandukuny.
Nta valaipuye kindo, yeeve ilya niini ikatana yasha ikavakomba kombi. Na yoo masheyony a Mwana yeto wa nndu ni indo-da kisheendaa.
Nalyo llyo vandu vavii vakooyaa vakee ireminy, yeto umwi awarywaa na yeto ungyi narewa-u.
Vaka vavii vakooya veesaa iseweeny, yeto umwi ashewarywaa, na yeto ungyi narewa-u.”
“Naasany veny velala shoovi, kimmba mulaishi nkonu yeto Nndumi waany ashaa nato ni ungau.
Indi kindo kimwi mwiishi, ‘Kya muni kyeny kukooye mmbo eeishi ni ikamba lya kio lyeeringa lyingalyi inyinyi lyishaa, mmbo elalaa shoovi, nnyeraa mmba yakwe isumwa-fo.’
Kimmba ni indo neeni veny vandu vakudeesye, mashika Mwana yeto wa nndu asheshaa kyeeri mulakumbuye.”
“Naasany ishinga lyiiyo lyitiri usaari na urango usha llyingalyiny? Nndumi wakwe kammbika nniini wa mmba yakwe nandeavya mashinga wooroye shoonga kyeeri kisumani.
Na ishinga elyo elyi nndumi wakwe ashaa, nakooye eetanaa indo, ngoma lyo.
Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Mmbo ashemmbikaa nniini wa findo fyakwe fyoose.’
Indi ishinga elyo ikasha, kwakooya lyaamba efo nriminy: Nndumi wakwa nnashaa uviny-fo.
Nalyo lyikapooka ikapa mashinga wooroye nawe kasanga na veenangwa kalya na ina nawo.
Naasa nndumi ulya wa ishinga elyo mmbo asheshaa kyeeri lyilaifo lyimmbereyaa na saa lyilaishi.
Nawe ashelyirummbwaa tapa nandelyisanda ando amwi na yewo vakunang'ari, kive nkyo waavi lwakwe. Nalyo kukae-fo ikapa kiiyo na irafunnya mayoo.”
“Nalyo llyo umangyi lwa iruveeu lushekaa-fo lufwanani na vana va kyeny ikumi valeipoo taa tawo, vakauka kyeny, vandeammbya muni walyi.
Nawo valya varaanu varung'ani, na valya varaanu varango.
Naasa valya varung'ani vakaipoo taa tawo valakiipoo mafura.
Na valya varango vakaipoo mafura na fiiya fyawo ando amwi na taa tawo.
Naasa muni walyi kakyeeywa. Vakarengeya woose vakalala rony.
Naasa elyi kio nnang'ani kavii kukaitiwa kyoorongye, ‘Akakato muni walyi! Kwiipoony-te mundemwaammbya!’
Naasa vana valya va kyeny vakakwiipoo woose vakasongosia taa tilya tawo.
Valya varung'ani vakavia valya varango, ‘Mafura yoo any lwaavyeny-ng'u kidu! Mashika taa teru tiifo tirumikaa.’
Valya varango vakarouwa vakaamba, ‘Ode, nnyalumaa yese neeni-fo. Nkisha mweende kwa yewo veekumba, mundekuurya-fo any muveni!’
Naasa varie shia yeenda, muni walyi kasha. Na valya vakooya vekudeesye vakaenda nawe efo walyiny. Mwaango ukaraywa.
Elyi numa vana valya va kyeny vengyi vakasha nau, vakaamba, ‘Woi Nndumi! Woi Nndumi! Luruye mmba!’
Nawe kaamba, ‘Nkya dede shamuvia, nshimwiishi yeni-fo.’
Kimmba ni indo, veny velala shoovi shamashika elyi mulaishi nta nkonu yeto na saa yeyo.”
“Mmbo kyava sheelyi nndu eekunndye yeenda kyaaro, kapooka ivaanga mashinga akwe muni. Kavaarya masaa akwe.
Ulya umwi kaniinngya talanta isaanu, na ungyi ivii, na ungyi imwi. Wo nndu kanniinngya kisumani na mwiina wa wiidimi lwakwe. Naasany kaipoo kyaaro.
Ameenda, nalyo yeni ulya wa talanta isaanu katiipoo, kandekapa nato mbusha. Kalyima-u talanta tingyi isaanu.
Na ulya wa talanta ivii kavetana kiwo. Kauta-u mbusha ya tingyi ivii.
Naasa ulya wa talanta imwi kaiipoo. Kandeisummya si. Kasuruma-fo talanta ilya ya nndumi wakwe.
Naasa kwamiira-u kyeeri kyaasha, nalyo nndumi ulya wa mashinga alya kasha. Kakundany vamweekennyi.
Ulya alewarya talanta tilya isaanu, kasha nau, kaende talanta isaanu tingyi. Kaamba, ‘Nndumi talanta kuleshyaarya ni isaanu. Akati talanta isaanu tingyi shilelyima-u.’
Nndumi ulya wakwe kammbia, ‘Aika ishinga isha kwaveva nsaari. Kwekee mwiikallya findo fyaangu kikee kya usaari. Nkuvikaany mwiikallya findo fiingyi. Anga na efo nsieny wa nndumi wafo!’ “
Na ulya alewarya talanta tilya ivii kavesha nau. Kaamba, “Nndumi talanta kuleshyaarya ni ivii. Akati talanta tingyi ivii shilelyima-u.”
Nndumi ulya wakwe kammbia, “Aika ishinga isha kwaveva nsaari! Kwekee mwiikallya findo fyaangu kikee kya usaari. Nkuvikaany mwiikallya findo fiingyi. Anga na efo nsieny wa nndumi wafo.”
Naasa ulya alewarya talanta ilya imwi kavesha nau. Kaamba, “Nndumi shilekumanya mmbo kukee nndu muumu, mmbo kwailula ando kulasuye mbeu, kwavesanyirya ando kulanyanyatye.
Neeny shairyaa, shandesummya talanta ilya yafo efo si.”
Naasa nndumi ulya wakwe kaallwa kammbia, “Yewe ishinga yeesi kwaveva mpeere!

Kuleshimanya-sho, mmbo shailula ando shilasuye mbeu, shavesanyirya ando shilanyanyatye? Kyasiany yewe nshi kyeekusumannyi indeera talanta ilya yakwa efo kwa vandu vekapa mbusha va fesa. Na yeny kwakooya shasha nsheviirywany efyo fyakwa ando amwi na ulyimi lwa vayo.
Naasa nsokeny talanta yeyo mundeniinngya yeto atiri talanta yeto ikumi.
Mashika wo nndu atiri findo mmbo asheengerywaa fiingyi katana aingifywa. Indi yeto nalatiri kindo, naakwa na kilya atiri mmbo akisokwaa.
Na ishinga elyo lya mweelu endelyeereny efo poo. Mfo kuvaa ikapa kiiyo na irafunnya mayoo.
Naasa elyi Mwana yeto wa nndu ashaa akee na itumbe lyakwe, aryani na vasu va Iruva woose, llyo ashekaa rembo yoo kitiminy kyakwe kya itumbe.
Nalyo efo kisanguny kyakwe kushesanyiryou vandu va masanga moose. Nawe ashevarauwaa navaave kavii, shaasa nndu mwiisi arauwa moonri na mburu.
Na moonri asheavikaa yoo woko lwakwe usha, na mburu yeto tivikwaa yoo woko lwakwe umuso.

Nalyo mangyi asheviaa valya va efo wokony lwakwe usha, ‘Kusheyeny na yaa shikai, mukee vandu va Nde-yaakwa avakunndye mbora! Endekeeny efo umangyi ny, mfo ding'uny yeanga, mulesurummywa uka mapookyony a ulana.
Shamashika shetirwa nshaa mukashiniinga shoonga. Shetirwa nnyura mukashirita. Shekee muny mukashiwarya efo kyeny kwany.
Shekuuywa mukashivika soori. Shelwee mukashisengera. Shekee kifingyony mukasha ishisaiya.’
Nalyo vandu yewo va usumanu vashemwaallwa, ‘Nndumi a niindii lulelollya kutirwa nshaa lukakuniinga shoonga? Ao kutirwa nnyura neese lukakurita?
A ni indii lulekulollya kukee muny, neese lukakuwarya efo kyeny kweru? Ao kukuuywa neese lukakuvika soori?
Ao ni indii lulekulollya kulwee ao kukee mfinge, neese lukasha ikusaiya?’
Nalyo mangyi ashevarouwaa, ‘Nkya dede shamuvia, wo kindo muletannya vanavama wakwa yewo vafwafwa ya woose, naakwa ni ulya umwi nsi, ni yeny muleshitannya.’
Nalyo asheviaa na yewo va wokony lwakwe umuso naambe, ‘Ukeny yaa shikai mukee vandu vakee vadenge, mundefika efo murony ularumikaa, ulesurummyo Satana na vasu vakwe.
Shamashika shetirwa nshaa, nta mulashiniinge shoonga. Shetirwa nnyura, nta mulashirite.
Shekee muny nta mulashiwarye efo kyeny kwany. Shekuuywa nta mulashivike soori. Shelwee, shekee mfinge, nta mulashe ishisaiya.’
Nawo vasheverouwaa kiwo, ‘Nndumi, a niindii lulekulollya kutirwa nshaa, ao nyura, ao kukee muny, ao kukuuywa, ao kulwee, ao kukee kifingyony, neese lukara lulakufurukannya?’
Nalyo ashevarouwaa, ‘Nkya dede shamuvia, Wo kindo mulera mulatannya yewo vafwafwa ya woose, naakwa ni ulya umwi tupu, mmbwe yeny mulera mulashitannya.’
Nawo vasheendaa vandelyiswa ukiva llung'anu, na yewo va usumanu wo vandekaa na muu wa llung'anu.”
Kyikava elyi Yesu ammarisya marero alya moose, nalyo kavia valya vakiloshyony kyakwe,
“Mwamanya mmbo kushiraa-u mikonu ivii, kufike yeto wa Pasaka. Llyo Mwana yeto wa nndu ashendaa irambikyo-fo nandekapyo nsalabeny.”
Nalyo vakohani valya vaniini vakakuumbya ando amwi na masiingo a vandu kulya mmba ikee shaakare ya nkohani ulya nniini avaangwaa ni Kayafa.
Vakafisha shila shaasa vashetiraa Yesu na ntambo vammbwae.
Naasa vakaamba, “Nkyivaa elyi lya nkonu yeto nniini-fo. Mmbo kusheshaa mwaaluko-luko wa vandu.”
Naasa Yesu akee kulya Betania, kulya mmba kwa Simon, yeto etirwa ni ivave,
kasheywa ni nndu nka arie kipete kitiri mafura eekwaamba a wuuru uniini. Kalletya efo nrueny akee rembo eelyaa shoonga.
Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakalolya, vakasswa. Vakaamba, “Nkyiki elyi kindo ekyo kyareka indo?
Kindo ekyi mmbo kyeevaa ikumba wuuru uniini kindeavyo vakyiva.”
Naasa Yesu kamanya kavavia, “A ekyo mwaatarya nka yeu nkyoki? Mmbo ashitannya ekyo kisha!
Shamashika vandu vakyiva mmbo mukee nawo kyeeri kyoose. Indi yeny mmukee neeny kyeeri kyoose-fo!
Nawe elyi aletya mwiili wakwa mafura yoo, mmbo atana indo kya yuudesya underikwa.
Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Kundo kwamoongoywa nrumi yeyo ya nsia kunu ulaniny koose, na ekyo kyakwe atana mmbo kishekumbuwaa.’ “
Nalyo ulya umwi wa valya ikumi na vavii avaangwaa ni Yuda Iskariote, kandefika kulya kwa vakohani vaniini.
Kaamba, “Kindo musheshiniingaa nkyokyi neeny shindenrambikya maakony any?” " Nawo vakamweesya misasarwe ya fesa makumi araru.
Nalyo nng'u alepookya isia mwaanya nsha weenrambikya efo maakony awo.
Naasa elyi lya nkonu wa mbee weelyiwa mikate ilatiri ntarang'o, valya vakiloshyony vakakuumbya yoo Yesu akai, vakaamba, " “A kundo kukundye lundesongosya eelyiya Pasaka nkwi?”
Nawe kaamba, “Endeny efo muriny kwa ng'anya mundemmbia, ‘Llori akuvia-le vai, Kyeeri kyakwa kyamfika kufii. Ni efo kwafo shikundye yuutya-fo nndumwa yeu wa Pasaka, amwi na vakiloshyony kyakwa.’ “
Na valya vakiloshyony vakandetana indo-da, shaasa Yesu avavasya. Vakandesongosya Pasaka ilya.
Naasa elyi kwamfika nkwaany, kasha nau ishekaa-fo rembo nalye shoonga aryani na valya vakiloshyony ikumi na vavii.
Veefo valyaa kavavia, “Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Nnang'ani yaany umwi waany asheshiriingyaa.’
Nawo vakasokywa mfyoova finiini. Vakapooka immbia kwi umwi umwi, ‘A ndesa ni yeny Nndumi?’
Nawe kavavia, ‘Yeto loolota nawe maako marama efo kideeveny mmbwe asheshiriingyaa.
Kya Mwana yeto wa nndu yeenda mmbo asheendaa shaasa kyikee kireiye kyakwe. Indi nndu yeto Mwana wa nndu asheriinngyaa mmbwe, oshiny lwakwe!’ Nndu yeto kyakwe mmbo kyekee kisha kwee eraa nalairwa!
Naasa Yuda yeto mwiinndiinngya kaamba, ‘A ndesa ni yeny-ro llori?’ Nawe kammbia, ‘Kwankyaamba kumuni!’ “
Naasa elyi veefo valyaa Yesu kaipoo nkate. Kaarafuma Iruva. Kaufisha-fisha fyenga. Kaavya valya vakiloshyony kyakwe kaamba, “Nngeny, lyeny! Yeu ni mwiili wakwa.”
Kaveipoo na upata kaana Iruva. Kavaniingya kaamba, “Niny-fo moose!”
Yei ni samu yakwa yeevika nkundanu, iifoo ishiiritwaa kimaruma kya vandu veengyi vakooye ifwaayo ngyulyamari.
Indi yeny shamuviany, “Kyipookya ulaalu nshishekinaa-se ekyo kyavikwa ni nsabibu-fo, na shifike nkonu yeto shana lya wuiya ando amwi neeni efo umangyi ny lwa Nde-yaakwa.”
Naasa elyi vamiimba fiimbo vakakwiipoo. Vakaenda kulya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura.
Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Kio yekyi kyeni moose mushesukyoo ni yeny! Kimmba kyikee kyireiye kyeamba, ‘Nshekapaa mwiisi na ironda lya mburu lyindenyanyaka.’
Indi elyi numa shammaa iruka nshemusongoyaa indefika kulya Galilaya.
Petro kaallwa kaamba, ‘Naakwa woose vasukyo ni yewe, yeny nta nshishesukyoo-fo.’
Yesu kammbia, ‘Nkya dede shakuvia, kio yekyi kyeni kulaore nguku yankapa kukooyaa kwanshikana kararu.’
Petro kammbia, ‘Naakwa shalollya kuti shifwe shisandwa neewe, nshishekukanaa-fo. Na valya vakiloshyony vengyi vakaveamba indo woose.’ “
Nalyo Yesu keenda aryani nawo. Kafika ando ukee nnda uvaangwaa Getsemane. Kavia valya vakiloshyony vakwe, “Kaeny yaa sheende alya indeterevyau Iruva.”
Kakamara Petro na vana valya va Sebedayo vavii. Kapooka isokyo mfyoova na yeereve.
Nalyo kavavia, “Nrima wakwa wiifo usokywaa mfyoova deny, wafika kufii na ifwa. Kaeny yaa mulale shoovi neeny.”
Kaenda mbee kinnywa. Kawa si na kisangu katereva Iruva kaamba, “Woi Nde, kwakooya kikuviiyaa, upata yelu lushiire shire shilaluna! Indi kilave shaasa shikundye yeny-fo, kiveva shaasa kukunndye yewe!”
Naasa kasha na alya vakiloshyony vakai, kakooya valele rony. Kavia Petro, “A niinda, nta mulashiidimaa ilala shoovi neeny ando a saa imwi nsi?
Kyelaleny shoovi mwiterevaa mulakooye iira kyeesyony! Nrima to ulangye indi mwiili ukava mfwafwa.”
Kaenda lyingyi lya kavii, kandetereva. Kaamba, “Woi Nde-yaakwa, kwakooya kivaa upata yelu lushiire shire shilaluna, lyo kikuviiyeny shaasa kwankunda!”
Kasha nang'u lyingyi, kakooya velele rony. Mashika miso awo akee marovye nrwe.
Naasa kavara-u, keenda lyingyi katereva lya kararu. Kaamba marero alya meni.
Nalyo kasha na yoo vakiloshyony vakwe vakai, kavavia, “A niindo mwalunga ilala na iimuya! Llen-te kyeeri kyamfika, na Mwana yeto wa nndu eefo anderambikywaa maakony a vandu valyamari.
Kwiipony-te, lweende. Akakato yeto mwiishiriingyaa amaafukya!”
Na elyi eefo areraa indo, Yuda kasha nang'u, akee umwi wa valya ikumi na vavii, aryani na nsemu mwiingyi wa vandu varie ngyusu na mariinga vauka kwa vakohani vaniini na masiingo a vandu.
Na nndiingyi yeu eevavikye kiring'isyo kavavia, “Nndu yeto nshemmimindaa mmbwe mushentiraa!”
Nalyo yeni kafika yoo Yesu akai, kaamba, “Shakwiidikira llori! Kammiminda.”
Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Mbuya yakwa kyakweende na yaa nkyokyi?” Nalyo vakaserikya na yoo akai, vakaleesya Yesu maako vakantira.
Nalyo akakau umwi wa valya vavandami na Yesu kaorwa woko, kasommwa usu lwakwe, kamanya nalo ishinga lilya lya nkohani ulya nniini, kammaswa kuri.
Nalyo Yesu kammbia, “Viira usu efo kipony kya vayo. Kimmba yewo vamiipoo usu, ni usu lushevaretaa.
A mmbo shilashiidimaa ifuuya Nde-yaakwa, nawe nashirikye vasu va efo iruveeu maronda ikumi na avii na kilanya?”
A efyo fikee fireiye fyeamba, “Mmbo kyikee kirummbwe kyeende indo, mmbo fyeeshiinukyaa indaany?”

Naasa kyeeri kilya kyeni Yesu kavia nsemu ulya wa vandu, “Mmbo mwooka kyeny mukasheshisheya sheelyi nkee mwaala shia, murie ngyusu, na mariinga musheshitira. A kyera shekee rembo ando amwi neeni mikonu myoose shiloshaa efo mmba ya Iruva, neeni mulashitire!
Indi kimaruma kyikaenda indo, ni kilya kyikee kyireiye ni veawuya fisuku, naambo kyikooye iinukya-u.” " Nalyo valya vakiloshyony vakanreeya vakarisha.
Naasa valya vatira Yesu vakandenrwaa kulya kwa nkohani ulya nniini we Kayafa. Nafo mfo kweekuumbye-fo veelosha mavavaso na masiingo a uruka.
Naasa Petro eefo allatyaa yoo numa akee kyikwaasha. Kalava ifika mmba ilya shaakare ya nkohani ulya nniini kaanga nafo, kakaa-fo rembo kasanga na vasero valya va poo nakooye ilola shaasa kivaa. "
Naasa, vakohani valya vaniini vasasangyi na ikwaanu lilya iniini lya masiingo a uruka, vakava varuuyaa ukureekyi lwa wongo naambo vakooye iwaa Yesu,
nta valaonise, lla ndesa vakureekyi va wongo valesha nang'u veengyi. Elyi lyeefurummya vakasha nang'u vavii.
Vakaamba, “Nndu yeu aleamba vai, ‘Nshiidimaa isammbwa mmba ya Iruva ando a mikonu iraru shiitani lyingyi shimaa.’
Kyasia nkohani ulya nniini kasalala-u kammbia, ‘A nkushaambaa nta kindo kyeerouwa ukureekyi lwa yewo vavika lweekukumba?’ “
Indi Yesu kamalallya sau. Nkohani ulya nniini kaallwa kammbia, “Nkulyisaany mboo, ‘Swa Iruva muni muu kuluvie kwakooya yewe ni Kristo kukee Mwana wa Iruva.’ “
Yesu kammbia, “Kwankyaamba kumuni. Indi shamuvia, ‘Kupookya ulaalu mushelollyaa Mwana yeto wa nndu akee rembo yoo woko usha lwa Muni itumbe na isha navesha ariwa mmafishi a efo nginiiu.’
Nalyo nkohani ulya nniini karanndwa soori takwe ta yeerya. Kaamba, ‘Akakyo anruma Iruva nyira!’ A ekyo lusiiyaa vakureekyi vengyi nkyeekyi-se? Mmbo mwiitye ulaalu aruma Iruva.”
A mwarummbwa inda? Nawo vakaallwa vakaamba, “Kindo kinsumanyi ni iwaawa.”
Nalyo vakamwiisellye minyiiri efo kisanguny. Vakankapa na ng'unde. Vengyi vakankapa na mbiiri.
Vakaamba, “Lwaauye kisuku-te Kristo, yeto akukapa mmbi?”
Naasa Petro ekee rembo efo poo ya mmba ilya shaakare, nka kishinga kasha na yoo akai, kaamba, “Na yewe-da kweekee na Yesu yeto wa kulya Galilaya!
Nawe kalema-fushu mbee yaawo woose, kaamba, ‘Nshamanya ekyo kwaamba-fo.’ “
Kakwiipoo-fo kafika yoo ngiriny. Nka kyishinga ungyi kallollya kavia valya, “Yeu avekee nndu umwi na Yesu yeto wa kulya Nasareti.
Nawe kalema-fushu lyingyi eelyaa mboo kaamba, ‘Nshiishi nndu yeu-fo.’ “
Kairisha kinnywa, valya vasalali-fo vakasha na kufii. Vakavia Petro, “N-dede-da naakwa nnyewe kukee nndu waawo, ni mirerye yafo yakwaamba.”
Nalyo Petro kakudenga we muni na ilya mboo eshaambaa, “Nshiishi nndu yeu-fo!” Nalyo nguku ikakapa.
Naasa Petro kakummbwa kirero kilya Yesu alemmbia, “Kulaore nguku yankapa kukooyaa kwanshikana kararu.” Kasomuka na mbengyeny kaiya kyuumu nnu.
Naasa elyi kwamfika ikya Vakohani vaniini woose vasasangyi na masingo a vandu vakafisha kyama kikee kya kisuuya naambo vakooye iwaa Yesu.
Vakankamara vandenrambikya kwa nshilyi ulya wa Kaisari, we Pilato.
Nalyo Yuda ulya alenndiingya elyi allolya Yesu ameekerywa uvingo lweewaawa nawe kakuria. Kaipoo misasarwe ilya ya fesa makumi araru kandeiviirya Vakohani valya vaniini na masiingo a vandu.
Kaamba, “Mmbo shiletana ukasha elyi shariinngya samu ilatiri kiteve.” Nawo vakaamba, “A mmbo kiluwore-kyi yese? Lola kyafo kumuni!”
Nawe kandeera misasarwe ilya ya fesa kulya mmba ya Iruva. Kawara shia, kandekuvanika.
Naasa vakohani vaniini vakaipoo misasarwe ilya ya fesa, vakaamba, “Nkwiifo mumu wa iivika efo mbolokony ya mmba ya Iruva-fo, kimmba ni wuuru lwa samu.”
Naasa vakafisha shila vakaura nayo irema lya uteri lwa muumba nungu lyive ando eerika veny.
Nkyo kimaruma irema lilya lyikavaangwa ni irema lya samu kufike inu.

Nalyo kilya kyikee kirere na kana ka nkisuku ulya Yeremia kikakooya iinukya-u kyeamba, “Na yeny shileipoo misasarwe ilya makumi araru ya fesa, ni wuuru lwa nndu alererywa wuuru, yeto vana va Israeli valenrerya wuuru.
Shaivika yeeura irema lilya lya uteeri lwa muumba nungu, shatana shaasa Nndumi avavasye.”
Naasa Yesu kandeseleeswa mbee ya nshilyi ulya wa Kaisari. Nshilyi wa Kaisari kammbesa kaamba, “Yewe mmbo kukee mangyi ya Vayuda?” Na Yesu kaamba, “Kwankyaamba kumuni.”
Na elyi eefo akumbwaa ni Vakohani vaniini na masiingo a vandu, nta nalarouwe kindo.
Nalyo Pilato kammbia, “A mmbo kulaitye efyo vakureeka-u fyeekuutya uvingo shaasa fifye?”
Nawe nta nalarouwe nta kyimwi ammbesa. Nshilyi ulya wa Kaisari katana afulukywa deny.
Naasa elyi lya nkonu nniini nshilyi ulya wa Kaisari eishivie iporomuya vandu nndu mfinge umwi ulya vankunda.
Naasa meendi alya alekooya atiri nndu mfinge umwi aenngye usutu avaangwaa Baraba.
Naasa elyi vakuummbye-u indo nkuka Pilato kavavia, “A nndu mwankunda shimuporomuye ni ungau ndesa, ni Baraba ao ni Yesu yeto avaangwa ni Kristo?”
Nyelyi aishi kyavaniinga vakankumba ni kyinying'u.
Naasa elyi akee rembo yoo kitiminy kya ushilyi, nalyo nka wakwe kanrummya nrumi. Kammbia, “Kulasange mbony ta nndu yeu wa usumanu! Mmbo shilelya ukiva wiingyi kimaruma kyakwe nshooryaa kyio kya inu.”
Naasa Vakohani valya vaniini vasasangyi na masiingo a uruka vakaaya vandu valya vakuummbye-u nkuka, naambo vakunde Baraba, na Yesu nawaawa.
Naasa nshilyi ulya wa Kaisari kaallwa kavavia, “A yeva vavii ni ungau mukunndye shimuporomuye-u ndesa? Nawo vakaamba, N Baraba.”
Pilato kavavia, “A shatana inda na Yesu yeu avaangwa ni Kristo?” Woose vakaamba, “Nandekapywa nsalabeny!”
Naasa kaamba, A ukasha alelutana llo kyi-ro? Nawo vakakapa kisengelele na kamwi, vakaamba, “Nandekapywa nsalabeny!”

Naasa Pilato kalollya kulaifo kindo kyikyivaa, kyoorongye kyilya kyikaenda kyiing'anaa tupu. Kawarya mura kasangya maako yoo kisanguny kya vandu valya vakuummbye-u mamwiingyi. Kaamba, “Loleny yeny nshitiri ukasha na samu ya nndu yeu-fo. Loleny yeni muveni!”
Na vandu vakaallwa woose vakaamba, “Samu yakwe iluwuiye yese na vana veru!” "
Nalyo kavaporomuya Baraba. Na Yesu kanrambikya-u nandekapo na ngova numa nandekapyony nsalabeny.
Nalyo vasikari va nshilyi ulya wa Kaisari vakakamara Yesu. Vakanrwaa mmba ya ushilyi. Vakaende nang'u siri shoose ya vasikari. Ikasha inkuummbya.
Vakamuuta soori takwe muni vakammbika soori ifwani nsoru.
Vakaoka ureto lwa miinga vakammbika nrueny. Vakanniinngya irere efo wokony lwakwe usha. Vakafiiryandi vakanteenda, vakaamba, " “Lwakwiidikira mangyi ya Vayuda!”
Vakamwiisellye minyiiri. Vakawarya irere lilya vakankapa nalyo nrwe. "
Na elyi vammaa inteenda indo vakamuuta soori ilya vakawuya immbika soori tilya takwe muni, vakankamara nandekapyo nsalabeu.
Naasa elyi vankwiipoo veefo vasheendaa, vakakooya nndu wa Krene avaangwaa Simion, vakamwiitikya nantare nsalaba ulya wakwe.
Vakafika ando avaangwaa ni Golgota, kyikee sheelyi kyaambawa, “Nkisharongony.”
Vakanniinga mfinyo ukee nsande na nri weenangisa. Ashosha nalakunde ina."
Naasa vakankapya nsalabeu. Vakaavana soori takwe veetikapyaa kura.
Vakakaa-fo rembo vakanringa.
Na yoo nrweny wakwe vakavika ngumbwa ikee shireiye ule, “YEU MMBWE YESU MANGYI YA VAYUDA.”
Nalyo veala shia vavii vakakapyo nsalabeny vakasandwa nawe. Umwi kavikwa woko usha na ungyi woko umuso.
Naasa valya vairau vakanruma, vesisikaa mirwe,
vakaamba, “Yewe mwiwundwa mmba ya Iruva ando a mikonu iraru kuwuye iitana lyingyi, nkyekukyireeny kumuni, kwakooya mmbo kukee mwana wa Iruva! Kuveolokany nsalabeny!”
Na Vakohani valya vaniini vakaventeenda kiwo vasasangyi na veelosha mavavaso na masiingo a vandu.
Vakaamba, “A elyi alekyira vengyi, nalaidimi ikukyira we muni! Mmbo akee mangyi ya Israeli, noolokeny nsalabeny ulaalu indi, neese lumwiirikye!
Mmbo akusirye na Iruva, naasa we namwaauweeny kwakooya ankunndye. Kyimmba aleamba mmbo akee mwana wa Iruva.” "
Naasa na valya veala shia vakapyo nsalabeny ando amwi nawe, nawo-da vakavemmina.
Naasa uruka loose lukawoywa ni ireema kupookya saa irindaru kukafika saa keenda.
Naasa elyi kwamfika saa keenda Yesu koonisa unyanga waasha kaamba, " “Eli, Eli lama sabaktani.” Nakyo kyikee sheelyi kyaambawa, “Woi Iruva wakwa, Woi Iruva wakwa, nkyikyi elyi kwashira?”
Naasa vandu vasalali-u maata vaita indo vakaamba, “Nndu yeu mmbo avaanga Elia.”
Nalyo yeni umwi waawo kanderisha, kandeende kivikaa mura, kakyiishura mfinyo utarang'aa. Kavika irereeny, kanrita.
Naasa valya vengyi vakaamba, “Ra lulole kwakooya Elia ashaa imwaauwa-u.”
Naasa Yesu kafua lyingyi na unyanga uniini kakumba muu.
Nalyo akakalyo isullya lyilya lyaavanisye mmba ya Iruva lyikavambuka nnang'ani kavii lyipookya yo si lyikavambukya uwe. Na uruka lukarerema. Na ngereko ta mawe tikaparika-parika.
Na mbanga ta vafu tikarwika, minying'a miingyi ikaruka ya vandu veele.
Vakaruka vauka efo mbangeny, na elyi numa we ammaa iruka vakafika kulya muriny mweele, vakakoora na vandu veengyi.

Naasa nshilyi ulya wa vasikari na valya akee nawo veeringaa Yesu, elyi valollya kidinasi kilya na filya fyautika fyoose vakatirwa mmbweerei wiingyi. Vakaamba, “Nkya dede yeu mmbo ekee mwana wa Iruva.”
Naasa kweefo na vaka veengyi velolaa vekee kikwaasha. Nawo mmbo valya valelatya Yesu vauka kulya Galilaya vemfurukanyaa.
Na efo nnang'ani yaawo kusangyi-fo Maria Magdala na Maria ulya akee maye wa Yakobo na Yosefu, na maye wa vana valya va Sebedayo.
Naasa elyi kwiifo kushiilaa kukasha nafo nndu isimba wa kulya Arimataya, avaangwaa Yosefu. Nawe muni avealukye Yesu kava nndu wa kiloshyony kyakwe.
We kafika kulya kwa Pilato kantereva nnying'a ulya wa Yesu. Nalyo Pilato kavavasya nandeniingywa.
Na Yosefu kaipoo nnying'a ulya kawoososya sooriny shaa pyai.
Kandewaara mbangeny yakwe shiiya adoshye efo iweny. Kapirimitya iwe iniini yoo mwaangony wa mbanga ilya, kakweengya.
Naasa na Maria Magdala mfo kundo eekai, na Maria ulya ungyi vakakaa rembo yoo usumanu na mbanga ilya.
Naasa elyi lya ndesi ukee nkonu ulatye nkonu weekudeesya llyo Vakohani valya vaniini vakandekuummbya kulya kwa Pilato varyani na Vafarisayo.
Vakaamba, “Ale Nndumi! Lwawuya ikummbwa kyilya llembi ulya alerera ekee na muu eeshaambaa, kushiiraa-u mikonu iraru shirukeny.”

Naasa vavasyany mbanga yeyo indevikywa kiringisyo kufike nkonu yeto wa kararu naambo yewo vakiloshyony kyakwe valashe nau vamwiive-fo, vandeviany vandu, “Annduka auka kwa vafu, na ulembi yelo lweefurummya luilanyi lulya lwa mbee.”
Pilato kavavia, “Varingyi vawonikaa. Kweengyeny munderinga shaasa mwaidima.”
Naasa vakakweengya vakandevikya mbanga ilya uringyi vevikaa iwe lilya kiring'isyo kyawo na varingyi valya vakakaa-u.
Naasa elyi nkonu ulya wa Sabato wamiira kwiifo kwikyaa elyi lya nkonu yeto wa mbee wa mfungare, llyo Maria wa kulya Magdala kaenda aryani na Maria ulya ungyi, vandelola mbanga ilya.
Nalyo akakakyo kidinasi kikaira kiniini. Nyeeli nsu ulya wa Nndumi aoloka auka iruveeu. Kasha nang'u, kakunnya iwe lilya mbai kalyikaya.
Na fwana yakwe ikee shaa pyai sha kimwii kya iruveeu na soori yakwe ikamika paa sha laura ya kulya kyaamwi.
Na kimaruma kya imwiiryaa varingyi valya vakava sheelyi vamfwa.
Naasa nsu ulya wa Iruva kaallwa kavia vaka valya, “Nta mulairyee yeni-fo! Mmbo shammanya mmbo mwiifo musiaa Yesu yeto alekapyo nsalabeny.”
Nnakyikee-se yaa-fo, mashika annduka, shaasa aleamba. Oshony na yaa-te, mushelola ando ekee mwaare.
Na yeni endeny na ngeta, mundevia valya vakyiloshyony vakwe, mmbo annduka. Nawe llen-te ashemwiiryaa mbee indefika kulya Galilaya, mfo kundo mushellollyaa. Akakakyo shamuvia.
Nawo kyaangu naakyo vakakwiipoo vauka alya mbangeny vatirwa mmbweerei vakasanda na nsia. Vakarisha pyany vandekyoongoya valya vakiloshyony vakwe.
Nalyo akakau Yesu ansha ikwaananya nawo efo shia. Kaamba, “Kaeny na ufoo vama mmbee!” Naasa vakaenda na yoo akai, vakallyingillya marende vakamoolokya na fisangu.
Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Nta mulairyae-fo! Endevieny vanavama wakwa vafike kulya Galilaya. Mfo kundo vasheshilollyaa.”
Naasa elyi varie shia yeenda, akakawo varingyi valya maata vankwiipoo, vakaenda kulya muriny. Vakandevia vakohani valya vaniini mbony tilya tautika toose.
Nawo vakakuumbya ando amwi na masiingo alya a uruka. Vakafisha kyama vakaniinngya vasikari valya fesa shiingyi,
vakaamba, “Ambeny, ‘Valya vakiloshyony vakwe mmbo valesha kyio, vakamwiiva-fo lwiilele rony.’
Na kwakooya kindo ekyi kyandeitiwa kwa nshilyi wa Kaisari, neese lushemfweera-fweeraa lumuute mwaandu.” "
Naasa vakawarya fesa tilya. Vakatana shaasa valefundwa. Na kirero ekyo kyikakwaana kulya kwa Vayuda kyikafika inu.
Naasa valya vakiloshyony ikumi na umwi vakaenda kulya Galilaya vakafika alya ifumbu-u kundo Yesu evavavasya.
Vakallolya vakamoolokya na fisangu. Indi kukavekaa-fo na vetirwa nnyinyira.
Na Yesu kasha na yoo vakai, karera nawo. Kavavia, " “Shanniinngyo ushilyi loose lwa efo iruveeu na lwa kunu urukeny.
Kyasia endeny mundeallwa vandu va masanga moose vave vakiloshyony vakwa mwiivabatisyaa irina lya Nde na lya Mwana na lya Mumuyo Mweele. Muvevalosha varinge efyo shilemuvavasya fyoose.
Na yeni manyiny-te, nkaa neeni mikonu myoose kufike yoo masiiyony a ulana.”
Nrumi ya Iruva ya Nsia ileendwa ni Yesu Kristo, mmbo ilepooka indo,
shaasa kikee kyireiye efo kitabuny kya nkisuku ulya Yesaya kyeamba, “Akakau shiifo nrumaa nsu wakwa nakusongoye yoo mbee yafo, mmbwe ashekusongosyaa shia yafo.”
Kwaitiwa unyanga luvaanga kulya kasa lushaambaa, “Deesyeny shia ya Nndumi! Sumaniseny miko yakwe!”
Ni indo Yohane alefummya vandu ashevabatisaa kulya kasa. Kava mwiikapa weele lwa ubatiso lwa yaalashika efo nriminy vakooye ifwaaywa ngyulyamari tawo.
Keengywaany ni uruka loose lwa Yudaya na Vayerusalemu woose. Vakandebatisywany kulya mureny wa Yordani veparya Iruva ngyulyamari tawo.
Nawe Yohane aree soori ta mafwaa a ngamula kakufinga na ukova lwa shony efo kisiny. Kalya nrie na ukyi wa mbakony.
Kakapa weele ashaambaa, “Yoo numa yakwa kwiifo kwiishaa yeto atiri finya ngota yeny. Nawe nta nshimaa shikwiinyike shiporommwi ukova lwa fyaaru fyakwe-fo.
Kyakwa yeny ni mura shava mwiibatisa nato. Indi we ni Mumuyo Mweele ashemubatisaa nato.”
Nalyo fyeeri fyekee filya fyeni Yesu alesha nafo auka kulya Galilaya, kabatiswa ni Yohane kulya Yordani.
Na llya alesaama auka efo mureny, llyo yeni kalollya efo iruveeu kukarauka na Mumuyo wa Iruva kamoolokya akee sha mbeta.
Na unyanga lukaitiwa luuka efo iruveeu lushaambaa, “Yewe mmbwe mwana wakwa nkunde, ni yewe shilekusauwa.” "
Nalyo yeni Mumuyo wa Iruva kanrwaa nafike kulya kasa.
Kakaa-fo ando a mikonu makumi aana asheeswaa ni Satana. Kakaa-fo amwi na mafisi, na vasu va Iruva vakamfurukannya.
Naasa elyi numa elyi Yohane ammeerambikywa-fo Yesu kafika kulya Galilaya ashekapaa weele lwa yoongoya vandu Nrumi ya Iruva ya Nsia.
Kaamba, " “Alashikeny efo nriminy muvekusirya na Nrumi yeyo ya Nsia.”
Nalyo kaira efo mbaambaa ya yeeve ilya ya Galilaya. Kalollya Simion na Andrea akee mwanamaye wa Simion veefo vashoolotaa nreiyo weereiya makunga efo yeeveny mashika vekee veereiya makunga.
Na Yesu kavavia, “Oshony, mushilatye, na yeny nshemwaallwa muve veereiya vandu.”
Nalyo yeni vakara u mireiyo ilya yaawo, vakallatya.
Keenda na kwambee kinnywa, kalollya Yakobo akee mwana wa Sebedayo, na Yohane we mwanamaye nawo vakee ngalaveny veefo vasongosya mireiyo yaawo.
Nalyo Yesu kavavaanga. Vakara-u nde-yaawo, we Sebedayo efo ngalaveny ando amwi na varundi valya vakwe. Vakaenda vakallatya.
Nalyo vakafika kulya Kapernaumu. Nalyo yeni elyi Sabato yansha kaenda efo mmba yaawo yeeterevya, kava eloshaa.
Na vandu vakaising'ang'a kya miloshye ilya yakwe. Mashika elyi ava mwiilosha sha nndu atiri ushilyi, nalakee wa ngata ya veelosha mavavaso.
Nalyo yeni efo mmba yaawo yeeterevya kweifo nndu eetirwa mmumuyo wa utefusu.
Kakooma kaamba, “Nkyiki kyeru na yewe Yesu wa kulya Nasareti? Mmbo kusheye ilurumata! Lukwiishi yewe ni vi! Yewe ni yeto Mweele wa Iruva.”
Na Yesu kankyeemya eshaambaa, “Malallya sau kwammbuka!”
Nalyo mumuyo ulya wa utefusu ukamweera efo na efo; ukafua na unyanga waasha ukammbuka.
Vakauma mwaangaya woose. Vakatana vaumburana vakaamba, “ A kindo ekyi mmbo kyikee inda? Akakakyi kiloshyo kyiiya kitiri ulyimbi! Na mimuyo yeyo ya utefusu kaivavasa, nayo ikamwiirikya.” "
Nalyo yeni mbony takwe tikakwaana kulya urukeny lufitani na Galilaya loose.
Na elyi vansomuka efo mmba yeeterevya nalyo vakafika kulya kyeny kwa Simion na Andrea, varyani na Yakobo na Yohane.
Naasa mayaanka wa Simion eefo atirwa nkitara etirwa mmuro. Nalyo yeni vakamoongoya mbony takwe.
Nawe kasha nau, kantira woko, kanseleesa. Na muro ulya ukammbuka. Nawe kavafurukannya. "
Naasa elyi kwamiila mwi wamoolokya, vakamweenngye vandu valya veeiyo valwee woose na yewo vatirwa mmimuyo mikasha.
Na muri moose ukava mmbo ukuummbye yoo mwaangony kwakwe.
Nawe kakira vandu veengyi valwee ndwari shive na shive. Kaanta mimuyo mikasha miingyi, nta nalalekeye mimuyo ilya mikasha ikarera-fo, mashika yemwiishi.
Naasa elyi lya ngama nraasi na ivishivishi kakwiipoo. Kasomuka efo mmba kaenda kundo kulakee vandu, kava mfo aterevya.
Na Simion kasanga na wooroye, vakammbingya.
Vakankooya vakammbia, “Woose veefo vakuruyaa.”
Nawe kavavia, “Ndifony lweende kundo kungyi, miriny yeyo ya minyanuny. Nafo-da shiveenda shindekapa-fo weele. Mashika nkyo kileshiniinga shasha shyuuka kyeny.”
Kawara shia kava mwiira-ira kulya Galilaya koose eshangaa na efo mmba tawo teeterevya na ikapa-fo weele na yaanta mimuyo yeyo mikasha.
Nalyo kasheywa ni nndu atirwa ni ivave. Kantereva, kamfiirya-ndi, kammbia, “Kwankunda mmbo kushiidimaa isheeremuta!”
Nawe kantinnywa kaorwa woko kampaana. Kaamba, “Shankunda, eremukany!”
Nalyo yeni ivave lilya lyikammbuka kaeremuka.
Nalyo kantauwa kamwiima deny,
kammbia, “Manya kulavie nndu kindo! Mmbo kusheendaa ikoora efo kwa nkohani. Na elyi kwameeremuka indo kundevika na kindo kyeeninga Iruva kilya Mose avavasye, kive nkyo ukureekyi lwa efo kwawo.”

Naasa kauka-fo kapooka indekyoongoya vandu na ifura deny, na ivambisa mbony yeto. Nawe Yesu nalakiidimi-se ikyaanga muriny wa vandu paa. Naasa kandekaa kundo kulalelwa, vandu vakansheya vauka wo ando.
Naasa mikonu ikaira mive na mive kavefika-se kulya Kapernaumu. Kyikaitiwa we ni efo mmba akai.
Nalyo vandu vakasha ikuumbyau veengyi. Yoo mwaangony kulaidimi ivatira-se. Nawe kavaviany irero lya Iruva.
Nalyo vakasha imweengye nndu muumu malungo ariwa mmbandu vaana.
Nawo valaidimi imfita yoo akai kyimaruma kya mamwiingyi ulya. Vakasammbwa alya mmbeeu kusumani na yoo Yesu akai. Vakarua-u vakaolota nang'u kitara kilya kileeywa ni ulya muumu malungo.
Na Yesu alolya kikusiryo kyawo kavia ulya muumu malungo, “Mwana-akwa kwammeutwa ngyulyamari tafo!”
Naasa veelosha mavavaso maata veefo rembo vakarera efo miriminy yaawo,
Vakaamba, “Nkyiki elyi nndu yeu arera indo? Mmbo aruma Iruva! Mmbi ashiidimaa yuuta nndu ngyulyamari kulaore ni umwi nsi, mmbwe Iruva?”
Nalyo yeni Yesu kamanya na ngoo yakwe mmbo varera indo efo miriminy, kavavia, “A kimaruma mukarera indo efo miriminy yaany nkikyi?
A kyaangu nkyokyi? Ndesa ni ivia yeu muumu malungo, ‘Kwammeutwa ngyulyamari tafo, ao ni yaamba, kwiipoo, kwakurika kitara kyafo, kwende kyeny?’
Indi manyiny-te Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo atiri ushilyi lweeuta vandu ngyulyamari tawo kunu urukeny. Naasa kavia ulya muumu malungo,
Shakuviany, ‘Kwiipoo kukurike kitara kyafo; kweende kyeny kwafo.’ “
Nawe kakwiipoo, nalyo yeni kavekurika kitara kyakwe, kasomuka-fo velollye woose. Nawo woose vakatana vafulukywa deny vakaarafuma Iruva veshaambaa, “Llulendelollye kindo sha ekyi-fo!”
Nawe kawuya ikwiipoo-fo, kaenda kulya mbaambaa ya yeeve ilya. Mamwiingyi ulya moose wa vandu ukasha na alya akai. Nawe kavalosha-ny.
Kaira na mbee kalollya Levi ulya wa Alfayo akee rembo efo mmba yeededemmya, kammbia, “Shilatya!” Nawe kakawiipoo kallatya.

Naasa kyikava elyi Yesu akee rembo efo mmba kwa nndu yeto naambo nalye shoonga nafo kweefo vadedemi veengyi na vandu valyamari. Vakasasanga na Yesu na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe veelya nawo shoonga. Mashika nyelyi veefo veengyi, nawo ni vandu valellatya.

Naasa vaarya va fitabu va ngata ya Vafarisayo vakusheye nafo vakalolya eelyaa shoonga na vadedemi valya na vandu valyamari, vakavia valya vakiloshyony vakwe, “Mmbo alya na ina asasangyi na vadedemi yewo na vandu valyamari!”
Na Yesu kakyiita kavavia, “Nshi yewo vakee na finya vakundye ishiiswa-fo, indi ni yewo valwee. Nta nshisheye nafo ishevaanga yewo va usumanu-fo, ni yewo valyamari.”

Naasa valya vakiloshyony va Yohane na Vafarisayo veefo vakootoyaa. Vakasha vakammbia, “A kyimaruma nkikyi, elyi vakiloshyony kya Yohane vakootoyaa na vakiloshyony kya Vafarisayo-da, indi yewo vakiloshyony kyafo valakootoye?”
Na Yesu kavavia, “A vandu va walyi vaidimi inda ikootoya elyi muni walyi asindi nawo? Kyeeri kyoose vakee na muni walyi, mmbashiidimaa ikootoya-fo.
Indi kukaa kushe mikonu vasokwaa muni walyi, llyoony vashekootoyaa nkonu yeto.
Nta nkwiiyo nndu afummya kirami kya soori shiiya efo sooriny shikuu-fo. Kwakooya ni indo, ekyo kyiveiywaa-u mmbo kyawuya irannduwa-u, yoo kwiiya kukalakana na yoo kukuu.

Nta nkwiiyo nndu asuruma mfinyo mwiiya efo mbolokony ta masara makuu-fo. Kwakooya ni indo, mfinyo yeto mmbo uriitaa mboloko yeto, na mfinyo ufwe mwasi sanda na mboloko yeto. Mfinyo mwiiya mmbwa ivika efo mbolokony shiiya.”
Nalyo kikava elyi akee efo shia, keera efo mareminy a nganu elyi lya nkonu wa Sabato. Na valya vakiloshyony vakwe elyi vekeenda na shia vakapooka yuurushwa fyaa.
Nalyo vafarisayo vakammbia, “Lla-te, nkikyi elyi vatana kindo ekyi kilatiri mumu nkonu yeu wa Sabato?”
Nawe kavavia, “A mmbo mulandesomi shaasa Davidi aletana llya alekooya atura kyeelya, katirwa nshaa we na valya aryani nawo?
Shaasa aleanga na efo mmba ya Iruva, meendi a nkohani ulya niini Abyatari, kalya mikate ilya ya kideesyo. Nayo ilatiri mumu weelyiwa ni nndu, kulaore ni Vakohani veni, kaavya na valya aryani nawo.”
Nawe kavavia, “Nkonu wa Sabato mmbo ulevikwa kimaruma kya nndu, nshi nndu alevikwa kyimaruma kya Sabato-fo.
Kimmba ni indo, Mwana yeto wa Nndu mmbo aveva nniini wa Sabato.”
Nalyo kaanga lyingyi efo mmba yeeterevya. Nafo kwiifo nndu atiri woko lufirikye.
Nawo vakava vallaayany, valole kwakooya ankiraa elyi lya Sabato, naambo vakooye kyeenkumba nakyo.
Nawe kavia nndu ulya atiri woko lufirikye, “Kwiipoo, kushesalala yoo nnang'ani.”
Nalyo kavavia, “A ndesa kwiifo mumu weetana mesha nkonu yeu wa Sabato ao ni itana makasha, ikira muu wa nndu ao ni yuureta?” Nawo vakamalallya sau.

Naasa kavaringitya miso ivalola arooywaa nngoo na isokywa ni fyoova deny kimaruma kya ngoo tilya tawo tammba indo shuumu. Kavia nndu ulya, “Orwa woko yelo lwafo!” " Kaorwa, woko lulya lwakwe lukawuya iva usha.
Nalyo yeni Vafarisayo vakasomuka-fo, vakandesasanga na Herode. Vakaruvya shila kyikee kya insua, vaoni shia yeenreta.
Nalyo Yesu kakwiipoo-fo waarya aryani na vakiloshyony vakwe. Kaenda kulya mbaambaa ya yeeve ilya. Vandu vakansora mamwiingyi nniini vakauka kulya Galilaya na kulya Yudaya,
na kulya Yerusalemu na Idumaya na kulya kwa kulya ya Yordani na kulya myuungony ya Tiro na Sidoni, ni mamwiingyi nniini deny wa vandu, nawo vaitye filya aletana fyoose, vakafika kulya akai."
Nawe kavia valya va kiloshyony vakwe vairikise ngalava ilya shidu immbere kimaruma kya mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu, naambo valashe insisira.
Mashika elyi alekira veengyi na valya vatiri fivalyilyisaa vakeeuwa vandu naambo vakooye ifika alya akai, vampaani.
Na mimuyo ilya ya utefusu elyi ilellollya, ikamwoolokya si, ikafua ishaambaa, “Yewe mmbwe Mwana wa Iruva!”
Nawe kaveema deny valeshemwaamba.
Nalyo kasaama alya ifumbu-u. Kavaanga valya ambakunda muni. Vakasha na yoo akai.
Kavika vandu ikumi na vavii, vave vekaa nawe, navevaruma vandekapa weele.
Vavetira na ushilyi lwa yaanta mimuyo mikasha.
Kavika valya ikumi na vavii. Kafishya Simion irina lyakwe ni Petro.
Na Yakobo ulya wa Sebedayo na Yohane we mwanamaye wa Yakobo, we kavafishya irina ni Boanerge, nakyo ni kyimwi na vana va maruruma.
Na valya vengyi ni Andrea, na Filipo, na Bartolomayo, na Matayo, na Toma, na Yakobo ulya wa Alfayo, na Tadayo na Simon akee wa yewo vakaari iringa ngata ya Kiyuda.
Na Yuda Iskariote mmbwe yeto alenndiingya.
Nalyo kaenda kaanga efo mmba, vandu vakasha ikuummbya-u lyingyi-se mwamwiingyi. Nta valaidimi iwonisa mwaanya weelya shoonga.
Na valya va kulya kwakwe, elyi vamiita mbony takwe teenda indo, vakawara shia vandentira. Vakaamba, “Ansukwa.”
Na veelosha mavavaso valya valesoka wooka kulya Yerusalemu, wo vakaamba, “Mmbo atirwa ni Belsebuli, na elyi aanta mimuyo mikasha mmbo aekywa ni yeto nniini wa mimuyo mikasha.”
Nawe kavavaanga na yoo akai, karera nawo aveera fyaaso kaamba, “A ni inda Satana ashiidimaa yaanta Satana uroye?
Na kwakooya umangyi lusheraukanaa lukakukapa weni, umangyi yelo nta llushiidimaa ikaa-u-fo.
Na kwakooya mmba ya nndu isheraukanaa ikakukapa sheni, mmba yeyo nta nnyishiidimaa ikaa-u-fo.
Na kwakooya Satana akwiipoo kakukapa muni mmbo araukana, nta nnashiidimaa ikaa-u-fo, mmbo ashekombika kombi.
Indi nta nkwiifo nndu ashiidimaa yaanga kwa nndu mwaafinya nandekamara fiiya filya fyakwe nafimaa-fo, kwankooya kulaore ampooka ifinga mwaafinya yeto llyo-ny ashekamaraa fya efo mmba kwakwe nafimaa.”
Ni kya dede shamuvia, “Vana va vandu mmbo vashewonaa ifwaaywa kya findo fya ulyamari fyoose, na fyaararo fyoose vamaarara shaasa fifye.
Indi kwakooya nndu amaarara kya imina Mumuyo Mweele, we nnaonaa ifwaaywa-fo, mmbo akaa na uvingo lwa llung'anu lwa ulyamari lwakwe.”
Mashika llya valeamba, “Mmbo atirwa mmumuyo wa utefusu.”
Nalyo maye vakasha nang'u na vanavamaye, vakasha iirisha yoo poo. Vakanrummya nrumi yeembaanga.
Naasa na mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu ukee rembo unndingitye riti, vandu vakammbia, “Akakawo mau na vanavamau na vamfwamau vakee yoo poo vakuruuyaa.”
Nawe karouwa kaamba, “A ma na vanavama ni vakyi?”
Naasa kalola valya vakee rembo vansengetye kavaringitya miso. Kaamba, “Akakava ma na vanavama vakwa.
Wo nndu aiyo moose atana efyo fisennyi Iruva mmbwe ava mwanama wakwa na mfwama wakwa na ma wakwa.”

Nalyo Yesu kapooka lyingyi ilosha akee alya waameu lwa yeeve ilya. Kulya akai vandu vakasha ikuumbya-fo mamwiingyi nniini na kamwi ukee yoo kwaarutu. Nawe katana asaama na efo ngalaveny, kakaa rembo efo yeeveny.
Nawe kava avaloshany kwa fyaaso. Na elyi eefo aloshaa kaamba ule,
“Aranyiny! Akakato nndu mweera mbeu ankwiipoo nandeera mbeu takwe.
Kikavaany elyi eefo asheeraa, maata tikolooka yoo mbai ya shia, na ndeye tikasha tikalya tikamaa.
Na tingyi tikooloka ando iwe lyikwaallye efo si kulatiri uteri wiingyi. Nalyo yeni tikamia neelyi uteri lulaanngye si.
Na elyi mwi wavaa tikaya. Kimmba tilasotye mirarii si, tikauma.
Na tingyi tikooloka ando a miingeny. Miinga ilya ikarwa ikatisisira tilavike nta kimu.
Na tingyi tikaoloka ando a uteri usha, tikarwa, tikawongya, tikavika kimu. Yeyo imwi ikavika makumi araru, na ingyi makumi arindaru, na ingyi iyana.”
Nalyo kaamba, “Nndu atiri maarwi earanya navearannya!”
Na elyi akee kyaanya kyakwe muni, valya vanndingitya vakasanga na valya ikumi na vavii vakammbesa kya fyaaso filya.
Nawe kavavia, “Yeni mmbo mwaniingwa imanya mbony yeto shirike ta umangyi lwa Iruva. Indi yewo va poo kyawo kyoose mmbo vakyikooya veevywaa fyaaso.”
Naambo, “Ilola valole, valalollyaa. Na yaaranya, vaarannyi valamanyaa. Valasheyaalukya Iruva, vakooye ifwaaywa.”
Nalyo kavavia, “A elyi mwanra mulamanya kyaaso ekyo, ni inda mumanyaa fyaaso efyo fingyi?
Yeto mweera mbeu ni irero lya Iruva eera.
Na yewo va efo mbai ya shia, ni efo kundo asheraa irero lya Iruva. Nawo wakammaa iita nalyo yeni Satana kasha nau, karakwa-u irero llya lyikee yeere efo miriminy yaawo.
Na kya yewo vakee veere ando iwe lyikwaallye si, kyawo ni kiwo: Vakammaa iita irero lya Iruva, nalyo yeni vakalyilumba na nsia.
Nawo nta valasotye miraari efo miriminy yaawo, mmbo vakee vandu va veru-veru. Elyi numa vakalolya kushe fyuure ao irishiswa kimaruma kya irero lya Iruva. Nalyo yeni vakawonisa nsindara.
Na vengyi ni yewo veere ando a miingeny. Yewo mmbo vandu valearannya irero lya Iruva.
Nalyo ngyusau ta ulana yelu tikaanga-fo na ulembi lweelembwa ni masaa na lango yeto ta findo efyo fiingyi. Nafyo fikasisira irero llya lyilakivike-se kimu.
Na yewo veere ando a uteri usha mmbo yewo vashaaranyaa irero lya Iruva vakalyilumba, vakeenda vevikaa fimu, umwi kavika makumi araru, na ungyi makumi arindaru, na ungyi iyana.”
Kawuya kavavia, “A taa mmbo yeendwa indesikywa na nakori ao kitara? Nshi isheendwaa indevikwa ando a yeekyerya taa?
Mashika nkwiifo kindo kisurumwaa kire kilamanyika-fo. Nta kulaifo kindo kisurumi kire kilamanyika paa-fo.
Kwakooya nndu atiri maarwi earannya navearannya!”
Kawuya kavavia, “Manyiny ekyo mwiifo mushiita-te! Myeesye yaany mwameesya nayo vandu, nnyo musheesywaa muviirywaa na yeengerywa muveengerywa-u.
Mashika nndu atiri kindo mmbo aningwaa fingyi. Na nndu nalatiri kindo, na kilya akooya atiri mmbo avekisokwaa.”
Kawuya kaamba, “Umangyi lwa Iruva shaasa lukai mmbo lwava sha nndu aleenda yeera mbeu efo uteriny.
Kava mwiilala na ikwiipoo kio na nsanyiny na mbeu ilya ikamia, ikang'ana, na yeto muni nalamanyi.
Uteri yelo lukarosa fimu lo weni. Mmbo lulepooka yeende mikongo, numa fyaa, numa nganu tiinukye efo fyaany.
Na kwakooya kimu yekyo kyankwaamba ivira, nalyo yeni karika finndo kimmba kwamfika yoo maveiyony.”
Kawuya kavavia, “A nkyokyi umangyi yelo lwa Iruva lushevakaniswaa nakyo ao lulwaallwe kyaaso kyeekyi?
Mmbo lukee sha mbekye ya Haradali, nndu aleyeera efo sumbai, nayo ikee shidu ikairya mbeu toose teerwa sumbai.
Nayo ikamaa yeerwa ikarwa, ikang'annya miri ingyi myoose. Ikaende maramba maniini, ndeye ta efo nginiiu tikatana taidima yookya-fo fifuri fisikywa nkirishe kya vayo.” "
Kawoongoya kirero kya Iruva avaviaa fyaaso fiingyi fya ngata yeyo shaasa vaidima yaaranya.
Nta nalarere nawo kindo kulaore aveera fyaaso-fo. Lyo valya vakiloshyony veni kavatambashuya fyoose vakee kyaanya kyawo.
Nalyo nkonu ulya mweni elyi kwamiila kavavia, " “Ndifony, luruuke na kwakulya.”
Nalyo vakasamana na mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu. Vakankamara shaasa eefo efo ngalaveny. Naasa na ngalava tingyi tikavekaa-fo teemwiimmya!
Nalyo kukakwiipoo uraato lwa finya lurie mmbwa. Ngalava ilya ikatana yaishwa mura.
Nawe muni akee efo taari ya ngalava yoo kwa numa eelele rony aekyerye mboloko yeelaaya nrwe. Nalyo vakamwaanta vakammbia, “Llosha, a mmbo kulasarye elyi lwiifo lusiaa?”
Nawe kakwiipoo kakyeemmya uraato lulya kavia yeeve ilya, “Malallya sau!” Nalyo uraato lukasyado, kukava kimammya sau.
Nalyo kavavia, “A kikyi elyi mukee veerei indo? Kyavaany inda elyi mwatura kyikusiryo?”
Vakatirwa mmbweerei wiingyi, vakaviana, “A nndu yeu mmbwa kwi elyi na uraato lwamwiirikya na yeeve yei?”
Nalyo vakafika kulya kwa kulya ya yeeve ilya kulya urukeny lwa Vagerasi.
Na elyi amooloka efo ngalaveny nalyo yeni nndu kasha ikwaannya nawe atirwa mumuyo nkasha, auka kulya mbangeny ta vafu.
Nawe efo mbangeny tilya ta vafu nng'u aaluye kyeny kwakwe, nta kulaiyo nndu aidima imfinga na nse.
Mashika mmbo enkapywa minya keengyi na ifingwa na mise. Nawe karummbwa mise ilya na minya tilya katifisha-fisha. Nta kulakae-fo nndu aleidima imbinga.
Nawe kyeeri kilya kyoose mmbo eekaa efo mbangeny ta vafu na efo mafumbuny. Kava moongora-fo kio na nsanyiny na ikumanya-manya na mawe.
Naasa kalollya Yesu aifo ashaa akee kwaasha. Nawe kanrishya kandemoolokya si.
Kafua na unyanga waasha kaamba, “A nkyoki kukundye neeny, yewe Yesu, kukee Mwana wa Iruva yeto akee uwe ya findo fyoose? Shilyiiyaany mboo-te, swa Iruva, kwakooya kulasheshiturwa!”
Nyeeli we arie immbya, “Yewe mumuyo nkasha uka nndu yeu.”
Nalyo kammbesa, “A irina lyafo ni yewe vi?” Nawe kammbia, “Irina lyakwa ni itorito. Mashika elyi lukee veengyi.”
Naasa kamfuuya kyuumu nalasheevarika kwaasha valakani na uruka lulya.
Naasa nang'u kwiifo kushiiswaa ironda iniini lya nguve alya usambalo lwa ifumbu lilya.
Vakantereva vakaamba, “Lurike lundeanga nguve yeto.”

Nawe kavaninga mumu. Nalyo mimuyo ilya mikasha ikasomuka-fo, ikaanga nguveny tilya. Naasa ironda lilya lyikooloka lyirishaa na efo waangeu, lyikandesiiya efo yeeveny ilya. Nalyo lyefikye fiku fivii. Tikafumbwa mmura efo yeeveny.
Nalyo valya vetiisaa vakarisha vakandevia vandu va efo muriny na va efo mareminy, mbony tilya vandu vakeenda vandelola kindo kilya kyatanyika vamanyi mmbo kikee inda.
Vakafika alya Yesu akai. Na ulya etirwa mmumuyo nkasha vakallollya akee rembo, ammeeraa soori, mmbwe ulya eetirwa mmatorito alya. Nawo vakairyaa.
Na valya valollya nndu ulya wa mimuyo mikasha shaasa atannywa, na kilya kya nguve tilya vakawoongoya mbony eto.
Vakapooka imooshora nakwiipoo nooke efo myuungony yaawo.
Nalyo elyi eefo asaamaa na efo ngalaveny, nndu ulya etirwa mmimuyo mikasha kasha intereva nakukaye nawe.
Nawe nalamwiirikye, kammbia, “Enda kulya kyeny kwafo kwa vandu vafo kundewoongoya ekyo kiniini kyoose shaasa Nndumi akutannya na ikulillya ukiva lwafo.” "
Nalyo kaenda kapooka indekapa weele efo kwa vandu va uruka llwa lwa miri ikumi (Dekapoli) evaviaa kilya kiniini Yesu alentannya kyoose. Vakasongololo woose.
Nalyo Yesu kawuya karuuka lyingyi na kulya kwakulya eeriwa nngalava. Vandu vakasha ikuumbya alya akai mamwiingyi ung'ani. Nawe akee efo mbaambaa ya yeeve ilya.
Kukasha nau nndu akee umwi wa yewo vekallya mmba ya iterevya. Na irina lyakwe ni Yairo. Allolya kooloka si yoo marendeny akwe.
Kamooshora kyuumu, kaamba, " “Kimwana kyakwa kya kyeny kiifo kifwaa mbee. Neewe kundany mbee indemweekyerya maako, nakooye ikirwa na iwona muu.”
Kaenda nawe na vandu vakallatya mamwiingyi ung'ani, vakansisira.
Nalyo kweifo nka elwee ndwari ya kyika ando a myaaka ikumi na ivii.
Elyiswaa ukiva wiingyi ni vaanga veengyi, emmaya-fo na findo etiri fyoose, nta kilammbukye-fo kindo, kaveenda asheengeraa iva nnana tupu.
Naasa elyi amiita mbony ta Yesu kasha numa akusurummyi efo mamwiinginy ulya, kapaana soori yakwe ya yeerya.
Nawe kaamba, “Kwakooya shapaana naakwa ni soori ta yeerya, mmbo nsheshiaa tupu.”
Nalyo yeni kishoru kya ndwari ilya yakwe ya kyika kikamanda. Kaita efo mwiiliny wakwe mmbo ankyia kilya kyeeke ntuurwa.
Nalyo yeni Yesu kamanya efo nriminy mmbo ambukwa mfinya. Kainduka akee efo mamwiinginy wa vandu, kaamba, “Ni vi apaana soori takwa-ro?”
Valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakammbia, “Kulollye mamwiingyi yeu wiikusisira-sisiraa Neewe kwawuya yaamba, mmbi ashipaana?”
Kavavikya miso nakooye ilollya ulya ampaana.
Naasa nka ulya kasha nau atirwa mmbweerei na irerema ameemanya na kilya kyammbutikya, kakweera si yoo akai kamoongoya kya dede kilya kyoose shaasa kyeenda.
Nawe kammbia, “Mwana-kwa elyi kwankusirya-u indo nkyo kyakukyira. Kweengye na ufoo, kuveva nndu ammeeshia ekyo kyeekulyisaa ukiva.”
Naasa elyi eefo areraa indo kukasha nau vandu wooka kulya kyeny kwa ulya mwiikallya mmba yeeterevya. Vakaamba, “Mwana yeto wafo amfwa. Nkikyi elyi kwaatara-se llosha yeu?”
Naasa Yesu kaita kirero kilya kyaambawa, kavia ulya mwiikallya mmba yeeterevya, “Nta kulairyee! Kusirye-u tupu!”
Nalyo nta nalalekeye nndu nallatye neende nawe-fo kulaore ni Petro na Yakobo na Yohane we mwanamaye wa Yakobo.
Vakafika kulya kyeny kwa ulya mwiikallya mmba yeeterevya. Kalollya-fo vandu vekapaa ufullwe na kiiyo na irorongya kyuumu.
Nawe kavavia, “Nkyiki elyi mwakapa indo ufullwe na iiya? Kimwana yekyo nshi kifiiye-fo, mmbo kilele rony.”
Nawo vakanseka. Naasa we muni kaanta-u woose. Kakamara ndeye wa kimwana kilya na maye na valya aryani nawo. Kaira na efo kundo kimwana kilya kikai.
Katira kimwana kilya woko kakyivia, “Talita kumi!” Nakyo kwaallwa kyikee sheelyi kyaambawa, “Mwana shakuvia kwiipoo!”
Nalyo yeni kimwana kilya kya kyika kyikakwiipoo, kyikapooka irua-rua, nawe emaye myaaka ikumi na ivii. Nalyo yeni vakauma mwangaya.
Nawe kavavavasa kyuumu kindo ekyo nndu nalakooye ikimanya. Kaamba kimwana kilya kiniingwa shoonga.
Nalyo kawara shia kooka kulya akai, kandefika kulya muriny kundo alelelyo. Na valya vakiloshyony vakeenda varyani nawe.

Naasa elyi kwamfika nkonu wa Sabato kapooka ilosha efo mmba yeeterevya. Na valya vearanya veefo veengyi. Nawo vakaising'ang'a, vakaamba, “A nyira nndu nkwi yeu autye mbony yeto na urango yelo? Na mitannyi yeyo ya wiidimi ya ngata yeyo ikavetanyika na maako akwe!
A nndu yeu nshi ulya eepashaa firi, akee mwana wa Maria na mwanamaye wa Yakobo na Yose na Yuda na Simion? Na vamfwamaye nshi vavekee kunu kweru?” Naasa vakava mmbo vawonisaa nsindara efo kwakwe.
Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Nndu nkisuku nkwii-fo kundo aminwa, kulaore ni efo muriny kundo alelelyo na efo kwa vandu va ufyari lwakwe na efo kyeny kwakwe-fo.” "
Nawe nta nalaidimi itana-fo kindo kya wiidimi-fo, kulaore ni vandu vanana vaangu alevaekerya maako kavashiisa.
Nawe katambiswa elyi valema indo ikusirya-u. Nalyo kava mweenda iira-ira efo miriny midu isengetye-u na ilosha-fo. "
Nalyo kavaanga valya ikumi na vavii vashekuummbya yoo akai. Kavaruma vavii vavii. Kavaniinga ushilyi lwa iitorya mimuyo ya utefusu.
Kavavavasa valakamare kishau kulaore ni nsengye mweni, nta kishau-fo, nta mboloko-fo, nta pesa ta efo ukoveny lwa kisiny-fo.
Kavavia, “Mmbo musheendaa muree fyaaru fya kisima. Nta muleende muree soori ivii-fo.”
Kawuya kavavia, “Wo kundo mwamaanga mmba ya nndu, kaeny-fo mutani mwauka kundo eko.
Na wo ando mwanra mulawarywa nta yaaranywa, ukeny-fo mwiikakapaa kilulyi kya marende any, kive ukureeki kwawo.”
Nalyo vakawara shia vakandekapa weele lwa ivia vandu vaalashike efo nriminy.
Nawo vakaanta mimuyo mikasha miingyi. Na vandu valwee veengyi vakavaamba mafura vakavashiisa.

Nalyo mangyi ilya Herode kaita mbony ta Yesu, neelyi irina lyakwe lyeenngye nnduma nawe kaamba, “Ate ni Yohane Mmbatisi, annduka ooka kwa vafu. Nkyo kimaruma finya yeto teetana fya wiidimi tikarunda kwakwe.”
Naasa vengyi vakaamba, “Ni Elia.” Vengyi vakaamba, “Ni nndu mwauya fisuku akee wa ngata imwi na vakisuku valya va mbee.”
Naasa elyi Herode aita kirerwaa indo, kaamba, “Ni Yohane ulya shilenrummbwa nrwe, mmbwe alewuya iruka.”
Nyelyi we Herode muni enruma vandu vaende itira Yohane, kamweera efo mmba ya vafingwa kimaruma kya Herodia ulya ekee nka wa mwanamaye we Filipo, emmurwaa.
Mashika Yohane evia Herode, “Nkutiri mumu weerwaa nka wa mwanamau-fo.”
Naasa Herodia kakaa ellyie iyoo. Kavekunda na imbwaa; nalaidimi.
Neelyi Herode eereiye Yohane eeishi ni nndu nsumanu kaveva mweele. Kakaa anringaa. Kava mumwiirannya kavefulukywa keengyi. Kawuya kavekunda imwaarannya-da.

Nalyo kukawonika nkonu utiri mwaanya nsha, nyelyi kwamfika nkonu weekummbwa Herode alewonika. Kaniinga ngyama takwe shoonga na vashilyi vakwe va fira valya vaniini, na vandu va nrwe va kulya Galilaya.
Nalyo mwana ulya wa kyeny we Herodia kaanga nafo kashefina, kasennya Herode na valya akee nawo efo shoongeny. Naasa mangyi kavia mwana ulya wa kyeny, Shitereva kindo kwankunda, na yeny nkuniingaa!
Kavellyiiya mboo eshaambaa, “Kindo kwankuterevya nkuniinga-da, na kikava kyenga kya umangyi lwakwa.”
Nawe kasomuka-fo kandevia maye, “A shatereva ki ndesa?” Nawe kaamba, “Ni nrwe wa Yohane Mmbatisi.”
Nalyo yeni kaanga na efo mangyi akai ashaangusyaa, katereva kaamba, “Mmbo shakunda kushiniinge nrwe wa Yohane Mmbatisi ulaalu indi, ushe uriwa ni nndeeva.” "
Nalyo mangyi kasokywa m fyoova deny, indi kimaruma kya veny valya na valya akee nawo alya shoongeny nalakunde imwiima.
Nalyo mangyi karuma umwi wa vasikari vakwe venringa, kammbavasya nandeende nrwe wa Yohane.
Nawe keenda kandenrummbwa nrwe efo mmba ya vafinge, kasha aurie na nndeeva, Kasheniingya mwana ulya wa kyeny. Na mwana ulya wa kyeny kandeurwaaya maye.
Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakaita mbony tilya, vakasha nafo vakaipoo nnying'a ulya wakwe vakawaara mbangeny yeerika.
Nalyo valya vakiloshyony vakasha ikuummbya alya Yesu akai, vakamoongoya filya valetana na ilosha.
Nawe kavavia, " “Oshony yeni muveni mweende kyaanya kyany mukooye iimuya-u kyaangu!” Mashika mmbo neelyi vandu vee-fo veengyi veshaa na yeenda nawo nta valaoni mwaanya weelya shoonga.
Vakakwiipoo-fo vakeenda ando kulalelwa, variwa nngalava, vakaefo kyaanya kyawo.
Nalyo vandu valya veefo veengyi vakavalollya vesheendaa, vakamanya mmbo. Nawo vakeenda na marende veerisha wooka miriny myoose vandekuummbya kulya arie yeenda. Vakasonngwa ifika-fo ngota wo.
Naasa elyi aoloka ngalaveny kalollya kwankuummbya-u mamwiingyi wa vandu. Nawe kavatinywa nyelyi vakee sha mburu tilatiri mwiisi. Kapooka ivalosha mbony shiingyi.
Naasa elyi nkonu wameenda nnu valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakasha na yoo akai, vakaamba, “Yaa lukai ni kasa, na nkonu wameenda nnu.
Vasami veende kulya mareminy na miriny ilya iringitye na kulya fimuriny vandekuurya-fo fyeelya.”
Nawe karouwa kavavia, “Vaniingeny yeni kyeelya!” Vakammbia, “A mmbo kwakunda lundeura mikate ya fesa mayana avii, lushevaniinga valye!”
Naasa kavavia, “A mikate mutiri ni yiinga?” “Endeloleny-te.” “Ni iraanu iifo, na makunda avii.”
Nawe kavavavasya vakwaale si woose efo mareny vakae mboto-mboto.
Vakakaa rembo makumi araanu araanu.

Nalyo kawarya mikate ilya iraanu na makunga alya avii, kalola efo iruveeu kaarafuma Iruva. Kafisha-fisha mikate ilya fyenga fyenga, kaniingyany valya vakiloshyony vandeavya vandu wo nndu kyakwe. Na makunga alya avii kavaavya woose.
Vakalya woose, vakauura.
Vakaveipoo na fipereshu mikusha ikumi na ivii,
Na valya valelya mikate ilya vafye sha womi fiku firaanu.
Nalyo yeni kaitika vakiloshyony vakwe vaange na efo ngalaveny vasongwe yeenda vanderuuka na kwakulya ya Betisaida, nawe nasami mbele vandu valya.
Nalyo elyi ansamana nawo kakwiipoo kaenda ando a ifumbuny nandeterevya-fo.
Naasa na elyi kwamiila ngalava ilya yamfika efo yeeveny nnang'ani, nawe akee kulya kwaarutu we muni.

Nalyo alollya vaona ngatara yeerwaa ngalava na mbee, mashika uraato lwesumani nawo. Naasa elyi kwafika ikamba lyeeringa kio lya kaana, nawe kafika yoo vakai ashiiraa yoo uuwe ya yeeve ilya, kakunda ivaira na mbee.
Naasa vekillollya ashiiraa efo uuwe ya mura, vakakusara kulakooye nkirishe, vakafua wui.
