Neelyi vallollye woose vakaising'ang'a. Naasa nalyo yeni karera nawo, kavavia, “Wuiyony mmuu, ni yen-te! Nta mulairyae!”
Nalyo kasaama na efo ngalaveny kundo vakai. Uraato lulya lukamalallya sau. Nawo vakoomany mwaangaya efo miriminy yaawo.
Mashika kya mikate ilya walandekiitumuso-fo na ngoo tawo tilakummbwe.
Nalyo vakaruuka na kulya kwakulya kwaarutu, kulya Genesareti, vakanangyi sya-u ngalava ilya.
Nalyo yeni elyi vamooloka wooka efo ngalaveny, vandu vakammanya mmbwe,
vakaenda na ngeta, vakanderingitya uruka lulya loose. Vakapooka indeipoo valya valwee variwa mfitara, vakasengetya-sengetya nawo wo ando vamiita akai.

Na wo ando amaanga nafo a efo fimiriny, ao miriny, ao efo mmba, vakashevika yewo valwee efo singireny vakanterevany vapaani naakwa ni ikyedu lya soori yakwe ya yeerya. Na yewo vampaana vakaveshia woose.
Nalyo Vafarisayo vakashekuumbya yoo akai vasangyi na veelosha mavavaso valya maata vauka kulya Yerusalemu.
Vakalolya vakiloshyony vakwe maata velyaa shoonga na maako arindye, maako nalakee masangye.
Mashika Vafarisayo naakwa na Vayuda woose mmbeelyaa shoonga, kulaore vasangya maako keengyi-fo. Vakava veeringa indo ngyufundo tilya valereeywa ni vakuu vawo.
Na elyi vashuukaa singireny kulaore vapooka ikusangya mmbeelyaa shoonga-fo. Kukavekaa-fo na findo fingyi-se fiingyi valereeywa fyeeringa, sha mirumwa yeefwallya ngyupata mura na ndima na nungu.

Naasa, Vafarisayo valya vasangyi na vaarya valya va fitabu vakasha immbesa, “A nkikyi elyi vakiloshyony vafo valaendaa kisumani na ngyufundo ta vakuu veru? Na ilya vakaveelya shoonga na maako arindye?”
Nawe kavavia, “Yesaya mmbo alemuronga yeni vakunang'ari ashaauyaa kisuku kyeamba, ‘Vandu yeva ni kana kawo vashiindyaa nako, indi ngoo tawo tikakaa kwaasha na yeny.
Mmbo vashireremmya kikee kyaruu parany, kimmba mavavaso yoo a kivandu, mmbo ava mbony tawo teelosha.’ “
“Yeni mmbo mureeye ivavaso lya Iruva mukawuya ikushya ngyufundo yeto ta kivandu.”
Kawuya kavavia, “Ni indo kyikai: Ivavaso lya Iruva llyo mwalyifullwa naambo mwiidimi iringa ngyufundo yeto tany.
Mashika Mose mmbo avavasye kyeamba, ‘Indya ndoo na mau. Na yeto aruma ndeye na maye ifwa nafwe.’
Neeni mukawuya yaamba, ‘Nndu kavia ndeye ao maye ni Korbani,’ kikee sheelyi kyaambawa, ‘Efyo mweewaryaa kwakwa fyeemulela akakafyo shammeefivika waavi lwa mmba ya Iruva.
Mmukillekeyaa-se katannya ndeye ao maye kindo-fo.’
Kikavaany mmbo mwamina kirero kya Iruva kimaruma kya ngyufundo yeto tany mulereeywa mukatifitya vandu. Na findo fifwanani na fya ngata yeyo mukatana fiingyi.”
Nalyo kavaanga-se lyingyi mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu vashekuummbya yoo akai. Kavavia, “Shaaranyiny moose mwiitumuso!
Nkwiifo kindo kyikee kipoo ya nndu kyikamwiira na efo nnang'ani kishiidimaa imwaalwa ntefusu-fo. Kya indi yekyo kishuuka efo nnang'ani yakwe nkyo kishaallwaa nndu kava ntefusu. [
Naasa yeto atiri maarwi earannya navearannya!]”
Naasa elyi vamaanga na efo mmba anrau mamwiingyi ulya, valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakashembesa kya kyaaso kilya.
Nalyo kavavia, “Na yeni da mmbo mukee vandu valamanyaa kindo? A mmbo mulaishi wo kindo kya kipoo kyoose kishangaa nnduny, nshikyo kishiidimaa imwaallwa ntefusu-fo.
Mashika kundo kishangaa nafo nshi efo ngoony-fo, ni efo ndewuny. Kikawuya yuuka-fo kikaenda irininy.” Nawe elyi arera indo, kikava nkyo aallwa nakyo shoonga toose tikava shivaramu.
Naasa kaamba, “Ekyo kishuukaa efo nnduny, nkyo kindo kyamwaallwa kava ntefusu.
Kimmba efo ngoony ta vandu mfo kundo kuukye makusaro yoo meesi, na fya urui, na fya wiivi, na fya uwai,
na fya utuusi, na fya unying'u, na fya ngoo-shuu, na ntambo, na ngata ya ngula, na iriso yeesi, na kyaararo na ngata ya kinyala, na ngata ya nria.
Naasa findo efyo fyeesi fyoose, mmbo fyuukye efo kimmba, nafyo mfyo fyaallwa nndu kava ntefusu.”
Naasa kakwiipoo-fo kandefika kulya myuungony ya Tiro na Sidoni. Kaira na efo mmba ya nndu nalakunndye kimanyike. Nawe nalaidimi ikusuruma.
Indi nndu nka eefo akooya atiri mwana wa kyeny atirwa mmumuyo wa utefusu. Kaita mbony tilya takwe. Nalyo yeni kaanga nafo kamoolokya si yoo marendeny akwe.
Nawe akee nka aishi irera Kigriki aukye Foinike ya kulya Siria. Nawe kamooshora-dwa naante mumuyo ulya nkasha uuke mwana ulya wakwe wa kyeny.
Nawe kammbia, “Ra fivana fiwuure mbele! Nshi kisha iipoo shoonga ya fivana na indeerya fite-fo!”
Nawe karouwa kammbia, “Ee-da Nndumi! Naakwa ni fite mmbo fishekulyiiyaa misaaro yeyo ya vana.”
Nalyo kammbia, “Kimmba kwamaamba indo, kweengyeeny! Mwana yeto wafo ammbukwa ni mumuyo yeto nkasha.” "
Nalyo kakwiipoo, keenda kyeny kwakwe. Kakooya kimwana kilya kyakwe kilele rony efo kitareny na mumuyo ulya nkasha wammeemmbuka.
Nalyo kawara shia kooka kulya taari ya kulya Tiro, karummbwa na shia ya kulya Sidoni. Katana afika kulya kwiiduvani na yeeve ilya ya Genesareti kulya muungony wa miri ikumi.
Naasa, vandu vakamweenngye nndu akee mfu maarwi na ulumi lwakwe lukava utambasi. Vakashemooshora namweekerye maako.
Nawe kallakanisa efo vanduny vakuummbye-u nkuka, kandenrwaa kyaanya. Kaita nni efo maarwiny akwe, kawuya kafisha maare, kapaana ulumi lulya lwakwe.
Kainuya miso efo uwe iruveeu. Kadia kaamba, " “Efata!” Nakyo kikee sheelyi kyaambawa, “Tarambuka!”
Nalyo yeni maarwi alya akwe akawuya itarambuka na kitambisa kya ulumi lwakwe kikatambashuka, kawuya irera nisha.
Nawe kavavavasa valandeekivia nta nndu. Indi we asheengeraa ivavavasa nawo vakeengera ivambisa.
Vandu vakaising'ang'a nnu. Vakaamba, “Ate efyo atannyi fyaveshia fyoose! Valya vafiiye maarwi kaveekya vakaita, na valya vakee mbimbi kaveekya vakarera.”
Naasa mikonu ilya kweekuumbye-fo lyingyi nsemu nniini wa vandu, nawo valatiri kindo kyeelya. Nawe kavaanga valya vakiloshyony kyakwe. Kavavia,
“Shatinnywa vandu yewo vakuummbye-fo nkuka, mashika vansisirya kunu kwakwa ando a mikonu iraru sele, valatiri kindo kyeelya.
Na kwakooya shavatauwa indi veende kyeny valakomba kindo mmbo vasherovywaa efo shia. Na yewo maata ni kwaasha vaukye.”
Na valya vakiloshyony vakanndouwa, “A ni inda nndu ashiidimaa iwuutisa vandu yeva kunu kasa?”
Nawe kavavesa, “Ni mikate iinga mutiri?” Vakammbia, “Ni mfungare.”

Nawe kavia mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu vakee rembo. Kawarya mikate ilya mfungare, kaana Iruva. Kafisha fyenga fyenga. Kaniingya valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vandeavya vandu. Vakandeavya vandu vakuummbye-fo.
Vavetiri na fikunga fyaangu. Kafivikya mbora kaamba, nafyo-da vandefyaava.
Vakalya vakauura. Vakaveipoo na nsaaro wa fipereshu, mikusha mfungare.
Na vandu veeiyo vafye sha fiku fiina. Naasa, kavatauwa.
Nalyo yeni kasaama na efo ngalaveny aryani na vakiloshyony vakwe, Kafika kulya myuungony ya Dalmanuta.
Naasa Vafarisayo vakansheya vakapooka illya nawe ulai, Vakammbia nawoore wende luuka iruveeu vemweesaa.
Nawe katirwa ni unyafi kaamba, “Naambo-kyi irika elyi lyasia wende?” Nkya dede shamuvia, “Irika elyi llyisheniingwaa wende nta-fo!”
Nalyo kavara-u, kawuya kasaama na efo ngalaveny, kawara shia, kafika kulya kwakulya.
Naasa vakakooya vanrekywa ikamara mikate ya kishau. Na efo ngalaveny nta valarye-fo kindo kulaore ni nkate umwi nsi.
Nawe kavavavasany ashaambaa, “Manyiny mukwiise ntarang'o wa Vafarisayo na wa Herode.”
Naasa, vakaumburanaany wo veni na veni, “Ni elyi lulariye mikate ya kishau.”
Nawe kamanya kavavia, “A kimaruma nkikyi mukaumburana elyi mulariye mikate? A mmbo mulandeipuye nta kindo nta iranngwa. Na mirima yaany ikava ishi?
Mmbo mutiri miso mulalollye. Mukavetira maarwi mulaitye, nta mulakummbwa kindo!
Llya shileavya vandu valya fiku firaanu mikate ilya iraanu, a mikusha iishwe fipereshu ni iinga muleipoo-ro? Vakammbia, ‘Ni ikumi na ivii.’
A llya shileavya valya fiku fiina mikate ilya mfungare ni mikusha iinga iishwe fipereshu muleipoo? Vakaamba, ‘Ni mfungare.’
Nawe kavavia, ‘A mmbo mulandeitumuso?’ “
Naasa vakafika kulya Betisaida. Vandu vakamweenngye nndu mfu miso. Vakamooshora nampaani.
Nawe katira nndu ulya mfu miso woko. Kanrwaa kulya poo ya muri. Kafishya miso alya akwe maare. Kamweekerya maako, kammbesa, kwakooya alollye kindo.
Nndu ulya katarammbwa miso kaamba, “Shilollye vandu-da, lyo mmbo vakee sha miri isheendaa.”
Nalyo kamweekerya maako lyingyi efo misony, kaambuka miso, kashia kapooka ilollya findo fyoose fikamanyika paa.
Nawe kansama neende kyeny kwakwe, kammbia, “Nta kulaire neefo muriny-fo.”

Nalyo Yesu kakwiipoo-fo kawara shia aryani na vakiloshyony vakwe. Vakafika kulya fimiriny fikee kufii na kulya Kaisaria ya Filipo. Na elyi varie indo shia kavesa valya vakiloshyony vakwe, kaamba, “A vandu vaamba kyakwa, yeny mmbo shikee viiny?”
Nawo vakamoongoya vakaamba, “Kwiifo vaamba yewe ni Yohane Mmbatisi, na vengyi ni Elia. Na vengyi vakaamba, yewe ni umwi wa vakisuku.”
Nawe kavavesa, “A yeni mwaamba inda kyakwa, yeny mmbo shikee viiny?” Petro karouwa kammbia, “Yewe ni Kristo!”
Nawe kavaima valasheerera na nndu ekyo kyakwe.

Nalyo kapooka ivalosha mmbo kikee kideerye kya Mwana yeto wa Nndu nandeliswa ukiva wiingyi mmbandu na indeminwa mmasiingo a vandu na veelosha mavavaso, na iwaawa nawaawa, na mikonu ikamiira-u iraru nawuye iruka-ny.
Kavavia kirero ekyo areraa paa. Nalyo Petro kanrwaa na mbai. Kapooka inkeemmya.
Nawe kainduka kalola valya vakiloshyony vakwe. Kakeemmya Petro, kaamba, “Kwiipoo wuya numa yakwa Satana! Ekyo kukusarye nshi kya Iruva-fo, nkya kivandu!”
Nalyo kavaanga valya vakuummbye-fo sanda na vakiloshyony vakwe vashesangya yoo akai. Kavavia, “Nndu akunda ishilatya kuti nasue mwili vakwe muni avekurika nsalaba wakwe, naveshilatya-ny.
Mashika wo nndu ankunda ikira muu wakwe akaa naurete. Na wo nndu areta muu wakwe kwakooya ni kimaruma kyakwa na Nrumi yeyo ya Nsia, we akaa naukire.
Mashika iviri nndu ashuutaa-u llyo kyi kwakooya ashewonisaa ulana loose luve mbusha yakwe, kawuya iretya-u muu wakwe?
A kindo nndu avikaa kyeewouwa muu wakwe nkyo kyi?

Na kunu nnang'ani ya irika elyi lyiraiye utuusi na ulyamari wo nndu aifo amiira sony kyakwa na kya marero akwa, na Mwana yeto wa Nndu asheveiraa sony kyakwe-da elyi meendi ashaa aree itumbe lya Ndeye aryani na vasu yewo veele va Iruva.”
Nawe kavavia, “Nkya dede shamuvia, vandu vasalali yaa indi kwiifo valasheshosha ufu kulaore vallollya umangyi lwa Iruva lushe na finya.”
Nalyo mikonu ikaira-u irindaru Yesu kaipoo Petro na Yakobo na Yohane. Kavasaamisa ifumbuny yaasha vakee kyaanya kyawo wo veni. Nalyo kaalashika fwana yakwe valollye.
Na soori takwe tikamika tikava shaa pyai. Na kunu urukeny nta kulaifo mwiisangya soori ashiidimaa itiilisa indo-fo.
Nalyo Elia kasha na Mose ishekoora nawe. Vakarera nawe.
Naasa Petro karouwa kavia Yesu, “Llosha, ni kisha elyi yese lukee ya neese lukunndye itana matengo araru, lyafo lyimwi, na lya Mose lyimwi na lya Elia.”
Mashika nalaishi kindo arera kyeerouwa, Nyelyi vatirwa mmbweerei.
Nalyo ifishi lyikasha lyikavavikya nruve. Na unyanga lukarera luuka efo ifishiny lushaambaa, “Yeu mmbwe mwana wakwa nkunde, mwaaranyiny-te!”
Nalyo yeni elyi velolaa valalollye nndu, kulaore ni Yesu muni-da, eekee nawo.
Na elyi vee-fo vashoolokaa efo ifumbuny kavavavasa valendeeongoya nndu kilya valollya na kutani elyi Mwana yeto wa Nndu arukaa ooka kwa vafu.
Naasa kirero ekyo vakakiwarya, vakavesana-vesana wo veni na veni, a iruka elyo na yuuka kwa vafu mmbo lyikee inda ndesa?
Vakammbesa vakaamba, “A elyi veelosha mavavaso vaambaye mmbo kyikee kideerye Elia nasonngwe isha mbele?”

Nawe kavavia, “Ee-da ni indo vaambaye Elia asheshaa navauwe findo fyoose fishie sha elyo mbee. Indi kwakooya ni indo, a kyavaany inda elyi kikee kireiye kya Mwana yeto wa nndu nandeliswa ukiva wiingyi na iminwa?
Kya indi yeny shamuvia, Elia isha alemeesha, nawo vakantannya shaasa vakukunndya, shaasa kyekee kireiye kyakwe.”
Naasa vakafika kulya vakiloshyony vakwe vakai. Vakalolya vandu mamwiingyi nniini varingitye riti ma vaarya, va fitabu vellyaa nawo ulai.
Nalyo yeni elyi mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu moose wallollya Yesu, nawo vakamatuka deny. Vakandenrishya, vakamwiidikira.
Nawe Yesu kavavesa, “A kindo mwiifo mwiilyaa nawo ulai nkyokyi?”
Nalyo nndu wa efo mamwiinginy ulya kamwaallwa, “Llosha mmbo shemeende mwana wakwa na kunu kwafo atirwa mumuyo mbimbi.
Nato wo kyeeri wammeentafukya ukamwaaruva. Nawe kava mweende mavia na irafunnya mayoo. Kaenda anaa-naa. Na yeny shavia vakiloshyony yewo vafo vawaante, valaidimi.”
Nawe kaallwa kavavia, “Eele mukee irika liturye kikusiryo! A shikee neeni shifike indii? A shimusisirye mfike kwi? Kyemweendeny na yaa shikai!”
Vakamweende na alya akai. Naasa mumuyo ulya elyi walyollya ukansisika. Kawa yoo si kakwaalala-alala-u arosaa mavia.
Nawe kavesa ndeye, “A mfyeeri fifye inda uka kindo ekyo kimmusheya?” Nawe kaamba, “Uka elyo akee n-du.
Nato keengyi ukava umweeraa efo murony na mureny kufii umbwaa. Indi kwakooya yewe kushiidimaa kindo, lweekye kwiilusaryaa ukiva!”
Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Elyi kwaamba, ‘Kwakooya kushiidima!’ Findo fyoose mmbo fishiidimikaa-da efo kwa yeto akusirye-u!”
Nalyo yeni ndeye wa mwana ulya kaonisa unyanga, kaamba, “Shikusirye-u-da. Na yoo shalemmywa ikusirya-u kuveshitarama, mbee!”

Naasa Yesu kalollya vandu nkuka veefo vasheengeraa irishya-u, nawe kakeemmya mumuyo ulya wa utefusu kauvia, “Yewe mumuyo wa mbimbi kwaveva na mfu maarwi, yeny mmbo shakuvavasaany uka nndu yeu, nta kulakimwaange-se!”
Nato ukansisika kyuumu, ukammbuka. Nawe kava sheelyi amfwa. Valya vaiyo vakaamba, “Ankumba muu.”
Naasa Yesu kantira woko, kamwiinwa. Nalyo kasalala.
Kyasia, na elyi amaanga na efo mmba, valya vakiloshyony vakammbesa kyama, “A kimaruma yese lulaidimi yuuta nkikyi?”
Nawe kavavia, “Ngata yeyo nkwiifo kindo uvaa yaanta nakyo kulaore ni kiterewo-fo.”
Nalyo vakakwiipoo-fo, vakeenda, vakarumbwa na kulya Galilaya. Nawe nalakunde nndu nammanyi.
Neelyi eefo alosha vakiloshyony vakwe, kavavia, “Mwana yeto wa nndu eefo arambikywaa efo maakony a vandu, na immbwaa vammbwae. Nawe kammewaawa namae mikonu iraru, naruke-ny.”
Nawo valaitumuso elyi aamba indo, vakairyaa immbesa.
Naasa vakafika kulya Kapernaumu na elyi ammaanga efo mmba kavavesa, “A kindo mweefo mweereraa muveni na muveni efo shia nkyokyi?”
Vakamalallya mashika kindo valerera wo veni na veni vakee efo shia ni yeto akee nniini wa wooroye ni vi?
Nalyo kakaa rembo kavaanga valya ikumi na vavii na yoo akai, kavavia, “Kwakooya nndu akunda iva wa mbee, we kuti naaluke nave wa numa ya woose na mwiifurukannya woose.”
Nalyo keende kimwana kakyiseleesa yoo nnang'ani yaawo kakyikushya maakony kavavia,
“Wo nndu ammbwarya fivana efi kimwi kyawo kyikee kya ishikummbwa yeny, mmbo ashiwarya yeny. Na nndu ashiwarya yeny, nshi yeny ashiwarya-fo, mmbo awarya yeu aleshiruma.”
Naasa Yohane kaamba, “Llosha lulelollya nndu asendaa irina lyafo ashaantaa nalyo mimuyo mikasha, nawe nta nalakee nndu alulatye. Neese lukamwiima kimmba nalakee nndu alulatye.”
Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Nta mulamwiimi-fo, mashika nkwiifoo nndu asendaa irina lyakwa katana nalyo kindo kya wiidimi, nalyo yeni kamanya ishirera ukasha-fo.
Nndu nalalusuuye mmbo ava wa kyaalu kyeru.
Mashika wo nndu amurita mura na upata kyikee kya ishikummbwa yeny elyi mukee vandu va Kristo, ndede shamuvia, isina lyakwe llyikaa lyireke-se-fo, na lyikafika kwi!”

Na yewo vafwafwa vakusirye neeny naakwa ni yeto umwi-da, wo nndu ammbiiya nsindara weentuula si, kya nndu yeto mmbo kyava kisha kilanya nafinngywa isewe lyirungutwaa ni nshungu efo singony yakwe, nandeolotwa efo yeeveny.

Na kwakooya woko lwafo lushekweenngyee nsindara, lurummbwe! Mmbo kikee kisha kilanya kukooye ikwiirya neefo muuny kukee kisaya, ngeta elyi kwatira maako ai avii kweenda ifika efo Gehena, efo murony ularumikaa. [
Nafo sava ya vayo ilashefwaa na muro wa vayo ulasherumikaa.]

Na kwakooya urende lwafo lushekweenngyee nsindara, lurummbwe! Mmbo kyikee kisha kilanya kukooye ikwiirya na efo muuny kukee kitongororo, ngeta elyi kwatira marende yoo ai avii kweenda yeerwa efo gehena. [
Nafo sava ya vayo ilashefwaa na muro yeto wa vayo ulasherumikaa.]

Na kwakooya iriso lyafo lyishekweenngyee nsindara, lyiillwe! Mmbo kyikee kisha kilanya kukooye ikwiirya na efo umanginy lwa Iruva, kukee wa iriso lyimwi, ngeta elyi kwatira miso yoo ai avii kweenda yeerwa yefo Gehena.
Nafo sava ya wayo ilashefwaa na muro yeto wa vayo ulasherumikaa.
Mashika wo nndu kindo asheroliswaa nakyo ni muro.
Mmbala ni kindo kisha, kwakooya wanreta nrolo wa vayo, a nkyokyi musheurolisaa nakyo? Kevekeeny mutiri mmbala efo nnang'ani yaany, muvekaa na ufoo mu veni na veni.
Nalyo kakwiipoo-fo kafika kulya myuungony ya Yudaya na kulya kwakulya ya Yordani. Vandu vakasha-se ikuummbya kulya akai nseemu mwiingyi. Nawe kava mwiivalosha shaasa eishivie.
Nalyo Vafarisayo vakansheya, vakammbesa vemweesaa, “A ndesa nndu nndumi atiri mumu weelakana na nka wakwe?”
Nawe kaallwa kavavia, “A Mose amuvavasye inda?”
Nawo vakaamba, “Mose mmbo aluvikye mumu nndu nareiye barua ya ilakana nakulakannyiiny nawe.”
Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Ni kimaruma kya mirima yaany ikee myuumu indo, nkyo kilenniinga kamureiya ivavaso elyo.
Kya indi uka elyo mapookyony a findo fyuumbe, mmbo alevaumba vakee nndu nndumi na nndu nka.
Kimmba ni indo, nndu mmbo asheraa ndeye na maye nandekutira na nka wakwe.
Nawo vee vavii vandeva mwiili umwi nsi. Kikavaany nshi vakee-se vavii-fo, mmbo vava mwiili umwi nsi.
Naasany kindo Iruva we muni allunga nndu nalakirauwe-fo.”
Naasa elyi vakee efo mmba valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakammbesa lya kavii kya mbony yeto.
Nawe kaamba, “Wo nndu allakana na nka wakwe kaalyika ungyi, mmbo atana kindo kya utuusi.
Nawe nka yeto alakana na mmi, kandealyikwa ni ungyi, mmbo avetana kindo kya utuusi.”
Nalyo vakamweenngye fivana naambo nafipaani, na valya vakiloshyony vakakeemmya valya vafyeende.
Naasa Yesu alollya indo kasua, kavavia, “Reny fivana efyo fikusheye na kwakwa, nta mulafiimi. Mashika umangyi lwa Iruva lwava lwa yewo vafwanani nawo.
Ni kya dede shamuvia, nndu ara nalawarya umangyi lwa Iruva eetiri ngata ya kimwana, nnaonaa yaanga-fo-fo.” "
Nalyo kafishukura kafivikya mbora afyeekerye maako.
Naasa elyi ansomuka na poo neende, nndu umwi kasha nau eerishaa, kamfiirya-ndi kammbesa, " “Yewe Llosha nsha, a shitani inda shiwonise muu wa llung'anu uwe nto ding'u yakwa?”
Naasa Yesu kammbia, “A nkyokyi kwashivaangya nsha? Nkwiifo akee nsha-fo kulaore ni umwi tupu, mmbwe Iruva.
Mmbo kwiishi mavavaso yoo, ‘Kulawae, kulatuuse nta ituuswa, kulaive, kulavike ukureekyi lwa wongo. Kulasoke nndu kindo. Indya ndoo na mau.’ “
Nawe kammbia, “Efo fyoose mmbo shileva mwiivallya nafyo uka elyo shikee mwana n-du.”
Naasa Yesu kammbikya miso, kankunda, kammbia, “Kindo kwasaara-u ni kimwi, enda kundekumba fyoose kutiri kwaavye vakiva, llyony kushekuwonisyaa masaa efo iruveeu. Kwammaa oshoony, kusheshilatya!”
Nawe kakusha maviri kya ekyo avio. Keenda eesuuye mashika akee nndu atiri findo fiingyi.
Nalyo Yesu kalola taari toose ellaa vakiloshyony vakwe, kavavia, “A paa ngatara iifo ya yewo veni masaa vakooye yaanga umanginy lwa Iruva!”
Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakaising'ang'a elyi arera indo. Naasa Yesu kaallwa lyingyi kavavia, “Nyira fivana! A paa ngatara iifo ya vandu vakooye yaanga na efo umanginy lwa Iruva!
Mmbo kyava kyaangu ngamula iire efo mmbweny ya sindanu ngeta nndu muni masaa nakooye yaanga efo umanginy lwa Iruva.”
Naasa vakeengera ising'ang'a. Vakarera wo veni na veni. A nndu akooya ikirwa ni viiny?
Yesu kavalola swaa kaamba, “Kunu vanduny ekyo nkishiidimikaa-fo, kulaore ni efo kwa Iruva. Mashika efo kwa Iruva fyoose mmbo fishiidimikaa.”
Nalyo Petro kammbia, “Lla-te, mbee, yeese lureeye findo fyoose lukakulatya.”
Yesu kaamba, “Nkwiifo nndu areeye mmba ao mwanamaye, ao vamfwamaye, ao maye, ao ndeye, ao fivana, ao minda, kwakooya ni kimaruma kyakwa na Nrumi yeyo ya Nsia,
nare nalawarya ka iyana, meendi a muu yeu nawarye mmba na vanavamaye, na fivana, na minda, naakwa ni elyi aifo arishiswaa, na efo ulaniny yelo lwiishaa, nawarye muu wa llung'anu.
Indi yewo vakee va mbee veengyi vakaa vave va numa, na yewo wa numa vakaa vave va mbee.”

Naasa elyi varie shia yeenda irwa na kulya Yerusalemu, na Yesu eefo avasongoyaa, nawo vakasavaa. Na vandu yewo vallatye vakatirwa mmbweerei. Nalyo kaummbya-se valya ikumi na vavii yoo akai kapooka iwoongoya efyo fikaa finsheye.

Kaamba, “Llen-te lwiifo lurwaa na kulya Yerusalemu na Mwana yeto wa nndu nanderambikywa efo maakony a vakohani vaniini na vaarya va fitabu, nawo vamweekerye uvingo lweewaawa, vandenrambinkya efo maakony a vandu va masanga.
Nawo vashentatalaa na imweesellya minyiri na inkapa na ngova na immbwaa vavemmbwaa, nawe namae mikonu iraru narukeny.”
Nalyo Yakobo na Yohane vakanserikya, wo vana va Sebedayo, vakammbia, “Llosha mmbo lutiri kindo lukunndye ikutereva kulutannyi!”
Nawe kavavia, “A kindo ekyo mwakunda shimutannyi nkyokyi ndesa?”
Nawo vakammbia, “Luniinge ando eekaa rembo umwi yoo wokony lwafo usha, na ungyi yoo woko lwafo umuso elyi kukee usuriny lwafo.”
Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Mmwiishi nta kindo mwatereva-fo. A ndesa mushiidimaa ina upata yelo shinaa, ao ibatiswa ubatiso yelo yeny shibatiswaa?”
Nawo vakammbia, “Lushidimaa-da!” Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Upata yelu yeny shinaa muvelunaa, na ubatiso yeny shabatiswa muvebatiswa.
Kya indi iniinga nndu eekaa rembo yoo woko lwakwa usha na umuso, ekyo nshi kindo kyakwa yeny-fo, mmbo akee a yewo vandeesywa.”
Naasa valya ikumi vekiita indo, vakaswa na Yakobo na Yohane.
Nalyo Yesu kavavaanga na yoo akai. Kavavia, “Mmbo mwiishi yewo valollywa ni veshilya vandu va masanga, mmbo vavaafinyi. Na yewo vaniini vawo vakavalammya.
Indi kunu nnang'ani yaany nshi indo kivaa-fo. Indi kunu kwany, wo nndu aiyo akunda iva nniini waany, we kuti nave nndundi waany.
Na wo nndu akunda iva wa mbee, we kuti nave kishinga kya woose.
Mashika naakwa na Mwana yeto wa Nndu nshi asheye ishefurukannywa-fo, ni ishefurukannya-u, na ivika-u muu wakwe uve kiraso yeewouwa veengyi.”

Nalyo vakafika kulya Yeriko. Na elyi eefo akapaa muri ulya wa Yeriko mungo aryani na vakiloshyony vakwe na vandu mamwiingyi nkuka, nalyo vakakooya mwana ulya wa Timayo, we Bartimayo, akee mfu miso akee rembo yoo mbaambaa ya shia asheereryaa vandu kyeelya.
Kaita mmbwe Yesu wa kulya Nasareti akeeiira. Nalyo kapooka ifua na yaamba, “Woi Yesu kukee mwana wa Davidi shisarya ukiva lwakwa!”
Vandu veengyi vakankeemmya namalallye. Nawe keengera ifua kilanya, “Woi Yesu mwana wa Davidi, shisarya ukiva lwakwa-te!”
Nalyo Yesu kairisha kaamba, “Mmbaangeny!” Vakambaanga vakambia, “Wuiyo mmuu! Mmbo akuvaanga!”
Nawe keera soori takwe mbai, tilya ta yeerya. Karumbuka kasalala, kasha na yoo Yesu akai.
Nalyo Yesu kammbia, “A nkyokyi kukundye shikutannyi?” Mfu miso kammbia, “Llosha, ni ishaallwa shive nndu alollye!”
Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Kweenngye, kwankusirya-u indo, nkyo kyakukyira!” Nalyo yeni kava nndu alollye, keenda ellatyaa efo shia.
Na elyi veefo vaparikyaa kulya Yerusalemu vamfika kulya Betifage na Betania nng'u ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura, nalyo karuma vakiloshyony vakwe vavii.
Kavavia, “Endeny efo kimuriny ekyo kisumani na yaa mukai. Mukamfika-fo nalyo yeni mushekooya ngashe ya nshungu ikee shaavike. Yaauweny musheenngye!
Na kwakooya nndu amuvia, a nkikyi elyi mwatana indo? Mbieny ni Nndumi atiri kindo aikunndye! Nawe asheirikaa-se na kyaangu iwuye na yaa.”
Vakeenda vakavekooya ngashe ilya ya nshungu ikee shaavikye yoo mwaangony wa mmba yoo kipoo yoo ilemmyony lya shia.
Na vandu vasalali-u maata vakavavia, “A nkikyi elyi mwauwa ngashe yeyo?”
Nawo vakavavia indo-da shaasa Yesu aamba. Vakavara.
Vakarwaa ngashe ilya na kulya Yesu akai. Vakaala soori tawo ta yeerya efo mungony wa vayo. Nawe kasaama-u, kakaa-u rembo.
Na vandu veefo vengyi vakaala soori tawo ta yeerya efo shia. Veengyi-se vakaala-u maramba vamanya efo miriny.
Nalyo valya vasongwa vakasanga na valya vasha numa, vakaonisa ngyunyanga vashaambaa, “Kundearafumwa yeto asha arumwa ni Nndumi!
Kundearafumwa umangyi lwa nde weeru Davidi lwiifo lushaa! Hosiana efo uuwe iruveeu!” "
Nalyo kafika kulya Yerusalemu alya poo ya mmba ya Iruva. Kalola-fo findo fiiyo fyoose, kakwaanisa kakooya kwameenda nnu kwishiilaa. Kakwiipoo-fo keenda kulya Betania aryani na valya ikumi na vavii.
Na elyi lya ndesi ngama, elyi veefo vashuukaa kulya Betania katirwa nshaa.

Nalyo kalollya nkuu wa nndeny ukee kwaasha wamoora maru. Kasha nau kaamba kulakooye alollya-u kindo. Ashe na yoo ukai, nta nalakooye-u kindo kulaore ni maru meni. Mashika kulandefika kyeeri kya ndunda-fo.
Nawe kauvia, " “Kulakikae-se nndu alya ndunda kunu kwafo na kufike llung'anu-fo.” " Na valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakakiita.

Naasa vakafika kulya Yerusalemu. Nawe kaira na efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva. Kapooka yaanta-fo valya veefo veekumbaa na yuura findo efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva. Kavefullwa na mesa ya valya vealasha fesa na firi fyeekaya fya valya veekumba mbeta.
Nta nalalekeye nndu kaira na efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva arie kindo.
Kavalosha kavavia, " “A mmbo kilakee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Mmba yakwa mmbo ivaangwaa mmba yeeterevya ya vandu va masanga moose?’ Neeni mukawuya iyaallwa mbanga ya veala shia.” "

Nalyo vakohani valya vaniini na veelosha mavavaso vakeeta. Vakasia mwaanya shaasa vemmbwaa. Nyelyi vamweereiye, mashika vandu valya vakuummbye-u mamwiingyi woose vatirwa nntamba kya kiloshyo kilya kyakwe.
Na wo nkonu elyi kwafika iila kaveuka kulya muriny.
Naasa elyi lya ndesi ngama vashiiraa efo shia vakakooya nkuu ulya wamuuma upookya miraariiny.
Na Petro kakummbwa kammbia, " “Llosha llate nkuu yeto kuleudenga, ekakato wamuuma.”
Na Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Veny vekusirya Iruva!

Nkya dede shamuvia, wo nndu avia ifumbu yelyi, ‘Ipowa yaa kukai kundeerwa efo yeeveny,’ kara nalatirwa nnyimyira efo nriminy, kakusirya-u deny, mmbo kishevaa indo-da shaasa amaamba, naasa ni indo ashewonisaa.”
Kimmba niindo, neeny shamuvia, “Findo fyoose muterevaa efo kwa Iruva na ifyooshora, kevekusiryeny-ng'u mmbo mwammeefiwarya, nalyo mushefiwonisaa tupu.
Na kyeeri musalalyi-u mwiiterevaa, kwakooya mutiri mwaandu na nndu, mfwaayeny, naambo na Nde waany wa efo iruveeu navemufwaaya yeni kya efyo mulyamarye. [
Indi kwakooya kulaore yeni mwafwaaya vandu, nta Nde yeto waany wa efo iruveeu nnashemufwaayaa yeni kya ngyulyamari tany-fo.]”
Nalyo vakafika lyingyi kulya Yerusalemu. Naasa elyi eefo arua-ruaa efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva, kasheywa ni vakohani vaniini na vaarya va fitabu na masiingo a vandu.
Vakashemmbia, “A ni wiidimi lwa ngata-kyi kwatana nalo findo efi?”
Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Reny shimuvese kindo kimwi, neeny mushaallwe, llyo na yeny nshemuviaa kya mumu yeto shitiri shatana nato indo mmbwa ngata ingai.
A ubatiso lulya lwa Yohane kundo luukye nkwi, ni efo iruveeu, ao ni kunu vanduny ndesa? Shirouweny ekyo.”
Nawo vakaumburana wo veni na veni, vakaamba, “Kwakooya lwaamba, ‘Ni lwa efo iruveeu’, mmbo asheluviaa, ‘Naambo kyi mulamwiirikyeeny?’
Na kwakooya lwaamba, ‘Ni lwa kunu vanduny’, nkivaa-fo, mashika vandu woose veeshi Yohane mmbo akee nndu nkisuku dede.”
Naasa vakarouwa Yesu vakaambia, “Llwiishi-fo.” Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Nta yeny nshimuviaa kya mumu shitiri shatana nato indo mmbwa ngata ingai-fo.”

Nalyo kapooka irera nawo eveeraa fyaaso, kaamba, “Kweefo nndu aleronga nnda wakwe wa misabibu. Kauringitya na uvare. Kasuma-fo ando eekammya sabibu. Katannya-fo na nganga yeeringa. Kawaarya varemi, numa kaipoo kyaaro.
Naasa elyi kyeeri kyamfika karuma kishinga kulya kwa varemi valya nandewarya waavi lwa ndunda ta nnda ulya.
Nawo vakantira, vakankapa nnu. Vakansama wa ruu parany.
Nalyo kawuya karuma-se ishinga lyingyi kulya kwawo. Nawe-da vakavenkapa mariinga a nrwe, vakamwiinyala.
Kawuya kaveruma-se ungyi. Nawe vakammbwaa. Na vengyi-se veengyi, maata vakavakapa na maata vakavawaa.
Naasa kakooya atiri-se umwi, mmbwe mwana wakwe nkunde. Mmbwe alefurummya inruma kakusara, ‘Ammba mwana wakwa mmbo vashenreremyaa.’
Naasa varemi valya vakaviana, ‘Akakato muya ding'u! Ndifony lundemmbwaa, na ding'u yeyo ive yeeru luveni.’
Vakantira vakammbwaa. Vakandemweera efo poo ya nnda ulya.”
A muni nnda yeto mmbo ashetanaa inda ndesa? Mmbo ashekwiipoo nanderumata varemi valya. Na nnda ulya naare-fo vengyi.
A mmbo mulandesomi kilya kyikee kireiye kyeamba, “Iwe yelyo vetana mmba valelyiinyika, llyo elyo lyilewuya iva iwe lya ndumbeny.
Mmbo kileva indo kyuuka efo kwa Nndumi. Kikava kindo kyeesongololo lulollye na miso eru.” "
Nalyo vakasia mwaanya weentira, vakawuya iiryaa mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu. Mashika elyi vaishi kyaaso kilya aamba nkyeevaronga wo. Vakanra-u vakeenda.
Nalyo vakanrummya Vafarisayo vaangu variani na ngyama ta Herode vashenreiya na marero.

Vakasha nang'u vakammbia, " “Ale llosha lwiishi mmbo kukee nndu wa dede kulasarye nta nndu. Nyelyi kulakee nndu mwilola fisangu fya vandu. Mmbo kuloshye shia ya Iruva kya songosiny. A ndesa kwiifo mumu weevikya Kaisari ukamba ao oode? A lukanninga aa lukara?”
Nawe kamanya ukunang'ari lwawo kavavia, “A ekyo mwasha isheesya nkyokyi? Sheengye dinari shiilole.”
Nawo vakamweenngye. Nalyo kavavia, “A ufwanu yelu lwiiyoo ni lwa vi na kireiyo ekyo?” Nawo vakammbia, “Llwa Kaisari-te!”
Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Kyasia, efyo fikwaani na Kaisari finiingeny Kaisari. Na efyo fikwaani na Iruva muvefiniinga Iruva.” " Nalyo vakauma ng'any.
Naasa kasheywa ni Vasadukayo, mmbo vandu veshaambaa, nkwiifo iruka lya vafu-fo. Vakammbesa vakaamba, "
“Ale Llosha! Mose mmbo areiye kyeeluvia, ‘Kwakooya mwanamaye wa nndu afwa karau nka nalare-u mwana, naasa mwanamaye kuti naalyike nka ulya wakwe, naambo nalunngye-u mwanamaye ufyari.’
Naasa, kweefo vasero mfungare vekee vana va nka. Ulya wa mbee karwaa nka. Kafwa nalare-u mwana.
Nalyo ulya wa kavii kanrwaa. Kavefwa nalare-u mwana. Na ulya wa kararu ni kiwo-da.
Nalyo woose mfungare nkuiyo alera-u mwana-fo. Lyeefurummya nka ulya nawe kavefwa numa ya woose.
A elyi kwamfika yoo marukyony elyi vandu vafu vasherukaa, nka yeto ashevaany wa ungau wa yewo woose? Mashika woose mfungare vemunrwaa.”
Naasa Yesu kavavia, “A kindo kyamuniinga mukarekwa shia nshi elyi mulamanyaa efyo fikee fireiye nta finya ya Iruva?
Mashika elyi vandu vafu varukaa mmbashealyikaa-se-fo, nta yaalyikwa-fo. Mmbo vashevaa sha vasu va efo iruveeu.

Indi ekyo kya vafu shaasa vakaa varuke, a mmbo mulandesomi mbony tikee efo kitabuny kya Mose ta ngorosho ilya, ndesa Iruva alemmbia kaamba, Yeny ni Iruva wa Abrahamu, na Iruva wa Isaki, na Iruva wa Yakobo.
Naasa Iruva nshi akee wa vafu-fo, mmbo akee wa vakee na muu. Mmbo mwarekywa mukaangya mbai deny.”
Nalyo kukasha nau nndu wa efo kwa veelosha mavavaso, kaita verouwana indo. Kalollya eevarouwaa shaasa avaronga nisha, kammbesa, “A ivavaso elyo lyisongoye engyi moose llyingalyi?”
Yesu kaallwa, “Elyo lya mbee lyikee ule, ‘Yewe Israeli arannya-dwa! Nndumi weeru Iruva ni Nndumi umwi.
Neewe kunda Nndumi wafo Iruva kunkunde na ngoo imwi nsi, na nrima umwi nsi, na nrwe umwi nsi, na finya imwi nsi.’
Na lya kavii lyikee ule, ‘Kunda nndu uroo shaasa kukukunndye ku muni.’ Nta nkwiiyo ivavaso lyikee iniini ya yoo-fo.”
Nalyo mwaarya ulya wa fitabu kammbia, “Mmbo kwarera nisha, kwaamba dede. We mmbwe yeto umwi nsi aiyo nta nkwiiyo ungyi kulaore mmbwe-fo.
Na kya inkunda na ngoo imwi nsi na urango lumwi nsi, na finya imwi nsi, na kya ikunda uroye weeru shaasa nndu akukundye we muni, ekyo kyava kiniini-da, kikairya firaso fyoose fyeevivya murony.”
Nalyo Yesu alollya amwaallwa nisha indo kammbia, “Yewe nkukee kwaasha na umangyi lwa Iruva-fo.” Nalyo kulakee-fo nndu akara immbesa-se kindo.
Nalyo Yesu karouwa aloshaa efo mmba ya Iruva kaamba, “A kyava inda elyi veelosha mavavaso vaambaye Kristo ni Mwana wa Davidi?
Davidi we muni mmbo alekaywa Mmumuyo Mweele karera kaamba, We Nndumi alevia Nndumi wakwa, ‘Kaa rembo yoo woko lwakwa usha, shitani shaara vakiduva vafo si, vave kitima kyafo kyeekerya marende afo.’
Kikavaany Davidi we muni mmbo ambaanngye ni Nndumi. A naidimi-se inda iva mwana wakwe?” Nalyo vandu valya vakuummbye-u nkuka vefurye nnu imwaarannya.
Na elyi eefo aloshaa kaveamba, Kwiiseny na vaarya va fitabu, yewo vakunndye irua-rua varee soori shaasha na iidikirwa mmbandu ando a singira,
na ikaa rembo fitiminy fya mbee efo mmba teeterevya, na ikaa marembo asongoye elyi vakee kilyiiyony kya shoonga.
Nawo vakava vandu veemira mmba ta vaka va ding'u, na itereva Iruva fiterewo fyaasha kyikee kya ikoora efo vanduny tupu. Mmbo vashewonisaa uvingo uniini kilanya.
Nalyo kandekaa rembo alya asumani na isanduku lyeesanyirya fesa ta mmba ya Iruva. Kalola vandu vakuummbye-fo shaasa vavika fesa tawo efo isandukuny. Masimba akasha meengyi, akavika findo fiingi.
Naasa nka wa ding'u nkiva kasha nau. Kavika fiparwe fivii, nafyo fiinani na senti imwi.
Nawe kavaanga valya vakiloshyony vakwe na yoo akai kavavia, Nkya dede shamuvia, “Nka yeto wa ding'u avekee indo nkiva mmbo avika kiniini kairya yewo vavika kindo efo isandukuny woose.
Mashika woose mmbo vavika-fo vautye efo findony fyawo vatiri fya mmwasi, indi we kavika-fo auta efo findony fyakwe fyeerorwa kalekeya fyoose atiri, mfyo fyoose akee nafyo fyeelela muu wakwe.”
Na elyi asomuka efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva, nalyo umwi wa vakiloshyony kyakwe kammbia, “Llori lla-te mawe yoo shaasa asenyi, na mmba yeto shaasa titiri usuri.”
Na Yesu kamwallwa kammbia, “Kulollye mmba yeto shiniini indo-ro? Nkwiifo iwe lyisaa uwe ya lyingyi lyilasambuwaa-fo.”
Naasa nawe kandekaa rembo alya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura alya asumani na mmba ya Iruva. Na Petro kasanga na Yakobo na Yohane na Andrea vakammbesa kyaanya kyawo.
“Luvie-te mbee, meendi kindo ekyo kikaa kyuutike! Na wende lweemanya meendi yoo elyi findo efyo fyoose fishiinukya ni indii ndesa?”
Naasa Yesu kapooka ivavia, “Kwiiseny nndu nalakooye imureta shia.
Kukaa kushe vandu veengyi varie irina lyakwa vashaambaa mmbwe yeny. Nawo varete vandu veengyi.
Na elyi meendi mushiitaa fira na fyuulaalu fya fira, nta muleereve, mmbo kikee kirummbwe kyeende indo-da. Indi yoo masiiyony nalandefike-fo.
Mashika uruka lushekwiipoo lundekapa lungyi, na umangyi lundekapa umangyi yelo lungyi, na kuveira-fo na fidinasi kundo kungyi na kungyi, kuvesha na shaa. Nalyo llyo fipooka fyuure efyo fyeefurumya.

Kya indi kwiiseny mu veni! Mmbo vashemurambikyaa efo maakony a masiingo awe eerummbwa myaandu, neeni mundekapwa na mbiiri efo mmba teeterevya, na indeseleswa efo fisanguny fya vashilyi vaniini na vamangyi kimaruma kyakwa, kive nkyo ukureekyi lwa efo kwawo.
Na vandu va masanga moose kuti valave mbele indeongoywa nrumi ya Iruva ya nsia.

Na elyi meendi vemurwaa vandemurambikya efo maakony a vandu valya, nta mulapooke isaukwa kya kindo mundeambaa-fo. Indi kindo mushaambaa-fo ni ekyo mukooyaa mwankiniingwa kyeeri ekyo kyeni. Mashika veerera-u nshi yeni-fo, ni Mumuyo yeto Mweele.
Na mwanamaye wa nndu anderambikya-fo mwanamaye nandewaawa, na ndeye wa nndu nanderambikya-fo mwana. Na fivana fya nndu fishekwiipoo kya isua vamiku vawo vandewaawa.”
“Neeni muve veesuwa mmbandu woose kimaruma kya irina lyakwa. Indi yeto asisirya-u nafike yoo mafurumyony, mmbwe akooya ikirwa.”
Indi usutu lyulya lwa yaallwa-u irama elyi meendi mushelollyaa lwamfika alya lulasumani ifika-u na yeto mwiisoma-u nakummbwe llyo yewo vakooyaa valele kunu Yudaya vanderisha vapare mafumbu-u.
Na yeto akooyaa akee efo mmbee-u nalaoloke nandeanga nefo nandeipoo kindo kya efo mmba kwakwe-fo.
Na yeto akooyaa akee ireminy nalawuye na numa nandeipoo soori yakwe ya yeerya.
Indi yewo vakooyaa vakufinngye na yoota vana fyeeri efyo, oshiny lwawo!
Kyaindi mmbo musheterevaa Iruva efyo filasheshaa kyeeri kya mbeo.

Shamashika fyeeri efyo kushekaa-fo fyuure, nafyo shaasa fikai, filandelollyo fing'ani indo-fo kupookya mapookyony a findo fyuumbe efyo Iruva alefitana kufike ulaalu, nta meendi a numa mfishevaa-se indo-fo.
Na kwee fyeeri efyo kulaore fyeefiiswaa nkweekaa-fo nndu ekooya ikya-fo. Indi kimaruma kya yewo vasauwe nkyo kimaruma fyeeri efyo fishefiiswaa.
Nalyo kwakooya nndu ashemuviaa, “Kristo akakau yaa ao akakato efo nta mulairikye-fo!
Indi kukaa kukwiipoo Makristo wongo, na veauya fisuku va wongo. Nawo vatani fyeora wende na filandelollyo lyingyi, vakooye ireta naakwa ni yewo vasauwe, kukooye kyeevaa.
Kevekwiiseny muveni! Akakafyo, shalava imuvia fyoose.”
“Indi fyuure efyo fya fyeeri efyo fikamiira-u, llyo mwi ushaalukaa ireema na mwiiri mbusheendee-se sa ya vayo-fo.
Na nyinyiri yeto tikooywa tishoolokaa tyuuka efo iruveeu, na finya yeto ta efo iruveeu tiverinyiswa-rinyiswaa.
Nalyo llyo vashelolyaa Mwana yeto wa Nndu ashaa ariwa mmafishi akee na finya niini na itumbe.
Nalyo llyo asherumaa vasu va iruveeu vandeumbya yewo vasauwe ando amwi vavaute taari yeto iinya kundo ngyuraato tauka nafo vapooke masiiyony a ulana vafike masiiyony a ngina.”
“Naasa efo nriny wa nkuu uteny-fo ufundo lweekulosha! Iramba lya vayo lyikammaa ifumbisa na yoora maru neeni mukamanya iilula lyamfika kufii.
Na yeni ni kiwo-da. Elyi mushelollyaa findo efyo fyutika kevemanyiny, mmbo Nndumi amfika kufii, ni yoo mwaangony akai.
Nkya dede shamuvia, irika elyi lyishiiraa kulaore findo efyo fyainukya indo fyoose-fo.
Kya efo iruveeu kukaa kurumake na ulana, indi kilarumakaa ni marero yoo akwa.”
“Kya indi kya nkonu yeto mweni na kya saa yeyo sheni, nkwiifoo nndu afiishi-fo, nta vasu va efo iruveeu, nta Mwana-fo, kulaore ni Nde muni.
Naasa kwiiseny muvelala shoovi! Mashika mulaishi kyeeri ekyo meendi kifikaa.
Mmbo kyikee sheelyi nndu eenda kyaaro, kara mmba yakwe, kavikya mashinga alya akwe mumu wekallya findo fyakwe wo nndu kamwaavya ishora lyakwe. Na nringyi yeto wa poo kammbavasa nalale shoovi.
Naasa neeni kevelaleny shoovi, kimmba mulaishi kyeeri muni kyeny ashaa, kwakooya ni nkwaany, ao ni kio nnang'ani kavii, ao ni kyeeri nguku yakapa, ao ni ngama.
Kilave asha tiny nakooye mulele rony.
Indi kindo shamuvia yeni, nakyo shakyivia woose, Laleny shoovi!”
Naasa mikonu yeiyo ivii kufike Pasaka na kyeeri kya mikate ilatiri ntarang'u. Nalyo Vakohani valya vaniini vakasanga na veelosha mavavaso vakasia mwaanya wa itira Yesu na ntambo vambwae.
Mashika nyelyi vaamba, “Nta lulakitani kwiikee nkonu nniini-fo vandu valakooye yaanta kituuru.”

Naasa, Yesu akee kulya Betania, efo mmba kwa Simion ulya eelwee ivave elyaa-fo shoonga. Kukasha nau nndu nka arie kishupa kya iwe yaa kitiri mafura eekwaamba afwaamaa nisha nnu, akee maa akava a uuru uniini. Kafisha kishupa kilya kaletya Yesu nrweny.
Naasa kukakaa-fo vandu vasua vakarera wo veni na veni, “A kimaruma mafura yaa akatavanywa indo nkikyi?
Mafura yaa mmbo eevaa ikumba dinari mayana araru na mmwasi na indeavya vakiva.” Vakasakira nka ulya.
Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Kunreeyeny-te! A ekyo mwamwaatarya mmbo ashitannya ishora isha!
Kya vandu vakiva mmbo mukee nawo nkonu simu, na wo kyeeri mwankunda mushiidimaa ivatannya mesha. Indi yeny mmukee neeny kyeeri kyoose-fo.
Ekyo aidima nkyo atana. Mmbo alava yaamba mwiili wakwa mafura elyi wiifo urikwaa.
Nkya dede shamuvia, wo kundo kushoongoywaa Nrumi ya Nsia kunu ulaniny, na ekyo kyakwe atana kiveva nng'u kyaambaywa kya inkummbwa.” "
Nalyo Yuda Iskariote umwi wa valya ikumi na vavii kakwiipoo, keenda kwa vakohani valya vaniini akundye irambikya Yesu efo maakony awo.
Nawo elyi vaita indo vakafura. Vakandeerya kyaasa vanniinge fesa. Nalyo kava mwikusara shaasa asheonisaa mwaanya weendenrambikya-fo.
Naasa kwiikee nkonu wa mbee weelyiwa mikate ilatiri ntarang'o, kyeeri vashishaa ngurana ya Pasaka nalyo vakiloshyon vakwe vakashemmbia, " A kundo kukundye lweende indedeesya-fo Pasaka nkwi?
Nalyo karuma vakiloshyony vakwe vavii kavavia, “Endeny kulya muriny nafo mushekwaanannyaa na nndu arie mura na nungu. Mmbwe mushellatyaa numa.
Na efo kundo ashangaa nafo, vyieny yeto muni kyeny, ‘Llosha akuvia-le vai, ando a imuuya nkwi, kundo alyiiyaa Pasaka na vakiloshyony vakwe?’
Nawe muni ashemooraa kirya kya mmba ya uwe. Nafo kukee kwaale kukakwaana piti mfo kundo musheludeesyaa.” "
Nalyo valya vakiloshyony vakakwiipoo vakafika kulya muriny, vakavekooya indo-da shaasa Yesu avavia. Vakadeesya-fo Pasaka.
Nalyo elyo kwamfika nkwaany kasha nang'u aryani na valya ikumi na vavii.
Na elyi vefo velyaa shoonga Yesu kaamba, " “Nkya dede shamuvia, umwi waany nawe shikeelya nawe shoonga mmbo asheshiriingyaa.”
Vakapooka isokywa mfyoova na immbia ku umwi umwi, “A ni yeny mbee?”
Nawe kavavia, “Ni umwi waany yeni ikumi na vavii, we nndu loolota nawe maako marama efo kideeveny.
Lyo Mwana yeto wa nndu yeenda mmbo asheendaa shaasa kikee kyireiye kyakwe. Indi oshiny nndu yeto Mwana yeto wa Nndu asheriingywaa mmbwe. Nndu yeto kyakwe mmbo kyekee kisha kwee era nalairwa.”
Nalyo elyi veefo valyaa shoonga, kaipoo nkate; kaana Iruva, kaufisha-fisha kavaavya kaamba, “Waryeny yeu nto mwiili wakwa.”
Kawuya kaipoo upata kaarafuma Iruva, kavaniingya, vakana woose.
Nalyo kavavia, “Yei nnyo samu yakwa yeevika nkundanu, iifo ishiiritwaa kimaruma kya vandu veengyi.
Nkya dede shamuvia, nshikikaa-se shini ekyo kyivikwaa ni nsabibu-fo, na shitani shafika nkonu yeto shikinaa lya wiiya efo umanginy lwa Iruva.”
Nalyo vakaimba fiimbo, vakakwiipoo-fo, vakafika alya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura.
Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Mmbo musheonisaa nsindara moose, kimmba kikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Nshekapaa mwiisi yeto, na mburu tindenyanyaka.’ “
Indi elyi numa shammaa iruka llyo nshemusongoyaa ifika kulya Galilaya
Naasa Petro kammbia, “Naakwa vashewonisa nsindara woose, yeny nshi indo-fo.”
Nalyo Yesu kammbia, “Nkya dede shakuvia, kio ekyi kya inu kulaore nguku yankapa kavii mmbo kukooyaa kwanshikana kararu!”
Nawe kakaarya irera deny kaamba, “Na shalollya kuti shiwaawa shisandwa neewe, nshishekukanaa nta-fo.” " Nawo woose vakaverera indo.
Nalyo vakafika ando a nnda uvaangwaa ni Getsemane. Nawe kavia vakiloshyony vakwe, " “Kaeny rembo yaa shindetereva alya.”
Nalyo kaipoo Petro na Yakobo na Yohane vakeenda veryani nawe. Nawe kapooka isavaa na yeerera.
Kavavia, “Nrima wakwa mmbo usokywa mfyoova deny shafika kufii neefwa. Kaeny yaa mulale shoovi!”
Keenda mbee kinnywa, kaoloka si na itereva Iruva ashambaa, “Kwakooya kivaa, saa yeyo ishiire.”
Kaamba, “Aba, Nde efo kwafo findo fyoose mmbo fyaidimika. Naasa ita-ny upata yelu mbai lushuuke, indi nta kilaende shaasa shakunda yeny-fo, ni shaasa kwakunda yewe.”
Nalyo kasha kakooya valele rony, kavia Petro, “Simion, a mmbo kulele-da, nta kulaidimi ilala shoovi neeny ando a saa imwi nsi?”
Kyelaleny shoovi-te musande na itereva mulakooye yaanga kyeesyony. Nrima to ulangye indi mwili ukava nnana.
Nalyo keenda lyingyi kandetereva Iruva arera marero alya meni.
Nalyo kawuya nang'u kakooya valele rony. Neelyi miso awo eefummbye rwe. Nawo valamanyi nta kindo varouwa.

Nalyo kasha nau lya kararu, kavavia, “A ni indo mwalunga ilala tupu na iimuya na kyeeri ekyi kyoose! Kikufiiyeny! Kyeeri kyamfika. Mwana yeto wa Nndu akakau eefo arambikywaa maakony a vandu valyamari.
Kwiipoony-te lweende! Akakau, yeto mwiishiriingya ansha kufii.”

Nalyo yeni elyi eefo areraa indo Yuda Iskariote akee umwi wa valya ikumi na vavii, kasha nang'u aryani na vandu nkuka varie ngyusu na mariinga, varumwa ni vakohani na veelosha mavavaso na vamiku va vandu.
Na ulya anrambikya-fo emmbadeerya wende kaamba, “Nndu yeto shimmimindaa mmbwe mushentiraa mweende munrie.”
Naasa elyi asha nau nalyo yeni kafika yoo akai kaamba, “Shakwiidikira llori wakwa.” Kammiminda.
Vakamoroya maako vakantira.
Naasa ulya umwi wa valya vasalali-u kasommwa usu lwakwe kakapa nalo ishinga lya nkohani ulya nniini, kammaswa kuri.
Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Mmbo mwakwiipoo kyeny murie ngyusu na mariinga sheelyi mwaenngya nndu mwaala shia musheshitira.
Na nkonu simu mmbo shekee neeni shiloshaa efo mmba ya Iruva, nta mulashitire. Indi kimaruma kikaenda indo ni filya fikee fireiye naambo fikooye iinukya-u fyoose.” "
Nalyo woose vakanreeya vakarisha.
Nalyo kweeyo mwana nkoo wa womi eefo ellatyaa eree soori ya yeerya ya lasi, nawo vakakunda intira.
Kavareeya soori ilya ya lasi, karisha eefo mbereto.
Nalyo vakaenda varie Yesu, vakamfita kulya kwa nkohani nniini. Nafo kwenkuummbya-fo vakohani valya vaniini woose na masiingo na veelosha mavavaso."
Na Petro kaengya kwaasha ellatyaa, katana afika efo poo kwa nkohani ulya nniini. Kakooya vasero va efo poo vakee-fo rembo kasanga nawo ashoraa muro.
Naasa vakohani valya vaniini vasasangyi na ngyama toose vakasia ukureeki lweevinga Yesu naambo vambwaa, lyo valaonise.
Nyelyi veengyi veefo vavikaa ukureekyi lwa wongo vammbinge, na efyo fya ukureekyi lwawo filave fimwi.
Nalyo vandu vaangu vakasalala-u vakavika ukureekyi lwa wongo vammbinge, vakaamba,
Yese mmbo luleita ashambaa, “Yeny mmbo nshewundwaa mmba yei ya Iruva ikee shitani na maako, shitani ingyi ilakee shitani na maako ando a mikonu iraru shimaa.”
Nta elyi varera indo ukureekyi lwawo lulave lumwi.
Nalyo nkohani ulya nniini kakwiipoo, kashesalala yoo nnang'ani. Kavesa Yesu, kaamba, “A mmbo kulashaambaa kyafo kyeerouwa efyo vakureekyi yeva vaamba-u fyeekukumba?”
Nawe kamalallya-sau, nta nalarouwe kindo. Nkohani nniini kammbesa lya kavii, “A nnyewe Kristo we Mwana wa yeto Mwiirumishwa?”
Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Yeny mmbwe. Neeni mushelollyaa Mwana yeto wa Nndu akee rembo yoo taari ya woko usha lwa Mwaafinya, nashe eeriwa mmafishi a efo nginiiu.”
Naasa nkohani ulya nniini karanndwa soori takwe ta yeerya kaamba, “A ekyo luruuyaa-se vakureekyi vengyi nkyo-kyi-se nyira?
Akakakyo mwamiita aruma Iruva-te! A mwarummbwa inda?” Nawo woose vakamweekerya uvingo veshambaa kindo kinsumanyi ni indewaawa.
Nalyo maata vakapooka imweeselya minyiiri na insikya kisangu na inkapa na ng'unde na immbia, “Kyeluvie kisuku-te!” " Na vasero va efo poo vakankamara venkapaa ngyoyi.
Nalyo Petro akee rembo kulya poo alya si. Kukasha nau mwana wa kyika umwi akee umwi wa fishinga fya nkohani ulya nniini.
Kalollya Petro ashooraa muro. Kammbikya miso swaa kaamba, " “Na yewe-da kweeriani na nndu yeto wa Nasareti, we Yesu.”
Nawe kalema-fushu kaamba, “Kindo ekyo kwaamba nshakimanya-fo, nta shakiitumuso-fo.” Nalyo kakwiipoo alya poo kafika yoo ngiriny. Na nguku ikakapa.
Kishinga kilya kya kyika kyikallollya kyikapooka lyingyi-se ivia lyingyi valya woorokye yoo mbai, “Yeu mmbwa efo nnang'ani yaawo.”
Nawe kalemafushu lya kavii. Elyi numa kinnywa valya vasalalyi yoo kufii, vakawuya ivia-se Petro, “Nkya dede kukee wa efo nnang'ani yaawo mashika neewe-da ni wa kulya Galilaya.”
Nawe kapooka ikudenga we muni na ilya mboo, “Nshiishi nndu yeu mwamwaamba-fo.”
Nalyo yeni nguku ikakapa lya kavii. Petro kawuya ikummbwa kirero kilya Yesu emmbia, “Kulaore nguku yankapa kavii kukooyaa kwanshikana kararu. Nalyo akummbwa indo kaiya nnu deny.”
Na kyeeri kulekya vakohani vaniini vakasanga na vamiku va vandu na veelosha mavavaso, na ngyama toose vakafisha shila, vakafinga Yesu, vakankamara, vakandenrambikya kulya kwa Pontio Pilato.
Nalyo Pilato kammbesa, “Yewe mmbo kukee mangyi ya Vayuda-ro? Nawe kaallwa kammbia, ‘Ni yewe kwakyaamba.’ “
Nalyo vakohani valya vaniini vakankumba kyuumu.
Nalyo Pilato kammbesa lya kavii, “A mmbo kulashirouwa kindo? Lla-te findo efyo fiingyi vakukumba nafyo. "
Na Yesu nta nalarouwe kindo, Pilato katana afulukywa deny.”
Naasa elyi lya nkonu ulya nniini evaporomuyaa nndu mfinge umwi, ulya vankukunndya.
Naasa kweefo nndu evaangwaa Baraba emfingwa ando amwi na vandu variingyi va uruka. Nawe Baraba efo kituuruny kilya vaanta vawaiye-fo vandu.
Naasa mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu ukanderwa nafo. Vakapooka intereva natani shaasa eevatannyaa.
Naasa Pilato kavavesa, " “Mukunndye shimuporomuye mangyi yeyo ya Vayuda-sho?”
Mashika elyi eishi kimaruma vakohani vakaaya vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vakunde navaporomuye Baraba.
Naasa vakohani valya vaniini vakaaya vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vakunde navaporomuye Baraba.
Nalyo Pilato karouwa lyingyi kavavia, “A nkyokyi ntanyaa yeu mwaamba mmangyi ya Vayuda?”
Nalyo vakawuya ikooma, “Endenkapye nsalabeny!”
Naasa Pilato Kavavia, “A ukasha aletana llo-kyi?” Nawo vakeengera ikooma, “Endenkapye nsalabeeny!”
Naasa Pilato ekunndye itana kindo kyeekushiisa na vandu valya vakuumbye-fo, kavaporomuya Baraba. Na Yesu kanrambikya-fo nandekapyo nsalabeu.
Naasa vasikari valya vakankamara, vakanrwaa efo poo vakamfita kari. Nng'u mmba ya ushilyi ikai. Vakavaanga siri ya vasikari shoose, vakashekuummbya-u.
Vakammbika soori ya yeerya ifwani nsoru. Vakaoka ureto lwa miinga vakammbikya nrony.
Vakapooka imwiidikira kyeemwiinyala, “Lwakwiidikira yewe mangyi ya Vayuda!”
Vakankapa nrwe na irere na immishia minyiiri. Vakamfiirya-ndi, vakapaana si na kisangu.
Na elyi vammeentatala indo, vakawuya immbuta soori ilya ya king'ang'ari, vakammbika soori tilya takwe muni.
Nalyo vakamwiipoo vandenkapya nsalabeu. Vakakooya nndu shia auka ireminy, we Simon wa kulya Krene, nawe ni ndeye wa Iskanda na Rufo. Vakamwiitikya nantare nsalaba ulya wakwe.
Vakanrwaa Golgota, kwaallwa, ni “Kisharongony.”
Vakeesa iniinga mfinyo ukee nsasande na nri weenanga, lyo nalakunde iwarya.
Nalyo vakankapya nsalabeny. Vakaavana soori tilya takwe veetikapyaa kura, kimanyike wo nndu kindo ashiipoo.
Naasa kwemfika saa isaru nalyo vakankapya nsalabeny.
Na mwaandu wakwe ukee nreiye yoo uuwe indi, “YEU MMBWE MANGYI YA VAYUDA.”
Na veala shia vavii vakakapyo nsalabeny ando amwi nawe, umwi taari yei na ungyi taari yeyo. [
Vakatana indo naambo kilya kyikee kyireiye kyiinukye kyeyaamba, “Mmbo alesandwa na varavi.” ]
Na vandu vekee iira-u vakarinyisa-rinyisa mirwe, vakamwarara vakaamba, “Akwa, yewe mwiiwundwa mmba ya Iruva na iitana lyingyi ando a mikonu iraru!
Oloka nsalabeny-te kukukyire kumuni.”
Na vakohani vaniini na veelosha mavavaso vakavemwiinyala indo-da; veshaambaa, “A mmbo alekira vengyi kalemwa ikukyira we muni.
Kwakooya kukee Kristo mangyi ya Israeli, oloka nsalabeny ulaalu neese lukwiirikye.” " Na valya vekapyo nsalabeny ando amwi nawe vakavemwiinyala indo.
Na elyi kwamfika saa irindaru uruka loose lukawoywa ni ireema lukafika saa kyeenda.
Na saa kyeenda Yesu kafua na unyanga waasha kaamba, " “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani!” Nakyo kwakyaallwa mmbo kyaamba, “Woi Iruva wakwa, woi Iruva wakwa nkyikyi elyi kwashira?”
Nalyo vandu valya vasalalyi-u maata vaita indo, vakaamba, “Akakau avaanga Elia!”
Naasa nndu umwi keenda erishaa kandeende kyoonga mura kakyiishura mfinyo utarang'aa. Kavika irereny kakunda inrita ashaambaa, “Reny, lulole kwakooya Elia asheshaa nashemoolota-u.”
Naasa Yesu kafua lyimwi tupu na unyanga uniini, kakumba muu.
Nalyo isullya lilya lyaavanisye efo mmba ya Iruva lyikavambuka nnang'ani kavii lyipookya yoo uwe lyikafika si.
Naasa nshilyi ulya esalalyi yoo usumanu nawe alollya ni indo akumba muu, kaamba, “Nndu yeu mmbo ekee Mwana wa Iruva dede.”
Naasa kweefo na vaka velolaa vakee kyikwaasha. Na efo nnang'ani ya vaka valya kwiifo Maria wa kulya Magdala na Maria we maye wa Yakobo ulya n-du, na Yose, na Salome.
Nawo mmbo vellatyaa na imfurukannya meendi ekee kulya Galilaya. Nawo veryani na vaka vengyi-se veengyi valerwa nawe, vakafika Yerusalemu.
Nalyo elyi kwamfika kyeeri kya nkwaany, na nkonu wiifo ni nkonu weekudeesya, nto usongoye sabato.
Kukasha nau Yosefu wa kulya Arimataya akee nndu ngyama aishiwa, nawe ni nndu eevereyaa umangyi lwa Iruva. Naasa kakara yaanga na kulya kwa Pilato, kantereva nnying'a ulya wa Yesu.
Nalyo elyi Pilato aita Yesu amfwa, kasongololo, kanderummya nshilyi ulya wa vasikari nrumi kammbesa kwakooya mmbo afwa kirambo kyaasha.
Kasunundywa ni nshilyi ulya wa vasikari. Kaniingya Yosefu nnying'a ulya.
Nawe kandeura soori ya lasi, kandemoolota-fo kamoososya soori tilya ta lasi. Kandemwaara mbangeny ikee shidoshe iweny. Kakunnya-u iwe lyeeraya mwaango wa mbanga ilya.
Naasa Maria ulya wa Magdala aryani na Maria ulya maye wa Yose, wo veefo velolaa ando aarwa.
Naasa elyi nkonu ulya wa Sabato wamiira, nalyo Maria wa kulya Magdala vakasanga na Maria ulya ungyi akee maye wa Yakobo, na Salome vakandeura miri ifwaamaa vandemwaamba.
Naasa elyi ngama nraasi, nkonu wa mbee wa mfungare ulya, vakafika alya mbangeny elyi mwi wanrasa-rasa.
Vakaumburana wo veni na veni vakaamba, “A nndu alweekyaa iteswa-u iwe lilya lyiraye mwaango wa mbanga ilya lummbutaa kwi?”
Vainnwa indi miso vakakooya, ate iwe lilya lyantesuwa-u. Nalyo mmbo lyekee iniini nnu.
Vakaanga na efo mbangeny. Vakalolya mwana nkoo akee rembo yoo taari ya woko usha aree soori shaa pyai. Vakaawukwa mmuu.
Nawe kavavia, “Nta mulaawukwa mmuu-fo. Mmbo mwiifo musiaa Yesu wa kulya Nasareti, yeto alekapywa nsalabeny. Annduka, nnakyikee-se yaa-fo! Llen-te, akaa ando valemwaara!
Neeni endeny mundevia valya vakiloshyony vakwe na Petro, nawe mmbo ashemusongoyaa indefika kulya Galilaya. Mfo kundo mushellollyaa shaasa alevemuvia.” "
Naasa vakauka alya mmbangeny veerishaa mashika vekee irerema na yuuma mwaangaya, nta valavie nndu kindo mashika a elyi vairyaa nnu. [
Nawe elyi Yesu ammaa iruka elyi ngama nraasi elyi lya nkonu yeto waiduva Sabato kapooka ikoora na Maria wa kulya Magdala, ulya alemuuta mimuyo ilya mikasha mfungare.
Nawe kakwiipoo kanderuuya valya vekee nawe elyo mbee, nawo vakee vating'i na iiya.
Nawo elyi vaita indo mmbo eefo na muu alollywa mmbwe, valairikye. " "
Naasa numa ya vayo kakoora na vavii va efo nnang'ani yaawo etiri fwana ingyi nawo varie shia yeenda ireminy.
Nawo vakakwiipoo vakanderuuya valya vengyi mbony. Na yewo-da nta valairikye.
Elyi kyeeri kyeefurummya kakoora na valya ikumi na umwi vaiyo velyaa shoonga. Kavasakira llya valera valakusirya-u, vakaumisa ngoo tawo, nta valairikye valya vallollya annduka.
Nalyo kavavia, " “Waryeny shia yeenda mundefika masangeny moose dang'a. Na wo kindo kyuumbe kiiyo kyoongoyeny Nrumi yeyo ya Iruva ya Nsia.
Na nndu kakusirya-u na ibatiswa kavebatiswa, mmbo ashekooya ikirwa. Na nndu kalema ikusirya-u mmbo ashuutywaa uvingo.
Na ngyende mmbo tishiimmyaa yewo vakusirya-u, ni irina lyakwa vashaantaa nalyo mimuyo mikasha, vaveva vandu veerera na ngyulumi shiiya.
Mmbo vashetiraa shoka na maako. Na kwakooya vana kindo kiwaa, nkishevamanyaa furu-fo. Mmbo vasheekeryaa vandu valwee maako nawo vashie.”
Naasa elyi Nndumi Yesu ammaa irera nawo indo, karoswa na efo iruveeu. Kakaa rembo efo woko usha lwa Iruva.
Naasa vandu valya vakakwiipoo vakandeamba mbony ta Iruva kundo koose. Na Nndumi kavakaya efo kirundyony kyawo. Na ngyende tilya tikavangisa ndera ilya vashaambaa.]
Ni veengyi veefo valeipoo maako vandevika mbony ta Yesu ando amwi, tyeende ntere, yeto ta findo fileutika kunu kweru,
shaasa lulefityo ni vandu valya valellollya irero yelyo na miso awo wo veni kumya yoo mapookyony a vayo, na ilyirundya.
Kimmba ni indo, na yeny shavelollya ni kisha shiiduve mbele mbony yeto udongo kipookya yoo mapookyony a vayo shitisununde nisha, shikwekye-ny itireiya Teofilo wakwa nsuri.
Naambo kukooye imanya mbony yeto kuleloshwa mmbo titiri ukureekyi lwa vayo.
Naasa meendi alya Herode akee mangyi ya kulya Yudaya kweefo nndu nkohani evaangwa Sakaria akee wa ufyari lwa Abia. Erie nka wa efo vefuny va Aron, na irina lyakwe ni Elisabeti.
Nawo vee vavii vekee vandu va usumanu efo usanguny lwa Iruva; veevallya na mavavaso moose a Nndumi na ngyufundo takwe valatiri nta mbese.
Nawo mmbetiri mwana-fo mashika Elisabeti ekee nka kyuumba nawo vee vavii vemmikwa deny.
Naasa Sakaria eefo arundaa mashora akwe a ukohani efo kisanguny kya Iruva kikwaani na ikamba lyakwe lya irunda.
Naasa na vakohani veeshivye ikapa kura, nalyo kawuiyo ni kura nandeanga neefo mmba ya Nndumi nandekora ubani.
Na vandu vakuumbye-u mamwiingyi moose veefo vaterevaa efo poo kyeeri ekyo ubani lwakorwa.
Naasa nsu wa Nndumi kasha ikoora nawe asalalyi yoo woko usha lwa mesa eekorya ubani.
Sakaria kallollya kaising'ang'a kawoywa mmbwerei.
Naasa nsu ulya wa Iruva kammbia, “Nta kulairyee-fo Sakaria! Kimmba kiterewo kyafo kyammirikywa, na nka wafo Elisabeti akaa nakwiirye mwana wa womi. Neewe kushemfishya irina lyakwe ni Yohane.
Nawe ashekuniinga ifura na ikyesa, neelyi awonikaa veengyi vashuuta-u nsia.
Mashika akaa nave nniini yoo kisanguny kya Nndumi, nta nalashenaa mfinyo nta kindo kinangaa, na kipookyaa elyi awonikaa naveva nndu aishwe Mumuyo Mweele.
Na vana va Israeli veengyi ashevaviiraa vawuye yaalukya Nndumi Iruva waawo.

Nawe muni ashemwiiryaa mbee akee na Mumuyo wa Elia na finya yakwe nandealwa ngoo ta vandeye va vandu tiwuye yaalukya vana vawo, na yewo vatiri kiila navevaalwa vakooye itira makusaro a vandu va usumanu, naambo vakooye ideesya Nndumi vandu vakwe vakee vasongosye.”
Nalyo Sakaria kavia nsu ulya wa Iruva: “A kindo ekyo mmbo shikyimanyaa inda? Mashika yeny shammba mmiku, na nka wakwa ni nkyeku wa suku shiingi.”
Nalyo nsu ulya wa iruva kaallwa kammbia: “Yeny ni Gabrieli shisalalyi yoo kisanguny kya Iruva. Sharumwa shisherera neewe shivekufitya nrumi yeyo ya nsia.
Neewe llate kushevaa mbimbi kulashiidimaa irera kufike nkonu yeto elyi kisheutikaa indo. Kimmba kwanra kulakusirya na marero yoo akwa. Nang'u ashiinukyaa elyi kyeeri kya vayo kyamfika.”
Naasa na vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vee-fo vavereyaa Sakaria. Vakatambiswa elyi akyeeywa indo efo mmba ya Iruva.
Naasa kasomuka na poo nta naleedimi irera nawo. Nawo vakamanya paa mmbo amwoorwa kindo efo mmba ya Iruva. Nawe kava avasinya-sinyaany. Kakaa akee mbimbi.
Kikava elyi mikonu ya mashora akwe yansia alya a ukohani lwakwe, kakwiipoo keenda kyeny kwakwe.
Naasa elyi numa ya mikonu ilya nka ulya wakwe, we Elisabeti kakufinga. Kandekusuruma efo kyeny ando a miiri iraanu.
Kaamba, “Ni indo Nndumi aleshitannya mikonu yei annyisauwa, nashyuute nayo usutu lwakwa kunu vanduny.”
Naasa elyi kwamfika mwiiri wa karindaru nsu ulya Gabrieli karumwa ni Iruva nandefika kulya muriny wa Galilaya uvangwaa Nasareti,
kulya kwa mwana wa kyeny umwi akee mfinge ni nsero umwi avangwaa Yosefu, akee wa mmba ya Davidi. Na irina lya mwana ulya wa kyeny ni Maria.
Nalyo nsu ulya wa Iruva kaanga na efo kwakwo kaamba, “Shakuidikira yewe kukee nkyiiye! Ni Nndumi akee neewe!”
Naasa elyi eeta avio indo, kaising'ang'a. Kava aswaangyany kya kyiidikiro kyilya nkya ngata-kyi?
Nalyo nsu ulya wa Iruva kammbia, “Nta kulairyee-fo Maria! Mmbo kwawona ikyiiyo efo kwa Iruva.
Neewe llate kushekufingaa kwiire mwana wa womi, na irina lyakwe kushemmbangaa Yesu.
Nawe akaa nave nniini navevaangwa ni Mwana wa yeto akee uve ya findo fyoose. Na Nndumi Iruva nanniinge kitima kya umangyi kya ndeye we Davidi.
Nawe asheshillya mmba ya Yakobo nafike llung'anu na umangyi lwakwe lulakooyaa nta ando lwamanda-fo.”
Naasa Maria kavia nsu ulya wa Iruva, “A kindo ekyo kyishutikaa inda elyi yeny shilaishi nta mmi?”
Nsu ulya wa Iruva kaallwa kambia, “Ni Mumuyo Mweele ashekusokyaa na finya ya yeto akee uwe ya findo fyoose ishekukayaa. Nkyo kyaniinga ekyo kyeele kyishirwaa kyivaangwa ni ‘Mwana wa Iruva.’
Neewe llate, mfyari ulya wafo Elisabeti nawe-da avekufingye lya mwana wa womi lla ndesa akee nkuu. Na mwiiri yeu wakwe mbwa karindaru. Nawe alevaangwa kyuumba.
Mashika efo kwa Iruva nkwiifo kindo kyilashiidimikaa-fo.”
Naasa Maria kaamba, “Akakau yeny shikee kyishinga kya Nndumi, ekyo kyakwa kyivekuviiyany indo shaasa kwaamba.” " Naasa nsu ulya wa Iruva kakwiipoo keenda.
Naasa Maria kawara shia mikonu ilya myeni. Kandefika kulya mafumbu-u na ngeta, kulya muri wa Yuda.
Kasha yaanga neefo mmba kwa Sakaria. Kaidikira Elisabeti.
Kyikavaany elyi Elisabeti aita kyiidikiro kilya kya Maria, nalyo kimwana kilya kyikashonga efo nsangeny wa maye. Na Elisabeti kaishwa Mumuyo Mweele.
Kaonisa unyanga uniini kaamba, " “Yewe kulelimyo mbora nnang'ani ya vaka! Na ekyo kyeendwa ni nsanga wafo kyivekee kyilimyi mbora!
Na kindo ekyo kyashukya na kwi, elyi shakusheyo ni maye wa Nndumi wakwa?
Mashika elyi mangelele a kiidikiro kyafo aanga maarwiny akwa, nalyo kyimwana ekyo kikashonga kunu nsangen mbwakwa kiitirwa ni nsia.
Na ngoma yewe kulekusirya-u, mashika ekyo kulevio kyuuka kwa Nndumi mmbo kyikaa kiutike indo.”
Nalyo Maria kaamba, “Nrima wakwa wang'anisa Nndumi
na ngoo yakwa ikakyesa kyimaruma kya Iruva akee nkira wakwa.
Mashika elyi alelola ufwafwa lwa kyishinga kyakwe. Mashika kipookya ulaalu Marika moose asheshivia, ‘Ngoma ni yewe!’
Kimmba yeto Mwaafinya anshitanya findo finiini. Na irina lyakwe lyikava yeele.
Kalunga isarya vandu marika na marika a yewo vamweereiye.
Kava mwiitana fya wiidimi na woko lwakwe Katarakanisa yewo vatiri kyiila efo makusarony a mirima yaawo.
Yewo valyimbye kavakuna efo fitiminy fyawo. Karosa yewo vafwafwa.
Yewo vatirwa nshaa kavawutisa findo fya muye na yewo masimba kavasama vakeenda ruu,
Kasheekya kyishinga kyakwe we Israeli. Nandekummbwa ivasarya.
Ndesa alevia vande valya veru we Abrahamu na ufyari lwakwe kufike llung'anu.” "
Naasa Maria kakaa na Elisabeti kafika ando a mikonu iraru. Kawuya na kulya kyeny kwakwe.
Naasa Elisabeti kafita kyeeri kyakwe kya iira mwana. Kaira mwana wa womi."
Nalyo vandu va nnyanu sanda na va ufyari lwakwe vakaita mmbo Nndumi allilya kyikang'ana. Vakasanga nawe vakafura.
Kyikavaany elyi kwamfika nkonu wa nyanya vakasha nafo vanderina kimwana kilya. Vakakunda ikyifishya irina lya ndeye Sakaria.
Nalyo maye karouwa kaamba, “Ode! Mmbo avaangwa Yohane!”
Nawo vakambia, “A elyi efo ufyariny lwafo kuleefo nndu avaangwaa irina elyi!”
Naasa vakasinnya ndeye kya immbesa irina akundye imfishya.
Nawe kakunda ipoo lya ireiya. Kareiya-u kyeamba Irina lyakwe ni Yohane. Vakasongololo woose.
Naasa kyaangu naakyo kana kakwe kakatambashuka kiwo na ulumi lwakwe. Karera ashaarafumaa Iruva.
Nalyo valya vafiiti nawo nnyanuny vakawoywa mbweerei woose. Na mbony tilya toose tikaenda ikwaana kulya mafumbuny a Yudaya tikakwaana koose.
Na valya vaita vakatisuruma efo ngoony tawo vakaamba, “A Mwana yeu mmbo akaa nave wa ngata ingai? Nyeli woko lwa Nndumi lunkaaye.”
Na ndeye, we Sakaria kaishwa Mumuyo Mweele kaawuya kisuku kaamba,
“Kundearafumwa Nndumi, we Iruva wa Israeli. Kimmba ansaiya vandu vakwe na ivawouwa.
Kaluseleesya ngo ya ukiro lwa efo mmba ya nsero wakwe, we Davidi.
Shaasa alerera na kana ka vakisuku valya vakwe veele kyipookya elyo mbee.
Kya iluniinga ikirwa misa eru na ilwauwa efo maakony a yewo valusuuye woose.
Natani indo kya isarya vande valya veru na ikummbwa nkundanu ulya wakwe mweele.
Mboo ilya alelyiiya nde ulya weeru, we Abrahamu naluniinge,
ando lushenndundyaa lulakitiri weerei lukee valete maakony a misa.
Lukooye ikaafo lukee na uvaramu na usumanu efo kisanguny kyakwe fyeeri fyeru fyoose.
Na yewe kyimwana kukaa kuvaangwa, ‘Nkisuku wa eto akee uwe ya findo fyoose,’ mashika kushiryaa Nndumi mbee efo kisanguny kyakwe kundesongosia shia takwe.
Kya iniinga vandu vakwe urango usha, lweemanya shaasa vakooyaa ikirwa kyikee kyeefwaayo ngyulyamari tawo.
Nnyelyi Iruva weeru avavyo mmuu kya ilulyilya. Nkyo kimaruma lukasheyo ni sa yuuka efo uuwe.
Naambo ishevaiya yewo valele ireeminy na nruveny wa ufu. Nakooye yoorisa marende eru na efo shieny ya ufoo.”
Naasa kimwana kyilya kyikaenda kyiing'ana-ng'anaa na yeengera itumaa efo nriminy. Nawe kandekaa kundo kwa kasa katana afika nkonu ulya alendekoora na Israeli paa.
Naasa kikava fyeeri efyo ivavaso lyikauka kwa Kaisari Augusto ulana loose lweende ireiyo kya usanu.
Na kireiyo kilya kyikava kya kyipooka llya meendi Kirenio aleshillya kulya Siria.
Nalyo vandu vakandereiyo woose, wo nndu na muriny kwakwe kundo aparikye.
Na Yosefu nawe kavekwiipoo auka kulya Galilaya kulya muriny wa Nasareti kaenda kulya Yudaya muriny wa Davidi uvaangwaa Betilehemu, nnyeli akee nndu wa efo ufyariny lwa Davidi, mfo ukuuny lwakwe.
Nandereiyo ando amwi na Maria tindi yakwe nawe akufingye.
Naasa kyikava elyi vakaa-fo kafika kyeeri kyakwe kya iira mwana.
Kaira mwana wakwe wa mbee kamfingya firami, kamwaara mundiny wa ng'umbe, nnyeli kulaore valeona mwaanya efo mmba ya veny.
Naasa kyuungony kilya kyeni kweefo veesi velele mbateny veshaala makamba a iringa ironda lyawo elyi kio.
Paripari vakasheyo ni nsu wa Nndumi na itumbe lya Nndumi lyikavamikya, vakaringityo ni sa riti. Vakairyaa nnu.
Nsu ulya wa Nndumi kavavia, “Nta mulairyaa-fo! Mashika akakau shiifo mmongoyaa Nrumi ya Nsia nayo ikaa ifike kwa vandu woose.
Mashika mwamiiryo NKIRA inu mmbwe Kristo akee Nndumi efo muriny wa Davidi.
Na wende shamoora; Mmbo mushekooya nkoku yeto akee mfingye firami akee mwaare mundiny wa ng'umbe.”
Nalyo pariparii kulya kwa nsu ulya wa Iruva kukasha ikuumbye-u nsemu mwiingyi nng'u matorito aefo iruveeu. Vakaarafuma Iruva vakaamba,
“Nnduma ulele Iruva efo kukee uuwe ya findo fyoose na kunu urukeny kukava na ufoo efo kwa vandu vakundikye.”

Nalyo kyikava elyi vasu valya va Iruva vankwiipoo kulya veesi valya vakai vaende Iruveu, nawo vakaumburana wo veni na veni, vakaamba, “Ndifony-te lweende lutani lwafika kulya Betilehemu, lundelola kindo ekyo kyatanyika ekyo Nndumi aloongoya.”
Vakaenda veerishaa vakakooya-fo Maria na Yosefu na nkoku ulya akee mwaare efo mundiny wa ng'umbe.
Naasa elyi vallolya vakandevambisa mbony eto valevio kya mwana ulya.
Na vandu vaita vakasongololo woose kya mbony tilya vavio ni veesi valya.
Na Maria kavika marero alya moose efo nriminy eeswongyaa.
Na veesi valya vakawuya na kwawo veshiitikisaa Iruva na imwaarafuma kya findo fyoose valeeta vakavelolya indo-da shaasa valevio.
Na elyi mikonu yamfika nyanya llyo kyeeri kyakwe kyeenda irinwa, kafishywa irina lyakwe ni YESU, llyo alefishywa ni nsu ulya wa Iruva kyeeri kilya kulaore maye enkufinga.
Na elyi mikonu ya Yosefu na Maria yamiinana ya yeenda ikweeremuta kyikwaani na uvavaso lwa Mose vakandenrosa na kulya Yerusalemu, vandenserisya na efo kisanguny kya Nndumi.
Shaasa kikee kireiye efo uvavasony lwa Nndumi kyeamba, “Wo kindo kyuumi kiruaa nsanga wa maye kuti kyivaangwa ni kindo kyeele kya Nndumi.”
Vakatana na kyingi-se kyikee kyivavasye, ni indeniingya kiraso shaasa kyikee kirere efo uvavasony lwa Nndumi, nakyo ni mbeta ivii ao maana avii a mbeta ta mmba.
Nalyo akakau nndu akee kulya Yerusalemu na irina lyakwe ni Simion. Nawe ni nndu wa usumanu mwiindya Iruva. Kaveva nndu avereyaa kiviiryaa Israeli muu akee nkaye ni Mumuyo Mweele.
Nawe akee moore Mmumuyo Mweele kyembia nnashefwaa kulaore alolya mbele Kristo eto wa Nndumi-fo.
Nalyo kasha na efo mmba ya Iruva aitikwa ni Mumuyo Mweele. Na elyi vamiku va kimwana kyilya Yesu veefo vamweende na efo mmba ya Iruva vashemmbutya shaasa kyikee mbuka ya uvavaso,
kasha imbwarya na maako, kaarafuma Iruva kaamba,
“Ulaalu shisamaany yeny kishinga kyafo Nndumi shikweengye na ufoo shaasa kuleamba.
Kimmba miso akwa allolya ukiro lwafo,
yelo kudeesye usanguny lwa vandu va masanga moose.
Ukiro elu nsa iniingaa vandu va masanga vakooye irambuyo mbony tafo. Na vandu vafo va Israeli vavikwa itumbeny.”
Na ndeye na maye vakava mmbo vatirwa ntamba veshiitaa kyilya kyarerwa kya mwana ulya.
Na Simion kavavikya mbora kavia maye we Maria, “Yeu mmbo akee mmbike-u naambo va kunu Israeli veengyi vakooye iwa nawe na isalala nawe; naveva na wende lurerwa kya iipalwa.
Na yewe usu lukaa lukwiire efo ngoony na makusaro a vandu veengyi naambo akooye imanyika paa.”
Naasa kwiiyo na nndu nka mwauya kisuku we Anna akee mfu wa Fanueli wa efo ufyariny lwa Aseri. Nawe amaaye fyeeri fiingyi enkaa na mmi ando a myaaka mfungare uka ammalyikwa.
Nawe ni nka wa ding'u, na kya ukuu lwakwe amaaye myaaka makumi nyanya na iina. Nawe nnyelakana efo mmba ya Iruva-fo, kava mwiindya Iruva ekootoyaa na itereva Iruva kio na nsanyiny. "
Nalyo kyeeri kyilya kasha nang'u kaitikisa Iruva. Kandeongoya vandu mbony ta mwana ulya Yesu, valya veefo vaverayaa kufike elyi makiryony a Yerusalemu.
Naasa elyi vammaa iinutya filya fyoose fikee fivavasye ni Nndumi vakawuya na kulya muriny kwawo kulya Nasareti.
Na mwana ulya kaenda eng'anaa na itumaa eshishwaa urango usha, na iwona ikyiiyo efo kwa Iruva. "
Naasa vamiku vakwe veshendaa na kulya Yerusalemu wo mwaaka elyi kwamfika nkonu ulya nniini wa Pasaka.
Nawe ekifita myaaka ikumi na ivii, vakaveenda inderwa nafo, shaasa vandu vaishivye iindya nkonu ulya nniini.
Naasa elyi vammawutya mikonu ilya miniini, varie shia yewuya na kyeny, mwana ulya Yesu karewa kulya Yerusalemu vamiku vakwe valeeshi.
Vakakummbwa kulakooye akee na vandu va kyaaro. Vakaenda efo shia ando a nkonu umwi. Vakansia efo kwa vandu va ufyari, na efo kwa vandu vaishivani nawo.
Nta valallolye, vakawuya na kulya Yerusalemu, vandensia-fo.
Kukaira-u mikonu iraru, vakatana vankooya akee rembo efo nnang'ani ya velosha valya avaaranyaa na ivavesa mbony.
Na valya veiyo vemmwaranyaa vakauma ng'any kya urango lwakwe na mbony tilya arouwa.
Naasa elyi vallolya indo vakaising'ang'a. Na maye kammbia: Mwana-akwa nkyiki elyi kwalutannya indo? Lla-te ndoo na yeny lwakusia na ting'wa-dwa!
Nawe kavavia: “A ekyo mwashisiiya nkyokyi? A mmbo mulaishi kundo kushisumanyi isinda ni efo kutiri findo fya Nde?”
Nawo kyirero kyilya avavia nta valakimanyi.
Nawe kandeoloka nawo kasha na kulya Nasareti. Kava Mwana avatirye vio.
Na Yesu keengera irangwa na ing'ana na ikyiiyo efo kwa Iruva kasennya Iruva na vandu.

Naasa mwaaka wekee wa ikumi na karaanu kipookya Kaisari ulya Tiberio antira uruka na Pontio Pilato ekee nshilyi nniini wa kulya Yudaya na Herode akee mangyi wa kulya Galilaya na Filipo we mwanamaye ekee mangyi wa kulya Iturea na uruka lwa Trakoniti, na Lisania akee mangyi ya kulya Abilene,
meendi alya Anasi na Kayafa vekee Vakohani vaniini, llyo meendi kirero kya Iruva kilefika kulya kwa Yohane, we mwana wa Sakaria, ekee kulya kasa.
Nawe kandefika kulya urukeny lufiitani na Yordani loose, kava mwikapa-fo weele lwevia vandu kya ubatiso luryani na yaalashika efo nriminy, naambo vakooye ifwaaywa ngyulyamari tawo.

Kikaenda indo shaasa kikee kireiye efo kitabuny kitiri marero a nkisuku ulya Yesaya, nang'u akee ule, “Alu unyanga lwa nndu mwiikapa weele kundo kwa kasa ashaambaa, ‘Songosyeny shia ya Nndumi, muveorota na ngyushengye takwe.
Wo imungo lyiiyo lyishevovirwaa na wo ifumbu lyiiyo na wo kidooro fisholotwaa na si. Na efyo fikulemyi fiveva fyoorotu, na shia eto tikee malomi-lomi tiveva shirambalali.
Na woose vatiri mwiili valollye ukiro lwa Iruva.’ “
Nalyo vandu vakava vemweengya mamwiingyi vandebatiswa mmbwe. Nawe kavavia, “Yeni luva ya shoka a ni vi alemusununndya shaasa muturunyaa unyafi elo lwa Iruva lukaa lukape vandu?

Naasa vikeny ndunda tisumani na nrima waalashikye! Nta mulapooke irera efo nriminy mwaambe, ‘Nde weeru luntiri ni Abrahamu!’ Mmbo shamuvia, Iruva kakunda ashiidimaa iparya Abrahamu vana navaute naakwa ni efo maweny!
Na kyaara kyammaa ivikwa sindeny ya miri. Naasa wo nri wiiyo ulavikaa ndunda shisha umanywaa na indeerwa murony.”
Nalyo vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vakammbesa vakaamba, A lukatanany inda?
Nawe kaalwa kavavia, “Yeto akoyaa atiri soori ivii naniinge yeto nalatiri. Na yeto akoyaa atiri shoonga navetana kiwo.”
Naasa vandu vadedemi vakasha nafo vashebatiswa. Vakammbia, “Llosha, a yese lukatana inda?”
Nawe kavavia, “Nta mulaengere isoka nndu kindo ngota ekyo kyikee kivavasye.”

Naasa vandu vasikari vakavemmbesa vakaamba, “A na yese lukatana inda?” Nawe kavavia, “Nta mulaafinyi nndu, nta mulakumbe nndu kya wongo. Mmbo mushekufuryaa na ekyo muniingwaa kya urundi lwany lwa kyaasikari.”
Naasa vandu va kulya urukeny woose veefo vavereyaa na ikusara-sara kya Yohane efo nriminy veshambaa kulakooye mmbwe muni akee Kristo.

Nalyo Yohane kaalwa kavavia, “Yeny ni mura shamubatisa nato. Indi kwiifo kushaa yeto mwaafinya ashiilannyi. Nawe nshammaa shiporomwi nta ukova lwa fyaaru fyakwe-fo. We mmbwe ashemubatisaa na Mumuyo Mweele na muro.
Nawe arie nndeeva na woko lwakwe nandeaiya efo muunguny wakwe kwiile peru. Na nganu eto natyaalye efo mbesheny yakwe, na muulu nandeuvivya murony ularumikaa.” "
Naasa kalungya-u na marero engyi-se meengyi eveetikaa ashoongoyaa vandu nrumi yeyo ya nsia.
Naasa mangyi ilya Herode kakooya areryo mmbwe kimaruma kya Herodia ekee nka wa mwanamaye na kimaruma kya makasha moose aletana.
Na findo filya fyoose fya ngata yeyo keengerya-fo kingyi kanderaya Yohane kifingyony.
Naasa kyikava elyi vandu va kulya urukeny vaenda ibatiswa ni Yohane na Yesu kaveenda indebatiswa. Eefo atereva Iruva, kulya iruveeu kukarauka.

Na Mumuyo Mweele kansokya kashenkaya. Na fwana yakwe alesha afwanani na kindo kyuumbe kyikee na mwiili kyikee sha mbeta. Na unyanga lukavaanga luuka efo iruveeu lwishambaa, " “Yeu mmbwe mwana wakwa nkunde shisenywa mmbwe.”
Na Yesu muni kava nndu wa myaaka makumi araru elyi alepooka ilosha vandu. Nawe aishiwa mmbo akee mwana wa Yosefu, we mwana wa Eli,
we mwana wa Matati, we mwana wa Levi, we mwana wa Maliki, we mwana wa Yanai, we mwana wa Yosefu,
we mwana wa Matatia, we mwana wa Amosi, we mwana wa Nahumu, we mwana wa Esili, we mwana wa Nagai,
we mwana wa Maati, we mwana wa Matatia, we mwana wa Semei, we mwana wa Yosefu, we mwana wa Yuda,
we mwana wa Yoana, we mwana wa Resa, we mwana wa Serubabeli, we mwana wa Salatieli, we mwana wa Neri,
we mwana wa Maliki, we mwana wa Adi, we mwana wa Kosamu, we mwana wa Elmadamu, we mwana wa Eri,
we mwana wa Yosua, we mwana wa Elieseri, we mwana wa Yorimu, we mwana wa Matati, we mwana wa Levi,
we mwana wa Simion, we mwana wa Yuda, we mwana wa Yosefu, we mwana wa Yonamu, we mwana wa Eliakimu,
we mwana wa Melea, we mwana wa Mena, we mwana wa Matata, we mwana wa Natani, we mwana wa Davidi,
we mwana wa Isai, we mwana wa Obedi, we mwana wa Boas, we mwana wa Salmoni, we mwana wa Naasoni,
we mwana wa Aminadabu, we mwana wa Aramu, we mwana wa Esrom, we mwana wa Faresi, we mwana wa Yuda,
we mwana wa Yakobo, we mwana wa Isaki, we mwana wa Abrahamu, we mwana wa Tera, we mwana wa Nahori,
we mwana wa Seruki, we mwana wa Ragau, we mwana wa Faleki, we mwana wa Eberi, we mwana wa Sala,
we mwana wa Kaini, we mwana wa Arafaksadi, we mwana wa Semu, we mwana wa Noe, we mwana wa Lameki,
we mwana wa Metusala, we mwana wa Enoki, we mwana wa Yaredi, we mwana wa Maleleeki, we mwana wa Kenani,
we mwana wa Enoki, we mwana wa Seti, we mwana wa Adamu we mwana wa Iruva.
Naasa Yesu kawuya yuuka kulya Yordani aishwe Mumuyo Mweele. Kanderawa ni Mumuyo wa Iruva neende kulya kasa.
Kakaa-fo ando a mikonu makumi aana asheswaa ni yeto Nkumbi. Nawe mikonu ilya kasinda nalalye shoonga. Nalyo elyi yansia, katirwa nshaa.
Naasa yeto Nkumbi kashembia, “Kwakooya mmbo kukee mwana wa Iruva, via iwe elyi lyaaluke nkate!”
Yesu kanndouwa, “Mmbo kyikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Kindo nndu akirya-u nakyo muu nshi shoonga tupu-fo.’ “
Nalyo kandensaamisa ando a uuwe kamoora ngyumangyi ta ulana yelu toose sha ikafya lyimwi.
Nalyo yeto Nkumbi kambia, “Umangyi yelu sanda na usuri lwavayo nkuningaa yewe, mashika ni fyakwa shikee nniingye, neeny nshefikuniingyaa nndu shankunda.
Naasa neewe kwashoolokya sumbai yoo kisanguny kyakwa mmbo fishevaa fyafo fyoose.”
Na Yesu kaalwa kammbia, “Mmbo kyikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Ni Nndumi wafo Iruva mmbwe kushemolokyaa si, nawe mmbwe muni kushemwindyaa.’ “
Naasa kawuya inrwaa kulya Yerusalemu kansaleesa alya urorony lwa mmba ya Iruva. Kammbia, “Kwakooya mmbo kukee mwana wa Iruva, kilya si kwauka yaa kukai!”
Mmbo kyikee kireiye kyeamba, “Ashekuvavasyaa vasu vakwe va iruveeu mashika afo, vashekuringa kwaashuke.
Nawo vashekukamaraa na mai, neewe kulasheekapa nta urende iwe-u.”
Nalyo Yesu kaalwa kambia, “Mmbo kyikee kyaambe, ‘Nta kulaese Nndumi wafo Iruva!’ “ "
Nalyo yeto Nkumbi kakooya ammarisya fyeeso fyoose, Kammbuka, katevesa mbele.
Na Yesu kawuya na kulya Galilaya akee mmbikye finya ya Mumuyo wa Iruva. Na kyulaalu kyakwe kyikandekwaana na kulya urukeny lusengetye loose.
Nawe kava mwiilosha efo mmba tawo teterevya eerumishwaa mmbandu woose. "
Nalyo kasha na kulya Nasareti kundo alelelyo. Kandeanga na efo mmba yeeterevya elyi nkonu wa Sabato shaasa eshivye. Kasalala nandesomya vandu.
Kasheniingyo kitabu kya nkisuku ulya Yesaya. Kakyoororwa kakooya ando akee areiye u-le:

“Ni Mumuyo wa Nndumi ashikaye kimmba aleshaamba mafura shindeongoya vakiva nrumi ya Iruva ya nsia. Kashiruma shindekapya yewo vafinge weele lweelekeyo. Na yewo vafu miso vakooye ilola, indelotora yewo vaondore vave valeke,
indekapa weele lwa mwaaka wa Nndumi usennyi.”
Nalyo kaososa kitabu kilya kaviirya yeto mwiifurukanya-fo. Kakaa rembo. Na vandu vakee efo mmba yeeterevya woose vakammbikya miso swaa.
Naasa kapooka ivavia, “Ekyo kyikee kireiye kyaamba indo, ni inu kyammiinukya kyikamwaanga maarwiny any.”
Nalyo vakandumisha woose vakasongololo kya marero alya asennyi indo auka efo kaniny kakwe. Vakaamba, “A yeu nshiwe mwana wa Yosefu?”
Nawe kavavia, “Mmbo shiishi deny musheshiviaa, ‘Kukee mwaanga kukire kumuni! Findo lwiitye fyambutika kulya Kapernaumu kyevefitani na kunu kweru fyoose kunu muriny kwafo.’ “
Kawuya kaamba, “Ni kya dede shamuvia, nndu nkisuku mmbo ashiirikyoo koose kuutaa efo kundo alewonikya.

Nkya dede shamuvia, kweefo vaka va ding'u veengyi kulya Israeli fyeeri filya fya Elia llya meendi efo iruveeu kuleraya ando a myaaka iraru na miiri irindaru, uruka lukatana lwawoywa nshaa shiniini nnu.
Nta umwi waawo Elia alerumwa kwakwe-fo, kulaore ni kulya kwa nka ulya wa ding'u ekee kulya Sarepta kulya urukeny lwa Sidoni.
Kukavekaa-fo vandu va ivave veengyi kulya Israeli meendi alya a nkisuku ulya Elisa. Nawo nta umwi waawo alewona yeeremutwa-fo kulaore ni Naemani, nawe ni nndu wa kulya Siria.”
Nalyo valya vakee efo mmba yeeterevya elyi veeta arera indo vakatirwa ni unyafi woose.
Vakakwiipoo vakankilyisa vakanfita kulya kwakulya ya muri wawo. Vakanrwaa alya ifumbu-u masasa, kulya kundo muri ulya wawo ukee ntannyi naambo vakooye imwoolota nang'u.
Nawe kaira efo nnang'ani yaawo vyaa kakweengya.
Nalyo kandesoka na kulya Kapernaumu. Nato ni muri wa kulya Galilaya. Kava mwiivalosha elyi mikonu ya Sabato.
Nawo vakaising'ang'a kya miloshye yakwe, nyeli arera kyikee na ushilyi.
Nalyo efo mmba yeeterevya eefo nndu atirwa mmumuyo wa utefusu. Nawe kafua na unyanga lwa finya.
Kaamba, “Sha! Nkyiki kyeru na yewe Yesu wa Nasareti? Mmbo kusheye ilurumataro! Neeny shikwiishi yewe Yewe ni yeto Mweele wa Iruva!”
Nalyo Yesu kankyeemya kaamba, “Malallya sau kummbuke!” Nalyo mumuyo ulya nkasha ukantuula si yoo nnang'ani yaawo ukammbuka, nta ulammanyi furu-fo.
Vakatirwa ni mwising'ang'o woose, vakava vaumburanaany, vakaamba, “A kirero ekyo nkya ngata-kyi? Ate arera kikee na ushilyi na wiidimi kyevavasa mimuyo yeyo ya utefusu, nayo ikauka-fo.” "
Nalyo mbony takwe tikaenda ikwaana kundo koose kulya urukeny lwa kufii.
Naasa kasomuka efo mmba yeeterevya kandefika kulya mmba kwa Simion. Naasa mayaanka wa Simion etirwa mmuro mwiingi. Vakantereva naambo nanshiise.
Nalyo kasha nang'u kakwiinyika yoo akai kakyeemmya muro ulya. Nato ukammbuka. Naasa kyaangu nakyo kakwiipoo kavafurukannyany. "
Naasa elyi mwi wiifo ushoolokaa kakooya asheywa ni valya woose vatiri vandu valwee ndwari shive na shive, vakamweenngye. Nawe kaveekerya maako wo nndu umwi umwi shaasa veiyo kavakira.
Naasa veengyi vakookwa ni mimuyo mikasha, ikafua ishaambaa, “Yewe mmbwe Mwana wa Iruva!” Nawe kaikyeemya nta nalailekeye ikarera, kimmba imwiishi we mmbwe Kristo.
Naasa elyi kwankya kakwiipoo keenda kundo kulalelwa. Nalyo vandu valya vakuumbye-fo mamwiingyi vakava vannduya-ruyaany. Vakafika kulya akai. Vakakunda intira nalavauke-se.
Nawe kavavia, “Kuti shindefika na miriny yeyo ingyi shindeongoya vandu nrumi ya nsia yeyo ya umangyi lwa Iruva, mashika nkyo kindo shilerummyo.
Nalyo kava mwoongoya vandu mbony efo mmba tawo teeterevya ta kulya Galilaya.”
Kyikava elyi vandu valya vakuumbye-fo veefo vansisiraa veshaaranyaa ndera ya Iruva, nawe asalalyi yoo mbai ya yeeve ilya ya Genesareti.
Kalollya ngalava ivii tikee shiirikise yoo mbai ya yeeve ilya. Na valya veereiya makunga vambuka-fo veefo vasangyaa mireiyo yaawo ya nruu.
Naasa ngalava tilya kaalukya ilya imwi, nayo ikee ya Simion Petro. Kantereva naisembere yuuke yoo kwaarutu yeende neefo kimureny kinnywa. Kakaa-u rembo, kalosha.
Ammanda irera kavia Simion, “Enderwaa ngalava yeyo efo nnang'ani ya mura, moolote-fo mireiyo yaany mureiye makunga.”
Simion kaalwa kammbia, “Ale Ndumi! Lweelele rembo taa lwiivinaa, lulatire nta kindo. Indi kwammbika-u ulumi lwafo yewe, nsheendaa yoolota mireiyo yakwa efo mureny.”
Vakatana indo vakareiya kyilula kya makunga. Mireiyo ilya yaawo ikatana yasia iranduka.
Vakasinnya wooroye valya vawo vakee ngalaveny ilya ingyi, vashe ivatarama yaalutya wambeu. Vakavesha vakaishura ngalava tilya tiivii, tikatana takunda idovya na si.
Naasa Simion Petro alolya kive indo, kakutuula si yoo marendeny a Yesu, kaamba, “Nndumi uka yaa shikai, mashika shikee nndu llyamari.”
Nyeli asongololo na valya akee nawo woose kimaruma kya kilula kilya kya makunga vareiya.
Na vana valya va Sebedayo, we Yakobo na Yohane, wo ni kiwo da. Yesu kavia Simion, “Nta kulairyee! Uka ulaalu kushaalukaa mwireiya vandu.” "
Vakanderwaa ngalava tilya alya kwaarutu, vakaisityo-u findo fyoose vakallatya.
Nalyo kyikava elyi amfika muriny ilya umwi wa vayo, akakau nndu nsero asiiye ni ivave deny. Nawe alolya Yesu kamoolokya si kantereva kaamba, " “Woi Nndumi kwankunda kushiidimaa isheremuta.”
Nalyo kaorwa woko kampaana, kammbia, “Shankunda eremukany!” Nalyo yeni ivave llya lyikammbuka.
