Na llya vandu valelolya kive indo vakarininda woose, vakaamba, “Mmbo angaa neefo mmba kwa nndu llyamari nandekwiimurisa-fo.”
Naasa Sakayo kashesalala yoo mbee ya Nndumi kammbia, “Lla-te Nndumi findo shitiri nshaavaa kavii, kyenga shikininge vakiva. Na kwakooya shilensoka nndu kindo nshembiryaa kaana.”
Naasa Yesu kambia, “Kyeny eka kammbona ukiro inu, kimmba neewe-da ni mwana wa Abrahamu.
Mashika Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo asheye iruuya ekyo kirekye nakikire.”
Naasa veefo veshaaranyaa mbony yeto, nawe kalungya-u kaveera kyaaso. Nyelyi eefo ashaafukyaa Yerusalemu nawo veeshi kulakooye umangyi lwa Iruva lwiifo lufumaa paa na lyimwi.
Naasa kaamba, “Kweefo nndu wa mmba ya mangyi aleipoo kyaaro kya uruka lwa kwaasha, nandetira-fo umangyi nawuyeny.
Naasa kavaanga mashinga alya akwe ikumi, kavaniingya fesa ta ikapa mbusha. Kavavia, ‘Endekapeny nato mbusha shitani shawuya.’
Naasa vandu va uruka llwa lwakwe muni vensuuye. Vakaruma varumi veellatya numa vandeamba, ‘Llukundye kutire umangyi kulwiitorye yese-fo!’
Nalyo kikava elyi antira umangyi ammbuya na kyeny, kaamba kundevaangwa mashinga alya alevaniingya fesa tilya naambo namanyi wo nndu mbusha alewonisa.
Nalyo ulya wa mbee kasha nang'u, kaamba, ‘Nndumi iyana llya lyafo lya fesa lyileende mbusha ya mayana ikumi.’
Nawe kammbia, ‘Eeka ishinga isha, mmbo kweetiri fyaangu kwavefikallya na usaari. Tiraany ushilyi lwa iitorya miri ikumi!’
Nalyo ulya wa kavii kasha nang'u kaamba, ‘Nndumi iyana lyafo lya fesa lyileende mbusha ya mayana araanu.’
Naasa na yeu-da kavemmbia, ‘Neewe vaany mwiitori wa miri iraanu!’ “
“Nalyo ulya ungyi kasha kaamba, ‘Nndumi iyana llya lyafo lya fesa akakalyi shilelyifingya kiraminy shalyisuruma.
Mashika shilekwiryaa kimmba yewe ni nndu nnyuku. Mmbo koondwa kundo kulaarye. Kwaveilula kundo kulasuye mbeu.’
Nawe kammbia, ‘Yewe ishinga yeesi! Ekyo kyauka kaniny kafo nkyo nkutyaa nakyo uvingo lwafo. Elyi kweeshi yeny ni nndu nnyuku shoondwa kundo shilaarye, shaveilula kundo shilasuye mbeu.
A kimaruma kwara kulanderwaa fesa ilya yakwa efo kwa vandu vekapa mbusha na fesa ta vandu nkyikyi? Neeny elyi sheshaa llyo sheewaryaa kimwi na ulyimi lwa vayo?’
Nalyo kavia valya vasalali yoo kufii, ‘Nsokeny iyana elyo lyakwe lya fesa muniingye yeto atiri mayana ikumi.’
Nawo vakammbia, ‘Nndumi, mmbo atiri mayana ikumi-te!’
Neeny shamuvia, ‘Wo nndu atiri kindo mmbo aniingwaa na fingi. Na yeto nalatiri mmbo asokwaa na kilya atiri.
Indi vakiduva valya vakwa valya valakundye shivikwa mangyi mwivashilya, endeveendeny na yaa muvarengetye si shiilolye!’ “
Nalyo elyi ammaa irera indo keera na mbee asheendaa irwa na kulya Yerusalemu.
Nalyo kikava elyi aafukya kulya Betifage na Betania kulya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura, nalyo karuma vandu vakiloshyony vavii.
Kaamba, “Endeny efo muriny usumani na yaa lukai. Mukafika-fo mushekooyaa ngashe ya nshungu ikee shifingye ando nayo ilandesaamwa ni nndu. Iporomweny musheengye.
Na kwakooya nndu amuvesa, nnyeeki mwaiporomwa mmbo mushambaa ni Nndumi aikundye!”
Naasa valya varumwa vakakweengya vakavekooya indo-da shaasa avavia.
Naasa elyi veefo veporomwaa ngashe ilya veni valya va vayo vakavavia, “Nkyiki elyi mwaporomwa ngashe yei ya nshungu?”
Nawo vakaamba, “Ni Nndumi aikundye-te!”
Nalyo vakayeengye Yesu. Vakawuya vakaala soori tawo ta yeerya efo mungony wa vayo, vakasaamisa-u Yesu.
Naasa eefo ashendaa nawo vakaala soori tawo ta yeerya efo shia.

Naasa elyi amfika alya kufii na yoolokyony lya ifumbu llya lya miri ya mafura, nalyo mamwiingyia valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakapooka iitikisa Iruva na unyanga uniini velookaa, kimaruma kya findo filya fya wiidimi valolye fyoose.
Vakaamba, “Kundearafumwa yeu asha akee mangyi arumwa ni Nndumi! Efo iruvee-u kuvaa na ufoo na efo kukee uuwe ya findo fyoose kukatira tikisi!”
Nalyo Vafarisayo vaangu vakee efo nnang'ani ya mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu, vakambia, “Llosha kyeemya vandu yeva vakiloshyony kyafo-te!”
Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Kwakooya wo vamalalya ni mawe yaa ashekapaa kyoorongye.”
Na elyi eefo ashaafukyaa-fo kalola muri ulya kaudonisya misoru.
Kaamba, “A nkyema kuveishi na yewe kindo kyeekweengyee ufoo naakwa ni nkonu yeu wa inu! Indi kwankisurumwa kulashekilolyaa-se ulaalu-fo.
Mashika kukaa kushe kyeeri kikuwoyaa tiny elyi misa ashekuringityaa sha isimamba riti vakuraye deny vakushingilye taari toose.
Nawo vakuwunduye si vakusande na vana vafo va efo nnang'ani yafo, nta mmbasheraa-u iwe lyikweekyerye iwe uroye wa vayo-fo, kimmba kwanra kulamanya kyeeri kyafo kya isengerwa.”
Nawe keera neefo poo ya mmba ya Iruva kaanta-fo valya veefo veekumbaa findo.
Kavavia, “Mmbo kyikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Mmba yakwa kuti ive mmba yeeterevya.’ Lyo yeni mukawuya iyaallwa mbanga ya veala shia.”
Naasa kava mwiilosha efo mmba ya Iruva wo nkonu. Na vakohani valya vaniini vakasanga na veelosha mavavaso vakasia mwaanya weemmamita, na vandu valya vasongoru va uruka ni kiwo-da.
Nawo nta valaoni kyeetana mashika mamwiingyi moose wa vandu mmbo weeriani nawe vemwaaranyaa.
Naasa nkonu umwi elyi eefo aloshaa vandu efo mmba ya Iruva na iwoongoya Nrumi ya Nsia, nalyo vakohani vaniini vakasha nang'u tiny na vaarya va fitabu vasasangyi na masiingo a vandu.
Vakarera nawe vakaamba, “Elyi kwatana indo mmbo kutiri muumu wa ngata ingai? Na nndu yeto akuvikye muumu yeto mmbi?”
Naasa kaalwa kavavia, “Ra neeny shimuvese neeni mushirouwe!
Ubatiso lwa Yohane luukye kwi? Ni efo iruveeu, ao ni kunu vanduny ndesa?”
Naasa vakakusara-sara kikwawo, vakaamba, “Kwakooya lwaamba ni iruveeu luukye, mmbo ashambaa kikavaany inda elyi mulamwiirikye?”
Indi kwakooya lwaamba nkunu vanduny luukye, ekakayo mburwa yei ya vandu shoose ishelweeraa mawe, mashika elyi veeshi na nshushwa Yohane mmbo akee nndu nkisuku.
Nalyo vakarouwa, “Llwamanya kundo luukye-fo.”
Na Yesu kavavia, “Nta yeny nshimuviaa mumu shatana nato indo mmbo ukee wa ngata ingai-fo.”
Naasa kapooka irera na vandu kaveera kyaaso ekyi, “Kweefo nndu aleronga nnda wakwe wa misabibu. Kauningya varemi wikee wa waara, keenda kyaaro kya kyeeri kyaasha.
Neelyi kyeeri kya vayo kyamfika karuma ishinga kulya kwa varemi valya vanniinge waavi lwakwe lwa fimu efyo fya misabibu. Naasa varemi valya vakamwiila vakammbiira ruu.
Nalyo keengera iruma ishinga lyingyi. Nalyo-da vakavelyiila na ilyipira. Vakalyiviira ruu.
Nalyo keengera iruma wa kararu. Nawe-da vakankapa mariinga vakampurusa neefo shia.
Naasa muni nnda ulya wa misabibu kaamba, ‘A mmbo shitanaa inda? Mmbo nshevarumyaa mwana nkunde wakwa. Kulakooye we vashenreremyaa.’
Naasa varemi valya veekilolya ashe vakaumburana wo veni na veni, vakaamba, ‘Akakato muni ding'u! Ndifonte lumbwae ding'u yeyo ive yeeru luveni!’
Nalyo vakankunnya neefo kipoo ya nnda ulya, vakambwaa, ‘A muni nnda ulya wa misabibu mmbo ashevatanyaa inda?
Mmbo asheshaa nasherumata varemi valya na nnda ulya wa misabibu asheningyaa vandu vengyi.’ Naasa elyi veeta indo vakaamba, ‘Nta kilave indo-fo!’ “
Naasa kavavikya miso swaa kavavia, “A kyavaany inda elyi kilereiyo kyeaamba, Iwe elyo vetana mmba valelyilema, llyo lyileva iwe lya ndumbeny.”
“Wo nndu awoya iwe elyo afika-fikaa. Na yeto lyammboya lyishensa-saa.” "

Nalyo veelosha mavavaso valya vakasanga na vakohani vaniini vakasia mwaanya weentira kyeeri kyilya kyeni, vakawuya iiryaa ironda llya lya vandu lyiiyo mashika elyi valemanya mmbo aleera kyaaso kyilya kyeevaronga wo.

Nalyo vakava vanreiyaa vakaruma vellaa vakunang'arye sheelyi vakee vandu vesha, vandenreiya na ekyo areraa, vawonise kindo naambo vedimi indenrambikya efo maakony a Serikali na mwiitori wa uruka, mmbwe nshilyi wa Kaisari.
Nawo vakashemmbesa vakaamba, " “Ale llosha! Lwiishi mmbo kukee nndu mwiirera na ilosha kisumani kulalolaa nta fisangu fya vandu. Mmbo kwafunda shia ya Iruva kyikee kya dede.
A lukataa usanu lwa Kaisari ni kindo kisumani ndesa ao ode?”
Nawe kaitumuso ntambo wawo, kavavia,
“Kyeshooreny fesa-te! A ufwanu yelo lwiiyo llwa-vi na kireiyo yekyo?” Nawo vakaamba, “Llwa Kaisari-te!”
Naasa kavavia, “Kyasiany Kaisari nningye findo fikwaani na Kaisari, na Iruva muvenniingya efyo fikwaani na Iruva.”
Nawo valeedimi inreiya neekyo areraa efo usanguny lwa vandu valya vakuumbye-fo. Vakatirwa ntamba kya kilya avarouwa. Vakamalallya sau.
Naasa Vasadukayo vaangu vakansheya nawo ni vandu valemmyi kya iruka lya vafu vakaamba llyiifo-fo, vakashemmbesa,
Vakaamba, “Ale llosha! Mose mmbo areiye kyeeluvia kwakooya mwanamaye wa nndu afwa nalatiri mwana, kuti mwanamaye narwaa nka yeto, naonisye mwanamaye muya ding'u.
Naasa kweefo vana va nka mfungare. Ulya wa mbee karwaa nka, kafwa nalare-u mwana.
Na ulya wa kavii-da.
Na ulya wa kararu kavenrwaa. Ni indo valya mfungare woose, valare-u nta mwana, vakasia ifwa.
Neelyi lya ifurummya nka ulya kavefwa.
Kyivaany inda elyi kufikaa yoo marukyony a vandu vafu kya nka yeto, mmbo ashevaa wa nndu ungau? Mashika woose mfungare veerie nka yeto.”
Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Vana va ulana yelu vashalyikaa na yaalyikwa.
Kya indi yewo vasherumbuyoo mwaandu vandekooya ulana yelo lwishaa na iruka lya vafu, wo mmbashaalyikaa-se-fo, nta yaalyikwa-fo.
Nta ifwa mmbakiidimaa-se ifwa-fo, mmbo vavaa sha vasu va Iruva, vaveva na vana va Iruva elyi vannduka.

Na mbony ta vandu vafu shaasa varukaa dede, na Mose-da alevetironga alya akee areiye mbony ta ngorosho ilya yekee yaaka, avaangye-u Nndumi mmbwe Iruva wa Abrahamu, na Iruva wa Isaki, na Iruva wa Yakobo.
Kyasia, Iruva nshi akee wa vandu vafu-fo, mmbo akee wa valya vakee na muu. Mashika woose vakee vakwe mmbo vava vandu vakee na muu.”
Naasa veelosha mavavaso valya maata vakaamba, “Llosha mmbo kwarera kwaronga deny!”
Nawo valakare immbesa-se nta kindo.
Naasa, nawe kavavia, “Kyava inda elyi vandu vaambaye Kristo mmbo akee mwana wa Davidi?
Kimmba Davidi we muni arerye efo kitabuny kya Saburi kaamba, ‘Nndumi alevia Nndumi wakwa, kaa rembo yaa woko lwakwa usha,
shitani shaara vakiduva vafo si, shivaallwe kiri kyafo kya yeekyerya marende.’ “
“Naasany kimmba Davidi ammbaanga ni Nndumi, a ni inda ava-se mwana wakwe?”
Naasa elyi vandu valya vakuumbye-fo veefo vashaaranyaa, nawe kavia valya vakiloshyony vakwe,
“Kwiiseny na veelosha mavavaso vakundye iraa soori shaasha na ilanga iidikiryo efo singireny na indekaa marembo a mbee efo mmba teeterevya na marembo a mbee elyi vavaangwa ando a sukukuu.
Ate wo mmbo vandu veemira mmba ta vaka va ding'u. Vakava vetereva fiterewo fyaasha kyikee kya ikoora vanduny tupu. Mmbo vashewonisaa uvingo uniini nnu.”
Naasa Yesu kalolya vandu masimba shaasa vavika firaso fyawo efo isandukuny lyeesanyirya fesa ta mmba ya Iruva.
Naasa kalollya nka wa ding'u akee nkiva avika-fo senti ivii.
Nalyo kaamba, “Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Nka yeu wa ding'u akee nkiva indo mmbo avika kiniini ngota woose.
Mashika yewo woose ni efo findony fyawo fya mmwasi vauta efyo vavika fya pya.’ Indi we ni efo findony fyakwe fyerorwa aleuta kavika kyoose atiri kyeelela muu wakwe.”
Nalyo kakooya vandu vereraa kya mmba ya Iruva elyi ikee shishope indo na mawe a utore na findo vandu vavikye fya iishopa, nawe kaamba,
“Kya efyo mulollye kukaa kushe fyeeri kulasherewaa-u iwe lyikweekyerye iwe lyingyi lyire lyilawunduyo si-fo.”
Naasa vakammbesa vakaamba, “Llosha a meendi kisheutikaa indo ni indii? Na elyi findo efyo fyamfika isha, wende lwavayo llokyi?”
Naasa kaamba, “Kwiiseny mulasheelembwa mashika veengi vasheshaa na irina lyakwa vashambaa, ‘Mmbwe yeu!’ vaveamba-se, kyeeri ekyo kyikee kufii kyifike. Neeni nta muleende ivalatya-fo.
Indi meendi mushitaa kwiikapaa fira na myaalukoluko ya vandu iifo, neeni nta mulairyee! Mmbo kyikee kirummbwe kisongwe yeenda indo, indi yoo masiiyony nshilyo yeni ammba isha-fo.”
Keengera ivavia, “Uruka lushekwiipoo lukape uruka lungyi, na umangyi luvekapa umangyi lungyi.
Kushiraa-u na fidinasi finiini, na shaa na ndwari wo ando, na ngyende teeresye tivelolyo tuuka neefo iruveeu.

Indi kindo kipokaa itanyika kulaore findo yefyo fyansha, mmbo veshemutiraa na imurishisa vandemurwaa efo mmba tawo teeterevya, na mmba ta vafinge, mundevefitwa na efo fisanguny fya vamangyi na vashilyi yewo va Kaisari kimaruma kya irina lyakwa.
Nakyo nkyo kishemwengyee mwaanya weevika ukureeki lwany.
Naasa nng'u mushefishyaa shila tapa efo nriminy mure mulakusara-saraa kindo musherouwaa ewo vamukumba.
Mashika ni yeny nshemuniingaa kana na urango usha, na vakiduva yewo vany woose nta valashiidimaa ifilyimba na ifyaallwa.
Indi naakwa ni vamiku vany, na vanavamaye vany, na woofyari vany, na vambuya vany, mmbo mushendaa irambikyo mmbo efo maakony a vakiduva, nawo vamwiite na ufuny yeni maata.
Muveva na veesuwa mmbandu woose kimaruma kya irina lyakwa.
Manyiny naakwa ni ufii lwa efo nrweny wany nta llusherekaa-u-fo.
Kwakooya mushesisirya-u llyo mushekirwaa.”
“Indi meendi mushelolyaa kunu Yerusalemu kushingilyo mmatorito a fira nalyo manyiny, mmbo kwamfika kyeeri kya vayo kyealuka irama.
Nalyo yewo vakooyaa vakee kunu Yudaya varishe vandepara na mafumbu-u. Na yewo vakooya vakee mareminy, wo valawuye na numa vandeanga nafo-fo.
Mashika fyeeri efyo mfyo fyeetaiya naambo efyo fikee fireiye fikooye indeinukya-u fyoose.
Indi yewo vakooyaa vakufingye na yoota vana fyeeri efyo, oshiny lwawo! Mashika llyo uruka lushewoywaa ni ngatara shiniini, na vandu va uruka yelu vakooye iwoywa ni ngapo shinyaasi.
Nalyo vashewawaa noosu na inderawa mifungwa efo vanduny va masanga na usu. Na kunu Yerusalemu kuve kundo vandu va masanga vavavara kutani fyeeri fyawo fyafika.”
“Nalyo kushelolyoo ngyende efo ngini-u na efo mwiiriny na efo nyinyiriny. Na kunu urukeny vandu va masanga vasheerevee vatambwa ni yeeve yeyo shiniini ishonaa na irosa matundulu maniini.
Na vandu vashumaa mwaangaya kimaruma kya weerei na ivereya kindo kikaa kiwoye ulana elu, mashika vekooyaa na finya yeto ta efo iruveeu tirinyiswaa-rinyiswaa.
Nalyo llyo vashelolyaa paa Mwana yeto wa nndu ashaa ariwa ni ifishi atiri finya shiniini na itumbe.
Na yeni meendi mukooyaa findo yefyo fipookaa itanyika, kwipoony shu muveinwa mirwe yaany, mashika kwamfika kufii na mawoweny any.”
Nawe kaveera kyaaso, “Loleny nkuu na miri ingyi myoose.
Kwakooya yamfumbisa mmbo mwamanya kwamfika kufii na iilula.
Na yeni ni kiwo-da, meendi mulolyaa findo efyo fiifo fishutikaa, kyevemanyiny ni umangyi lwa Iruva lwamfika kufii lulolyo paa.
Nkya dede shamuvia, irika elyi llyishesiaa kulaore findo efyo fyamiinukya indo fyoose-fo.
Ngina na ulana firumakaa, kilarumakaa ni marero akwa.”
“Kya indi kwiiseny muveni, mirima yaany ilakooye irovyo mwiitalauwaa ndeu na inangwa mmbwari na yaafuka kya findo fya muu yeu, na nkonu yeto umuwoye tiny sha nsoori.
Shamashika ushesheyaa vandu vakee yaa ulaniny ukooye vakweekye.
Naasany, laleny shoovi wo kyeeri mwiiterevaa Iruva mwiidimi ikyia findo efyo fyoose fikee fiteerye fishe, muverewa mwiisalalyi yoo mbee ya Mwana yeto wa Nndu.”
Naasa, fyeeri fya nsanyiny kava mwiilosha efo mmba ya Iruva, na kyio kandelala kulya ifumbuny lya Miri ya mafura.
Na ironda llya lya vandu lyoose lyikava lyilavaa insheya ngama efo mmba ya Iruva lyishemwaaranya.
Naasa nkonu nniini ukafika isha ulya wa sukukuu ya mikate ilatiri ntarang'u yeto uvaangwaa ni Pasaka.
Nalyo vakohani valya vaniini vasasangyi na veelosha mavavaso vakaruuya mwaanya wa iwaa Yesu, mashika veereiye mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu.
Naasa Satana kaanga Yuda ulya avaangwa Iskariote, nawe akee umwi wa valya ikumi na vavii.
Nalyo kawara shia kandefisha shila na vakohani valya vaniini na vashilyi veshilya vasoro va efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva karera nawo shaasa ashenrambikyaa efo maakony awo.
Nawo vakafura vakateeryana nawe vanniinge fesa.
Nawe kairikya karuuyany mwaanya weenrambikya efo maakony awo kirika.
Naasa nkonu ulya wa mikate ilatiri ntarang'o ukafika yeto usumani ishisha ngurana ya Pasaka.
Nalyo karuma Petro na Yohane kaamba, “Yendeny, mundeludeesya Pasaka lushe ilya.”
Nawo vakambia, “A kundo kwakunda lundeideesya ni kwi, mbee?”
Nawe kavavia, “Llen-te, mukammaanga efo muriny, mwishekwaananyaa na nndu arie nungu ya mura, mmbwe mushellatyaa mufike nawe efo mmba kundo ashangaa.
Naasa muvieny yeto muni kyeny, Llosha akunndye ando a ishelyiiya Pasaka ando amwi na vakiloshyony vakwe.
Nalyo nndu yeto ashemwooraa kirya kiniini kya mmba ya uuwe kyikee kideesye, nng'u mushedeesyaa kilaayo yekyo.”
Naasa vakeenda vakavekooya indo-da shaasa avavia. Vakandedeesya-fo Pasaka.
Nalyo elyi kyeeri kyamfika kashekaa-fo rembo ilya shoonga na vakiloshyony vakwe.
Kavavia, “Sheetirwa mmasha deny shilye shoonga yei ya Pasaka neeni kulaore shammeenda indeliswa ukiva.
Mmbo shamuvia, ‘Nshisheilyaa-se-fo, na kutani yainutyo efo umanginy lwa Iruva.’ “
Nalyo kaipoo kikombe kaana Iruva kaamba, “Nngeny ekyi niny-fo moose.
Mashika shamuvia, kipookya ulaalu nshishekyinaa-se kya kimu ekyo kya nsabibu-fo kutani umangyi lwa Iruva lwasha.”
Nalyo kaipoo nkate kaana Iruva, kaufisha-fisha fyenga, kavaniingya kaamba, “Ekyi ni mwiili akwa [nato wiifo urambikyoo-u kimaruma kyany. Neeni kevetaniny indo kya ishikummbwa.”
Na upata lulya lweeniwaa elyi numa ya Kilaayo kilya, kavetana nalo indo-da, kaamba, “Upata yelu ni nkundanu mwiiya wavikwa na samu yakwa, nayo iifo ishiiritwaa kimaruma kyany.]
Indi loleny-te woko lwa yeto asheshiriingyaa mmbo lukee yaa meseny ando amwi neeny.
Kya Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo ashendaa shia yakwe shaasa kikee kirummbwe indi oshiny lwa nndu eto ashendiingyaa!”
Nawo vakapooka ikuvesa wo veni na veni kya nndu wa efo kwawo ashetanaa indo mmbi?
Naasa kikava mmbo vallya ulai efo nnang'ani yaawo kya nndu akee nniini waawo.
Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Vamangyi va vandu va masanga mmbo vavaafinyi, na yewo vavaitorye vakavaangwa, vambuya va uruka.
Indi kyany yeni nta kilave indo-fo! Kya indi yeto akee nniini wa vengyi kunu nnang'ani yaany naaluke nave n-du wa vengyi. Neeto eefo asongoye vengyi naaluke mwiifurukannya vengyi.

Mashika nniini wa vengyi ni ungau? Ndesa ni yeto akaa rembo keengyo shoonga ao ni yeto eefo amfurukanyaa-u? Nshi yeto akaa rembo keengyo shoonga? Kyasia, na yeny-da shavekaa kunu nnang'ani yaany shava mwiifurukannya vengyi.”
“Kya indi yeni mmbo yewo musisirye-u ando amwi neeny efo fyeesyony fyakwa.
Neeny shamuterevyany ding'u ya umangyi shaasa Nde aleshiterevya yeny,
neeni muvekooya ikaa efo umanginy lwakwa musasangyi neeny mwilyaa na ina efo meseny akwa. Nalyo mushekaa-fo rembo efo fitiminy fya umangyi mushilye ngyufyari yeto ikumi na ivii ta Israeli.”
“Yewe Simion, Simion-ro! Ekakato Satana akemuruuya kyuumu nakooye imweela sha nganu.
Kyaindi yeny mmbo shilekuterevya kwa Iruva naambo kyikusiryo kyafo kilasheangwa. Neewe elyi numa kwakooya kwashiwuiya-se kuvangise vanavamau.”
Nawe kammbia, “Nndumi shikee neewe mmbo nshidimaa naakwa ni inderawa kyifingyony naakwa ni indewaawa.”
Nawe kaamba, “Petro shakuvia, oro ya nguku, nnyishereraa kulaore kwanshikana kararu kwaambe nkushiishi-fo.”
Nalyo kavavia, “Llya shilemuruma mularie nta mboloko nta nkusha, nta fyaaru, a ndesa kwiiyo kindo muletura?” Nawo vakammbia, “Nta kyimwi-fo!”
“Kya indi ulaalu yeto akooyaa atiri mboloko neende arie, na yeto wa nkusha naa-kiwo-da. Na yeto akoyaa nalatiri nandekumba soori yakwe ya yeerya nandekuurya usu.
Mmbo shamuvia, ekyo kyikee kireiye mmbo kyanrumbuwa kyindeinukya yaa kwakwa, kyeamba, ‘Nawe mmbo aleekenwa ando amwi na varavi.’ Mashika ekyo kikee kirummbwe kyakwa mmbo kiifo kimarisyony.”
Naasa vakaamba, “Nndumi akakati ngyusu ivii tikee yaa.” Nawe kavavia, “Kifye.”
Nalyo kakwipoo-fo kaenda kulya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura shaasa eeshivye. Na valya vakiloshyony vakallatya.
Naasa eekyifika ando alya kavavia, “Ketereveny Iruva mulasheanga kyeesyony!”
Nalyo kooka yoo vakai, kafika sha ando a yeera iwe. Kafiirya ndi kapooka itereva,
kaamba, “Woi Nde kwakunda, ita upata yelo mbai lushiiyami. Indi kilaende shaasa shikundye yeny-fo.” [
Naasa nsu wa Iruva kasha ikoora nawe auka efo iruveeu kammbika finya.
Nalyo kava asavaany kapooka itereva kanangisa. Kasina nrike ukava sha marony a samu wishoshokya-si.]
Nalyo kakwipoo yoo kiterevyony kasha na alya vakiloshyony vakai, kakooya valele rony kimaruma kya fyoova fivatiri.
Nawe kavavia, “Naambo-kyi mulele rony? Kwipoon-te mutereve Iruva mulakooye yaanga fyeesyony!”
Eefo areraa indo akakau mamwiingyi wa vandu vansha nang'u. Na nndu avasongoye ni ulya avaangwa ni Yuda, akee wa valya ikumi na vavii, kasha na yoo kufii na Yesu kammiminda fyoomu.
Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Yuda mmbo kwariingya Mwana yeto wa nndu na kimimindo?”
Naasa valya varyani nawe elyi valolya kishendaa indo vakaamba, “Nndumi a lukavamanya na ngyusu?”
Nalyo umwi wa efo nnang'ani yaawo kamanya kishinga kya nkohani nniini kammaswa kurwi ka woko usha.
Naasa Yesu karouwa kaamba, “Kureeyeny kimande yoo!” Nalyo kapaana kuri kalya kanshiisa.

Na Yesu kavia vakohani valya vaniini vansheya na vashilyi veshilya vasoro va efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva na masiingo alya a vandu, “Mmbo mwakwiipoo mukasha murie ngyusu na mbiiri sheelyi shikee mwaalashia?
A tepa shilesinda neeni mikonu simu efo mmba ya Iruva nta mulashitire Indi ekyi nkyo kyeeri kyany na kya finya ta ireema.”
Naasa vakantira vakeenda vanrie vakamfita efo mmba kwa nkohani ulya nniini. Na Petro kalatya yoo numa ashengyaa kwaasha.
Nawo vakaata muro alya poo vakakaa rembo vakauringitya, nawe Petro kakaa-u rembo nawo.
Naasa nka kishinga wa efo poo kallollya Petro ekee rembo emikyoo mmuro, Kaamba, “Na yeu-da ni nndu eeryani na Yesu!”
Nawe kanlema-fushu kaamba, “Nshimwiishi-fo-te!”
Numa kyinnywa nndu ungyi kallola kaamba, “Na yewe-da kukee umwi waawo!” Naasa Petro kaamba, “Ode nndu, nshiwe yeny-fo!”
Naasa kukaira kyeeri kyaangu, nndu ungyi kavika ukaari kaamba, “Ni dede, na yeu-da akee nndu eeryani na Yesu. Mashika nawe ni nndu wa Galilaya.”
Naasa Petro kaamba, “Nshiishi ekyo kwaamba-fo nndu!” Nalyo yeni eefo areraa indo oro ya nguku ikakapa.
Naasa Nndumi kainduka kalola Petro. Nalyo Petro kakummbwa kirero kya Nndumi kilya alemmbia, “Oro ya nguku nyishekapaa inu kulaore kwanshikana kararu-fo!” "
Nalyo kasomuka na mbengyeny kaiya kavavyo nnu nriminy.
Nalyo vasoro valya vannrie vakantatala vakankapa na mbiiri.
Nalyo vakansikya kisangu vakammbesa vakaamba, " “Kyeamba yeto akukapa mmbi?” "
Vakarera na marero engyi meengyi emwaarara.
Naasa elyi kwankya masiingo alya a vandu akashekuumbya-fo na vakohani vaniini na vaarya va fitabu, Vakanrwaa efo ikwaanuny lya vaniini.
Vakaambaya-u, " “Kwakooya yewe mmbwe Kristo luvieny!” Nawe kavavia, “Kwakooya shamuvia mmushiirikyaa-fo,
Lingyi-se kwakooya shamuvesa kindo mmusherouwaa-fo.
Indi kipookya ulaalu Mwana yeto wa nndu ashevaa mmbo akee rembo yoo woko usha lwa Iruva yeto Mwaafinya.”
Naasa vakaamba woose, “A yewe mmbo kukee mwana wa Iruva-ny?” Na Yesu kavavia, “Ni yeni mwakyaamba, yeny mmbwe.”
Naasa vakaamba, “Naambo-kyi-se lwakaa lwiruyaa ukureeki lungyi? Mmbo lweeta luveni kyuuka kaniny kakwe.”
Nalyo vakakwiipoo nseemu ulya wawo moose vakanrwaa kwa Pilato.
Naasa vakapooka inkumba vakaamba, “Nndu yeu mmbo lwankooya asheevetaa vandu va uruka lweru kavaima valaute kodi ya Kaisari, kaamba we muni mmbwe Kristo akee mangyi.”
Naasa Pilato kawesa Yesu, “A yewe mmbo kukee mangyi ya Vayuda ndesa?” Yesu kaallwa kammbia, “Ni yewe kwakyaamba.”
Naasa Pilato kavia vakohani valya vaniini na nsemu ulya wa vandu, “Yeny nshilollye kindo kya uvingo kwa nndu yeu-fo.”
Nawo vakaitika vakaamba, “Mmbo ayaa vandu va uruka eeloshaa kakwaanisa kunu Yudaya koose apookya kulya Galilaya katana afika kunu.”
Naasa Pilato ekyiita indo kavesa kwakooya akee wa kulya Galilaya.
Ammanya nisha mmbwa efo ushilyiny lwa Herode, naasa kanrika kulya kwa Herode, nawe asheye na kulya Yerusalemu fyeeri filya-da.
Naasa llya Herode alelollya Yesu kafura kyuumu, kimmba eelangye illolya uka fyeeri fyaasha mashika elyi emmiita mbony takwe. Herode mmbo evikye nsia mmbo ashorwaa wende luuka kwa Yesu.
Naasa kammbesa mbony shiingyi, lyo we nalarouwe nta kindo. "
Naasa vakohani valya vaniini vasasangyi na veelosha mavavaso vakasha isalala-fo, vakeengera inkumba.
Naasa Herode kamwiinyala ando amwi na vasikari vakwe vakantatala, vakavembika soori shisha, vakambiira-se kwa Pilato.
Naasa Herode katira mbuya na Pilato nkonu ulya mweni, mashika elyo mbee vesuvani.
Naasa Pilato kavaanga vakohani valya vaniini na vandu va nrwe na vandu va uruka vashekuummbya ando amwi,
Kavavia, " “Mmbo mulesheengye nndu yeu mukaamba mmbo akeeveta vandu. Neeny shammeembesa kya mwaandu wakwe mwiitye, llyo shilaoni kindo kya uvingo kya efyo mwankumba nafyo kyikee kwakwe.
Naakwa ni Herode, nawe nta-fo, llyoony kammbiira na kweru. Nawe akakau nkwiifo kindo kisumani na ufu kyikee kitani mmbwe-fo.
Naasany, shinkapaany nakweengye.” [
Nalyo kyikee miishivye yakwe navaporomuye nndu umwi wo kyeeri kya sukukuu.]
“Naasa vakaongora ando amwi nseemu ulya moose, utau nndu yeu nalakilolyo-fo, kuluporomuye Baraba!”
Nawe Baraba ni nndu emmeenda yeerwa kifingyony kimaruma kya uriingyi lweefo kulya muriny na vandu vakawaawa.
Naasa Pilato karera nawo lya kavii ni elyi eekundye ilekeya Yesu.
Nawo vakakapa ngaya vakaamba, “Nkapye nsalabeny.”
Naasa kavavia lya kararu, “A kindo kya ukasha nndu yeu aletana nkyokyi? Yeny nshilollye kindo kya uvingo kisumani na ufu kyikee efo kwakwe-fo. Naasany nshenkapaany shillekeye.”
Nawo vakaitikya vekapaa kisengelele vakundye nandekapyo nsalabeny! Ngyunyanga tawo tikalyimba.
Nalyo Pilato karumbwa kindetanwa ekyo vakunndye.
Nalyo kalekeya nndu ulya aleerwa kifingyony kimaruma kya yaanta uriingyi na iwaa, na Yesu kavaniingya vantannyi shaasa vakundye.
Naasa elyi veefo vasheendaa vanrie vakatira Simon wa Krene asha auka ireminy. Vakanrika nsalaba nashe yoo numa ya Yesu aurie.
Naasa vandu va uruka vakallatya nseemu mwiingyi na vaka vekukapa-kapaa mbafu na imwiiya.
Naasa Yesu kavaindukya kaamba, “Nyira vaka va Yerusalemu mulashiiye yeny-fo! Iiyeny kyany muveni na kya vana vany!”
Llen-te kwikaa kushe fyeeri elyi vandu vashambaa, “Ngoma vaka fyuumba na misanga ilandeire wana na mavee alandeote.
Llyo meendi vashepokaa ivia mafumbu, Luwoyeny! Na yeni fidooro lusikyeny!
Mashika kwakooya vatanya nri yeto nshu indo a kya yeto muumu kisheendaa inda?”
Naasa kweeifo na vasoro vavii vetana uravi veeriwa ando amwi nawe vandewaawa.
Nalyo vakafika ando avangwaa ni Kisharongony. Nafo vakankapya-fo nsalabeny vakansanda na valya vetana makasha. Ulya umwi kavikwa kwa yoo woko lwakwe usha na ungyi yoo woko umuso.
Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Woi Nde vafwaaye kimmba valeeshi ekyo vatana.” Naasa vakaavana na soori takwe veetikapyaa kura.
Na vandu va uruka vasalali-fo velolaa. Na vandu valya va nrwe vakanteenda vakaamba, “Elyi nndu yeto alekira vengyi nalakukire we muni, kwakooya mmbwe Kristo nsauwe wa Iruva!”
Naasa na vasikari valya vaiyo vakafika yoo kufii vakantatala, Vakanserisya mfinyo utarang'aa.
Nalyo vakaamba, “Kwakooya yewe mmbo kukee mangyi ya Vayuda, Kukireeny kumuni-te!”
Naasa na ipoo lyiifo lyikee ivike yoo uuwe ya nrwe wakwe lyikee ireiye, “Yeu mmbwe mangyi ya Vayuda.”
Na valya veetana makasha valya vavambyo ando amwi nawe, ulya umwi kavemwaarara, “A yewe nshi Kristo? Naasany, kukyire kumuni kulusande-u neese.”
Indi ulya ungyi karouwa kikee kya insakira kammbia, “A mmbo kulaireiye nta Iruva! Neewe kwaveva nndu kwaona uvingo yelo-da.
Kyeru yese mmbo lwatannywa kisumani. Mashika kindo lwatawa ni ekyo kyikwaani na efo mitannyi yeeru. Indi yeu nnyatiri kindo atannyi kikasha-fo.”
Nalyo kaamba, “Woi Yesu shikummbwa elyi kwafika isha kukee na umangyi lwafo!”
Nawe kammbia, “Nkya dede shakuvia, ni inu-da kukooyaa kukee neeny efo Paradiso.”
Nalyo kumfika kyeeri kya saa irindaru uruka loose lukawoyo ni ireema kukafika saa kyeenda.
Na nkyeere ukareta sa ya vayo. Naasa isullya llya iniini lyaavanisye efo mmba ya Iruva lyikavambuka rany nnang'ani kavii.
Nalyo Yesu kaonisa unyanga waasha kaamba, “Woi Nde ni efo maakony afo shakurambikyaany nrima wakwa.” Ammaa yaamba indo kakumba muu.
Naasa nshilyi ulya wa vasikari iyana elyi allolya kiutika indo kaarafuma Iruva kaamba, “Ni kya dede nndu yeu ekee wa usumanu!”
Na vandu vakuumbye-fo nkuka vasheye nafo ishelola ekyo, nawo-da elyi vallolya kilya kyautika, vakawuya na kyeny vekukapa-kapaa mbafu.
Naasa kusalalye-fo na valya vaitani nawe woose sanda na vaka valya vavandami nawe vauka kulya Galilaya, nawo woose veefo-da velolaa efyo.
Nalyo akakau nndu nndumi ansha nafo avangwaa ni Yosefu, akee nndu nsongoru ni ntele kaveva wa usumanu.
Nawe shila ilya yaawo varummbwa nyeerikye kasanga nawo-fo. Na kundo aukye ni kulya Arimataya ukee muri wa Vayuda, nawe ni nndu avereye umangyi lwa Iruva.
Naasa nndu yeu kaengya Pilato kantereva mwiili ulya wa Yesu.
Kawoolota kawoososya sooriny sha pyai. Kandewaara kundo kwa mbangeny kukee kudoshe iweny kulandearwa nta nndu.
Na nkonu ulya ni nkonu wekudeesya na nkonu wa Sabato wiifo upokaany.
Naasa na vaka valya valesha varyani nawe vauka kulya Galilaya nawo vakasora yoo numa. Vakalolya mbanga ilya na nnying'a wakwe shaasa usharwaa.
Naasa vakawuya na kyeny. Vakandedeesya miri ifwamaa na mafura eyaamba. Na nkonu ulya wa Sabato mweni vakaimuya shaasa kyikee kivavasye.
Naasa nkonu ulya wepooka mfungare vakeenda alya mbangeny na ivishivishi lya ngama varie miri ilya ifwaamaa.
Naasa vakakooya iwe llya lyikee ikunnye mbai lyammbutwa yoo mbangeny.
Naasa vakaanga nafo valalollye-fo nnying'a ulya wa Nndumi Yesu.
Nalyo kyikava elyi veefo vafulukyo nkindo ekyo, nalyo akakava vasero vavii vavasheya tiny varee soori timika-mikaa.
Naasa vakatirwa mmbwerei vakafiikya fisangu si. Nawo vakavavia, “Yeu akee na muu nkyikyi elyi mwanduuya yaa ando a vafu?”
Nnyakyikee-se yaa-fo, mmbo annduka! Kummbweny kilya alemuvia kulya Galilaya,
eshambaa kya Mwana yeto wa nndu shaasa kyikee kirummbwe nanderambikyo efo maakony a vandu valyamari na indekapyo nsalabeny na elyi lya nkonu wa kararu nawuye iruka-ny.
Nalyo vakakummbwa marero alya akwe.
Nalyo vakawuya na kyeny vauka alya mbangeny. Vakandeongoya valya ikumi na umwi na valya vengyi mbony tilya toose.
Naasa kwiifo Maria wa kulya Magdala, na Yoana, na Maria we maye wa Yakobo, na valya vengyi veryani nawo, mmbo valendevia vakiloshyony vakwe mbony tilya,
nawo marero alya akavaviiya ni a urung'ani nta valaveerikye. [
Naasa Petro kakwiipoo keenda kulya mbangeny eerishaa, keemaiya-fo kalollya firami filya fyeni fyeerika, kawuya eetirwa ntamba kya kilya kyatanyika.]
Nalyo akakava vandu vavii va efo nnang'ani yaawo na nkonu ulya mweni veefo vasheenda kundo kwa muriny nafo kwauka kulya Yerusalemu kusheendaa ando a saa ivii kufike-fo, na irina lya vayo ni Emau.
Nawo vakava vareraany kya mbony tilya tiletanyika toose.
Naasa, veefo vekapaa indo sumu na yuumburana, nalyo Yesu muni kasha nang'u, keenda aryani nawo.
Na miso awo akasikywa nta valamanyi mmbwe.
Nawe kavavia, “A ni marero eekyi mwavesana indo elyi mwiifo mushendaa?” Vakairisha vekushye fisangu fyawo.
Na ulya umwi avangwaa irina lyakwe ni Kleopa kaalwa kambia, “A nnyewe kumuni kusheye na kunu Yerusalemu kukee muny, kwara kulamanya mbony yeto tiletanyika mikonu yei myaangu?”

Nawe kavavia, “A mbony yeekyi?” Vakammbia, “Ni ta Yesu wa kulya Nasareti-te ekee nndu mwauya fisuku kaveva mwiidimi itana findo finiini, fyeetana na fyeerera kikalollyo ni Iruva na vandu woose va kunu urukeny.
Na vakohani veru vaniini vakasanga na vandu veru va nrwe vakanrambikya-fo nandeutyo uvingo lweewaawa. Vakankapya nsalabeny.
Neese mmbo lweembikye nsia lukaamba, we mmbwe yeto eekaa nawouwe vandu va Israeli. Na findo efyo firyani indo nkonu wa inu mmbwa kararu uka fyantanyika indo.
Na kingyi-se ni vaka va kunu kweru vaangu valelwaawuta muu. Mmbo valefika kulya mbangeny elyi ngama nraasi.
Nta valakooye-fo mwiili wa Yesu. Vakasha veshambaa ni vasu va Iruva vavakooya-fo vekooraa nawo paa, vakaamba, ‘Eefo na muu.’
Na vandu va kweru maata vakandesaiya alya mmbangeny vakakooya ni indo kyikai shaasa vaka valya vaamba, indi we muni mmballolya-fo.”
Nawe kavavia, “Apaa vandu murung'ani, muvetiri na ngoo tikee shiroo ikusirya na filya fikee firere ni valya veawuya fisuku fyoose.
A nshi indo kivekee kirummbwe Kristo nasonngwe indeliswa ukyiva yelo loose, navekwiiryany neefo usuriny lwakwe?”
Nawe kapookya Mose na valya veawuya fisuku woose kavatambashuya mbony tikee shirere kyakwe ta efo mareiyony moose.
Naasa vakaparikya kulya muriny kundo veshendaa. Nawe kakwaalwa sheelyi akundye yeenda na mbee.
Vakamwiikyima vakaamba, “Kaa kweru mmbee, mashika kwiifo kushilaa.” Nawe kaanga neefo mmba kakaa nawo.
Naasa kyikava elyi akee nawo rembo vashelyaa shonga, nawe keepoo nkate kaana Iruva, kaufisha-fisha fyenga kavaavya.
Nalyo miso awo akaambuka vakamanya mmbwe. Veru, kavaverukya valakillolye-se.
Vakaumburana wo veni na veni vakaamba, “Ate ngoo teru nteekeyaaka-aka kunu nnang'ani yeeru elyi eefo eereraa neese efo shia elutambashuyaa mbony tilya tikee shireiye?”
Vakakwiipoo saa ilya sheni vakawuya na kulya Yerusalemu. Vakakooya valya ikumi na umwi, vakuumbye ando amwi, na valya vavandami nawo.
Vakakooya veshambaa, “Nkya dede Nndumi annduka kakoora na Simion!”
Nawo llyo valevaongoya mbony tilya ta efo shia na shaasa wo vammanya elyi afisha-fisha nkate ulya.
Naasa veefo vereraa indo we muni kashesalala yoo nnang'ani yaawo. Kavavia, “Kaeny na ufoo!”
Nawo vakamatuka vakatirwa mmbwerei, veeshi ni kirishe kya nndu mfu valolya.
Nalyo kavavia, “A kimaruma mukasavaa indo nkyokyi? Mukavetirwa mmakusaro a nyinyira naambo-kyi?”
Keloleny maako akwa na marende akwa mumanyi mmbwe yeny! Muveshilola mashika kirishe kya nndu mfu nkitiri mwiili nta mafua shaasa mushilollye yeny-fo.
Ekyaamba indo kawoora maako akwe na marende akwe.
Kakooya valandeedima iirikya deny kimaruma kya nsia uvatiri sanda na isongololo. Kavavia, “A ndesa mutiri kindo kyeelya yaa?”
Nalyo vakaniingya kiparwe kya ikunga yookye.
Kawarya kalya velollye.
Naasa kavavia, “Marero alya akwa shilemuvia llya shekee neeni ng'u yaa. Mmbo kyikee kirummbwe kundeinutyo mbony tilya toose tikee shireiye efo uvavasony lwa Mose na Vakisuku na Saburi.”
Nalyo kapooka ivasukuya kya mareiyo.
Kavavia, “Ni indo-da kyikee kireiye Kristo nandelyiswa ukiva na iruka narukeny auka kwa vafu elyi lya nkonu wa kararu.”
Nalyo kundekapwa weele kyikee kya irina lyakwe efo kwa vandu va masanga woose vaalashike efo nriminy vakooye ifwaaywa ulyamari lwawo, kipookya kunu Yerusalemu.
Neeni mukavaany mmbo vakureekyi va mbony eti toose.
Neeny shimurummyaa ekyo kyiledeeryo kyaasa ni Nde kishemoolokyaa kimukaye. Indi yeni kaeny kunu Yerusalemu kutani mwaningwa finya yuuka efo uwe.
Naasa kavauta kulya muriny kavafita kulya shia ya yeenda na Betania. Kaipoo maako akwe kavavikya mbora.
Kyikava elyi eefo avavikyaa mbora kavauka karoswa na efo iruveeu.
Nawo vakawuya na kulya Yerusalemu vatirwa ni nsia mwiingyi.
Vakava vesindaa efo mmba ya Iruva kyeeri kyoose veshaarafumaa Iruva.
Elyo mapookyony llyo Irero eefo. Nawe Irero ekee na Iruva. Nawe Irero ekee Iruva.
Mmbwe ekee na Iruva elyo mapookyony.
Findo fyoose fiifo mmbo filetanwa mmbwe. Nawe kulaore aiyo nkuletanwa kindo nta kimwi kya efyo fikee fitani-fo.
Nawe efo nnang'ani yakwe mfo muu weekai. Nato muu yeto ukava ni sa yeevaiya vandu.
Nayo sa yeyo iifo ivaa efo ireeminy. Na ireema nta lyilaiwarye.
Kweefo nndu alerumwa ni Iruva, na irina lyakwe ni Yohane.
Mmbwe alesha kikee kya ukureeki, navikye sa yeyo ukureeki, naambo vandu woose vakooye ikusirya-u kyeendwa mmbwe.
We muni nshiwe sa-fo, mmbo alesha navikye sa yeyo ukureeki.
Sa yeyo ya dede yeyo imikyaa wo nndu, yo yeefo yeeshaa na kunu ulaniny.
Mmbo alekaa kunu ulaniny, na ulana yelu mmbo luletanwa kyeendwa mmbwe, na ulana yelo nta lulammanyi.
Mmbo alesha na efo kukee kwakwe muni, na yewo va efo kwakwe nta valammbwarye.
Indi yewo vammeembwarya woose kavaniingya ulyimbi lwa yaaluka vana va Iruva, mmbo yewo vakusirye na irina lyakwe.
Mmbo yewo valeirwa kilauka na samu nta kikundyony kya mwiili wa nndu, nta kikundyony kya nndu-fo, mmbo vairwa kyuuka na Iruva.
Nawe Irero kaaluka nndu kakaa kunu kweru, araiye ikiiya vandu na iva wa dede. Neese lukalollya itumbe lyakwe. Nalyo lyikava ni itumbe lya Mwana wa Ngitany auka kwa Nde arye isarya iingyi na dede.
Mmbwe Yohane alemmbikya ukureeki kakapa weele kaamba, “Yeto mmbwe ulya shilemwaamba indi: Ni nndu ashaa yoo numa yakwa nawe ekee mbee yakwa kimmba ni nndu eshisongoye. "
Na elyi atiri fiingyi fikaingiki yese lukava velyimmywa, simbo ikasorywa ni simbo.
Mashika mavavaso nng'u vandu valeniinngywa aendwa ni Mose. Indi ikiiywa ni Iruva na immanya mmbwa dede efyo fikasha fyeendwa ni Yesu Kristo.
Nkwiifo nndu alellollya Iruva-fo. Ni Mwana yeto wa Ngitany, yeto akee ng'undeny ta Nde, mmbwe yeto aleloora Nde.”
Na elu llo ukureeki lwa Yohane, llya meendi Vayuda valeruma vandu vakohani na Valevi vauka kulya Yerusalemu vandemmbesa, " “A yewe ni yewe vi?”
Nawe kaamba paa, nta nalakani, kaamba paa, Yeny nshi we Kristo-fo.
Vakammbesa, “Kwakooya kulaore ni indo, a ndesa ni yewe Elia?” Nawe kaamba, “Yeny nshi we-fo.” “A yewe ni ulya mwaauya fisuku?” Nawe kaalwa, “Ode.”
Naasa vakammbia, “A yewe ni yewe viiny? Mmbo lukunndye luwoni kyeenda yaallwa valya valeluruma. A yewe kumuni mmbo kwaambaye inda kyafo?”
Nawe kaamba, “Yeny ni unyanga lwa nndu shakapa weele kundo kwa kasa shaamba, ‘Oroteny shia ya Nndumi, shaasa mwaauya fisuku ulya Yesaya aambaye.’ “
Na valya vakee varumi mmba efo kwa Vafarisayo.
Vakammbesa, “A nkikyi elyi kwava mwiibatisa vandu kwakooya kulaore kukee Kristo; nta Elia, nta umwi wa Veawuya fisuku?”
Yohane kaallwa kaamba, “Yeny ni mura shabatisa nato. Indi kwiifo mulamwiishi nawe ni efo nnang'ani yaany akai.
We mmbwe asheshaa yoo numa yakwa, na yeny nshimaa shiporomwi nta ngova ta fyaaru fyakwe-fo.” "
Na kundo mbony eti tileutikya ni kulya Betania kwakulya ya Yordani kundo Yohane eebatisyaa.
Na elyi lya ndesi kalollya Yesu eensheyaa kaamba, " “Akakai Ngurana ya Iruva ishiipoo ulyamari lwa ulana.
Yeu mmbwe yeto shilerera kyakwe shaamba, Yoo numa yakwa kwiifo kwiishaa nndu nawe ankooya ishiirya mbee kimmba ni nndu eeshisongoye.
Neeny nnshemwiishi-fo. Indi we naambo namanyike paa efo kwa vandu va Israeli, nkyo kindo shilesheya shibatise na mura.”
Na Yohane kavika ukureeki kaamba, “Mmbo shilollye Mumuyo wa Iruva eeshemoolokyaa akee sha mbeta auka efo iruveeu kasha inkaya.
Neeny nshemwiishi nta-fo. Indi yeto aleshiruma shishebatisa na mura mmbwe aleshivia, ‘Yeto kwallollya Mumuyo wa Iruva ashemoolokyaa nashe inkaya mmbwe yeto mwiibatisa na Mumuyo Mweele.’
Neeny shammellollya, shavikany ukureeki lwakwa shaamba, yeu mmbwe Mwana wa Iruva.”
Naasa elyi lya ndesi Yohane asalalyi-fo lyingyi aryani na vakiloshyony vakwe vavii.
Kavikya Yesu miso elyi eefo ashiraa-u kaamba, “Akakayo Ngurana ya Iruva.”
Naasa valya vakiloshyony valya vavii vamiita eeshaambaa indo vakandelatya Yesu.
Yesu kainduka kavalola elyi vallatya kavavia, “Ekyo mwasia nkyoki?” Nawo vakammbia, “Rabi! Nakyo kwaallwa ni kimwi na llosha. A nkwi kukaa?”
Kavavia, “Kusheyeny, mulole.” Naasa vakeenda vakalolya ando yoo akaa. Vakasinda nawe nkonu ulya piti. Nalyo kyeeri kya saa ikumi kyemfika.
Andrea we mwanamaye wa Simion Petro ni umwi wa valya vavii valeita kilya kyaambawa ni Yohane vakallatya.
Nawe kapooka ilollya mwanamaye muni, we Simion, kammbia, “Lwallollya Mesiya” nakyo kwaallwa ni kimwi na Kristo.
Kanrwaa kwa Yesu. Yesu kallola kaamba, “Yewe ni Simon kukee mwana wa Yohane. Mmbo kushevaangwaa ni Kefa.” " (Nakyo kwaallwa, ni iwe.)
Naasa elyi lya ndesi akunndye ikwiipoo nandefika kulya Galilaya, nalyo kalollya Filipo. Yesu kammbia, " “Shilatya.”
Na Filipo ni nndu wa kulya Betisaida, kulya muriny ulya wa Andrea na Petro.
Filipo kalollya Natanaeli kammbia, “Yeto Mose amwaambaye kanndeiya efo uvavasony na vakisuku vakavemwaamba na inndeiya, akakato lwammeellollya, mmbwe Yesu wa kulya Nasareti, we mwana wa Yosefu.”
Natanaeli kammbia, “A kulya Nasareti kushiidimaa yuuka-fo kindo kisha?” Filipo kammbia, “Oshony kulole!”
Naasa Yesu kalollya Natanaeli eefo ansheyaa, karera kyakwe kaamba, “Akakato nndu akee Mwiisraeli dede, nalalasye nta ntambo efo nriminy.”
Natanaeli kammbia, “A kwakooya inda ishimanya?” Yesu karouwa kammbia, “Kyeeri Filipo nalandekuvaanga kukee rembo alya sindeny ya nkuu ulya llyo shakulollya-te.”
Natanaeli kamwaallwa, “Rabi yewe mmbwe Mwana wa Iruva, yewe mmbwe mangyi ya Israeli.”
Yesu kaallwa kammbia, “Elyi shakuvia mmbo shakulollya kukee rembo sindeny ya nkuu ulya nkyo kimaruma kwakusirya-u indo ndesa? Mmbo kukaa kulollye findo finiini ngeta efyo.”
Nalyo kammbia, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, mmbo mushelollyaa efo iruveeu kurauka na Vasu va Iruva vasherwaa na yooloka vashekaya Mwana yeto wa nndu.”
Nalyo elyi lya nrondo kukaalyikwa walyi kulya Kana ya Galilaya. Na maye wa Yesu kasha nafo.
Na Yesu kavevaangwa-fo ando amwi na vakiloshyony kyakwe.
Naasa mfinyo ukafikya. Maye wa Yesu kammbia, “Mmbakitiri-se mfinyo-fo.”
Yesu kammbia, “Nkyiki kyeru lu vavii nka? Kyeeri kyakwa nkindefika-fo.”
Maye kavia vasero vefurukannya-fo, “Kindo amuvia na kikava-ki kevekitaniny tupu.”
Nafo kweiyo nungu irindaru ta mawe tikee shisimbite-u kisumani na mbuka ya Vayuda yeesamba. Nato wo imwi itiri sha lita iyana indi.
Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Endeishureny nungu yeti mura!” Vakaishura shapu.
Kawuya kavavia, “Ulaalu raany-fo kinnywa mundekirwaaya nkara yeto wa shoonga.”

Naasa elyi nkara ulya wa shoonga afika ishosha mura ulya nato wammaluka mfinyo nalamanyi kundo wauka. Vandu vaishi ni valya venfurukanya-u valya varaa mura ulya. Kyasia nkara ulya wa shoonga kavaanga muni walyi.
Kammbia, “Wo nndu apooka yaava mfinnyo yeto nsha. Vandu vakammbuura llyo ashavaa-ny yeto mfwafwa. Ate yewe mmbo kwasuruma mfinyo yeto nsha fika ulaalu.”
Nkyo kindo kyeeora wende kya mbee Yesu aletana kulya Kana ya Galilaya, kaora usuri lwakwe paa na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakautau ikusirya nawe. "
Naasa kyeeri kilya kyaiduva kandesoka na kulya Kapernaumu we muni na maye na vanavamaye na vandu vakiloshyony kyakwe. Nafo vakakaa-fo mikonu myaangu.
Nalyo nkonu ulya nniini wa Vayuda, ulya wa Pasaka, ukee kufii Yesu kanderwa na kulya Yerusalemu."
Nafo efo mmba ya Iruva kakooya-fo valya veekumba ng'umbe na moonri na mbeta na valya vealasha fesa vakee-fo rembo.
Nawe kasongosia kyeelashwa aoka na fyoove. Kavaumbuta efo mmba ya Iruva ando amwi na moonri na ng'umbe tilya tawo. Na fesa ta valya vealasha katipusuya si, na ifullwa mesa tawo.
Kavia na valya veekumba mbeta, “Ipoony-fo findo efi muute yaa! Nta mulaallwe mmba ya Iruva ive mmba yekapya mbusha!”
Na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakakummbwa kilya kyikee kirere kyeyaamba, “Mmbo shavavyo nriminy kimaruma kya mmba yafo.”
Naasa Vayuda vakaallwa vakammbia, “A ni wende-ki kwiifo kulwoora elyi kwakara itana indo?”
Yesu karouwa kavavia, “Fisheny mmba yei ya Iruva, neeny shiiseleese lyingyi ando a mikonu iraru shimaa piny.”
Naasa Vayuda vakaamba, “A elyi kwammiira-u myaaka makumi aana na irindaru mmba yei ya Iruva ikatana yasia, na yewe kwiiseleese lyingyi ando a mikonu iraru kumaa?” "
Indi we mmbo alerera kya mwiili wakwe ukee mmba ya Iruva.
Naasa llya meendi aleruka auka kwa vafu llyo valya vakiloshyony vakwe valekummbwa kilya aleamba. Nalyo vakakooya ikusirya na efyo fikee fireiye na kirero kilya Yesu alevavia.
Naasa kyeeri kilya ekee kulya Yerusalemu nkonu ulya nniini wa Pasaka, veengyi vakapooka ikusirya na irina lyakwe valollye filya fya wende atana.
Indi Yesu we muni nalakunde ikoora kwawo, kimmba avaishi shore woose,
Nalatiri kisunundyo na nndu kyeemanya mbony ta vandu-fo, mashika we muni eeshi efyo fikee nnang'ani ya nndu. "
Nalyo kweefo nndu Mfarisayo eevangwaa Nikodemu akee nndu wa nrwe wa Vayuda.
Nawe kansheya elyi kio kammbia, “Llosha lwiishi mmbo kukee llosha kuukye kwa Iruva muni, mashika kulaiyo nndu ashiidimaa itana efyo fya wende kwatana yewe kwakooya kulaore Iruva akee nawe.”
Yesu kanndouwa kaamba, “Ni dede kya dede shakuvia, kwakooya kulaore nndu ammiirwa lya kavii, nnashewonaa umangi lwa Iruva-fo.”
Nikodemu kammbia, “A niinda nndu ashiirwaa akee mmiku? A ndesa ashiidimaa iwuya efo nsangeny wa maye naveiirwa lyingi?”
Yesu karouwa, “Ni dede kya dede shakuvia, kwakooya kulaore nndu amiirwa auka na mura na Mumuyo nnyashiidimaa yaanga efo umanginy lwa Iruva-fo.
Kindo kyamiirwa kyuuka na mwiili mmbo kyaveva mwiili tupu, na kindo kyamiirwa kyuuka na Mumuyo mmbo kyaveva kya ngata ya Mumuyo.”
Nta kulatambwa elyi shakuvia, Kuti mwiirwa lya kavii.
Uraato mmbo luvivitaa ando lwakukunndya, na unyanga lwa vayo kwavelwiita, kya indi kulaishi kundo lwauka nafo, nta kundo lusheendaa nafo. Naasa, na wo nndu amiirwa auka na Mumuyo akee indo-da.
Nikodemu karouwa kammbia, “A kindo ekyo kyautika inda?”
Yesu karouwa kammbia, “Yewe kukee llosha wa kunu Israeli nta kulaishi mbony yeto?”
Ni dede kya dede shakuvia, “Kindo lwammanya nkyo lwaamba-u paa, na kindo lwallollya nkyo lwakivikya ukureeki. Na ukureeki yelo lweru nta mulaluwarye.
Kwakooya kulaore mwairikya elyi shimuviaa fya urukeny, a ni inda mushiirikyaa shimuviaa fya iruveeu?
Nta nkwiiyo nndu alenrwa na efo iruveeu-fo, kulaore ni ulya aleoloka auka iruveeu, mmbwe Mwana yeto wa nndu.
Na shaasa Mose alerosa shoka ilya kulya kasa, na kya Mwana yeto wa Nndu mmbo kikee kirummbwe naveroswa indo-da,
na wo Nndu akusirye nawe nakooye iwarya muu wa llung'anu.”
Iruva mmbo eekunndye ulana karuma Mwana wakwe wa ngitany naambo wo nndu akusirye nawe nalakooye ireka kyeendi nawoni muu wa llung'anu.

Sha mashika kimaruma Iruva karuma mwana wakwe nashe na kunu ulaniny, nshi anruma nashe yuutya ulana yelu uvingo-fo. Nndu kalema ikusirya nawe, we ammaa iwona uvingo kimmba anra nalakusirya na irina lya mwana wa Iruva wa ngitany.
Nndu akusirye nawe nnasheonaa uvingo-fo. Nndu kalema ikusirya nawe, we ammaa iwona uvingo, kimmba anra nalakusirya na irina lya Mwana wa Iruva wa ngitany.
Na iwona uvingo lyikava indi, ni sa ilesha ulaniny, vandu vakakunda ireema ngota sa. Mashika filya vatanyi mmbo fyekee fikasha.
Mashika wo nndu atannyi fya uravi mmbo asuuye sa nta nnashaa na seny-fo, naambo filya atannyi filakooye iparwa paa.
Indi wo nndu atanyi fya dede mmbo asha na seny, naambo filya atannyi fimanyike paa, mmbo fyatanwa akutiri na Iruva.
Naasa Yesu kaenda kulya urukeny lwa Yudaya aryani na valya vakiloshony kyakwe. Kasinda-fo nawo. Kava mwiibatisa vandu.
Na Yohane nawe-da eefo eebatisaa vandu kulya Ainoni kufii na Salimu, kimmba kweefo mura mwiingi. Vandu vakasha nafo ishebatiswa.
Mashika Yohane nalandeerwa kifingyony-fo.
Nalyo kukakwiipoo ulai lwa vakiloshyony kya Yohane na nndu Myuda kimaruma kya mbony ta isamba.
Vakasha na kulya Yohane akai, vakammbia, “Ulya ekee neewe kulya kwa kulya ya Yordani ulya kulemmbikya ukureeki, akakato ee-fo abatisaa na vandu woose vakamweengya.”
Na Yohane kaallwa kaamba, “Nkwiifo nndu ashiidima itira kindo kulaore ankiniingwa kyuuka efo iruveeu-fo.
Neeni muveni mukavaany vakureeki mwiitye kilya shileamba, yeny nshiwe Kristo-fo, mmbo shikee nrumi shive nsongoru wakwe.
Yeto arie nka mwaalikwa mmbwe muni walyi. Indi mbuya yeyo ya muni walyi, yeto akee nawe mmbo afuraa ashiita unyanga lwakwe. Naasa nto nsia wakwa ushitiri, nato wamiishwa shapu.
We kuti neende ang'anaa neeny kuti sheende shiinnyaa.”
Yeto asheye auka uwe mmbwe akee uwe ya woose. Na yeto aparikye kunu ulaniny kaveva wa kunu ulana, kaverera fya kyuulana. Na yeto asheye auka efo iruveeu, mmbwe akee uwe ya woose.
Nawe mbony yeto alollye na itiita nto ativikya ukureeki, na ukureki lwakwe kulakae-fo nndu alwiirikya.
Yeto amiirikya ukureeki lwakwe mmbwe avikya Iruva ukureeki sheelyi mmbo akee wa dede.
Mashika yeto alerumwa ni Iruva mmbo areraa marero a Iruva. Mashika Iruva nnyaniingyaa Mumuyo esheesyaa-fo.
Nawe Nde mmbo akunndye Mwana, nawe mmbo anrambikye findo fyoose efo maakony akwe.
Na nndu akusirye na Mwana yeto, mmbwe awarya muu wa llung'anu. Na nndu anra nalairikya mwana yeto nnyasheonaa muu-fo, we ni unyafi lwa Iruva lunkaye.
Naasa Yesu eekimanya Vafarisayo vamiita we mmbwe akee iwonisa vakiloshyony veengyi na ibatisa vandu veengyi ngota Yohane.
(Kya indi lyo Yesu we muni nnyalebatisa vandu-fo, ni valya vakiloshony kyakwe).
Kooka kulya Yudaya kawara shia kaenda lyingyi kulya Galilaya.
Naasa kalollya kuti naire shia yeerummbwa kulya Samaria.
Naasa kafika muriny umwi wa kulya Samaria uvaangwaa ni Sikari ukee kufii na irema llya Yakobo aleniinga mwana ulya wakwe Yosefu.
Nafo kweifo usoka llwa lwa Yakobo. Naasa Yesu kakooya amaariswa nkyaaro kakaa-u rembo indo yoo usokeny, kyeeri mwi usimbiki.
Kukasha nafo nndu nka wa Kisamaria isheraa mura. Yesu kammbia, “Shirita mura shini.”
Mashika valya vakiloshyony kyakwe veengye kulya murin vanderuuya-fo shoonga.
Nka ulya wa Kisamaria kammbia, “Kyavaany inda yewe nndu wa Kiyuda kwashitereva mura neeny shikee nka wa Kisamaria? Nyeeli Vayuda kulaore veshiidikiranaa na Vasamaria.”
Yesu kaallwa kammbia, “Kwee kweeshi simbo ya Iruva iifo, na nndu yeto akuvia, shirita mura shini, kukooye kweemwiishi mmbo kweenterevaa nawe eekuniingaa mura utiri muu.”
Nka ulya kammbia, “Nndumi, a elyi kulatiri nta kindo kyeeraa mura na kirori eki kya mura kyoolokye si, nkwi kwauta mura yeto utiri muu?
A mmbo kukee nniini kwairya nde ulya weeru Yakobo, yeto aleluniinga kirori eki kya mura? Nawe nng'u aleva mwiina mura we muni na vana vakwe na findo fyakwe amasye.”
Yesu kaallwa kammbia, “Wo nndu ana mura yeu mmbo awuyaa yaakuka-se.
Indi nndu kana mura yeto shinningaa yeny nnyakyaakukaa-se-fo na kafika llung'anu. Indi mura yeto nshenniinga efo nnang'ani yakwe mmbo ushaalukaa usoka lwa mura wiishwe muu wa llung'anu.”
Nka ulya kammbia, “Woi Nndumi shiniingaany mura yeto, shilakooye itirwa nnyura nta ikwaarisa isha iraa mura kunu.”
Nawe kammbia, “Endevaanga mmi wafo kuwuye na yaa!”
Nka ulya kaallwa kaambia, “Nshitiri mmi-fo.” Yesu kammbia, “Mmbo kwaamba songosiny, elyi kwaamba, Nkutiri mmi-fo.
Mashika kweeriwa mmbomi varaanu na yeu akurie ulaalu nshiwe mmi wafo-fo. Elyi kwaamba indo ni kya dede.”
Nka ulya kammbia, “Nndumi shilollye mmbo kukee nndu nkisuku.
A vande valya veru mmbo valeindya Iruva kunu ifumbuny elyi. Neeni mukaamba, kulya Yerusalemu mfo kundo kusumani iindya Iruva.”
Yesu kammbia, “Nka shiirikya. Mmbo kukaa kushe kyeeri mulasheindyaa Nde kunu ifumbuny elyi ao nta kulya Yerusalemu.
Yeni mmbo mwiindyaa kindo mulakiishi, neese lukaindya kindo lukiishi. Kimmba efo kwa Vayuda mfo kundo kuukye ukiro lwa vandu.
Kya indi kukaa kushe kyeeri naakwa na ulaalu kiveefo-da, elyi veindya Nde va toki vashemwiindyaa kikee kya ngata ya Mumuyo kiveva kya dede. Mashika Nde mmbo akee iruuya vemwiindya va ngata yeyo.
Iruva mmbo akee wa ngata ya Mumuyo na yewo vamwiindyaa nkuti vamwiindye kikee kya Mumuyo kiveva kya dede.”
Naasa nka ulya kammbia, “Shiishi mmbo kusheshaa Mesiya yeto avaangwa ni Kristo. Nawe meendi asheshaa mmbo ashelwoongoyaa findo efyo fyoose shaasa fikai.”
Yesu kammbia, “Yeny sharera neewe mmbwe yeto.”
Naasa kikeeny yoo, nalyo valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakasha vakasongololo elyi vakooya ereraa na nndu nka. Indi kulakae-fo nndu ammbesa nkikyi kwasia kwakwe ao nkikyi kwarera nawe.
Naasa nka ulya katiiya-u nungu ilya yakwe. Kaenda kulya muriny, kandevia vandu,
“Oshony mushelola nndu ashoongoya findo shitannyi fyoose. Kulakooye mmbwe Kristo ndesa?”
Vakakwiipoo vauka kulya muriny vakamweengya.
Kikeeny yoo nnang'ani yeu, valya vakiloshyony vakantereva vakaamba, “Llosha lyaan-te!”
Nawe kavavia, “Yeny shitiri shoonga yeelya yeni mulaiishi.”
Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakaviana, “A mmbo kwiifo nndu ammweenngye kindo kyeelya ndesa?”
Yesu kavavia, “Indetana kindo kikundywa ni yeto aleshiruma na indeinutya mashora akwe nkyo kyava shoonga yakwa.
A yeni nshi mwaamba kusaa-u miiri iina kufike yoo mailullyony? Manyiny kindo shamuvia, ‘Ipoony miso mulole, marema shaasa avereye yuululwa.’
Mwiilula ni ulaalu-da aifo awarya isina lyakwe na yuumbya fimu fyeendesanyirya efo muuny wa llung'anu. Na yeto mweera mbeu kusande na yeto mwiilula vafure kimwi.
Mashika kyaaso kilya ni yoo kyamanyikya mmbo kilererwa dede kyeamba, ‘Mweera mbeu ni ungyi na mwiilula kava ungi’.
Yeny mmbo shamuruma mundeilula kindo mulavinnyi. Ni vengyi vavinnyi-u neeni mukandesandwa neewo vavinnyi-u.”
Naasa vandu va Samaria veengyi vakapooka ikusirya nawe kimaruma kya marero a nka ulya elyi avika ukureeki ashaambaa, “Ashoongoya fyoose shaasa shiletana.”
Naasa elyi Vasamaria vafika kulya akai vakantereva nakae nawo. Kakaa-fo ando a mikonu ivii.
Nalyo veengyi kilanya vakapooka ikusirya nawe kimaruma kya ndera yakwe.
Vakavia nka ulya, “Kyaluniinga lukakusirya-u nshi kilya kwaambau yewe-fo. Mmbo lwamiita luveni lukamanya yeu mmbwe dede Nkira wa ulana.”
Naasany kwemiira-u mikonu ivii, kakwiipoo-fo kandefika kulya Galilaya.
Mashika Yesu muni alekureeka-u kyeamba, “Nndu nkisuku nshi efo urukeny lwakwe akooya iindywa-fo.”
Naasa elyi afika kulya Galilaya vandu va Galilaya vakammbwarya valollye fyoose shaasa aletana kulya Yerusalemu nkonu ulya nniini. Mashika nawo-da vesheye nafo kya nkonu ulya nniini.
Naasa kavefika-se kulya Kana ya Galilaya kulya aleallwa mura ulya ukava mfinyo. Naasa kweefo nndu umwi nshilyi eetiri mwana wakwe wa kyuumi elwee kulya Kapernaumu.
Nawe elyi amiita mbony ta Yesu ansha na kulya Galilaya auka kulya Yudaya, kawara shia yeenda kafika kulya akai. Kantereva nandesoka nafo, nakire mwana ulya wakwe; mashika ekee rengeny yefwa.
Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Kwakooya kulaore mwalollya ngyende na findo filandelollyo lyingi, mmushekusiryaa-u-fo?”
Nndu ulya nshilyi kammbia, “Woi Nndumi, soka-dwa, mwana ulya wakwa kulaore annutuka.”
Yesu kammbia, “Kweenngye-da, mwana wafo eefo na muu.” Naasa, nndu ulya kakusirya na kirero kilya Yesu ammbia, kavekweengya.
Arie shia yeenda na kyeny, mashinga akwe akasha imwaammbya, akaamba, “Mwana wafo eefo na muu.”
Naasa kavasununda kyeeri alepooka iva ng'waana. Vakammbia, “Ni ukwau kumfika saa mfungare, llyo muro ulya ulemmbuka.”
Naasa nndu ulya kamanya ni sa ilya sheni llya Yesu alemmbia, “Mwana wafo eefo na muu.” Kava nndu akusirye-u, na va kyeny kwakwe woose.
Nakyo nkyo kindo kya wende kya kavii Yesu aleengera itana llya aleuka Yudaya kasha na kulya Galilaya.
Elyi numa kukafika nkonu ulya nniini wa Vayuda Yesu kanderwa na kulya Yerusalemu.
Naasa kulya Yerusalemu, yoo kufii na Ngiri ya Moonri kweifo iruva lyivaangwa irina lya vayo lya Kiebrania ni Betsata. Nalyo lyitiri matengo araanu a uraa.
Nafo mfo kundo kukee kwaare nsemu mwiingyi wa vandu valwee na vafu-miso, na miketekete, na fitongororo. [Nawo vakava veevereya mura ulya usarywa.
Mashika kwifo kyeeri nsu wa Iruva ashoolokaa efo iruveny kasarya mura ulya. Naasa nndu ansongwa yooloka-fo elyi mura wansarywa-sarywa, kaveshia, na ndwari yakwe intiri na ikava-ki.]
Naasa kweifo nndu emaye-fo myaaka makumi araru na nyanya eeserikaa na ndwari yakwe.
Nndu ulya Yesu kallollya elele-fo, kamanya emaye-fo fyeeri fyaasha. Kammbia, “Kukundye ishia?”
Nndu ulya alwee kamwaallwa, “Nndumi nshitiri nndu ashoolotaa efo iruveny elyi mura wasarywa-fo. Mashika elyi shiifo nshoolokaa, nndu ungyi kaveshiirya mbee yooloka-fo.”
Yesu kammbia, “Kwiipoo, kurike kitara kyafo kukweengye.”
Nalyo nndu ulya kava nsha deny, kaipoo kitara kyakwe, kakweengya. Naasa nkonu ulya wekee wa Sabato.
Naasa Vayuda vakavia nndu yeu amishia, “Inu ni Sabato-te, nkutiri muumu weekurika kitara-fo.”
Kavarouwa, “Ni nndu yeto ashishiisa mmbwe ashivia, kurike kitara kyafo kukweengye.”
Vakammbesa, “A ni vi nndu yeto akuvia kurike kitara kukweengye?” "
Naasa nndu ulya eelwee nalamanyi mmbwe-vi, kimmba Yesu enrekya efo vanduny valya vakuumbyeu nkuka.
Naasa elyi numa Yesu kankooya akee efo mmba ya Iruva kammbia, " “Lla-te, kwammishia-ny. Nta kulalyamare-se-fo kukooye iwoywa nkindo kikasha mmwasi yeekyo.”
Naasa nndu ulya kakweengya kandevia Vayuda ni Yesu anshiisa.
Nakyo kyikaniinga Vayuda vakatira kisuuya nawe mashika elyi aleva mwiitana indo nkonu wa Sabato.
Nawe kavaalwa, “Nde-yaakwa aifo arundaa kafika ulaalu, neeny shivee-fo shirundaa-da.”
Naasa nkyo kimaruma Vayuda vakaengera iruuya mwaanya weembwaa, nshi kimaruma kya iimmbwa Sabato-fo, ni elyi aamba Iruva ni ndeye muni kakwiinanisa na Iruva.

Naasa Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, We mwana nnyamanyaa itana kindo kikee kya shila yakwe muni, kulaore ni ekyo alollya Nde etanaa-fo. Mashika we kindo atana na mwana nakyo kavekitana indo-da.
Mashika Nde akunndye Mwana kamoora fyoose atana we muni. Nawe ashemooraa fyeetana finiini kilanya ya efyo, neeni mukooye itambwa.
Mashika Nde aruta vafu kavaallwa va muu.
Mashika Nde nta nnyarummbwaa mwaandu wa nndu-fo, mmbo aniinngye Mwana ushilyi loose lweerummbwa mwaandu wa vandu.
Naambo woose vainndye Mwana shaasa vashiindyaa Nde. Yeto ara nalainndya Mwana mmbo ara nalainndya Nde alenruma.”
Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, “Nndu asharanyaa ndera yakwa kavekusirya na yeto aleshiruma, mmbwe ammbwarya muu wa llung'anu, nta nnashiitwaa mwaandun-fo. Mmbo ammbuka ufuny; kandeanga muuny.
Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, kukaa kushe kyeeri, naakwa ni ulaalu kiveefo-da elyi vafu vasheetaa unyanga lwa Mwana wa Iruva na yewo vamiita vawonise muu.
Mashika shaasa Nde atiri muu ummya efo kwakwe niindo-da aleniinga na Mwana itira muu ummya efo nnang'ani yakwe.
Kavenniinga na ushilyi lweerummbwa mwaandu kimmba akee Mwana wa Nndu.
Nta mulatambwa kya ekyo. Mashika kukaa kushe kyeeri elyi yewo valele efo fifuny vasheitaa unyanga lwakwe woose.
Nawo vashekwiipoo-fo, yewo vatanyi mesha varuke vawonise muu. Na yewo vatannyi makasha varuke vawonise mwaandu.”

“Yeny nshishiidimaa itana kindo kikee kya shila yakwa shimuni-fo. Mmbo sharummbwa kikwaani na ekyo shamiita, na ekyo sharummbwa kikava kya usumanu. Mashika kindo mmballyaa nakyo nshi yekyo kikundywa ni yeny-fo, ni ekyo kikundywa ni yeto aleshiruma.
Kwakooya shavika ukureeki kyakwa shimuni, ukureeki lwakwa nshi lwa dede-fo.
Indi yeto ashivikya ukureeki ni ungi. Neeny shiishi ukureeki yelu akureekye kyakwa ni lwa dede.
Mmbo muleruma vandu kulya kwa Yohane muveni. Nawe kakureekya dede yeyo.
Neeny nta nshiwaryaa ukureeki luuka kwa vandu-fo, mmbo shaamba-u ekyo naambo yeni mukooye ikirwa.
Ulya mmbo akee sha taa yaatwa ikamika, Neeni mukakyesa na sa yakwe ando a kivero.

Indi yeny ukureeki lwakwa shitiri ni uniini lukailanya lulya lwa Yohane, kimmba mashora Nde aleshiniinga naambo shaainutye nng'u yoo meni shiifo nndundaa. Nang'u akava nng'u ukureeki lwakwa kyeamba ni Nde aleshiruma.
Nawe Nde aleshiruma kaveshivikya ukureeki we muni. Neeni unyanga lwakwe nta mulandelwiite nta lyimwi-fo nta fwana yakwe mulandelollye-fo.
Na ndera yeyo yakwe nta mulandeitire mukakaa nayo efo nrimin-fo, mashika yeto alenruma mulakunde ikusirya nawe.
Mmbo mwava vesununda-sununda mareiyo kimmba mwiishi mmbo mushuutaa-u iwonisa-fo muu wa llung'anu nang'u ashivikye ukureeki.
Neeni nta mulakunde ikusheya na kwakwa naambo muwoni muu.”
“Nshiwaryaa nnduma wuuka na vandu-fo.
Indi yeni shammumanya nshi mukee na ukundi lwa Iruva efo nriminy-fo.
Yeny mmbo shisheye kyikee kya irina lya Nde-yaakwa, nta mulashiwarye, kyeendi kwakooya ungyi asha kyikee kya irina lyakwe muni, we mushemmbwaryaa.
A niinda mushewonisaa mwaanya weekusirya-u mummbe vandu vevikyana nnduma muveni na veni nta mulalalakyaa iwonisa nnduma wuuka kwa yeto akee Iruva muni?
Nta mulakusare mmbo shikunndye imukumba efo kwa Nde-fo, kwiifo yeto amukumba, mmbwe Mose yeto mummbikye nsia yeni.
Mashika kwee mweekusirye na Mose, mmbo mweevekusiryaa neeny kimmba we areiye kya ishyaambya.
Indi kwakooya kulaore mwakusirya na mareiyo yoo akwe, ni inda mushekusiryaa na marero akwa?”
Na elyi numa Yesu kakwiipoo-fo kafika kulya kwa kulya ya yeeve ilya ya Galilaya nayo nnyo Tiberia.
Na vandu vakansora nseemu mwiingyi mashika velollya filya fya wende atana fyeekira vandu valwee.
Naasa Yesu kasaama na efo ifumbuny, kakaa-fo rembo. Na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe varyani nawe.
Naasa na nkonu ulya nniini wa Vayuda, ulya wa pasaka, ukee kufii.
Yesu kainwa miso, kalollya vandu vansheya nseemu mwiingyi kavia Filipo, “A kundo lushuuraa mikate, vandu yeva vawoni kindo kyeelya nkwi?”
Karera indo kikee kya imweesa. Shamashika we muni eeshi ninsha kindo akunndye itana.
Filipo kamwaallwa, “Mikate ya dinari mayana avii nnyimaa wo nndu naoni kipereshu tupu-fo.”
Na umwi wa valya vakiloshyony kyakwe we Andrea ekee mwanamaye wa Simion Petro kammbia,
“Kwiiyo mwana wa womi yaa atiri mikate iraanu ya nganu shuu na makunga avii.”
Indi findo efi fifwanaa kwi vandu vammiingifwa indo? Yesu kaamba, “Vikeny vandu rembo.” Na alya vekai weekee mooro mwiingyi wa mare. Naasa womi valya vakakaa rembo vafikye fiku firaanu.
Naasa Yesu kawarya mikate ilya iraanu kaana Iruva. Kaavya vandu valya vakwaallye si. Na makunga alya kavevaavya shaasa vakunndye.
Naasa elyi vammbuura kavia valya va kiloshyony vakwe, “Enderorweny fipereshu efyo fisaa-u, mulare nta kindo kirekye-si.”
Vakanderorwa vakaishura mikusha ikumi na ivii, fipereshu fya mikate ilya iraanu, filya fyasaa elyi vammaa ilya.
Naasa vandu valya veekilolya ekyo kya wende atana, vakaamba, “Ate ni dede we mmbwe mwauya fisuku ulya akee nteerye nashe kunu ulaniny.”
Naasa Yesu kamanya vakundye isha imwipoo vamwallwe mangyi, nawe koovya kandesaama lyingyi neefo ifumbuny we muni.
Naasa elyi kwamfika iila, valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakandesoka na alya mbaambaa ya yeeve ilya.
Vakasaama neefo ngalaveny, varuuke veende na kulya Kapernaumu. Naasa ireema lyikooloka na Yesu nalandefika kundo vekai.
Na yeve ikaalukaluka kyeendwa ni uraato uniini.
Naasa elyi vanrwa ngalava ilya na mbee ando alyaa sha kilometa isaanu ao irindaru indi nalyo vakalollya Yesu asheendaa yoo uwe ya yeve amfika kufii na ngalava ilya. Nawo vakatirwa mmbweerei.
Naawe kavavia, “Ni yen-te, mulairyae-fo.”
Naasa vakakunda insaamisa efo ngalaveny. Vakakooya ngalava yamfika alya waambeu kulya vasheendaa nafo.

Naasa elyi lya ndesi nsemu ulya wa vandu valya valerewa vasalalyi kulya kwa kulya ya yeve ilya, vakalollya nkwiifo-se ngalava ingyi-fo kuuta ilya imwi yeefo, na Yesu nalandesanga na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe mmbo valeenda wo veni.
Naasa vakakooya kwansha nafo ngalava tingyi tuuka kulya Tiberia tikashefika kufii na alya valelyiiya mikate kyeeri Nndumi aleana Iruva.
Naasa mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu elyi valollya Yesu nalaiyo nta vakiloshyony kyakwe, vakasaama ngalaveny, vakafika kulya Kapernaumu vanderuuya-fo Yesu.
Vakakooya ammaa iruuka kafika taari ilya ingyi ya yeve, vakammbia, “Llosha a ni indii-da kwafika kunu.”
Yesu kaalwa kaamba, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, kyaniinga mukasheshiruuya nshi mashika a ngyende tilya mulelollya-fo, ni kimaruma kya mikate ilya mulelya mukawuura.
Nta mulavinnyi shoonga yeyo ikaa ipwaa, vinnyiny shooka yeyo ya muu wa llung'anu. Nayo ni Mwana yeto wa nndu ashemuniingaa. Mmbwe Nde, we Iruva alemmbikya kiringisyo namanyike mmbwa dede.”
Naasa vakammbia, “A mmbo lutanaa inda lukooye itana mashora yoo a Iruva?”
Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Ishora elyo lya Iruva llyo elyi, ni ikusirya na yeto alenruma.”
Naasa vakammbia, “A nkyo kyi kutanaa kyeeloora wende neese lukilollye lukooye ikusirya neewe? A ni ishora-ki kwatana?
Vande valya veru mmbo valelya mana kulya kasa shaasa kikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Alevaniinga nkate wuuka efo iruveeu.’ “
Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, nshi Mose alemuniinga nkate yeto wuuka iruveeu-fo, mmbwe Nde-yaakwa amuniinga nkate yeto wuuka efo iruveeu ukee wa dede.
Mashika nkate wa Iruva nto yeto wooloka wuuka iruveeu ukaniinga ulana yelu muu.”
Naasa vakammbia, “Nndumi kyeluniinge nkate yeto kyeeri kyoose!”
Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Yeny mmbwe nkate yeto wa muu! Nndu akusheya na kwakwa nnakitirwaa nshaa-se-fo. Na nndu kakusirya kwakwa nnatirwaa nyura-se-fo.”
Indi mmbo shamuvia, “Ilollya mwanshilollya nta mulaute-u ikusirya-fo.”
Ekyo Nde anshiniinga nkyo kikusheyaa na kwakwa, Na nndu ankusheya na kwakwa nshishemweeraa poo-fo.
Mashika kyashiniinga shooloka na kunu si, nshi ishetana kindo shikunndye shimuni-fo, ni kindo kikundywa ni yeto aleshiruma.
Na kindo kikundywa ni yeto aleshiruma nkyo ekyi, Woose Nde aleshiniinga naambo shilarete-u nta umwi, indi shinndute nkonu yeto weefurumya.
Mashika kindo kikunndywa ni Nde-yaakwa kikee indi, Wo nndu alola Mwana na ikusirya nawe, nawarye muu wa llung'anu na yeny nkaa shinndute nkonu yeto weefurumya.
Naasa Vayuda vakarininda kyakwe mashika elyi aamba, “Yeny mmbwe nkate yeto uleoloka wuuka iruveeu.”
Vakaamba, “A yeu nshi Yesu, we mwana wa Yosefu, a mmbo lulaishi ndeye na maye? Kyavaany inda elyi aamba mmbo aolokye auka iruveeu?”
Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Nta mulakae murinindaa muveni na veni.
Nkwiifo nndu aidima ifika kwakwa kulaore ni Nde yeto aleshiruma amwoommwa nafo-fo, neeny nkaa shinndute nkonu yeto wa ifurumya.”
Mmbo kikee kireiye efo fitabuny fya vakisuku kyeamba, nawo woose vakaa vave vafunde ni Iruva. Naasa, wo nndu amaarannya kyuuka na Nde na ikulosha mmbo ashaa na kwakwa-da.
Nshi kikee sheelyi kwiifo nndu alollye Nde-fo, kulaore ni yeto aparikye efo kwa Iruva, mmbwe alollye Nde.
Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, Yeto akusirye-u mmbo ammbwarya muu wa llung'anu.
Yeny mmbwe nkate yeto wa muu.
Vandeye valya vany mmbo valelya manna kulya kasa vakavefwa.
Indi nkate yeto shaamba nto woolokye wuuka efo iruveeu, naambo vandu vaulye valakikooye-se ifwa.
Yeny mmbwe nkate wa muu yeto uleoloka wuuka iruveeu. Na nkate yeto kwakooya nndu aulya nnyashefwaa-fo. Na nkate yeto shinsimbaa ni mwiili wakwa shyoonisye nato ulana yelu muu.
Naasa Vayuda vakava vallyaa ulai wo veni na veni vakaamba, A ni inda ashiidimaa ilusimba mwiili wakwe luulye?
Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, kwakooya kulaore mwalya mwiili wa Mwana yeto wa nndu na ina samu yakwe nta mmukaa na muu efo nnang'ani yaany-fo.
Nndu kalya mwiili wakwa na ina samu yakwa mmbo awaryaa muu wa llung'anu, neeny nkaa shindute nkonu yeto weefurumya.
Mashika mwiili wakwa nto kyeelya kya dede, na samu yakwa nnyo kyeena kya dede.
Na nndu kalya mwiili wakwa kavena na samu yakwa mmbo akaa asangyi neeny, neeny nkaa nsangyi nawe.
Kikava shaasa Nde yeto aleshiruma akee muni muu, neen shakaa na muu kimaruma kya Nde, nakiwo-da yeto ashilya akaa na muu kimaruma kyakwa.
Eto nto nkate uleoloka uuka efo iruveeu, nta ulakee wa ngata imwi na ulya vande valya veru valelya vakavefwa. Indi nkate yeto, nndu kaulya mmbo alung'anaa ikaa na muu.
Na kundo aleamba marero yoo ni kulya mmba yeeterevya ya kulya Kapernaumu eeloshyaa-fo.”
Naasa vandu veengyi nnang'ani ya valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vekiita indo vakaamba, “Marero yoo mmoomu-te, A nndu ashiidimaa yaairanya mmbii?”
Naasa Yesu kamanya we muni efo nriminy valya vakiloshyony mmbo veefo varininda kya ekyo. Nalyo kavavia, “A ekyo mmbo kyamuviiya nsindara?
A kishevaany inda kwakooya mushelollya Mwana yeto wa nndu eesherwaa na uuwe efo ekee elyo mbee?”
Mumuyo nto uningaa muu. Mwiili mmbumaa kindo-fo. Na marero yoo yeny shammeemuvia, nng'u a ngata ya Mumuyo akaveva a muu.
Indi kunu nnang'ani yaany kwiifo maata valakusirye-u. Nyeli uka elyo mbee Yesu eeshi vandu valakusirye-u mmbo vangava, nndu ashenndiingyaa ni ungau.
Nalyo kaamba, “Nkyo kimaruma shamuvia, Nkwiifo nndu eedima ifika kwakwa kulaore ni yeto ammbonisywa mwaanya ni Nde wakwa-fo.”
Naasa llyo vandu va efo kiloshyony veengyi valepooka iwuya na numa valakivandami-se nawe.
Naasa Yesu kavia valya ikumi na vavii, “A mmbo mukunndye ikweengya na yeni-da?”
Naasa Simion Petro kamwaallwa, “Lweende kwa vi Nndumi? Mmbo kutiri marero aende muu wa llung'anu.
Neese lwankusirya neewe, lukamanya yewe mmbo kukee yeto Mweele wa Iruva.”
Yesu karouwa, “A nshi yeny shimuni shilemukusauya yeni ikumi na vavii? Na efo nnang'ani yaany umwi kawuya iva mmbishwa?”
Naasa karera indo kya Yuda Iskariote akee mwana wa Simion. Mashika mmbwe aleva nndu yeto alenndiingya nawe ni umwi wa valya ikumi na vavii.
Naasa numa ya vayo Yesu kava mwiireera kulya Galilaya, Nyeeli nalekunndye iireera kulya Yudaya mashika elyi Vayuda vesiaa immbwaa.
Na mikonu ilya miniini lya Vayuda ikee kufii, ilya yeemanya matengo.
Naasa vanavamaye vakammbia, “Wara shia kwakwiipoo kunu kundefika kulya Yerusalemu, na vakiloshyony vafo nawo-da vakooye ilola mashora yoo afo kwatana.
Mashika nkwiifo nndu atana kindo kirika kakunda nawe amanyike urukeny-fo. Kwakooya mmbo kwakunda itana mashora a ngata yeyo, enda kooreny na va ulana-te.”
Mashika naakwa ni vanavamaye mmbalemwiirikya-fo.
Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Kyeeri kyakwa nkyalefika-fo. Indi yeni kyeeri kyany mmbo kiifo nkonu simu.
Nta ulana llushiidimaa imusua yeni-fo Mmbo lushisuuye yeny mashika a ukureeki lwakwa shivikye kimaruma kya vayo shaamba, mashora a vayo mmeesi.
Kweengyeny yeni mundelya suku-kuu. Yeny nshiderwaa nafo indelya suku-kuu-fo, kimmba kyeeri kyakwa kilandefika.”
Amaamba indo, kakukaya kulya Galilaya.
Naasa elyi vanavamaye vameenda irwa nafo kya mikonu ilya miniini iifo, nalyo we muni nawe-da kanderwa nafo kirika.
Naasa Vayuda vakava vannduuya elyi lya mikonu ilya miniini. Vakaamba, “A we nkwi akai?”
Nalyo efo vanduny valya vasasangi-fo nkuka kukakaa-fo kusu-kusu shiniini kimaruma kyakwe. Valya maata vakaamba, “Mmbo akee nndu nsha, maata vakaamba, Ode, mmbo aretaa vandu.”
Kikeeny indo lyo kulakae-fo nndu arera kyakwe paa-fo, kimaruma kyairyaa Vayuda.
Naasa mikonu ilya miniini yamfika yoo nnang'ani kavii, Yesu karwa na efo mmba ya Iruva kaloshya-fo.
Naasa Vayuda vakasongololo vakaamba, “A kyavaany inda elyi nndu yeu aishi indo nta nalakee lloshe?”
Naasa Yesu kaallwa kaamba, “Kya ufundo kwakwa nshi lwakwa shimuni-fo ni lwa yeto aleshiruma.
Kwakooya nndu akunda itana ekyo kikundywa mmbwe, mmbo akooyaa imanya kya ufundo yelo lwakwa, kwakooya sharera kyuuka na shila yakwa shimuni.
Yeto mwiirera kyuuka na shila yakwe mmbo asia ando asheng'anisywa we muni. Indi nndu asiiya yeto aleshiruma ando asheng'anisywa mmbwe nndu wa toki, nalakee na findo fya mwiiri nta.
A nshi Mose ammuniingye mavavaso? Na kunu nnang'ani yaany nta umwi aifo atana fya uvavaso yelo-fo. A kimaruma nkikyi elyi mukunndye ishiwaa?”
Vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vakaallwa, “Ako! Kulwee nrwe? A ni vi akunndye ikuwaa?”
Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Mmbo shiletana ishora lyimwi neeni mukasongololo moose.
Mose mmbo amuniinngye nndumwa weerinwa. Nta kilakee ni kwakwe uukye-fo, ni kwa vakuu valya va mbee. Nalyo mukava veerina nndu naakwa ni elyi lya nkonu wa Sabato.
Naasa kwankooya nndu ashewonisaa irinwa elyi lya Sabato, na uvavaso lwa Mose lulakooye ifuluwa, a ni inda mwashitirya unyafi elyi shileallwa nndu moose kava nsha nkonu wa Sabato?
Nta mularummbwe mwaandu kya ilola fisangu. Rummbweny kya usumanu.”
Naasa vandu va kulya Yerusalemu veefo valya maata vakaamba, “Akwa: Nshi we yeto vansia vammbwae?
Nawe akakau aifo areraa paa, valammbie nta kindo. Kulakooye vandu yewo va nrwe ni dede valekooya imanya yeu mmbwe Kristo ndesa?
Kya indi nndu yeu lumwiishi kundo aukye, lyo kyeeri Kristo asheshaa nkushekaa-fo nndu amanyaa kundo ooka nafo-fo.”

Naasa Yesu kaonisa unyanga eeloshaa efo mmba ya Iruva kaamba, “Ee-da na muveshiishi na kundo shuukye nafo muveishi-da. Neeny nta nshisheye kikee kya shila yakwa shimuni-fo. Mmbo kwiifo wa dede aleshiruma, nawe nta mulamwiishi yeni.
Yeny mmbo shimwiishi kimmba ni efo kwakwe shyuukye. Nawe mmbwe ashirummyi.”
Naasa vakava vasiaany mwaanya weentira, nta kulakae-fo nndu amooroya woko; mashika kyeeri kyakwe nkyemfika-fo.
Naasa efo mamwiinginy wa vandu veengyi vakauta-u ikusirya nawe. Vakaamba, “Kyeeri Kristo asheshaa mmbo asheengeraa itana fya ngyende fiingyi ngota efyo nndu yeu aletana?”
Naasa Vafarisayo vakaita ironda lilya lya vandu lyiikunung'unaa indo kyakwe, nalyo vakohani valya vaniini vakasanga na Vafarisayo, vakaruma vasoro va efo poo vandentira.
Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Ni ando a kyeeri kidu nsindi neeni, shikweenngyeny kwa yeto aleshiruma.
Llyo musheshisiaa mulasheshikooyaa, na kundo nshekaa mulashiidimaa ifika-fo.”
Naasa Vayuda vakarera wo veni na veni, “A nndu yeto nkwi afikaa neese lure lulankooya-se? A mmbo afikaa kulya kwa valya vanyanyakye masangeny a Vagriki, nandeloshya-fo Vagriki yewo?
A kikeeny inda elyi arera indo kaamba, musheshisiaa mulasheshikooyaa na kundo nkaa yeny mulashiidimaa ifika-u yeni?”
Naasa elyi kwamfika nkonu yeto nniini weemarisya, nato ukee nniini kitoro ya ingyi, nalyo Yesu kashesalala-u kaonisa unyanga kaamba, “Kwakooya nndu aakuka nakusheye na kwakwa nashe ina!
Nndu akusirye neeny, kyakwe mmbo kivaa shaasa kikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Nndu yeto efo nyaminy takwe kusherukaa-fo ngyusoka ta mura wa muu!’ “
Na elyi arera indo, ni mbony ta Mumuyo Mweele, mmbwe vandu vakusirye nawe vakaa vambwarye, mashika kyeeri kilya Mumuyo Mweele nalandeshe-fo, neelyi Yesu nalandeanga neefo itumbeny lyakwe.
Naasa efo mamwiinginy ulya wa vandu kukakaa-fo vandu vaita arera indo, vakaamba, “Yeu ni dede mmbwe nkisuku ulya akee nteerye nashe.
Vengyi vakaamba, mmbwe Kristo. Vengyi vakaamba, A mmbo Kristo asheshaa nauke kulya Galilaya?
A nshi kikee kireiye kyeamba, Kristo asheshaa aukye efo ukuuny lwa Davidi na efo Betilehemu efo muriny wa Davidi.”
Naasa mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu ukakumanya kavii kimaruma kyakwe.
Kukavekaa-fo na vaangu vakunndye intira, indi nndu alleesya woko nalawonike.
Naasa vasoro valya va efo poo vakawuya na kulya kwa vakohani vaniini na vafarisayo. Nawo vakavavia, “A nkiki kyaima mulamweende?”
Vasoro valya va efo poo vakaallwa, “Mmbo kulandewonike nndu arera shaasa nndu yeu arera-fo.”
Vafarisayo vakaallwa, “A mmbo neeni mwallembika?
A mmbo kwiifo nndu wa nrwe naakwa ni umwi tupu akusirye nawe, ao wa efo kwa Vafarisayo?
Lyo mburwa yei ya vandu ilaishi uvavaso mmbo vadenge.”
Nikodemu karera ulya emweengya kio, nawe ni wa efo nnang'ani yaawo, kaamba,
“A mavavaso a kikweru mmbo autye nndu uvingo kulaore amaarannywa mbele mbony tauka kwakwe kamanyika kindo aletana?”
Nawo vakaallwa vakammbia, “A mmbo neewe kuukye kulya Galilaya? Soma mbony ntere kumanyi, Kulya Galilaya nkushekwiipoo-fo nndu nkisuku-fo.” [
Vakawara shia wo nndu kaenda kyeny kwakwe.
Nawe Yesu kaenda kulya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura.
Elyi lya ndesi ngama shuru kafika-se kulya mmba ya Iruva, kaengywa ni Vayuda valele-fo woose. Nawe kakaa rembo kava avaloshaany.
Naasa vaarya va fitabu vakasanga na Vafarisayo vakaende nang'u nka aaramwa atuuswaa. Vakanseleesa yoo nnang'ani.
Vakammbia, “Llosha! Nka yeu mmbo aaramwa eetuswaa.
Naasa Mose mmbo aluvavasye efo uvavasony kya vaka va ngata yeyo luvakape na mawe. A yewe kwaambaany inda ndesa?”
Naasa kyavaniinga vakarera indo nyeeli vekundye imweesa naambo vawonise kindo vankumba nakyo. Naasa Yesu kakwiinyika kareiya na nni yoo uteriny.
Naasa elyi vengera immbesa kakwiinwa kavavia, “Nndu wa kunu nnang'ani yaany nalatiri kindo alyamarye we nave wa mbee weenkapa na iwe.”
Nalyo kawuya kakwiinyika lyingyi na ireiya yoo uteriny.
Nawo vamiita indo vakapooka isuruka-u umwi umwi vapookya na vamiku vakatana vasia-u. Na Yesu karewa-u we muni na nka ulya asalalyi-u.
Naasa Yesu kawuya ikwiinnwa kammbia, “A valya vekukumba valla na kwi nka? A mmbo kulakaa-fo nta umwi akuutya uvingo?”
Nawe kaamba, “Nta umwi-fo Nndumi!” Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Nta yeny nshikuutyaa uvingo-fo. Kweenngye, kure deny kulalyamare-se-fo.” ]
Naasa Yesu kawuya irera nawo lyingyi kaamba, “Yeny ni sa ya ulana. Nndu kashilatya nnyakyendaa-se ireemin-fo. Mmbo akaa na sa ishendee muu.”
Naasa Vafarisayo vakammbia, “Mmbo kwakureeka-u kyafo ku muni! Ukureeki lwafo nshi lwa dede-fo.”
Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Na kwakooya shakureeka-u kyakwa shimuni ukureekyi lwakwa mmbo lwava lwa dede-da, kimmba shiishi kundo shyuukye na kundo nsheendaa.
Neeni mmbo mwarummbwa mwiilolaa nyama yeto ta nndu, indi yeny nsharummbwa kya nndu nta-fo.
Naakwa kwakooya sharummbwa kya nndu, nrumbuye wakwa waveva wa dede-da, mashika nshakaa-fo shimuni-fo, mmbo shakaa-fo yeny na yeto aleshiruma.
Naakwa na efo uvavasony yelo lwany mmbo kikee kireiye kyeamba, Kindo kyammbikywa ukureeki ni vandu vavii mmbo kikee kya dede.
Yeny shimuni mmbo shikureekye-u kyakwa, na yeto aleshiruma we Nde, kavekureeka-u kyakwa-da.”
Naasa vakammbia, “A Nde yeto wafo akee kwi.” Yesu kaallwa, “Yeny mmushiishi-fo, nta Nde wakwa-fo. Kwee mmbo mweeshiishi yeny, mmbo mwemanyaa na Nde yeto wakwa.”
Nng'u marero alererya alya kufii na isanduku lyeesanyirya fesa efo mmba ya Iruva. Nta kulakae-fo nndu antira nnyelyi kyeeri kyakwe kilandefika.
Naasa kawuya kavavia lyingi, “Yeny shiifo nkweenngyaa, neeni musheshisiaa. Neefo ulyamariny lwan kundo mukai mfo mushefiiyaa. Kundo yeny nsheendaa nta mmushiidimaa ifika-fo yeni-fo.”
Nalyo Vayuda vakaamba, kulakooye mmbo akundye ikuwaa ndesa, elyi aamba, kundo yeny nsheenda nta mmushiidimaa ifikafo yeni-fo.
Nawe kavavia, “Yeni mmbo muparikye kunu si, na yeny ni efo uuwe shiparikye. Yeni mukavaany vandu muparikye kunu ulaniny, yeny shi nndu shiparikye kunu ulanin-fo.
Naasa neeny shamuviany, ni efo ulyamariny lwany kundo mukai mfo mushefiiyaa. Mashika kwakooya kulaore mukusirye-u yeny mmbwe, na efo ulyamariny lwany kundo mukai mfo mushefiiyaa.”
Naasa vakammbia, “A yewe ni viiny?” Yesu kavavia, “Ni indo kikai shaasa shilelava imuvia, na ulaalu shavemuvia indo-da.
Mmbo shetiri fiingyi fyeerera kyany na irummbwa kyany. Kyaindi yeto aleshiruma mmbwa dede. Neeny mbony shamiita shyuuta kwakwe nto nshambaa-u teevia ulana.”
Nawo nta valamanyi mmbo arera nawo kikee kya Nde.
Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Mukamfika irosa mwana yeto wa nndu llyo mushemanyaa yeny mmbwe, nta shilatiri kindo shatana kikee kya shila yakwa shimuni. Ni ekyo Nde aleshoora nkyo shaamba.
Na yeto aleshiruma, mmbo ashikaye. Nta nnashireeye shimuni-fo. Kimmba yeny findo finsennyi we mfyo shava mwiifitana kyeeri kyoose.”
Naasa elyi arera indo veengyi vakauta-u ikusirya nawe.
Naasa karera na Vayuda valya vakusirye nawe kaamba, “Kwakooya mwakaa mukutiri na ndera yakwa llyo-ny mushevaa vakiloshyony vakwa dede deny.
Neeni mushemanyaa ekyo kikee dede, kishemuvikaa muve valeke.”
Nawo vakamwaallwa, “Mmbo lukee ufyari lwa Abrahamu, nta lyimwi lulandeve mashinga a nndu-fo. A kyavaany inda, elyi kwaamba, mmbo mushevaa vandu valeke?”
Yesu kavaalwa, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, wo nndu atana fya ulyamari mmbo aaluka ishinga lya ulyamari.
Indi ishinga lyo lyikaa efo kyeny kyeeri kyoose-fo. Nndu akaa kyeny kyeeri kyoose Mmwana.
Naasany kwakooya mwana ashemwaallwaa muve valeke, llyoony mushevaa valeke dede deny.
Shiveishi-da mmbo mukee va ufyari lwa Abrahamu. Indi yeni mukasia mwaanya weeshiwaa, kimmba ndera yakwa ilaonnyi kirembo efo nnang'ani yaany.
Yeny kindo shilollye efo kwa Nde nkyo nshaambaa. Naasany neeni kevetaniny ekyo mwamiita muuta efo kwa Nde.”
Vakaallwa vakammbia, “A Nde weeru nshiwe Abrahamu?” Yesu kavavia, “Kwee mwekee vana va Abrahamu mmbo mweetanaa mitannyi ya Abrahamu.
Kya indi ulaalu mukeruuya mwaanya weeshiwaa, neeny shikee nndu shamuvia ekyo kikee kya dede, ekyo shilekiita shyuuta efo kwa Nde. Nta Abrahamu nshi indo aletana-fo-te.
Yeni mmbo mwava veetana mitannyi ya nde yeto waany.” Vakammbia, “Yese lluwonikye kyuuka na utuusi-fo. Mmbo lutiri Nde umwi-da, ni Iruva.”
Yesu kavavia, “Kwee Iruva ekee Nde waany, mmbo mweeshikundaa yeny, kimmba yeny shilesha shyuuka kwa Iruva shasha yaa shikai. Nta nshisheye kikee kya shila yakwa shimuni-fo. Mmbwe aleshiruma.
A kimaruma nkikyi elyi mulakeemanya ekyo nkeemuvia? Mmashika elyi mulashiidimaa yaaranya Irero lyakwa.

Yeni mmbo mukee va nde yeto waany we mmbishwa. Na efyo fikunndyo mmbwe mfyo mukunndye itana. We ekee mwiiwaa vandu uka elyo mapoonkyony nta nalakee na dede-fo kimmba efo nriminy mmbwakwe kulaifo kya dede yeyo kyeeri arera wongo mmbo arera ekyo kikee kyakwe muni, mashika we akee muni wongo kaveva mmbwe ndeye wa vayo.
Kya indi yeny elyi sharera ekyo kyikee dede nkyo kyaima mulakusirye neeny.
A nndu wa kunu kwany ni ungau ashiidimaa ishikureekya sheelyi shikee llyamari? A kwakooya sharera kya dede naambo-ki-se elyi kulaore mwakusirya neeny?
Yeto aparikye efo kwa Iruva, mmbo ashiitaa marero a Iruva, nkyo kyaniinga yeni mulaite nnyeeli mulakee vandu vaparikye efo kwa Iruva.”
Naasa Vayuda valya vakarouwa vakammbia, “A nshi lwaronga ninsha elyi lwaamba yewe mmbo kukee Nsamaria, kwavetirwa ni Mumuyo nkasha?”
Yesu kaallwa, “Yeny nshitirwa nta ni Mumuyo nkasha-fo mmbo shainndyaa Nde wakwa neeni mukashimina.
Neeny nta nshiruyaa nnduma wakwa shimuni-fo. Mmbo kwiifo yeto ashiniinga nnduma na irummbwa kyakwa na kyany.
Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, kwakooya nndu aringa ndera yakwa nnasheshoshaa ufu-fo na kafika llung'anu.”

Vayuda valya vakammbia, “Akakyo ulaalu lwammanya mmbo kutirwa mmumuyo nkasha. Abrahamu mmbo alefwa na valya veauya fisuku vakavefwa, na yewe kwaamba, kwakooya nndu aringa ndera yakwa nnasheshoshaa ufu fika llung'anu-fo.
A mmbo kukee nniini kwailanya nde weeru Abrahamu, nawe alevefwa-da? Na vakisuku vakavefwa-da. A mmbo kwakwaallwa sha vi?”
Yesu kaallwa, “Kwakooya shakung'anisa shimuni nng'anu wakwa nshi kindo-fo. Mmbo kwakaa-fo Nde-yaakwa mmbwe yeto ashing'anisaa. Na yeni mukaamba mmbwe Iruva waany.
