Nta mulamwiishi. Kya indi yeny shimwiishi. Na kwakooya shaamba, nshimwiishi mmbo shava mwoongo sheeni. Kya indi shimwiishi na kirero kyakwe shavekiringa.
Na nde ulya waany we Abrahamu alelooka eeishi mmbo akaa nalollye nkonu wakwe, nawe kaveulollya-da kafura.”
Naasa Vayuda vakammbia, “A yewe kulandefika irika lya mmyaaka makumi araanu-le, kwaamba inda kwallollya Abrahamu?”
Yesu kavavia, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, meendi Abrahamu nalandekaa-fo, yeny shiifo.”
Naasa Vayuda valya vakaipoo mawe vamweerye. Yesu kakusuruma kauka efo mmba ya Iruva.
Naasa eefo ashiiraa ando kalollya nndu akee mfu miso kipookya ammbonika.
Na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakammbesa, “Ale llosha! Nndu alelyamara mmbi, ni nndu yeu ndesa ao ni ndeye na maye kutani awonika indo akee mfu miso?”
Yesu kaallwa, “Nta nshi nndu yeu alelyamara-fo, nta nshi ndeye na maye-fo. Mmbo kileva indo naambo mashora a Iruva akooye imanyika efo kwakwe.
Yese kuti luve veetana mashora a yeto aleshiruma elyi kukee nsanyiny. Kio mmbo kiifo kishaa, llyo nndu nnakiidimaa-se irunda-fo.
Meendi shikee kunu ulaniny mmbo shava sa ya ulana.”
Amaamba indo kafishya maare si. Maare alya kaumba-umba nang'u mmbumba wa uteri. Mmbumba ulya wa uteri kawaamba yoo misony alya akwe.
Kammbia, “Enda kundesamba efo iruveny lya Siloamu.” Kwaallwa ni kimwi na nndu Nrumi. Naasa kakweengya kandesamba. Kawuya alolaa.
Naasa vandu valya va nnyanu na valya valellollya elyo mbee ekee nndu mweererya vandu, nalyo vakaamba, “Nyira, a yeu nshiwe ulya aleva mwiikaa-fo rembo asheereryaa vandu.”
Vengyi vakaamba, “Nshiwe-fo-te.” Vengyi vakaamba, “Ode, ni nndu afwanani nawe.” Nawe kaamba, “Ee, mmbwe yeny-da.”
Naasa vakammbia, “A mmbo kileva inda elyi miso afo akooya itarambuka.”

Nawe kaallwa, “Ni nndu ulya avaangwa ni Yesu, mmbo awumba mmbumba wa uteri kawaamba yoo misony akwa. Kashivia, Enda kulya Siloamu kundesamba-fo. Nalyo shaenda. Shimmeesamba shakooya ate shiifo llolaa.”
Vakammbia, “A nndu yeto nkwi akai.” Kaamba, “Nshukuny!”
Nalyo vakanderwaa nndu yeto ekee mfu miso na kulya kwa Vafarisayo.
Na nkonu ulya wekee wa Sabato llya Yesu aleumba mmbumba ulya wa uteri kawaamba yoo misony akwe.
Naasa Vafarisayo nawo-da vakammbesa-se shaasa alekooya ilola. Nawe kavavia, “Ni mmbumba wa uteri aleshaamba misony, shandesamba shakooya-ny ilola.”

Naasa Vafarisayo valya maata vakaamba, “Nndu yeu nshi nndu aukye kwa Iruva-fo, kimmba nalashiinndyaa Sabato.” Vengyi vakaamba, “Kukooye ni nndu llyamari a niinda eeshiidimaa itana fya wende fya ngata yeyo.” Nalyo vakaraukana.
Naasa vakawuya vakavia ulya ekee mfu miso, “A yewe kwaamba inda kyafo ku muni elyi alekutarammbwa miso?” Nawe Kaamba, “Mmbo akee nndu nkisuku.”
Naasa Vayuda nta valairikye kyakwe sheelyi mmbo ekee mfu miso kakooya ilola. Vakatana vavaanga ndeye na maye wa nndu ulya alekooya ilola.
Vakavavesa vakaamba, “Nndu yeu mmbwe mwana waany ulya eishiwa mmbo alewonika eekee mfu miso? A kilevaa-ny inda elyi ulaalu indi ankooya ilola?”
Naasa ndeye na maye vakaallwa vakaamba, “Kindo lwiishi nndu yeu ni mwana weeru nawe mmbo alewonika eekee mfu miso.
Kya indi shaasa kileva ulaalu kakooya ilola ekyo yese llukiishi-fo nta llwiishi nndu yeto alentarammbwa miso-fo. Kyemmbeseny-te, mmbo akee nndu nniini, ashaambaa ekyo kyakwe we muni-te!”
Na kyaninga ndeye na maye karera indo nyeeli veereiye Vayuda. Kimmba Vayuda venfisha kyama, kwakooya kwakaa-fo nndu ashemwamba paa mmbo akee Kristo, nawo vammbikye ishingo efo mmba yaawo yeeterevya.
Nkyo kimaruma ndeye na maye vakaamba, “Mmbo akee nndu nniini. Kyemmbeseny we muni-te!”
Naasa vakawuya ivaanga nndu ulya lya kavii, ulya ekee mfu-miso. Vakammbia, “Iruva mmbwe kumwiitikisaa! Kya nndu yeu lwammanya mmbo akee llyamari.”
Naasa nndu ulya kaallwa, “Kwakooya mmbo akee nndu llyamari ekyo nshiishi-fo. Ni kindo kimwi-nsi shiishi deny, mmbo shekee mfu miso na ulaalu shankooya ilola.”
Naasa vakammbia, “Mmbo alekutanya inda? Ni inda alekutarammbwa miso?”
Kavaalwa, “Mmbo shammeemuvia, neeni nta mulaite. Naambo ki-se mukunndye ikiita lya kavii? A mmbo neeni mwakunda iva vakiloshyony kyakwe ndesa?”
Vakasakya nawe vakammbia, “Nndu akee wa kiloshyony kyakwe ni yewe! Yese mmbo lukee vakiloshyony kya Mose-te
Kya Mose yese lwiishi, ni Iruva alerera nawe. Indi nndu yeto llwiishi nta kundo aukye-fo.”
Nndu ulya kaallwa kavavia, “Ate ando atiri tamba ni yoony, elyi mulaishi kundo aukye, nawe mmbwe aleshitarammbwany miso!
Mmbo luveishi Iruva nnarannyaa nndu llyamari-fo. Indi kwakooya kwakaa-fo nndu areremmya Iruva kavetana kindo kikundywa mmbwe, yeto mmbwe ashemwaarannyaa.
Kira ulana lwammbikwa kulandeitiwa nndu aletarammbwa miso a nndu alewonika akee mfu-miso.
Kwee nndu yeto nalaukye kwa Iruva nneemanyaa itana nta kindo-fo.”
Vakaallwa vakaamba, “Yewe nndu kulewonika kukee na ulyamari, kwatana kwalulosha yese!” Vakamweera neefo poo.
Naasa Yesu kaita vammweera na poo. Kakwaannya nawe kaamba, “A kukusirye na Mwana yeto wa Iruva ndesa?”
Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “A mmbo-vi Nndumi, neeny shikooye ikusirya nawe.”
Yesu kammbia, “Illollya kwammellollya, na yeto aifo areraa neewe mmbwe.”
Nawe kaamba, “Akau shankusirya-u Nndumi!” Nalyo kamoolokya si.
Na Yesu kaamba, “Yeny mmbo shisheye na kunu ulaniny naambo ekyo kya vandu kirumbuke, yewo valalollye naambo vakooye ilola, na yewo valollye naambo vakooye iva vafu miso.”
Naasa Vafarisayo maata varyani nawe vakaita indo vakammbia, “A mmbo lukee vafu miso na yese?”
Yesu kavavia, “Kwee mwekee vafu miso, mmweevaa valyamari-fo; indi ulaalu mmbo mwamaamba mulollye naasany ulyamari lwany mmbo lwamukaya.” YOHANE
Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, “Nndu nalashaangaa mfiriny wa moonri aira yoo ngiriny, kasaama na ando engyi, yeto ni mwiivi na nsoki.
Indi yeto aanga nafo aira yoo ngiriny, we mmbwe mwiisi wa moonri.
Na yeto mwiiringa yoo ngiriny mmbo annduyaa. Na moonri alya akaaranya unyanga lwakwe. Na moonri alya akee akwe muni kaavaanga marina a vayo kaauwa na poo.
Na alya akee akwe moose elyi aasomuta na poo kaira mbee asongoye. Na moonri alya akallatya kimmba eeshi unyanga lwakwe.
Indi nndu muny nnyashellatyaa-fo. Mmbo arishaa kimmba alaishi unyanga yelo lwa nndu yeto munny.”
Naasa nkyo kyaaso Yesu aleveera. Nawo nta valamanyi ekyo akunndye ivavia nakyo nkyo ki.
Naasa Yesu kawuya ivavia lingi, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, Ngiri yeanga kundo mburu tikai nnyo yeny.
Yewo vasheye nafo vashisongoye mmbo vekee veevi na vasoki woose, indi moonri alavaaranyi.
Ngiri yeyo nnyo yeny. Kwakooya nndu aanga nafo ashyaaluye ngiri mmbwe akooya ikirwa, na yaanga nafo na isomuka nafo, navekooya na ura.
Indi yeto akee mwiivi nnashaa nafo, kulaore ni isha iiva na ishisha na ireta-fo. Yeny mmbo shilesha nafo moonri akooye itira muu na iuwona shapu.”
“Mwiisi nsha mmbwe yeny. Mwiisi nsha mmbo arekyaa moonri akwe muu.
Indi nndu mwiisia weesi nalakee mwiisi, nta nalakee muni moonri alya karisha. Naasa nyamandu ikasha ikatitafura neetinyanyata.
Mashika elyi we akee nndu weesia weesi nalasarye kya moonri.
Mwiisi nsha mmbwe yeny. Mmbo shiveishi yoo akwa, nang'u aveshiishi yeny.
Shaasa nde wakwa ashiishi yeny, na yeny shiveishi Nde wakwa. Na muu wakwa shaveureka kimaruma kya moonri akwa.
Shitiri na moonri engyi-se, alakee a mfiri yeu. Nang'u nkuti shiende nau. Nang'u ashiitaa unyanga lwakwa. Na ironda lyive lyimwi na mwiisi nave umwi.
Nkyo kyaniinga Nde kashikunda elyi shareka-u muu wakwa.
Nta nkwiifoo nndu ashiusokaa-fo. Mmbo shaulekeya shikunda shimuni. Mmbo shivetiri na finya ya yuulekeya. Shivetiri na finya ya yuuvira lyingi. Llyo ivavaso shilewarya lyuuka kwa Nde-akwa.”
Naasa Vayuda vakawuya ikumanya kavii lyingyi kimaruma kya elyi arera indo.
Naasa veengyi vakaamba, “Mmbo atirwa mmumuyo nkasha kasukwa. A naambo-ki-se elyi mwiifo mumwaarannyaa?”
Vengyi vakaamba, “Marero yoo arera nshi akee sha a nndu atirwa mmumuyo nkasha-fo. A mmbo kwiifo mumuyo nkasha ushiidimaa itarammbwa miso a vafu-miso?”
Naasa kukafika nkonu nniini kulya Yerusalemu weekummbwa mmba ya Iruva ilesammywa. Na kyeeri kilya kiifo kikee kya mbeo.
Na Yesu eefo arua-ruaa efo mmba ya Iruva, efo itengony lya uraa lya Solomon.
Nalyo Vayuda vakasha inndingitya vakaamba, “A mmbo kufikaa indii kwiisavesaa mirima yeeru? Kwakooya yewe ni Kristo ambaany paa-te!”
Yesu kaallwa, “Mmbo shilemuvia-da, neeni mulakusirye-u! Ni mashora yoo yeny shatana kikee kya irina lya Nde-akwa, nng'u ashivikye ukureeki.
Neeni nta mulakusirye-u mashika elyi mulakee ukambeny lwa moonri akwa.
Na moonri yoo akwa mmbo aishiitaa unyanga lwakwa. Neeny shivetiishi nato tikashilatya.
Neeny shaaniinga muu wa llung'anu. Nang'u nta nnakaa nareke na akafika llung'anu-fo. Nta nkwiifo nndu asheatafuraa kunu wokony lwakwa-fo.
Nde yeto wakwa ashiniinngye mmbo ang'annyi woose. Nta nkwiifo nndu ashiidimaa aatafura efo wokony lwa Nde-fo.
Neeny na Nde mmbo lukee vamwi.”
Nalyo Vayuda vakeepoo mawe lyingyi vankape nang'u.
Yesu kavaallwa, “Mmbo shilemoora mashora mesha meengyi auka kwa Nde. A ni kimaruma kya ishora lyingalyi mukunndye ishikapa na mawe?”
Nalyo Vayuda vakamwaallwa, “Nshi kimaruma kya ishora isha lukunndye ikukapa na mawe-fo. Ni kimaruma kya kirumu kyafo kyeeruma Iruva, na elyi yewe kukee nndu-da kwatana kwakwaalwa Iruva kumuni.”
Yesu kavaallwa, “Efo uvavaso lwany a mmbo nalakee areiye kyeamba, ‘Yeny shileamba, mmbo mukee maruva?’
Naasa valya valefitywa irero lya Iruva, kwankooya mmbo alevavaanga ni maruva na ekyo kikee kireiye nta kilave ifullwa.
Afikaany, yeny shilevikwa Mweele ni Nde kashiruma na kunu ulaniny ni inda mwashivia mmbo sharuma Iruva, elyi shaamba, ‘Shikee Mwana wa Iruva?’
Kwakooya kulaore shatana mashora a Nde-yaakwa, reny mulakusirye neeny-fo!
Indi kwakooya mmbo shaatana, na kikava mulakusirye neeny shimuni, kusiryeny na mashora yoo-te, naambo mweende mwiimanyaa na iipuye Nde mmbo asasangyi neeny, neeny nsasangi na Nde.”
Naasa vakasia mwaanya weentira, lyo we katurushuka efo maakony awo keenda.
Nalyo kawara shia kafika lyingyi kulya kwakulya ya Yordani, kulya Yohane eebatisyaa kakaa-fo.
Vandu vakansheya veengyi vakaamba lyo dede we Yohane nta nnyaletana kindo kyeeora wende-fo, kya indi kilya Yohane alerera kya nndu yeu mmbo kikee kya dede kyoose.
Nalyo vandu va kulya veengyi vakakusirya nawe.
Naasa kweefo nndu eelwee evaangwaa Lasaro wa kulya Betania, wa kimuri kilya kya Maria na Marta we mfwamaye.
Na Maria mmbwe ulya aleamba Nndumi mafura afwaamaa nisha. Na marende alya kaangata na fii ta nrweny wakwe. Na mwanamaye we Lasaro, mmbwe ulya elwee.
Naasa vamfwamaye valya vakwe vakanrummya nrumi, vakaamba; “Nndumi ulya kunkundye alwee.”
Naasa Yesu aita indo kaamba, “Ndwari yei nshi yeewaa-fo, ni ya yeengye Iruva usuri, naambo Mwana yeto wa Iruva naute-u ing'aniswa.”
Naasa, na Yesu akundani na Marta, na mfwamaye na Lasaro.
Naasa elyi amiita alwee, nalyo kulya akai kaengera isinda-fo ando a mikonu ivii.
Amiirisha-fo indo elyi numa kavia valya vakiloshyon kyakwe, “Ndifony-te luwuye na kulya Yudaya.”
Valya vakiloshyony vakammbia, “Llosha, ni kyeeri yeki kyenyi Vayuda valya verie ikukapa na mawe-te. Neewe mmbo kwiifo kuwuyaa nafo lyingi?”
Yesu kaallwa, “Saa ta nsanyiny nshi ikumi na ivii? Na kwakooya nndu arua-rua nsanyiny nnyakapaa urende-fo, kimmba alollye sa ya ulana yelu.
Indi kwakooya nndu arua-rua kio mmbo akapaa urende kimmba nalakee na sa efo nnang'ani yakwe.”
Ekyaamba indo kawuya kalungya-u kingyi kavavia, “Mbuya ilya yeeru Lasaro ammeelala, lyo nsheendaa shindemwaanta.”
Naasa valya va kiloshyony vakammbia, “Nndumi kwakooya mmbo ammeelala, asheshiaa.”
Na Yesu arera indo neelyi emmeefwa. Nawo vakakusara kulakooye mmbo aamba alele rony.
Kikee indo nalyo Yesu kavavia paa, “Lasaro amfwa.
Neeny shavefura kimaruma kyany elyi shakooya shilai-yo, naambo mukooye ikusirya-u. Indi kendifony lundefika kwakwe.”
Naasa Toma ulya avaangwa Wamaasa, kavia wooroye valya vakiloshyony, “Ndifony-da na yese lundefwa lusange nawe.”
Nalyo Yesu afika-fo kakooya ammaa mikonu iina kifuny.
Na kwauka kulya Betania kufike Yerusalemu ni ando a kilometa isaanu.
Na Vayuda veengyi vasheye na kulya kwa Marta na Maria vavaangate misoru kya mwanamaye ulya waawo.
Naasa Marta kasheengywa mbony sheelyi Yesu aifo ashaa. Kaenda imwaammbya. Na Maria karewa akee kulya kyenyy.
Naasa Marta kashevia Yesu, “Nndumi kwee ni kunu kweekai mwanama yeu wakwa nnyeefwaa-fo!
Lyo naakwaa ni ulaalu mmbo shiveishi-da efyo kusheterevaa Iruva, Iruva mmbo akuniingaa.”
Yesu kammbia, “Mwanamau asherukaa!”
Marta kammbia, “Shiishi-da, mmbo arukaa elyi kwamfika yoo marukyony a vafu nkonu yeto weefurumya.”
Yesu kammbia, “Yeny mmbwe nnduti na muya-muu. Na nndu akusirye neeny naakwa afwa mmbo ashetiraa muu.
Na wo nndu aifo na muu kakusirya neeny, nnyakikooya-se ifwa-fo, na kafika llung'anu. A yewe kwakusirya-u indo?”
Nawe kammbia, “Ee-da Nndumi. Yeny mmbo shikusirye neewe mmbo kukee Kristo Mwana wa Iruva, yeto akee mwaambe nashe na kunu ulaniny.”
Amaamba indo nalyo kakwiipoo-fo kandevaanga mfwamaye we Maria kikee kya kirika. Kaambia, “Llosha ansha eefo akuvaangaa.”
Nawe ekiita indo kakwiipoo shu uviny kafika alya Yesu akai.
Na Yesu nalandefika efo kimuriny-fo. Mmbo akee alya akwaanannya na Marta.
Naasa Vayuda valya veeiyo na Maria kulya kyeny valya vakunndye imwaangata misoru vakalollya Maria akwipoo shu uviny kasomuka. Nawo vakallatya vaishi mmbo asheendaa na efo mbangeny indekapya-fo kiiyo.
Naasa elyi Maria afika yoo Yesu akai kallollya kawa si yoo marendeny akwe, kammbia, “Nndumi kwe kweekee kunu mwanama yeu wakwa nnyeefwaa-fo.”
Naasa Yesu alollya ashiiyaa indo na Vayuda valya vasha varyani nawe vakaveiiya, nawe karovyo efo nriminy kasavaa.
Kaamba, “A kundo mulemwaara nkwi?” Vakammbia, “Osho kushelola.”
Yesu koolota misoru.
Naasa Vayuda valya vakaamba, Llen-te ndesa enkunndye.
Na vengyi vakaamba, “A nshi-we aletarammbwa miso a nndu ulya mfu miso? A mmbo alelemwa itana kindo kyeeima na nndu yeu nalafwe?”
Nalyo Yesu kawuya irovyo efo nriminy. Kafika yoo mbangeny. Nayo ni mbanga ikee shidoshe iweny na iwe lyikee yaamire-u.
Nalyo Yesu kaamba, “Ipoony-mbu iwe yelyo.” Marta ulya mfwamaye wa Lasaro kammbia, “Nndumi, ampooka iraa-te. Mmbo ammaa-fo mikonu iina.”
Yesu kammbia, “A mmbo shilandekuvia kwakooya kwakusirya-u mmbo kushelollyaa itumbe lya Iruva?”
Nalyo vakaipoo-fo iwe Ilya. Na Yesu kainuya miso na uuwe, kaamba, “Woi Nde shakwaana elyi kwanshyaarannya.
Neeny shiveeshi-da, mmbo kwava mwiishyaarannya kyeeri kyoose. Indi kyashiniinga shakyaamba-u ni nkuka yeu wa vandu varingitye-u naambo vakooye ikusirya-u vamanyi ni yewe kuleshiruma.”
Na elyi ammaa yaamba indo, koonisa unyanga kavaanga, “Lasaro somuka na kunu poo.”
Nndu ulya mfu kasha na poo, na kisangu kilya kyakwe kikee kyoososye kirami. Yesu kavavia, “Moorommwiny munre neende.” "
Naasa Vayuda valya vasheye na kulya kwa Maria vekilolya kindo kilya atana, veengyi va efo nnang'ani yaawo vakapooka ikusirya nawe.
Na valya maata vakaenda kulya kwa Vafarisayo vakavavia kilya atana.
Naasa vakohani valya vaniini vakasanga na Vafarisayo vakavaanga shila shiniini ya ngyama tawo vakaamba, " “A lutaniny inda elyi nndu yeu ava mwiitana fyeeora ngyende shiingyi indo?
Kwakooya lwankureeya-u indo, vandu mmbo vasiiyaa kwakwe ikusirya nawe. Nalyo Varome vasheshaa vashelusokaa na uruka na vandu.”
Naasa nndu umwi wa efo nnang'ani yaawo umwi ni Kayafa ekee nkohani nniini wa mwaka ulya. Nawe kavavia, “Mmutiri nta nrwe-fo,
nta mulakusarye mmbo kyemuviiyaa kisha nndu umwi nafwe ando a vandu va uruka elu loose kyallya vandu va uruka loose varekaa?”
Na elyi arera indo nshi kya shila yakwe muni-fo. Ni elyi ekee nkohani nniini wa mwaaka ulya karera indo kikee ni kisuku auya kyeamba Yesu asheendaa ifiiya vandu va uruka.
Nshi kya vandu va uruka elu tupu-fo, ni kimaruma kya vana va Iruva yewo vanyanyakye naambo nakooye ivaummbya ando amwi.
Naasa kipookya nkonu ulya vakavika shila naambo vakooye immbwaa.
Naasa Yesu nalakive-se, mwiirua-rua paa efo kwa Vayuda. Indi kakwiipoo-fo kaenda uruka lwiiduvani na kulya kasa. Kafika muriny uvaangwaa ni Efraimu, kakaa-fo na vakiloshyony vakwe.
Naasa Pasaka ya Vayuda yensha kufii. Vandu veengi vakanderwa na kulya Yerusalemu vauka efo urukeny lulya, kulaore kwamfika Pasaka, vandekwiilyisa.
Naasa vakava varuuya-ruuya-ny Yesu. Vakarera wo veni na veni vasalalyi efo mmba ya Iruva, vashaambaa, “A mulla kyava inda? Ni dede nnasheshaa ishesaiya nkonu yeu nniini-fo ndesa?”
Na Vakohani valya vaniini vensanga na Vafarisayo vakauta mavavaso kyeamba, “Kwakooya nndu ammanya kundo akai neende mbony, naambo vakooye intira.”
Naasa kweeiyo mikonu irindaru kufike Pasaka. Yesu kafika kulya Betania kulya Lasaro elele ulya Yesu alennduta ammbuta kwa vafu.
Naasa vakanndesya shoonga na Marta kava mmbo afurukana-u. Na Lasaro kava ni umwi wa valya veefo rembo velyaa shoongaa.

Naasa Maria keende ratili imwi ya mafura eamba afwamaa nisha a ngata ya nardo akee mavaramu, atiri uuru uniini, kaamba marende a Yesu, Kawuya kaangata na fii ta nrweny wakwe. Na mmba ilya ikaishwa kifwaamu kya mafura alya.
Naasa Yuda Iskariote aiyo ni umwi wa valya vakiloshyon kyakwe ulya asheendaa inndiinngya, we kaamba,
“A nkyeema mafura yaa akummbwa fesa shiingi, nato tikandeniingwa vakiva.”
Na kyaaniinga kaamba indo nshi atinnywa vakiva-fo nnyelyi ekee mwiivi, nawe mmbwe arie mboloko ilya ya fesa, na filya fyavikwa-fo kava mwiipoo-fo.
Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Kunreeyeny-te nadeesye kya nkonu wakwa weerikwa.
Kya vandu vakiva mmbo mukee nawo mikonu myoose. Indi yeny mmukee neeny mikonu myoose-fo.”

Naasa vandu valya vakuummbye-fo ironda iniini va efo kwa Vayuda, vakamanya Yesu mfo kundo akai, vakasha nafo, nshi kimaruma kya Yesu tupu-fo, mmbo vakunndye ilollya na Lasaro ulya alennduta ammbuta kwa vafu.
Naasa vakohani valya vaniini vakafisha kyama naambo vawaa na Lasaro vansande nawe.
Nyeeli mashika akwe Vayuda veengyi valekusirya na Yesu.
Naasa elyi lya ndesi kweifo ironda iniini lya vandu lyisheye nafo kya nkonu ulya nniini. Vakaita Yesu eefo ashaa na kulya Yerusalemu.
Vakakamara maramba a myaangashi. Vakawara shia vandemwaammbya. Vakakapa kisengelele vakaamba, “Hosiana! Kundearafumwa yeto asha arumwa ni Nndumi kaveva mangyi ya Israeli.
Naasa na Yesu emmbonisa ngashe ya nshungu, kasaama mungony wa vayo. Kikaveva indo shaasa kikee kireiye kyeamba,
Yeni va Sion mulairyae-fo! Akakato mangyi yafo aifo akusheya asaammyi mungony wa ngashe ya nshungu.”
Nakyo shaasa kikai valya vakiloshyony valaitumuso mbele. Ni meendi alya Yesu aleira na efo itumbeny llyo meendi valekummbwa ni indo kyekee kireiye na itana vakaventannya indo-da.
Naasa ironda llya lya vandu valya vekee nawe nkonu ulya alevaanga Lasaro kauka efo mbangeny, kannduta ammbuta vafuny, nawo-da vakava vavikaany ukureeki.
Nakyo kikaveniinga ironda lyilya lya vandu vandemwaammbya nyelyi vamiita mmbo aletana kindo ekyo kya wende.
Nalyo Vafarisayo vakaviana nndu na uroye, “Mulollye-da, mmushiidimaa-se kindo-fo. Akakalu ulana loose lwiifo lunsoraa.”
Naasa efo nnang'ani ya vandu valya valerwa nafo vandeindya Iruva nkonu ulya nniini kukavekaa-fo na Vagriki vaangu.
Naasa vakaenngya Filipo wa kulya Betisaida ya kulya Galilaya. Vakantereva vakaamba, “Nndumi, lulanngye ilollya Yesu!”
Filipo kaenda kandevia Andrea. Andrea kasanga na Filipo vakandevia Yesu.
Na Yesu kavaallwa kaamba, “Akakyo kyeeri kyamfika, Mwana yeto wa nndu nakooye-ny iira na efo itumbeny.”
Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, “Mbekye yeyo ya nganu kwakooya kulaore yaoloka efo uteriny ikafiiya-fo, mmbo irewaa ikakaa yo sheni. Indi kwakooya yamfiiya-fo mmbo isheendee kimu kiingyi.
Yeto ankunda muu wakwe akaa naurete. Na yeto ansua muu wakwe kunu ulaniny yelu mmbwe asheuringaa ukooye muu wa llung'anu.
Kwakooya nndu akunndye ishirunndya nashilatye-ny. Na kundo shakaa yeny, na yeto ashirunndya mfo kundo ashevekaa. Na kwakooya nndu ashirunndya, mmbwe Nde ashenng'anisaa.”
Ulaalu nrima wakwa wasavaa. Neeny shyaambeny inda? Ndesa shyaambe, “Nde kushaauwe ulaalu? Indi kimaruma nkyo ekyo shakooya saa yei.
Woi Nde enda kwiing'anisaa irina lyafo yewe!” Nalyo kukaitiwa unyanga luuka efo iruveeu lwiishaambaa, “Shammeelying'anisa na lyingyi nsheendaa ilying'anisa-da.”
Naasa ironda lilya lya vandu vasalali-fo vakaita vakaamba, “Ni iruruma lyarera.” Veengyi vakaamba, Ni nsu wa Iruva arera nawe.
Yesu kaallwa kaamba, “Unyanga yelo nshi kimaruma kyakwa lwarera-fo, ni kimaruma kyany.
Ulaalu ulana elu lwiifo lushuutywaa uvingo. Ni ulaalu nniini wa ulana yelo asheerwaa na efo poo.
Neeny kwakooya shammeeroswa na uuwe shyuutwa kunu urukeny, llyo nshewoomuyaa na kwakwa woose.”
Karera indo yoolongya kya ufu ashendaa ifwa llwa ngata-ki.

Naasa vandu valya vakuummbye-u vakanndouwa, “Yese lwiitye kya Kristo kyuuka efo uvavasony mmbo ashekaa-fo llung'anu. A kyavaany inda elyi yewe kwaamba mmbo kikee kideerye Mwana yeto wa Nndu nanderoswa na uuwe? A Mwana yeto wa nndu ni viiny?”
Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Kusaa-u kyeeri kidu mukee na sa nnang'ani yaany. Kerueny mukee sha vandu vatiri sa mulakooye imilwa ni ireema. Na yeto mweenda ireeminy nnyamanyaa nta kundo afikaa-fo.
Elyi mukee na sa kusiryeny na sa yeyo mukooye yaaluka vana va sa.”
Naasa lla ndesa aleva mwiitana findo finiini indo velollye fya iwoora ngyende, nawo nta valakunde ikusirya-u.
Mmbo kileenda indo naambo kilya nkisuku ulya Yesaya alerera kiinukye kyeamba, “Nndumi, a nndu alekusirya na kyoongoyo kyeru ni vi? A ni vi alesukuywa woko Nndumi?”
Na kimaruma valaidimi ikusirya-u ni kilya kingyi Yesaya alerera kyeamba,
Mmbo alewaa miso awo, kaallwa ngoo tawo tikava shuumu, na miso awo naambo valakooye illa nang'u kindo, na ngoo tawo valakooye iipuye nato kindo vawuye neeny shivakire.
Ni indo Yesaya alerera llya alelollya itumbe lyakwe karera kyakwe.
Lyo mmbo kweefo na vandu va nrwe veengyi-da valeva vandu vakusirye nawe, indi ni kimaruma kya Vafarisayo valakyaambe paa valakooye yaantwa efo ikwaanuny lyawo.
Kaamba wo vakunndye nnduma wa kunu vanduny kilanya ya nnduma wa efo kwa Iruva.
Naasa Yesu kaonisa unyanga kaamba, “Nndu akusirye neeny nshi yeny ashikusirye-fo, ni yeto aleshiruma.
Na yeto ashilollye yeny mmbo alollye yeto aleshiruma.
Na kwakooya nndu aita marero akwa kara nalaaringa nshi yeny nshemmbutyaa uvingo-fo. Kimmba kindo shilesheya na kunu ulaniny nshi isheutya ulana yelu uvingo-fo ni ishekira ulana yelu.
Na kwakooya nndu aita marero akwa kara nalaaringa, nshi yeny nshemmbutyaa uvingo-fo. Kimmba kindo shilesheya na kunu ulaniny nshi isheutya ulana yelu uvingo-fo, ni ishekira ulana yelu.
Yeto ashiinyika kara nalawarya marero yoo akwa mmbo akooya yeto ammbutya uvingo. Ndera yeyo yakwa shileamba nyo ishemmbutyaa uvingo nkonu yeto weefurumya.
Kimmba nshi kindo shikyuutye kwakwa shimuni shilerera-fo. Ni Nde-yaakwa yeto aleshiruma mmbwe ashiniingye ivavaso lya kindo nshaambaa na kindo nshereraa.
Neeny shiveishi ivavaso elyo lyakwe mmbo lyava lya muu wa llung'anu. Naasany kindo sharera, shaasa kisumani na ekyo Nde ashiviiye, ni indo shareraany.”

Naasa kyeeri nkonu ulya nniini wa Pasaka ulandefika Yesu amanyaa kyeeri kyakwe kyammeesha nakwiipoo kunu ulaniny yelu indefika kwa Nde. Nawe ndesa alekunda yewo vakwe meendi akee kunu ulaniny, mmbo alevakunda dede deny.
Naasa kweefo kwelyiwa shoonga ya nkwaany. Na yeto nkumbi emmaa yaanga Yuda Iskariote, ulya akee mwana wa Simon, naambo nandenndiinngya.
Nawe Yesu emmanya Nde mmbo ammeenrambikya findo fyoose maakony akwe nawe mmbo alesha auka kwa Iruva, na efo kwa Iruva mfo kundo aifo asheendaa nafo.
Naasa kakwiipoo alya kilyiiyony kya kilaayo. Kakuuta soori yakwe ya yeerya. Kaende soori ya ifurukannya shoongen kakufinga nayo yoo mwiininy.
Kawuya kaletya mura wa isamba nndeeveny. Kapooka isangya valya vakiloshyony marende nayaangata na soori ilya akufingye.
Naasa afika yoo kwa Simion Petro, we kammbia, “Nndumi a yewe mmbo kushisangyaa marende?”
Yesu kaallwa kammbia, “Kindo shiifo ntanaa nkukiishi ulaalu-fo, mmbo kushekimanyaa numa.”
Petro kammbia, “Ode nta-fo nkusheeshisangyaa marende nakukafika indii-fo.” Yesu kanndouwa, “Kwakooya kulaore shakusangya marende nkukee umwi neeny-fo.”
Simion Petro kaallwa, “Woi Nndumi, nshi marende tupu-fo, naakwa ni maako na nrwe-da mbee.”
Yesu kammbia, “Yeto ansamba nnatiri kisanngyo-se-fo, kulaore ni marende meni, mmbo ameeremuka efo mwiiliny koose. Neeni mukee veeremutu-da, indi nshi moose-fo.” "
Nyeeli eeshi ulya eefo anndinngyaa, nkyo kimaruma kaamba, “Nshi mukee veeremutu moose-fo.”
Naasa elyi ammaa ivasangya marende kawuya iipoo soori ilya yakwe ya yeerya. Kakaa-fo lyingyi rembo kavavia, " “Mwamanya ekyo shamutannya shaasa kikai-ro?
Mmbo mwashivaanga llosha na Nndumi. Na elyi mwaamba indo kikava kisha-da, kimmba yeny mmbwe.
Naasany kwankooya yeny mmbo shamusangya marende shikee nndumi na llosha waany, na yeni-da mmbo kimusumanyi mukusangye marende.
Mmbo shamureeya kindo kyeelola neeni mundetana indo shaasa yeny shamutannya yeni.
Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, nkwiifoo nndundi airye nndumi wakwe-fo, nta nndu nrumi airye ulya alenruma-fo.
Kwakooya mmbo mwammeekimanya, mushevaa va ngoma mukauta indo.
Nshi shaamba indo kikee kya woose-fo. Yeny shiveishi yewo shilevasauwa. Indi kilya kikee kireiye kuti kindeinukya kyeamba, ‘Yeto alyiiye nkate wakwa, mmbwe ashirosyaa tutu nashikape inanga.’ “
Mmbo shalava imuvia ulaalu kulaore kyammba indo, na elyi kivaa indo naambo mukooye ikusirya-u sheelyi yeny mmbwe.
Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, “Yeto awaryaa nndu shanruma ni yeny ashiwarya, na yeto ashiwarya yeny mmbo awarya yeto aleshiruma.”
Na elyi Yesu amaamba indo nalyo kasavaa efo nriminy, kakureeka-u kaamba, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, Nndu umwi wa kunu nnang'ani yaany asheshiriinngyaa.”
Nalyo valya vakiloshyony vakakulola-lola vakatirwa ntamba kya nndu arera kyakwe.
Naasa kweifo umwi wa valya vakiloshyony vakwe akaa rembo yoo uvariny lwakwe. Mmbwe ulya Yesu eitani nawe.
Nawe Simion Petro kansinnya kammbia, “Mmbese yeto arera kyakwe ni vii.”
Naasa nndu ulya nalyo yeni kakwaamira yoo uvariny lwa Yesu akweevetye kammbia, “Nndumi, ni vii?”
Yesu kamwaallwa, “Ni yeto shinkapyaa kipereshu eki yoo nndeeveny shinniinngye, yeto mmbwe.” Naasa kipereshu kilya kakikapa efo nndeeveny, kaniingya Yuda Iskariote wa Simion.
Nawe eekilya kipereshu kilya Satana kamwaanga. Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Ekyo kwiifo kutanaa kitani uviny.”
Na valya veefo velyaa shoonga nkwiifo nndu alemanya kimaruma kammbia indo-fo.
Kukakaa-fo vekusaraa kya Yuda elyi arie mboloko yeesuruma fesa kulakooye Yesu mmbo ammbia, Endeura findo efyo lwatura fya nkonu yeu nniini ao nandeniingya vakiva kindo.
Naasa elyi ammeelya kipereshu kilya nalyo kasomuka na poo na kio kyemmesha.
Naasa eekisomuka na poo Yesu kaamba, “Mwana yeto wa nndu ni ulaalu ammeng'aniswa na Iruva kaveng'aniswa kyeendwa mmbwe.
Kwakooya Iruva mmbo ammeeng'aniswa kyeendwa mmbwe, na Iruva ashenng'anisaa kikee kyakwe muni. Na ulaalu indi-da ashenng'anisaa-se.”
“Nyira fivana nsindaa neeni kyaangu-da. Mmbo musheshiruuyaa. Nakyo kivevaa indo-da shaasa shilevia Vayuda shaamba, ‘Kundo yeny nsheendaa, mmushiidimaa ifika-fo yeni-fo. Neeny shamuviany ulaalu.’
Mmbo shamuniingya ivavaso iiya lyikee indi, kaeny mukundani shaasa shilemukunda yeni, neeni mukundani indo!
Kindo vandu woose vashemumanyaa nakyo mukee vakiloshyony kyakwa ni elyi mwakundana.”
Simion Petro kammbia, “A nkwi kusheendaa Nndumi?” Yesu kaallwa, “Kundo yeny nsheendaa, yewe nkushiidimaa ishisora-fo ulaalu-fo, mmbo kusheshisoraa-fo elyi numa.”
Petro Kammbia, “Nndumi, a kimaruma nkikyi elyi shilashiidimaa ikusora-fo ulaalu? Mmbo nshelekeyaa muu wakwa kimaruma kyafo.”
Yesu kaallwa, kaamba, “Mmbo kushelekaya muu wafo kimaruma kyakwa?” Ni dede kya dede shakuvia, “Oro ya nguku nnyikapaa kulaore kwanshikana kararu-fo.”
“Nta mulasavee efo nriminy, kusiryeny na Iruva, muvekusirya neeny.
Efo mmba kwa Nde mmbo kwiifo marembo meengyi deny. Kwee kulaore ni indo kikai, mmbo shemuviaa. Nsheendaa ndemudeesya-u ando.
Kwakooya shameenda indemudeesya ando mmbo mmbuya lyingyi shishemoonndwa na efo kwakwa, neeny ando shikai neeni muvekooya ikaa-fo.
Na kundo yeny nsheendaa, shia yeyo mwammeeimanya.”
Toma kammbia, “Nndumi kundo kusheendaa llwiishi nta-fo-te a ni inda lushemanyaa shia yeyo?”
Yesu kammbia, “Yeny ni shia na dede na muu. Nta nkwiifo nndu afika kwa Nde kulaore aroswa ni yeny-fo.
Kwakooya mmbo mwanshimanya yeny, mmbo mumanyaa na Nde-da. Na ulaalu indi-da mwammanya na ilollya mwallollya.”
Filipo kammbia, “Nndumi kelwoore Nde, nakyo kilukumayaany!”
Yesu kammbia, “Fyeeri efi fifye indo shankaa neeni, neewe kulandeshimanya Filipo? Yeto ashilollye yeny, mmbwe alollye Nde. A kyavaany inda elyi yewe kwaamba, ‘Lwoore Nde!’
A mmbo kulakusirye-u sheelyi yeny mmbo nsangyi na Nde, na Nde kasanga neeny? Na marero yoo shaamba nta nshaarera auka kwakwa shimuni-fo. Ni Nde akaa asangyi neeny mmbwe ava mwirunndya-u mashora akwe.
Kusiryeny na yeny-te mumanyi yeny mmbo shisangyi na Nde na Nde kasanga neeny. Kilave kimaruma kya indo, manyiny kimaruma kya mashora yoo akwa meni amuniinga ikusirya-u.
Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, nndu kakusirya neeny, mashora shatana, nawe-da ashaatanaa na maniini ngota yoo, kimmba yeny ni efo kwa Nde shiifo nkweengyaa.
Na wo kindo mwankitereva efo kwakwe kikee kya irina lyakwa mmbo akitanaa, na Nde nakooye ing'aniswa kiryani na Mwana.
Na kwakooya mwatereva kindo kikee kya irina lyakwa na yeny nshekitanaa.”
“Kwakooya mwashikunda mmbo musheringaa mavavaso yoo akwa.
Neeny nsheterevaa Nde, nawe ashemuniingaa Mweekyi ungi, nakae neeni nafike llung'anu.
Ni Mumuyo yeto asheendee mbony ta dede, yeto ulana lulashiidimaa immbwarya kimmba lulatiri miso eellollya nta lulamwiishi. Yeni mmbo mwammanya kimmba asindi neeni kamukaya efo nriminy.”
“Nta nshemuraa muve vangwera-fo, mmbo nshaa na kwany.
Kusaa-u kyeeri kidu ulana yelu lulakishilollyaa-se-fo. Neeni mmbo mushilollyaa kimmba shakaa-fo na muu, neeni mushekaa-fo na muu-da.
Na nkonu yeto mweni, mushemanyaa yeny mmbo shikee llunge na Nde, neeni mmbo mukee valunge neeny, neeny shikee llunge neeni.
Nndu antira mavavaso akwa kaaringa mmbwe nndu ashikunndye na nndu ashikunda mmbwe ashekundwaa ni Nde-yaakwa, neeny nshevenkundaa na ikoora nawe paa.”
Naasa Yuda nshi ulya Iskariote-fo, kaamba, “A kyavaany inda elyi kurie ikoora paa na yese-da, kulakoora na ulana yelu?”
Yesu kaallwa kammbia, “Nndu kashikunda ni ndera yeyo yakwa asheiringaa, na Nde-yaakwa ashevenkundaa, neese mmbo lusheshaa na kwakwe, lwaallwe-fo kuve kweru kweekaa.
Na nndu kara nalashikunda, nta marero akwa nnaaringaa-fo. Na ndera yeyo mwiitye nshi yakwa shimuni-fo, ni ya Nde, mmbwe aleshiruma.”
“Yaa nng'u marero akwa sharera neeni, kyeeri yeki nsindi neeni, shamaa-ny.
Kyaindi yeto Mweekyi, we Mumuyo Mweele, yeto Nde anshenrumaa kikee kya irina lyakwa, mmbwe ashemufundaa findo fyoose navemukumbura fyoose shilemuvia.
Ni ufoo shamureeya, ni ufoo lwakwa shamusimba. Na nsimmbye wakwa nshi ukee sha nsimmbye wa ulana-fo. Nta mulasavae efo ngoony, nta mulatirwa mmbweerei.
Mmbo mwiitye shimuviaa shiifo nkweenngyaa mmbewuyaa na kwany. Kwee mweeshikunndye mmbo mweefuraa elyi shakweenngya kwa Nde. Mashika Nde akee nniini ngota yeny.
Na ulaalu shamuvia elyi kilandeva indo, na yeni elyi kyammeeva indo naambo muute-u ikusirya-u.
Nshikireraa-se neeni marero meengi-fo, mashika yeto nniini wa ulana yelu eefo ashaa. Nawe nta nalatiri kindo kwakwa-fo.
Kyaindi ulana yelu nkuti lumanyi mmbo shikunndye Nde, na shaasa Nde aleshivavasya ni indo ntanaa. Naasa ndifony luuke ya lweende.”
“Yeny ni nsabibu wa dede na Nde-yaakwa kava mmbwe nremi.
Wo iramba lyikulunngye neeny lyikara lyilavika ndunda mmbo alyiammbwaa-fo. Na elyo lyiiyo lyoose lyivikaa ndunda kalyilyisa lyeengere ivika ndunda.
Neeni mmbo mukee vailyise kimaruma kya ndera yakwa shammeemuvia.

Kekaeny-fo mukulunngye neeny, neeny shivekaa-fo shikulunngye neeni. Kikava shaasa iramba lyilashiidimaa ivika ndunda lyikee kyaanya kya vayo kwakooya kulaore lyikulunngye na nsabibu, neeni ni kiwo-da, kwakooya kulaore mwakaa-fo mukulunngye neeny.”

“Yeny ni nsabibu neeni mukava ni maramba a vayo. Yeto akaa-fo akulungye neeny, neeny shavekaa-fo shikulunngye nawe, mmbwe avikaa ndunda shiingyi. Mashika kwakooya muraukani neeny mmushiidimaa itana kindo nta-fo.
Kwakooya kulaore nndu akaa-fo akulungye neeny mmbo asheerwaa poo sha iramba nandeuma. Nang'u akasanyiryo andeerwa murony akorwa.
Kwakooya mwakaa-fo mukulunngye neeny na marero yoo akwa kwakooya mwakaa nang'u efo nriminy, mmbo muningwaa wo kindo mwankunda ikitereva-u.
Kindo Nde-yaakwa akooya ing'aniswa nakyo ni elyi mwavika ndunda shiingi, mukashiviiya vakiloshyony vakwa.
Shaasa Nde aleshikunda yeny neeny shavemukunda yeni, kyekaeny na ukundi yelo lwakwa.
Kwakooya mwaringa mavavaso akwa llyoo-ny mushekaa na ukundi lwakwa. Shaasa na yeny shiriingye mavavaso a Nde-yaakwa shavekaa na ukundi lwakwe.
Akakakyo shammeemuvia indo naambo nsia yeto ushitiri yeny ukooye imwaanga yeni na nsia yeto wany weende ing'ana.
Ivavaso lyakwa mmbo lyikee indi, kundaniny muveni na veni shaasa shilevemukunda yeni.
Nta nkwiifoo nndu atiri ukundi uniini ngota elyi areka muu wakwe kimaruma kya mbuya takwe-fo.
Naasa yeni mmuvaa mbuya takwa, kwakooya mwatana kindo yeny shilemuvavasya.

Nta nshikimuvaangaa-se mashinga-fo, mashika nndu ishinga nnamanyaa kindo nndumi yeto wakwe ee-fo atanaa-fo, mmbo shammeemuvaanga ni mbuya, kimmba efyo shileita fyuuka kwa Nde mfyo shilemusununndya fyoose.

Nta shi yeni muleshisauwa-fo. Ni yeny shilemusauwa yeni, shamuruma mweende mundevika ndunda. Na ndunda yeto tany muvikaa tikooye ikaafo llung'anu. Na wo kindo mwankitereva Nde kikee kya irina lyakwa naambo naidimi imuniinga.
Naasa ivavaso lyakwa lyikava llyo elyo lyeamba, Kundaniny!”
“Kwakooya ulana yelu lwamusua, manyiny mmbo lulelava ishisua yeny kulaore lwammusua yeni.
Kukooye mwekee vakyuulana, ulana yelu mmbo lwemukundaa lwiishi mukee va vayo. Indi elyi mwanra mulava vakyuulana neeny shamusauwa shimuuta ulaniny, nkyo kimaruma ulana lukamusua yeni.

Kekummbweny kirero kilya shilemuvia shaamba, nkwiifo nndu kishinga airye nndumi wakwe-fo. Kwankooya mmbo valeshuumbuta yeny, neeni-da mmbo vashemuumbutaa kukooye veeringaa ndera yeyo yakwa, mmbo veeringaa na yeyo yaany.
Kya indi efyo fyoose mmbo vashemutannyaa kimaruma kya irina lyakwa kimmba valaishi yeto aleshiruma.
Kukooye kulaore shilesha neesherera nawo mmbetiri uvingo lwa ulyamari-fo. Indi ulaalu mmbatiri kindo kyeekuringa kyeekuuta ulyamari yelo lwawo-fo.
Nndu kashisua yeny, mmbo avesua na Nde-yaakwa.
Kukooye kulaore shiletana mashora alya efo nnang'ani yaawo alya nndu ungyi nalandeetani, mmbeetiri uvingo lwa ulyamari-fo. Indi ulaalu mmbo valollye-da vakaveshisua yeny na Nde-yaakwa vakavensua.
Mmbo kileenda indo naambo kirero kilya kiinukye kilya kikee kireiye efo uvavasony lwawo kyeamba, ‘Mmbo valeshisua kikee kyaa ruu parany.’ “
“Indi Mweekyi yeto shinrumaa auka kwa Nde, akee Mumuyo asheendee mbony ta dede, kwakooya ansha, mmbo asheshivikyaa ukureeki.
Na yeni ni kiwo-da mushevikaa-u ukureeki kimmba muvandami neeny uka elyo mapookyony.”
“Na kyashiniinga shamuvia indo nnaambo mulaoni nsindara. Mmbo vakaa vamwaante efo ikwaanuny lyawo.
Eeda, kushaa kyeeri wo nndu amuwaa naambe mmbo atana kindo kyeeinndya Iruva.
Na kivaniingaa vatani indo, nyelyi valaishi nta Nde, nta yeny valashiishi.
Na kimaruma shamuvia indo, kyeeri ekyo kikamfika naambo mumanyi ni yeny shimuni shilelava imuvia indo.” “Nta nshilemuvia indo uka elyo mapookyony-fo, mashika llyo shekee neeni ando amwi.
Ulaalu mmbo shiifo nkweenngyaa kwa yeto aleshiruma. Naasa nta umwi wa kunu nnang'ani yaany ee-fo ashivesaa naambe, ‘Kwi kusheendaa-fo.’
Indi elyi shamuvia indo, na yeni mukaishwa fyoova shapu efo nriminy.
Na yeny shamuvia kya dede, elyi nsheendaa, yeni mushuutaa-u iviiri. Mashika shanra shilaenda, yeto Mweekyi yeto nnyashaa kwany-fo. Indi kwakooya shameenda llyo nshenrumaa kwany.
Nawe elyi asheshaa ashesununndyaa ulana yelu kya ulyamari na kya usumanu na kya mwaandu.
Kya ulyamari nnyelyi valema ikusirya neeny.
Na kya usumanu nyeelyi shiifo nkweenngyaa kwa Nde, na yeni mulakishilollyaa-se.
Na kya mwaandu nyeelyi nniini wa ulana yelo ammaa yuutwa uvingo.”
“Mmbo shetiri-se mmbony shiingyi shekundye imuvia kya indi nyeeli mulashiidima itifita ulaalu.

Indi kyeeri we asheshaa, we Mumuyo mmbo asheendee mbony ta dede, mmbwe ashemooraa shia mumanyi findo fya dede fyoose. Nawe nta nnashereraa afyuuta kwakwe muni-fo. Ni mbony yeto amiita nto ashetyaambaa toose, na findo fikaa fishe nfyo ashemoongoyaa.
Nawe ni yeny asheshing'anisaa kimmba mbony yeto ashemoongoyaa ni kunu kwakwa ashetuutaa.
Na findo fyoose Nde atiri mfyakwa. Nkyo kimaruma shamuvia, mbony ashemoongoyaa ni kunu kwakwa ashetiutaa.”
“Kwiirishe kinnywa mmushekishilollyaa-se. Kuveirisha-se kinnywa muvewuya ishilollya.”

Naasa valya vakiloshyony maata vakaviana wo veni na veni. “A ekyo aluvia nkyoki ndesa? Kwiirishe kinnywa mmushe kishilollyaa-se-fo. Kuveirisha-se kinnywa muwuye ishilollya. Kaveamba, ‘Shiifo nkweenngyaa kwa Nde?’ “
Naasa vakaamba, A ekyo aamba kya iirisha kinnywa nkyoki ndesa? Llwiishi kindo aamba-fo.
Naasa Yesu kamanya mmbo vakunndye immbesa, kavavia, “Kindo mwiifo mushuumburanaa nyelyi shaamba, ‘Kwiirishe kinnywa mmushekishilollyaa-se-fo. Kuveirisha kinnywa muwuye ishilollya.’ “
Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, “Yeni mmbo mushefuaa na ikapa kiiyo lyo ulana yelu lo lushefuraa-dwa. Na yeni mushesokywaa mfyoova. Kusyeny-do fyoova efyo fyany fikaa fyaaluke nsia mweni.

Nndu nka kafika kyeeri kyakwe kya iira mwana mmbo ating'wa kimmba kyeeri kyamfika. Indi kamaa iira mwana nnakikummbwaa-se ngatara ilya-fo kimaruma kya nsia untiri kya nndu amiirwa aendwa kunu ulaniny.”
Na yeni ni kiwo-da, “Kyeeri kya ulaalu mwiifo musokywa mfyoova. Indi nshemulollyaa-se lyingi, na mirima yaany ifure, na nsia yeto wany nkwiifo nndu ashemusokaa-fo.
Na nkonu yeto ukamfika, mmusheshivesaa-se kindo-fo. Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, kwakooya mwatereva Nde kindo na kikava ki ashemuniingaa kikee kya irina lyakwa.
Fyeeri efi fika ulaalu mulandetereva kindo kikee kya irina lyakwa-fo. Ketereveny, nalyo musheniingwaa, na nsia wany wiishwe shapu.”
“Marero yoo shammeerera neeni mmbo ekee a fyaaso. Indi kyeeri kiifo kishaa shilakireraa-se neeni fikee fya fyaaso-fo. Llyo nshemoongoyaa mbony ta Nde paa.
Na nkonu yeto ukamfika llyo musheterevaa kikee kya irina lyakwa. Nta nshamuvia ni yeny nshemuterevyaa Nde-fo.
Mashika we Nde amukunndye muni, kimmba mwammeeshikunda yeny mukavekusirya kwakwa mwiishi mmbo shilesha shyuuka kwa Nde.
Shilesha shyuuka kwa Nde, shakusheya na kunu ulaniny. Na ulalu shiifo mmbukaa-se kunu ulaniny, shiwuye ikweenngya kwa Nde.”
Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakaamba, “Ate ulaalu kwarera paa, kulakirere-se na fyaaso-fo.
Na yese lwammeekumanya ulaalu mmbo kwiishi findo fyoose nta kulatiri kivesyo ni nndu. Nkyo kimaruma lukakusirya neewe lwiishi mmbo kusheye kuuka kwa Iruva muni.”
Yesu kavaalwa, “Ulaalu mwammbaany vandu vakusirye-u indo?
Llen-te, kukaa kufike kyeeri na isha kyammeesha neeni mundenyanyatwa, wo nndu na kyeny kwakwe muni mushireeye-u shimuni. Nta nshakaa-fo shimuni-fo, mashika ni Nde wakwa akaa-fo neeny.”
Marero yoo mmbo shammaarera mukooye itira ufoo mukulunngye neeny. Mukee kunu ulaniny mmbo mukee na fimusisiraa. Kaaryeny, yeny mmbo shammbinga ulana elo.
Yesu ekimaa irera marero yoo kainuya miso na efo uuwe kaamba, “Woi Nde akakakyi kyeeri kyamfikany. Kundany ing'anisa Mwana wafo, na Mwana wafo nakooye ikung'anisa yewe.
Kiryani na elyi kunniingye ushilyi lweeshillya findo fyoose, na efyo kunniingye naambo nakooye ifilyimmya muu wa lung'anu fyoose.
Na muu wa llung'anu ukavaany ule, ni ikumanya yewe mmbo kukee Iruva dede, na yeto kulenruma we Yesu Kristo.
Yeny mmbo shilekung'anisa shikee kunu ulaniny shiinutye ishora elyo kushiniingye shilyitani.
Na ulaalu woi Nde shing'anisaany efo kwafo kwashiniinga nng'anu ulya shetiri efo kwafo kulaore ulana lwammbikwa.
Mmbo shilesukuya vandu yewo irina lyafo, yewo kuleshiniinga kunu ulaniny. Vekee vafo, neewe kwavashiniinga. Nawo mmbo vammeeringa ndera yafo.
Ulaalu vakamanya efyo fyoose kushiiniinngye mmbo fyauka kwafo.
Kimmba marero yoo kuleshianiinga nng'u shilevaniinga nawo. Nawo vakaawarya. Vakamanya dede mmbo shileuka kwafo. Vakakooya ikusirya-u ni yewe kuleshiruma.
Neeny mmbo yewo shavaterevya. Nshi ulana yelo shaluterevya-fo, ni yewo kushiniinngye kiimmba mmbo vakee vafo.
Na efyo fikee fyakwa fikaveva fyafo fyoose. Na efyo fikee fyafo fikaveva fyakwa-da. Neeny efo kwawo shava nng'u shammeeng'anisywa.”
“Neeny nshikikee-se kunu ulanin-fo. Nawo mmbo vakee kunu ulaniny. Neeny shiifo nkusheyaany kwafo. Woi Nde Mweele, varinge vakae na irina lyafo elyo kushiniinngye yeny nawo vakooye iva vamwi na yese.
Meendi sheekee nawo ni yeny shileva mwiivaringa kyikee kya irina lyafo. Shavaauwa, nta nkwiifo nndu waawo alereka-u kulaore ni mwana yeto wa ureti-fo, naambo kilya kikee kireiye kikooye indeinukya.
Indi ulaalu shiifo nkusheyaa na kwafo, na marero yoo sharera shikee kunu ulaniny naambo vakooye ikaa na nsia yeto shitiri nato weende ing'ana efo miriminy yaawo.
Yeny mmbo shivalyimmyi ndera yafo na ulana yelu lukauta-u ivasua kimmba valakee va ngata ya ulana, shaasa na yeny shilakee wa ngata ya ulana.
Nshi shavaterevya kuvaute kunu ulanin-fo. Ni ivaringa vakie yeto nkasha.
Wo nshi va ulana yelu-fo shaasa na yeny shilakee wa mushu ya ulana yelu.
Vavike veele na ekyo kyikee dede Irero lyafo llyo dede.
Na shaasa kuleshiruma shishe kunu ulaniny, ni indo neeny shilevaruma vafike ulaniny.
Na kimaruma kyawo shakuvika mweele naambo nawo-da vakooye ivikwa veele.”
“Indi lyo nshi kyawo-da shatereva-fo. Mmbo shakummbwa na yewo vashevaa vandu vakusirye neeny, kyeendwa ni kirero kyawo.
Nawo vakooye iva vamwi woose shaasa yewe Nde kusangi neeny neeny shivesangyi neewe, naambo nawo-da vave vandu vasangyi neese, na ulana yelu luute-u ikusirya-u mmbo kuleshiruma yeny.
Na usuri yelo kushilyimmyi yeny neeny mmbo shivevalyimmye wo, naambo vakooye iva vamwi,
Neeny shive mmbo nsangyi neewe neewe kusange neeny nawo-da vakooye iinutya iva vamwi, na ulana yelu luute-u imanya mmbo kuleshiruma yeny, kwavevakunda shaasa kuleshikunda yeny.

Woi Nde mmbo shakunda kya yewo kuleshivaniinga, nawo-da vakooye ikaa ando amwi neeny efo kundo shikai, naambo vakooye ilollya usuri lwakwa kushiniinngye kimmba kuleshikunda kulaore ulana yelu lwammbeiywa.
Woi Nde kukee wa usumanu na ulana yelu nta lulakwiishi, yeny mmbo shilekumanya. Na yewo-da vakavemanya yewe mmbo kuleshiruma.
Neeny shavarambuya irina lyafo, na lyingyi nsheengeraa ivarambuya na ukundi yelo kuleshikunda luvakaye efo nriminy, neeny shive mmbo nsangyi nawo.”
Naasa elyi Yesu ammaa irera indo kakwiipoo-fo aryani na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe. Kandefika kulya kwakulya ya imungo lya Kedroni kulya nndeny. Nalyo kaira nafo aryani na valya vakiloshyony vakwe.
Naasa na Yuda ulya anndiinngyaa eishi ando alya mashika mfo kundo Yesu na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe valeva vesasanngyaa-fo keengi.
Naasa Yuda kandoondwa itorito lyilya lyeefo lya vasikari na vasero va poo maata va efo kwa vakohani vaniini na Vafarisayo. Kasha nafo aryani nawo varie fimishamisha na taa na fisha.
Naasa Yesu emmanya filya fishenkooyaa fyoose. Kasomuka na efo shia kavavia, “A nndu mwiinnduuyaa ni vi?”
Vakanndouwa, “Ni Yesu wa kulya Nasareti.” Yesu kavavia, “Mmbwe yeny.” Naasa kusalalye-fo na Yuda ulya mwiinndinngya aryani nawo.
Naasa elyi avavia, “Mmbwe yen”, nawo vakawuya na numa vakawa sumbai.
Naasa kawuya kavavesa lya kavii, “A nndu mwiinnduuyaa ni viiny?” Nawo vakaamba, “Ni Yesu wa kulya Nasareti.”
Yesu kavavia, “Shammeemuvia, mmbwe yeny. Kwakooya ni yeny mushiruuyaa lekeyeny yeva-te vakweenngye!”
Kikaenda indo naambo kilya alerera kindeinukya indo kyeamba, “Valya kuvashiniinngye nshilereta-u nta umwi-fo.”
Naasa Simon Petro etiri usu, kalusommwa kakapa nalo kishinga kya nkohani nniini kammaswa kuri ka woko usha, irina lya kishinga kilya ni Maliko.
Naasa Yesu kavia Petro, “Viira usu efo kipony kya vayo. Upata yelu Nde ashiniinga mmbo kukundye shire shilaluna ndesa?”
Naasa itorito lyilya lya vasikari lyiryani na vaniini vawo na vasoro valya va poo va Vayuda vakatira Yesu vakamfinga.
Vakanrwaa kulya kwa Anasi, mashika we eekee ndeyaanka wa Kayafa ulya eekee nkohani nniini mwaaka ulya. "
Na Kayafa mmbwe ulya aleniinga Vayuda irero llya ashaambaa, mmbo kyamuviiya kisha nndu umwi nafwe ando a vandu va uruka loose.
Naasa Simion Petro eefo alaatyaa Yesu, na ungyi wa vakiloshyony nawe-da. Naasa nndu ulya wa kiloshyony aishivani na nkohani ulya nniini. Kaira na efo poo kwa nkohani ulya nniini ando amwi na Yesu.

Naasa Petro kairisha yoo ngiriny yoo kimbengeny. Nalyo ulya ungyi wa kiloshyony ulya aishivani na nkohani ulya nniini kasomuka na mbengeny. Karera na nka ulya kishinga mwiringa ngiri kaita Petro na efo kari.
Nalyo nka ulya kishinga mwiiringa ngiri kavia Petro, " “Na yewe-da nshi kukee nndu wa kiloshyony kya nndu yeto?” Nawe kaamba, “Nshiwe yeny-fo!” "
Naasa kusalalye-fo mashinga na vasoro valya va efo poo vaatye muro wa makaa mashika kwee-fo mbeo, vakaora muro.
Naasa nkohani ulya nniini kavesa Yesu kya vakiloshyon kyakwe na kya miloshye yakwe.

Yesu kamwaallwa, " “Yeny mmbo shirerye paa ulana lukaita. Yeny nkonu simu shileva mwiilosha efo mmba teeterevya na efo mmba ya Iruva efo kundo Vayuda woose vakwaanannya. Nta shilarere kindo kirika-fo.
A elyi kwashivesa yeny nkiki? Kyevesa yewo valeita kindo shilerera! Yewo mbo vaishi kindo yeny shileamba.”
Na elyi arera indo nndu umwi wa vasoro valya vapoo kakapa Yesu woi kaamba, “A niindo kwakara irouwa nkohani nniini?”
Yesu kanndouwa, “Kwakooya mmbo sharera kikasha oraany ukasha lwavayo! Indi kwakooya ni kisha, a ekyo kwashikapya nkyoki?”
Naasa Anasi kanrika akee mfinge nafitwa kulya kwa nkohani ulya nniini muni, mmbwe Kayafa.
Naasa Simon Petro karewa asalalyi-fo ashooraa muro. Nalyo vakammbia, “Na yewe-da, a nshi kukee wa kiloshyony kyakwe?” Nawe kalema-fushu, kaamba, “Nshiwe yeny-fo!”
Naasa mashinga a nkohani nniini ulya umwi waawo akee mfyari wa ulya Petro alemmaswa kuri kammbia, “A nshi shakulollya alya nndeny kuryani nawe?” "
Naasa Petro kalema-fushu lyingi. Nalyo yeni oro ya nguku ikakapa.

Nalyo vakauta Yesu kulya kwa Kayafa vakanrwaa efo mmba ya ushilyi ya Pilato. Naasa kyeeri kikava kya ngama. Nawo veni nta valaange efo mmba ya nshilyi wa Kaisari naasa valakooye itefuka naambo vaidimi ilya Pasaka.
Nalyo Pilato kasomuka na poo ando vakai kaamba, " “A nkyo kikumbo ki mweende kya nndu yeu?”
Vakaallwa vakammbia, “Kwee nndu yeu kulaore ekee mwiitana makasha nta llweshaa ishenrambikya maakony afo-fo.”
Nalyo Pilato kavavia, “Mwiipoony yeni-te munderummbwa kyakwe kisumani na mavavaso a ki-kwany.” Nalyo Vayuda vakammbia, “Llutiri muumu wewaa nndu-fo.”
Nakyo kikaenda indo naambo kirero kilya kya Yesu kindeinukya kilya aleamba kya ufu ashefwaa llwa ngata ingai?
Nalyo Pilato kawuya yaanga na efo mmba ya ushilyi. Kavaanga Yesu kammbia, “A yewe mmbo kukee mangyi ya Vayuda?”
Yesu kaallwa, “Elyi kwarera indo mmbo kwakyuuta kwafo ku muni, ao ni vandu vengyi vakuvia indo kyakwa?”
Pilato kaallwa, “A yeny mmbo shikee Myuda-ro? Ni vandu va uruka lwafo sanda na vakohani vaniini mmbo vakurambikya kunu maakony akwa. A ekyo kuletana nkyoki ndesa?”

Yesu kaallwa, “Kya umangyi lwakwa, nshi luukye kunu ulaniny-fo. Kwee ni kunu ulaniny umangyi lwakwa luukye, vasoro vakwa mmbo veshikapanyaa, shilashe irammbikywa maakony a Vayuda yewo. Indi ulaalu shaasa kyikai, umangyi lwakwa nshi lwa kunu-fo.”

Nalyo Pilato kammbia, “A kwavevaany mangi-ro?” Yesu kaallwa, “Ni yewe kwakyaamba kumuni mmbo shaveva mangyi-da. Kimaruma shawonika na kimaruma shasha na kunu ulaniny ni indevikya ekyo kyikee dede ukureeki. Na wo nndu aparikyeny efo dedeny mmbwe ashaaranyaa unyanga lwakwa.”
Pilato kammbia, “A yekyo kyikee dede nkyoki-ro?” Ekyaamba indo kawuya isomuka lyingyi na poo kundo Vayuda vakai, kavavia, “Nshakooya kindo kya uvingo lwakwe nta kyimwi-fo.”
“Neeni mmbo mwiishivie ishitereva shimuporomuye nndu umwi nkonu yeto wa Pasaka. Naasany mwakunda shimuporomuye mangyi yeyo yaany?”
Nalyo vakakapa kyoorongye lyingyi vakaamba, “Nshi yeto-fo, ni Baraba! Nawe Baraba eekee nndu mwaala shia.”
Kifika yoo nalyo Pilato kaamba Yesu nadekapwa na ngova.
Nalyo vasikari valya vakaoka ureto lwa miinga vakammbika nrweny. Vakavemmbika na soori ya yeerya ifwani kinyanyari.
Vakasha isalala yoo usumanu nawo vakaamba, “Lwakwiidikira mangyi ya Vayuda!” Vakava vankapaa-ny ngyoyi.
Pilato kawuya kasomuka lyingyi na poo kavavia, “Akakau shamweende na kunu poo kundo mukai mukooye imanya nshaona kindo kya uvingo lwakwe-fo.”
Naasa Yesu kasomuka na efo poo aree ureto lulya lwa miinga na soori ilya ya yeerya ifwani kinyanyari. Nalyo kavavia, “Llen-te nndu yeu shaasa aamba!”

Naasa vakohani valya vaniini vasangyi na vasoro valya vawo va efo poo valollya vakakapa kyoorongye vashaambaa, “Endenkapye nsalaben! Endenkapye nsalaben!” Pilato kavavia, “Nkamareny yeni-te mundenkapya nsalabeny, mashika yeny nshilollye kindo kya uvingo kwakwe-fo.”
Vayuda vakaamba, “Yese mmbo lutiri ivavaso lya kikweru, na ivavaso yelyo kwakooya lyaindyo we kuti nafwe, kimmba akwaallwa Mwana wa Iruva we muni.”
Naasa elyi aita vaamba indo nawe kaengera iiryaa.
Kawuya yaanga lyingyi na efo mmba ya nshilyi wa Kaisari kavia Yesu, “A yewe ni nndu wakwi? Naasa Yesu nta nalanndouwe kindo.”
Pilato kammbia, “A mmbo kulaishi yeny shitiri ushilyi lwekuporomwa, shivetiri na ushilyi lwekukapya nsalabeny?”
Yesu kaallwa, “Nkutiri ushilyi neeny kwee kulaore kweeluningyo luuka efo uuwe-fo. Nkyo kyaniinga yeto ashirambikya kunu maakony afo kava mmbo awonisa ulyamari uniini nnu.”

Kipookyaany lyo Pilato karuuya mwaanya weemporomwa. Naasa Vayuda vakava vankapyaany kyoorongye veshaambaa, “Kwakooya kwamporomwa nkukee nndu akundani na Kaisari-fo. Wo nndu akwaallwa mangyi we muni mmbo alema Kaisari.”

Naasa elyi Pilato aita vaamba indo, nalyo kaamba, “Yesu narawa na efo poo.” Kashekaa rembo yoo kitiminy kya ushilyi efo kundo kuvaangwaa, “Mmbengye shaale mawe.” (Na irina lya vayo lya Kiebrania ni Gabata.)
Naasa na nkonu ulya ni nkonu weekudeesya ni kyeeri kya saa irindaru. Nalyo kavia Vayuda, “Llen-te mangyi yaany.”

Nawo vakakapa kyoorongye veshaambaa, “Muute yaa! Muute yaa! Kundenkapya nsalabeny.” Pilato kavavia, “A shitani shakapya mangyi yaany nsalabeny?” Vakohani valya vaniini vakaallwa, “Yese llutiri mangyi kulaore ni Kaisari-fo.”
Naasa kifikaa yoo nalyo kandenrambikya maakony awo nandekapyo nsalabeny. Vakaenda varie Yesu.
Nawe kaenda akurikye nsalaba wakwe muni. Kauka kulya muriny, kafika kundo kuvaangwaa ni kisharongony. Na irina lya Kiebrania ni Golgota.
Nafo vakankapya-fo nsalabeny. Vakansanda na vengi vavii, umwi taari yei na ungyi taari yei. Yesu kakaa yoo nnang'ani.
Naasa Pilato kareiya kiipoo kyeologya kakikapya yoo nsalabeu kwa uuwe. Na kikee kireiye-u indi: “YEU NI YESU WA NASARETI MANGYI YA VAYUDA.”
Naasa kipoo kilya Vayuda veengyi vakakisoma, mashika alya Yesu akapywa nsalabeu kukee kufii na kulya muriny. Na marero akee mareiye-u ni a Kiebrania na Kiroma na Kigriki.
Nalyo vakohani valya vaniini va Vayuda vakandevia Pilato, “Nta kulareiye kyeamba, Akee mangyi ya Vayuda-fo-te! Mmbo kureiyaa kyeamba, Nndu yeto aleamba, Yeny ni mangyi ya Vayuda!”
Pilato kaallwa, “Kindo shanndeiya ni ekyo shammereiya naasa.”
Naasa vasikari elyi vakapya Yesu nsalabeny vakaipoo soori takwe, vakaava fyenga fiina wo nsikari na kyenyga kyakwe, na soori ilya ya mwiiliny nnyitiri ufumu-fo mmbo ikee shooke ikarayo.

Nalyo vakaviana wo veni na veni, “Yeyo lulashe iirandwa-fo. Ndifony lwikapye kura ilolwa yeto immboyaa.” Naasa kyikaenda indo naambo-kilya kyikee kireiye kindeinukya kyeamba, “Valava soori takwa. Na masara akwa vakaakapya kura.” Naasa vasikari valya ni indo valetana.
Naasa kulya kufii na nsalaba ulya wa Yesu kusalalye-fo maye na mfwamaye wa maye na Maria ulya nka wa Kleopa na Maria wa kulya Magdala.
Nalyo Yesu alollya maye na ulya wa kiloshyony aitani nawe, kavia maye, “Nka, yeu mmbwe mwana wafo.”
Kawuya kavia ulya wa kiloshyony, “Yeu mmbwe mau!” " Nalyo kyeeri kilya kyenyi ulya wa kiloshyony kanrwaa na efo kyeny kwakwe.
Yoo numa Yesu kamanya fyoose mmbo fyammarisyo kundeinutyo filya fikee fireiye. Nalyo kaamba, " “Shaakuka.”
Naasa kukee kusimbite-u kiiya kitiri mfinyo utarang'aa. Nalyo vakaipoo kyoonga-mura vakakiishura mfinyo ulya utarang'aa, vakakivika irereny vakanrwaaya yoo kaniny.
Naasa Yesu ekina mfinyo ulya utarang'aa kaamba, “Kyamminutyo!” " Kainyika nrwe kakumba muu kafwa!

Naasa elyi nkonu wiifoo ukee wa ikudeesya Vayuda vakalollya nshi kisha miili ilya ilale kulya nsalabeu nkonu wa Sabato-fo. Na Sabato, yekee nkonu nniini deny. Vakandetereva Pilato mafua alya awo andefishwa-fishwa vavanuwa-fo. "
Nalyo vasikari valya vakasha nafo, vakafisha mafua a ulya wa mbee na ulya ungyi valya vakapyo nsalabeny ando amwi na Yesu.
Naasa vakafikya Yesu. Vakakooya ate ammefwa, nalyo valakimfishe-fishe-se mafua.
Indi vasikari valya ulya umwi kandosha yoo uvari na ifumu. Nang'u akataa mura usangyi na samu.
Na yeto akilolye kava mmbo avikau ukureekyi. Na ukureekyi lwakwe ni lwa dede. Nawe aishi ni kya dede, arera, na yeni-da naambo muvange ikusirya-u.
Mashika kyaniinga kikaenda indo ni kilya kikee kireiye naambo kindeinukya indo kyeamba, “Nashefishwaa nta ifua-fo.”
Kukavekaa-fo kindo kyikee kireiye kingyi kyeamba, Vakaa valollye yeto valenndosha na ifumu.

Naasa filya fimiira Yosefu wa kulya Arimataya kasha nawe akee wa kiloshyony kya Yesu kirika kimaruma kya iiryaa Vayuda. Kashetereva Pilato muumu wendevanwa mwiili ulya wa Yesu. Pilato kammbikya muumu. Naasa kasha nang'u kauvanwa.
Naasa Nikodemu kasha nafo ulya alensheya llya lya mbee kyeeri kya kio. Kasha arie manemane isasangyi na muya ya ngata ingyi ifwaamaa nafyo fyamaa kilo makumi araru indi.
Naasa vakaipoo mwiili ulya wa Yesu, vakauososya sooriny shaa teerika vakasanda na miri ilya ifwaamaa shaasa kikee mbuka ya Vayuda yerika vafu vawo.
Naasa na alya alekapyo nsalabeny kweifo nnda. Na efo nndeny ulya kweifo mbanga shiiya yerika ikee shidoshe iweny, nafo kulandearwa nndu-fo.
Nafo vakaara-fo Yesu mashika nkonu ulya mbwekudeesya wa Vayuda na mbanga ilya ikaveva kufii.
Naasa nkonu ulya wepooka mfungare elyi ngama nraasi na ivishi-vishi, nalyo Maria wa kulya Magdala kandefika alya mbangeny, kakooya iwe llya lyambutwa yoo mbangeny.
Nalyo kaenda sere kafika kulya kwa Simion Petro na nndu ulya wa kiloshyony Yesu eetani nawe. Kavavia, “Ate vamiipoo-fo Nndumi kulya mbangeny nta lulaishi kundo veenda imbika.”
Naasa Petro kakwipoo-fo na ulya ungyi wa kiloshyony. Vakawara shia yefika kulya mbangeny.
Vakaenda veerisha ve vavii. Nalyo ulya ungyi wa kiloshyony karisha uviny kailanya Petro, kapooka ifika alya mbangeny.
Nawe kaimaiya-fo akulemmyi kalollya soori tilya teerika tikee shivike-fo, nta nalaange nafo.
Naasa Simion Petro kafika-u ashe numa yakwe. Nalyo kaira na efo mbangeny. Kalollya soori tilya tikee shivike-fo.
Na kirami kilya ekee mfingyeny nrony, nakyo kilakee kivike ando amwi na soori tilya teerika, kikee kyososye ando engyi kikakaa kyaanya kya vayo.
Nalyo na ulya ungyi wa kiloshyony kaveiira nafo ulya alepooka ifika alya mbangeny. Kalollya kakusirya-u.
Mashika valendeitumuso kilya kikee kireiye kyeamba, “Mmbo kikee kirummbwe nanderuka auka kwa vafu.”
Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakakwiipoo-fo vakawuya na kyenyy.
Naasa Maria karewa asalali yoo usumanu na mbanga ilya yoo kipoo ashiiyaa. Naasa elyi eefo ashiiyaa kakulema kaimaiya efo mbangeny.
Kalollya vasu va Iruva vavii varee soori timikamikaa vakee-fo rembo. Ulya umwi kakaa yoo kinrony na ungi kimarendeny alya ando mwiili ulya wa Yesu wekee mwaare.
Nawo vakammbia, “A yewe nka nkikyi kwiiyaa?” Kavavia, “Mmbo vamipoo-fo Nndumi ulya wakwa. Neeny nta shilamanyi kundo vambika!”
Ekyaamba indo kainduka kalla numa kalolya Yesu asalali-u nta nalamanyi ni Yesu.

Yesu kammbia, “A nkikyi elyi kukeiya? Mmbi mai kukennduuya?” Nawe kakummbwa kulakooye ni mwiremya nnda ulya. Kammbia, “Nndumi kwakooya ni yewe kwamwipoo-fo, shiviany kundo kwaenda imbika neeny shyeende imoondwa-fo.”
Yesu kammbia, “Maria-ro!” Nawe kainduka kammbia, kwa Kiebrania, “Raboni!” Nakyo mmbo kyaamba, “Llosha wakwa!”

Yesu kammbia, “Nta kulashitire-fo. Shamashika shilanderwa na efo kwa Nde. Mmbo kushendaa kwa vanavama vakwa kundevavia, shiifo shirwaa neefo kwa Nde-yaakwa, nawe ni Nde waany, efo kwa Iruva wakwa nawe na Iruva waany.”
Maria wa kulya Magdala kaenda kanderuuya valya vakiloshyony kavavia, “Mmbo shallollya Nndumi.” " Kavewoongoya na kilya ammbia.

Naasa nkonu ulya mweni-da ukee nkonu wepooka mfungare elyi nkwaany na myaango yanrayo ya iira na alya vakiloshyony vakuumbye mashika elyi veereiye Vayuda, nalyo Yesu kasha nang'u kasalala yoo nnang'ani yaawo kavavia, " “Sindeny na Ufoo!”
Amaamba indo kawoora maako alya akwe na uvari lulya lwakwe. Nalyo valya vakiloshyony vakafura elyi valolya Nndumi.
Karera lya kavii kavavia, “Sindeny na ufoo, Shaasa Nde aleshiruma yeny, neeny ni kiwo-da shavemuruma yeni.”
Arera indo kavavia, “Waryeny Mumuyo Mweele.
Vandu mwambafwaaya ulyamari lwawo, vamaifwaayo. Na vandu mwambavikya ishingo kya ulyamari, lwawo, vammaa ivikyo ishingo.”
Naasa umwi wa vakiloshyony ni Toma, na irina lyakwe lya kavii avaangwaa Wamaasa, nawe nalaiyo ando amwi nawo kyeeri kilya Yesu alesha nang'u.

Naasa vakiloshyony valya vengyi vakandemoongoya, vakammbia, “Lwallolya Nndumi!” Nawe kavavia, “Shanra shilalolya ngoru ta misumari ilya efo maakony akwe, nepaana ngoru ta misumari na nni, nepaana uvari lwakwe na woko, yeny nshishekusiryaa-u-fo.”

Naasa kukaira-u mikonu nyanya na valya vakiloshyony vakee lyingyi efo mmba na Toma aveiyo ando amwi nawo. Yesu kasha nang'u, na myaango ikee miraye, kashesalala yoo nnang'ani kaamba, “Sindeny na ufoo.”
Kawuya kavia Toma, “Kyeende nni wafo na yaa kulole maako akwa kuveende na woko lwafo kupaani nalo uvari lwakwa naambo kulave mwira ikusirya-u! Vaany nndu mwikunda ikusirya-u.”
Toma kaallwa kammbia, “Nndumi wakwa na Iruva wakwa!”
Yesu kammbia, “Kwanshilollya nkyo kyakuniinga kwakusirya-u, ngoma vandu vakusirya-u valalollya.”
Naasa kukavekaa-fo na findo fingyi fiingyi Yesu aletana fyeyoora ngyende valya vakiloshyony valollye. Nafyo filakee fireiye fikavikwa kunu kitabuny ekyi-fo.
Indi filereiyo ni efi fyeni naambo mukooye iva vandu vavangyi ikusirya na Yesu mmbo akee Kristo we Mwana wa Iruva na efo kikusiryony ekyo mukooye-fo muu mukutire na irina lyakwe.
Naasa elyi numa ya vayo Yesu kawuya ikoora lyingyi na valya vakiloshyony vakee kulya waambeu lwa yeeve ilya ya Galilaya. Na shaasa alekoora nawo kyikee indi.
Ni Simion Petro vekee ando amwi na Toma ulya avaangwa Wamaasa na Natanaeli wa kulya Kana ya kulya Galilaya, na vana valya va Sebedayo na vengyi-se vavii va efo kiloshyony kyakwe.
Simon Petro kavavia, “Nsheendaany indereiya makunga.” Vakammbia, “Neese-da lusheendaa neewe.” Vakakwiipoo vakasaama na efo ngalaveny. Nalyo kio kilya valatire nta kindo.
Naasa kwamfika kwiikyaa, Yesu kashesalala alya waambeu, indi valya vakiloshyony valamanyi ni Yesu.
Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Nyira fivana a mmbo mulatiri kindo kyelya?” Vakammbia, “Oode mbee!”
Kavavia, “Oloteny mireiyo yoo taari ya woko usha lwa ngalava yeyo. Mmbo mushewonisaa!” Nalyo vakoolota-fo. Nawo valakiidimi-se yoomwa vaalutye uuwe kimaruma kya makunga ammba kilula.
Nalyo ulya wa kiloshyony Yesu aitani nawe kavia Petro, “Ate ni Nndumi!” Naasa Simon Petro ekiita ni Nndumi kakufinga soori ya uuwe, mashika mmbo eree kirami tupu. Kakoolota efo yeeveny.
Naasa vakiloshyony valya vengyi vakasha variwa ni ngalava ilya mashika mmbeekee kwaasha na alya waambeu-fo. Ando aiyo ni ando sha meta iyana. Vakasha veshomwaa nreiyo ulya wishwe makunga.
Naasa vakooloka-fo vakafika alya wambeu vakalollya kwikee kuvike muro wa makaa na ikunga lyikee ideerye-u na nkate.
Yesu kavavia, “Makunga yoo mwareiya ulaalu indi enden-fo maata!”
Petro kaalukya-fo kaalutya nreiyo ulya na efo wambeu. Nato wishe makunga maniini afikye iyana na makumi araanu na araru. Nang'u Lla ndesa akee meengyi indo, nreiyo ulya ularanduke.
Yesu kavavia, “Oshony-te mushetuka!” " Naasa valya vakiloshyony nta kulakae-fo nndu akarya immbesa, “A yewe ni yewe vi?” Ni elyi vemmanya ni Nndumi.
Yesu kasha nau, kaipoo nkate ulya. Kavaniingya, na ikunga lyilya ni kiwo-da.
Nalyo lyikava lya kararu Yesu alekoora na valya vakiloshyony elyi ammeruka auka kwa vafu.
Naasa elyi vammeetuka, Yesu kavia Simon Petro, " “Simion wa Yohane kushikundye ngota yeva?” Nawe kaamba, “Ee-da Nndumi, yewe kuveishi shikukundye!” Kammbia, “Endeesa ngurana takwa.”
Kawuya kammbia lyingyi lya kavii, “Simion wa Yohane kushikundye ndesa?” Nawe kammbia, “Ee-da Nndumi. Yewe kuveishi yeny shikukundye.” Kammbia, “Endeesa moonri akwa.”

Kammbia lya kararu, “Simion wa Yohane kushikunndye?” Petro kafulukyo elyi ammbia lya kararu, kushikunndye? Nalyo Petro kammbia, “Nndumi mmbo kwiishi findo fyoose, kwavemanya-da mmbo shikukundye.” Yesu kammbia, “Endeesa moonri akwa.”

Ni dede kya dede shakuvia, Elyi kwekee nkoo mmbo kuleva mwikufinga yoo mwiininy kumuni, na kundo kwakunda kwavekweengya-da. Indi elyi kuvaa mmiku mmbo kushorwaa maako afo na ungyi nakufinge yoo mwiininy nakurwaa kundo kulakundye.
Na kyaniinga karera indo ni kya yoolongya ufu akaa nawoni nang'anise nalo Iruva mmbo lushevaa lwa ngata ingai. Nalyo elyi amaamba indo kammbia, shilatyaany.
Petro kainduka kalollya ulya wa kiloshyony ulya Yesu aitani nawe eefo ashaa yoo numa, (nawe mmbwe ulya alekaa rembo yoo uvariny lwakwe llya valelya kilaayo kilya kaamba, “Nndumi a ni vi akuringyaa?”)
Naasa elyi Petro alollya nndu yeto kavia Yesu, “Nndumi a yeu kyakwe ni inda?”
Yesu kaamba, “Kwakooya shakunda yeu nakae-fo shitani shawuya a ekyo kikuwore ki yewe? Yewe shilatya-da!”

Naasa nng'u manuuna alepookya akakwaana efo kwa vana yewo va nka kyeamba nndu yeu wa kiloshyony nnyaafwaa-fo. Na Yesu nnyalembia nnyafwa-fo mmbo alemmbia, shakunda yeu nakae-fo shitani shawuya a ekyo kikuwore ki yewe.
Naasa yeto mmbwe nndu wa kiloshyony avikye-u ukureeki kya mbony yeti kavetireiya. Neese lukamanya na nshushwa sheelyi ukureeki lwakwe mmbo lukee lwa dede.
Naasa kukavekaa-fo na findo fingyi fiingyi Yesu aletana. Nafyo kwee fyeereiyoo fyoose, shikusara ulana elu llweshiidimaa itira fitabu efyo fyereiywaa-fo.
Teofilo wakwa mmbee, kitabu kilya kya mbee shilekireiya mmbo kitiri mbony ta Yesu kya filya alepooka itana na ilosha fyoose,
kutani kwafika nkonu ulya aleipowa na uwe. Nawe ammaa ivavasya vakiloshyony vakwe kwi shia ya Mumuyo Mweele valya emmbasauwa,
valya alekoora nawo na shia shiingi, kyeeri alemaa ilyiswa ukiva, vakamanya akee na muu, kakoora nawo ando a mikonu makumi aana, neerera filya fikwaani na umangyi lwa Iruva.
Kyeeri alekwaanannya nawo mmbo alevavasa valasheuka Yerusalemu, lyo vavereye mbele kyaasa kya Nde, kilya valeita mbony ta vayo kwakwe.
Kyeyaamba sheelyi Yohane we mmura alebatisa nato; kyaindi yeni mmbo mushebatiswaa na Mumuyo Mweele numa ya mikonu yei myaangu.
Naasa kyeeri valekwaananya nawe vakammbesa veshambaa, “Ale Nndumi, kyeeri eki nkyo kusheviryaa Vaisraeli umangi?”
Nawe kavavia. “Nshi kindo kyany imanya meendi na fyeeri efyo Nde avikye efo ushilyiny lwakwe muni-fo.
Lyo mmbo mushewaryaa finya, elyi Mumuyo Mweele ashemusokyaa neeni mushevaa vakureeki vakwa kunu Yerusalemu, na Yudaya koose, na Samaria, na kufike kishingony kya ulana.”
Elyi amaa irera indo, velollye indi, Yesu kaipowa na uwe ifishi lyikammbwarya kooka misony awo.
Kyeeri vekeengera ilola efo uwe iruveeu, llyo ekeerwa na uwe, pari pari ekakava vasero vavii varee soori shaa vakasalala kufii nawo,
vakaamba, “Yeni vandu va Galilaya a niinda elyi mwasalala mwiilolaa iruveeu? Yesu yeu aroswa na iruveeu auka kwany, mmbo ashewuyaa lyingyi indo shaasa mwallollya eerwaa na iruveeu.”
Naasa vakawuya na Yerusalemu vauka alya ifumbuny lyevangwaa lya Miseituni, lyikee kufii na Yerusalemu, ando a kirambo kyaangu.
Kyeeri valefika vakasaama na kai, nawo ni Petro, Yohane, Yakobo, Andrea, Filipo na Toma, Bartolomayo, Matayo, Yakobo wa Alfayo, Simon Selote na Yuda wa Yakobo.
Yeva woose mmbo vekee ando amwi veterevaa na nrima umwi nsi, ando amwi nawo veifo vaka valya Maria maye wa Yesu na vana va maye.
Mikonu yeyo Petro kasalala yoo vakiloshyony yewo vekai (yeekena lyawo nsha iyana na makumi avii indi) kaamba,
“Nyira, kilesenya indo mareiyo neenutyo, shaasa Mumuyo Mweele alerera kasha na kana ka Davidi. Kya mbony ta Yuda, yeto aletetera yewo valetira Yesu.
Mashika elyi ekee ando amwi neese, kawonisa urundi elu.”
(“Naasa nndu yeu mmbo aleura irema na fesa ya ulembi; nawe kawa uviny kariika ndeu maala akasomuka.
Vandu woose yewo vekee Yerusalemu vakamanya; na irema lyilya lyikafishyo Akeldama ni kishomu kyawo kyeyaamba, ni irema lya samu.”)
Mashika niindo kikee kireiye efo kitabuny kya Saburi: Ando akwe na kuve nrapu nta kulave nndu ashekaa-u lyingi nndu ungyi nashesalala ando akwe.
Naasa veefo vandu yewo vekee neese kyeeri kyoose ekyo Nndumi ekee neese, eshaangaa neesomuka,
kupookya ubatiso lwa Yohane, kufike nkonu ulya aleipowa kweru karwa na uwe, kikooye umwi waawo nave nkureeki wa iruka lyakwe ando amwi neese.
Vakavika-u vandu vavii, Yosefu wa Barsaba, ao Yusto, na Matiya.
Naasa vakatereva, vakaamba, “Woi Nndumi, yewe kwiishi mirima ya vandu woose, loore ni ungau nnang'ani ya yeva vavii,
naambo nakae kunu urundiny yelu na nruminy yei natire ando a Yuda.”
Vakakapa kura; nayo ikawoya Matiya, nawe kasanga ando amwi na vakiloshyony valya ikumi na umwi.
Naasa kwikifika nkonu ulya wa Pentekoste vakiloshyony woose mmbo vekee ando amwi.
Kukaitiwa yoona iniini lya uraato lwa finya, nalo lukaishwa kulya mmba kundo vekai.
Vakasheyo ni findo fivakye fipalapala fya muro fikwaavye-avye fikakaya wo umwi wa valya veiyo.
Woose vakaishurwa Mumuyo Mweele, vakapooka irera na fishomu fyeny, shaasa Mumuyo alevasimba irera.
Neefo Yerusalemu kweefo Vayuda, vandu veereiye Iruva, nawo vaukye wo ando ulaniny.
Naasa kyeeri yoona lyilya lyileitiwa nkuka ulya wa vandu ukasavaa, vakakusanyirya, mashika llya valevaita wo umwi ereraa kishomu kyakwe muni.
Vakafulukyo nnu, vakaviana, “A nkyelola, yeva vakerera woose nshi Vagalilaya?
A mmbo kyava indaany elyi wo umwi weeru eeta kishomu kyakwe ekyo awonikye nakyo?
Vaparti na Vaamedi na Vailami, neewo vakee Mesopotamia, na Yudaya na yewo vakaa Kapadokia, Ponto na Asia,
Frigia na Pamfilia, Misri na va taari ta Libia kulya kufii na Krene, na veny yewo vaukye Rome, wo Vayuda na vandu veeshi Iruva,
na Vakrete-da na Vaarabu; yeva woose mmbo lwaita veereraa na fishomu fyeru luveni mbony ta mashora maniini a Iruva.”
Vakafulukyo deny woose neetirwa nnyinyira, vakaamba, “A nkyoki eki nyira vandu?
Kukakaa-fo na vengyi vamina, vakaamba, ‘Mmbo vannangwa mmbwari wa kyaanka.’ “
Lyo Petro kasalala ando amwi na valya ikumi na umwi, kaonisa unyanga kaamba, “Eni vandu va Yudaya, neeni moose va Yerusalemu, manyiny kindo ekyi, mwaranye marero akwa,
Nshi shaasa mukusarye-fo; vandu yeva mmbanangyo-fo, mashika ulaalu ni saa isaru ta ngama;
kyaindi kindo ekyi ni kilya kyikee kirere na kana ka nkisuku Yoeli kyeamba,

‘Mmbo kyishevaa mikonu yeyo yeefurumya, ni Iruva aamba, mmbo nshepusuyaa vandu woose Mumuyo wakwa, na vana vany va womi na va kyeny, vasheambaa fisuku, na vana vakoo vashelolyaa ngyende, na vamiku vasheoryaa moorya.
Yee, na kyeeri yekyo nshepusuyaa varundi wakwa, womi na vaka, Mumuyo wakwa, nawo vasheavuyaa fisuku.
Neeny nshoraa ngyende efo nginiiu, neefo urukeny si, samu na muro, na nrike wa nsu.
Nkyeere mmbo ushevaa ireema, na mwiiri uve samu, kulaore nkonu ulya wa Nndumi wansha, ukee nniini nato ukee kuti ushe.
Neeto moose ashesendaa irina lya Nndumi, mmbwe ashekirwaa.’ “

“Yeni vandu va Israeli, aranyeny marero yaa; Yesu wa Nasareti, nndu ulya Iruva amoora paa kyany na shia ya ngyende na findo filandelolyo lyingi, Iruva kafitana kwany na woko lwakwe, shaasa yeni muveni mwiishi.
Shaasa Iruva alekunda immbika kwany, shaasa eekundye uka elyo mbee, mukanrambikya vandu vakasha vakankapya nsalabeny, mmukambwaa.
Mmbwe Iruva alenduta, kafisha mwinga wa ufu, mashika lluleidima intira-fo.
Mashika Davidi alerera mbony takwe kaamba, ‘Shilelollya Nndumi mbee yakwe wo nkonu, mashika elyi akee taari ya woko lwakwa usha, shilashesinga-singa.
Naasany nrima wakwa ukasennyo, shakapa nndoro, neeny nshevaa nndu mwiivika nsia.
Mashika nnyasheraa nrima wakwa uretiny-fo. Nta nkusheningyaa mweele wafo nalyamarike-fo.
Mmbo kuleshoora shia ya muuny kisangu kyafo kisheshiningaa ifura.’ “
“Nyira wanavama, shisaryeny shirere nookaari yaa mbee yaany, mbony ta nde weeru nniini Davidi, kyeamba mmbo alefwa karikwa, na kifu kyakwe kiiyo fika inu.
Naasa kimmba akee nkisuku eishi sheelyi Iruva mmbo alelyiiya mboo, sheelyi umwi wa ewo veshaukaa efo ufyariny lwakwe ashekaa yoo kitiminy kyakwe kya umangyi.
Nawe muni shaasa alesongwa ilolya efyi fyoose, kasenda mbony ta iruka lya Kristo, kyeamba ufu llulentira-fo, nta mwili wakwe mmbulelyamarika-fo.
Yesu yeto Iruva mmbo alenduta neese mmbo lukee vakureeki vakwe.
Naasa we ekimaa isaamiswa fika woko usha lwa Iruva, na iwarya kwa Nde kyaasa kilya kya Mumuyo mweele, mmbo alepuswa simbo yei muilollye ulaalu na iita.
Mashika Davidi muni nnyalensaama iruveeu-fo, lyo kaamba, ‘Nndumi mmbo alevia Nndumi wakwa, salala yewe taari ya woko lwakwa usha,
kutani shaara vakiduva vafo yoo si ya marende afo.’
Naasany mmba shoose ya Israeli imanyi paa sheelyi Iruva mmbo alevika Yesu yeto mulenkapya nsalabeu nave Nndumi na Kristo.”
Kyeeri valeita indo vakaokywa mirima yaawo, vakavia Petro na Varumi valya vengyi, “A lukatana inda vanavama veru?”
Petro kavavia, kuryeny mundebatiswa wo nndu na irina lya Yesu Kristo, muwoni isaryo ngyulyamari tany, naambo muwoni simbo ya Mumuyo Mweele.
Mashika kyaasa ekyi ni kimaruma kyany, na vana vany, na kwa yewo vakee kwaasha, neewo woose vashevaangwa ni Iruva Nndumi weeru vansheye.
Kavautya ukureeki evaviaa findo fiingyi evaikyimbaa, kavavia, kwiiseny na irika elyi lya umini.
Valya valeirikya marero akwe vakabatiswa, na nkonu eto vakaengerekau vandu sha fiku firaru indi.
Vakatira ufundo lwa Varumi valya, neekaa ando amwi, neefisha nkate, neetereva.
Wo nndu katirwa mbwerei, ngyende shiingyi tikatanwa ni Varumi.
Na yewo woose valekusirya-u vekee ando amwi, vakasanda masaa awo ando amwi.
Vakakumba masaa awo na findo fyawo vetiri, na yaavya wo nndu shaasa ekee nting'i.
Wo nkonu mmbo valekaa kulya mmba ya Iruva, vekee na nrima umwi nsi vakalya shoonga mmba kwi mmba, vakalya shoonga tawo na ifura na nrima umwi nsi,
vakarumisha Iruva, vakavesennya vandu woose. Nndumi kafumbuta yeekena lya valya veeke ikirwa wo nkonu.
Nkonu umwi Petro na Yohane mmbo vekeenda mmba ya Iruva indetereva, kyeeri kya saa kyeenda.
Na nndu umwi ekee kitongororo malungo ukya iwonika eeriwa mmbandu, veembikaa yoo mwangony uvaangwaa “Nsha” wa mmba ya Iruva wo nkonu, naambo natereve ngarami kwa vandu yewo vakeanga kulya mmba.
Nndu yeu kyeeri alelollya Petro na Yohane veshangaa na mmba ya Iruva katereva vanninge kindo.
Petro na Yohane vakambikya miso swaa, vakammbia, “Lulole yese.”
Kavalola, evikye nsia mmbo awonisaa kindo kwawo.
Kyaindi Petro kammbia, “Yeny nshitiri fesa nta saabu-fo lyo ekyo shitiri nkyo nkuningaa, Na irina lya Yesu wa Nasareti, salala kweenda.”
Kantira woko usha kamwipoo, ngyayo takwe na malungo akwe akavanga.
Kakupoo shu kasalala, kapooka yeenda kaanga mmba ya Iruva eriani nawo, keenda eshongashongaa erumishaa Iruva.
Vandu woose vakalollya shaasa ekeenda erumishaa Iruva.
Vakamanya mmbwe ulya ekee alya mwangony “Nsha” eterevaa, vakasongololo neefulukyo kyeefyo filentanyikya .
Naasa kyeeri eriani na Petro na Yohane, vandu woose vakakuumbya yoo vakai yoo kari kavangwa ni “Kari ka Solmoni,” vakafulukyo deny.
Petro ekyilollya indo kavavia, “Eni Vaisraeli, Nkyiki elyi mwafulukyo nkya efi, mukaveluvikya miso yese, sheelyi ni yese na finya yeeru lweedimisya nayo nndu yeu neende, ao na usha lweru yese?
Iruva wa Abrahamu na Isaki na Yakobo, Iruva wa vande veru mmbo aleng'anisa nsero wakwe Yesu, neeni mukandiingya neekana mbee ya Pilato, llya emmaa irummbwa nalekeyo.
Neeni mukakana Mweele yeto, muni usumanu yeto, mukatereva muningyo mwiwaa;
mukawaa Muni muu yeto, na mmbwe Iruva alenduta auka kwa vafu, neese lukee vakureeki vakwe.
Kimaruma kyekusirya irina lyakwe, irina lyakwe llyo lyaninga nndu yeu mumwiishi, finya na kikusiryo ekyo kyenkusirya nkyo kyaninga nndu yeu muu shaasa mullolye yaa mbee yaany.
Naasany, ulaalu vanavama, shiishi mmbo muletana efi kimaruma kya ilemwa imanya-da, shaasa na vasongoru vany valetana.
Kyaindi mbony tilya Iruva uka kasha alevambisa na kana ka vakisuku vakwe woose, kyeamba Kristo wakwe ashelyiswaa ukiva, mmbo aleinutyo indo.
Kuryeeny-te, mwiinduke, naambo ngyulyamari tany tiutwa, fishe fyeeri fyeellelisyo kimaruma kya Nndumi,
narumi Kristo Yesu akee mmbike uka elyo mbee,
kyikasenya nawaryo iruveeu kutani kwasha fyeeri fiiya fya findo fyoose ivikwa wiiya, fikee firere ni Iruva na kana ka vakisuku vakwe veele uka mapookyony a ulana.
Mashika dede Mose aleamba sheeli, Nndumi waany ashemweengye nkisuku, efo ufyariny lwany, sha yeny, mwaranyiny we efyo fyoose ashemuviaa.
Na wo nndu moose yeto araa nalaaranya nkisuku yeto mmbo asherumatwaa na ilakaniswaa na vandu vakwe.
Yee, na vakisuku woose pookya Samweli na valya va numa yakwe, woose yewo, mmbo valeawuya mbony ta mikonu yei.”
Yeni mmbo mukee vana va vakisuku na va fyaasa efyo, Iruva alevika na vande yewo vany, llya alevia Abrahamu, “Efo ufyariny lwafo mfo ngyufyari toose ta ulana tishevikywaa mbora.
Iruva, llya alemaa iruta nsero wakwe Yesu, mmbo alesongwa inruma kwany, namulyimyi mbora eshiitaa maravi moose kwaasha neeni.”
Kyeeri vekee irera na vandu yewo, makohani na nsongoru wa mmba ya Iruva na Vasadukayo vakavasheya,
vakaereve nnu kimaruma kya elyi vakeelosha vandu na ivambisa mbony ta iruka lya Yesu auka kwa vafu.
Vakavatira vakavarwaa kifingyony fika elyi lya ngama; mashika kwemmeva nkwaany.
Llyo veengyi nnang'ani ya valya valeita irero elyo vakakusirya-u, na yekena lya vomi veni lyikafikya fiku firaanu.
Elyi lya ngama vasongoru na vamiku na vaarya va fitabu vakakusanyirya alya Yerusalemu,
na Anasi Nkohani nniini, na Kayafa-da na Yohane na Iskanda, na woose valya vekee va kwa Nkohani nniini.
Kyeeri valevasaleesa yoo nnang'ani, vakavavesa, Ni finya-ki na ni kwa irina lya vi mwatana nalyo yefi?
Naasa Petro, eishwe Mumuyo Mweele, kavavia, “Yeni vaniini va vandu na vamiku va Israeli,
kwakooya lwaveswa inu mbony ta kindo kisha nndu ulya mfwafwa aletanywa, na shaasa aleshiiswa,

manyiny yeni moose na vandu woose va Israeli sheelyi ni irina lya Yesu wa Nasareti, ulya yeni mulenkabya nsalabeeu, na Iruva kanduta kooka kwa vafu, na irina elyo nndu yeu mmbo aselelyi yaa mbee yaany ekee nsha indi.
We mmbwe iwe elyo lyikee iile ni veetana mmba, nalyo mmbo lyamevikwa lyive iwe lya ndumba.
Nta nkwiifo ukiro kwa ungyi nta umwi-fo, mashika nkwiifo irina lyingyi kwasi ya ngina vandu vakee vaniinge vakirwa llyo-fo.”
Naasa kyeeri valelollya ukaari lwa Petro na Yohane, neevamanya nshi vandu vasommyi nnu, valatiri urango, vakafulukywa, vakamanya mmbo vekee na Yesu.
Na vekilollya nndu aleshiiswa esalalyi ando amwi nawo mbalekiidima irera-fo.
Vakavaumbuta alya ikwaanuny lilya, numa vakarera wo veni na veni,
vakaamba, “Lukatannya inda vandu yeva? Mashika vandu woose vakee Yerusalemu mmbo valelollya ni wende uniini luletano mmbo, nta llushidimaa ilema-fo.
Llyo naambo kindo ekyi kilashekwaana vanduny, luvaimi deny neeverese valasherera lyingyi na nndu moose kwa irina elyi-fo.”
Vakavavaanga, vakavaima deny valashelosha-se na irina lya Yesu.
Petro na Yohane vakavavia, “Kwakooya ni usumanu mbee ya Iruva imwaaranya yeni ngota yaaranya Iruva, rumbweny yeni muveni;
mashika yese llushidimaa ira lulaamba mbony eto lulelollya na itiita-fo.” "
Naasa vekimaa ivaerese lyingyi vakavaporomwa valalollye kimaruma kyevakapa, nyelyi valeereya vandu mashika vandu woose mmbo vekee irumisha Iruva kya efyo fyoose filetanyika.
Mashika nndu ulya aletannywa wende elu etiri myaaka makumi aana.
Llya valemaa iporomuwa, vakaenda kwa vandu vawo, vakavavia mbony toose tilya valevio ni vaniini va makohani na vamiku.
Nawo vekiita, vakaonisya Iruva ngyunyanga tawo na nrima umwi nsi, vakaamba, " “Nndumi ni yewe Iruva, nnyewe kutannyi iruveeu na ulana na yeeve na fyoose yefyo fiifo;
kwi Mumuyo Mweele mmbo kulerera na kana ka ndeye weeru Davidi we nsero wafo kwaamba, ‘Ni inda vandu va masanga vakeyuushana. Na vandu va ngyufyari ta vandu vakakusara-sara ruu.
Vamangyi va ulana vankudeesya na vasongoru vamfisha kyama. Uwe ya Nndumi na uwe ya Kristo wakwe.’ “
“Mashika ni dede, Herode na Pontio Pilato ando amwi na vandu va masanga na vandu va Israeli mmbo valekusanyirya yaa muriny yeu kimaruma kya nsero wafo mweele Yesu, yeto kulemwaamba mafura,
naambo vatani fyoose efyo woko lwafo na wiidimi lwafo lwendeesya uka elyo mbee fitanyike.
Naasa, woi Nndumi ulaalu kulole wiitiki elo lwawo, kwidimisye mashinga afo yaamba irero lyafo na ukaari,
kuveorwa woko lwafo kushiise, ngyende na myoorye fitanyike na irina lya Mwana wafo Yesu.” "
Vekimaa itereva Iruva, ando alya vekai kukarinyiswa, woose vakaishurwa Mumuyo Mweele, vakaamba irero lya Iruva na ukaari.
Na ironda elyo lya vandu va kikusiryo vakatira nrima umwi nsi na ngoo imwi nta kulakae-fo nndu aamba kindo kyoose atiri nkyakwe muni; kyaindi findo fyoose vakaallwa fyawo woose.
Na Varumi valya vakauta ukureekyi lwa iruka lya Yesu na finya shiniini, na mbora shiingyi tikakaa nawo woose. "
Nta nkulekaafo nndu umwi waawo aleting'wa nkindo; mashika woose yewo vetiri marema ao mmba mmbo valekumba, vakeende uuru lwa vayo;
vakaniingya vakiloshony, wo nndu kaniingwa-u shaasa eekunndye.
Na Yosefu ulya Llevi vakiloshyony valemfishya Barnaba, (kyeamba, “Nmwana wa Iviirya Muu.”) kwawo ni Kipro,
etiri irema kalyikumba, keengye valya vakiloshyony fesa.
Kyaindi nndu umwi evangwaa Anania, ando amwi na nkaakwe Safira, mmbo ekumba masaa,
kasuruma kyenga kya wuuru lwa vayo, na nkaakwe nawe kamanya ekyo, keende kyenga ekyo kakyiniingya Varumi ewo.
Petro kavia Anania, “Nkyiki elyi mmbishwa akaya nrima wafo kwavia Mumuyo Mweele wongo, kwasuruma kirisi kyenga kya wuuru lwa irema?

Kyeeri kyekee maakony afo kyekee-se kyafo? Na kyeeri ekyo kyemmaa ikumbwa, fesa ta vayo tekee-se ushilyiny lwafo? Mmbo kileva inda kwakunda itana kindo kya ngata yeyo? Nshi nndu wa vandu kulellemba-fo, ni Iruva.”
Anania ekiita marero yoo kawa si kafwa. Weerei uniini lukatira vandu woose valeita mbony yei.
Vasoro vakakwiipoo vakammbika sanda, vakansomuta vakandendika.
Kyikyisia saa isaru numa nka nawe kasha, nalaishi kindo kyantanyika.
Petro kammbesa, “Nkyeshivia, Nrema ilya mmbo mulekumba kwa wuuru elo dede?” Kaamba, “Yee, nkwa wuuru yelo.”
Petro kammbia, “A mmbo kileva inda mukasanga amwi ilemba Mumuyo wa Nndumi? Lola-te, valya valerika mmi wafo vakuvereye mwaangony, nawo vakusomutaa neewe.”
Llya yeni nawe kawa si yoo marendeny akwe kafwa; vasoro valya vakaanga vakakooya ammaa ifwa, vakansomuta, vakandika ando amwi na mmi wakwe.
Weerei uniini lukatira Siri shoose na vandu woose valeita mbony yeti.
Maakony a vakiloshyony tikatanyika ngyende na findo fyeyaawuta fingyi vanduny; nawo woose vakakaa na nrima umwi nsi efo kariny ka Solomon.
Neewo veengyi woose nkwifoo nndu alekarya yeenda nawofo, kuuta ivarumisha tupu.
Naasa valya valekusirya Nndumi vakaengereka, veengyi vomi na vaka;
kutani vandu vasomuta vandu vawo valoe efo shia velele firaany, naambo Petro eshiraa, naakwa ni kirishe kyakwe kipaani umwi waawo.
Nalyo maronda a vandu va miri ilya ikee kufii na Yerusalemu vakakusanyirya, vakeende vandu valoe, na valya vetirwa mmimuyo mikasha, nawo woose vakashiiswa.
Nkohani nniini ando amwi na vandu vakwe, (yewo mmbo yewo va kyama kya Vasadukayo), vakaishwa nyashi,
vakashetira Varumi yewo vakavavika kifingyony.
Kyaindi Nsu wa Nndumi karua myaango ya kifingyony elyi kio kavasomuta-fo, kavavia,
“Endeny salaleny mmba ya Iruva muvie vandu mbony ta Muu yeu.”

Nawo vekiita indo vakaenda mmba ya Iruva nraasi, vakapooka ilosha. Nkohani Nniini ando amwi na vandu vakwe vakasanyirya vandu va ikwaanuny na vamiku va vana va Israeli vakaruma vandu kulya kifingyony naambo vavaende.
Kyeeri varundi vawo valefika-fo mbalevakooya-fo, vakawuya vavavie mbony,
vakaamba, “Kifingyo nkiraye nisha, na varingyi vesalalyi mwaangony; lyo kyeeri lwarua llwakoyafo nta ndu-fo.”
Kyasia nshilyi wa mmba ya Iruva na vaniini va makohani vekiita indo, vakatirwa nnyinyira kimaruma kyawo, kyeyaamba mmbo kivaa inda kindo ekyi.
Nndu umwi kasha kavavia sheelyi, vandu valya mulevavika kifingyony ekawo vakee kulya mmba ya Iruva, vasalali-fo veeloshaa vandu.
Lyo nshilyi ulya alekupoo ando amwi na varundi, vakaveende, lyo nshi na finya-fo, mashika valeereya vandu valashevakapa na mawe.
