Mashika-le ndesa, ni vandu nkeevalelemba, a ni Iruva? Ao ndesa mmbo shikunndye isenya vandu? Kukooye fika ulaalu mmbo shikeesenya vandu, nta nshevaa ishinga lya Kristo-fo.
Mashika vanavama vakwa, nrumi yeyo shilemoongoya mmbo shamuvia deny, nshi ya mbuka ya kivandu-fo.
Mashika nshileyuuta kwa nndu-fo, nta nshileloshwa ni nndu-fo, ni Yesu Kristo muni aleshirambuya.
Mashika mulemmiita muveni mbony ta ngaa yakwa llya shekee na ufundo lwa Kiyuda. Mashika mmbo shesisya siri ya Iruva kikailanya kyeeso, shakunda iilyamara deny.
Neeny shatumaa efo ufundony lwa Kiyuda ngota veengyi yewo vekee va irika lyakwa na efo vanduny vakwa, shakutakura nnu itira ngyufundo ta kasha ta vande vakwa.
Kyaindi lyo Iruva yeto aleshisauwa uka shilandewonika kwa ma, kashivaangya isarya lyakwe,
shaasa kilensenya ishisunundya mbony ta mwana wakwe, naambo neeny shiidimi yoongoya vandu va masanga mbony yeto takwe, neeny nta nshilevesa mbele nta nndu-fo.
Nta nshilerwa na kulya Yerusalemu indekwaananya na yewo valeshisongoya iva varumi-fo, mmbo shileenda kulya kasa ka Vaarabu, shooka-fo shawuya na Dameski.
Numa ya vayo kwiikisia myaaka iraru, sharwa na Yerusalemu naambo shindekwaananya na Kefa, shakaa kwakwe ando a mikonu ikumi na iraanu.
Lyo nta nshilelollya-fo nrumi ungyi-fo, kuuta Yakobo muni, we mwanamaye wa Nndumi weeru.
Neefyo shikeemureiya, loleny nnu, shikee mbee ya Iruva nta nshireraa wongo-fo.
Numa ya vayo sheenda taari ta Siria na Kilikia.
Lyo siri ta Kristo ta kulya Uyuda ntileshilollya tishimanyi-fo.
Kuuta elyi valeeta-da, sheelyi yeto ekeelusaveesa elyo mbee, ulaalu mmbo akeevambisa kikusiryo ekyo llya kasha ekeekimamita.
Vakaitikisa Iruva kimaruma kyakwa.
Numa ya vayo kwiikisia myaaka ikumi na iina, sharwa lyingyi na kulya Yerusalemu shiryani na Barnaba, shaveipoo na Tito sheenda nawe.

Na yeny mmbo shileenda nafo mashika elyi Nndumi aleshoora, shavaongoya kya nrumi yeyo shikeongoya vandu va masanga, lyo lwikee luveni na yewo vatiri nnduma, kulashekooya mmbo nkeetambalya ruu, ao mmbo nkeetambalya irisha ruu.
Kyaindi Tito yeu sheriani nawe, nawe akee Ngriki, nnyaleitikywa irinwa-fo.
Lyo kimaruma kya vakristo va wongo yewo valeatwa siriny kirisi, valeatwafo kirisi naambo valumanyi shaasa lukai kunu kwa Yesu Kristo, naambo valurwaa ushingeny;
neese nta llulekunda ivaaranya-fo, naambo dede yeyo ya Nrumi ya Nsia ikooye ikaa na yeni.
Kyaindi valya vatiri nnduma; (na vakava inda kwakwa yeny nkimwi nsi, Iruva lyo nnalolaa fisangu fya vandu-fo), mmbo nkeyaamba valya vatiri nnduma vandu mbalesheengerya-u nta kindo-fo.
Kyaindi mbai na efyo, kyeeri valelollya shishoongoyaa valya valakee varini Nrumi ya Nsia, shaasa Petro ekeeyoongoya valya vakee varini;
(mashika yeto aleidimisya Petro iva nrumi wa yewo varini mmbwe yeto-da aleshiidimisya yeenda kwa vandu va masanga).

Na llya valemeemanya kya isarya elyo shilesimbwa; varumi Yakobo na Kefa na Yohane yewo vaishiwa ni ngo ta siri, mmbo valeshiwara yeny na Barnaba ng'asa ya woko usha kya wiitanu, naambo yese lweende kwa vandu valakee Vayuda nawo veende kwa Vayuda.
Nawo vakalukundya kindo kimwi nsi, lukummbwe vakiva; na yeny shakutakura nnu iinutya irero elyi.
Kyaindi kyeeri Kefa alesha Antiokia mmbo shilewakyana nawe kisangu kwa kisangu, mashika mmbo asumannyi uvingo.
Mashika kulaore vensha vauka kwa Yakobo mmbo ekeelya na vandu va masanga. Kyaindi kyeeri valesha we mmbo alekaa kwaasha nawo keereya Vayuda yewo vakee varini.
Na Vayuda yewo vengyi vakainduka ando amwi nawe, kutani na Barnaba nawe eewa ni ukunang'ari lwawo.

Kyaindi kyeeri shilelollya sheelyi ngata yeyo nnyisumani na Nrumi ya Nsia, mmbo shevia Kefa mbee yaawo woose, “Kwakooya yewe kukee Myuda kwasora mbuka ya vandu va masanga, ilakee ya Vayuda, a nkikyi elyi kukeitikya vandu va masanga isora mbuka ya Kiyuda?”
Yese lukee Vayuda tukula, lulake varekwa va masanga.

Neese lwiishi sheelyi nndu wa vandu nnyashekennywaa usumanu kyeendwa ni mashora akwe-fo, nkyeendwa ni ikusirya Kristo Yesu naasa, yese mmbo luleirikya Kristo Yesu naambo lweekennywa usumanu kimaruma kya Kristo, nta nshi kimaruma kya mashora-fo, mashika kyeendwa ni mashora a nndu kwiifo nta umwi asheekennywaa usumanu-fo.
Nkyoony kwakooya yese luveni lweekennywa usumanu elyi lwairikya Kristo lukalollywa mmbo lukee valyamari-da. A Kristo mmbo akee mwirundya ulyamari? Nta-fo!
Mashika kwakooya shawuya irosa filya shilefisammbwa, mmbo shakoora yeny shimuni sheelyi mmbo shikee nrekwa.
Mashika yeny mmbo shilefiiya uvavaso kyeendwa ni uvavaso naambo shikee na muu kwa Iruva.

Mmbo shilekapywa nsalabeny ando amwi na Kristo; lyo ulaalu shikee na muu, nta nshi yeny-se-fo, ni Kristo akee nnang'ani yakwa, na muu yeu nkee nato wa mwiili yeu, mmbo nkee nato kikusiryony kya Mwana wa Iruva, yeto alelukunda kakuuta we muni kimaruma kyakwa.
Nshiminaa isarya lya Iruva na ilyaallwa ruu-fo, mashika kwakooya usumanu mmbo luwonikaa kyuukana na mashora a nndu, naasany na Kristo mmbo alefwa ruu.
Yeni Vagalatia mulatiri urango, a mmbi alemulyamara mirwe. Yeni muleongoywa paa mbony ta Yesu Kristo sheelyi mmbo alekapywa nsalabeny?
Ni kindo kimwi nsi shikundye ikimanya kwany. A ndesa mmbo mulewarya Mumuyo kyuuka na mashora a nndu, ao nkimaruma kya iita yelyo lyileende kikusiryo?
A ni indii mulerung'ana indi? Mwammaa ipooka na Mumuyo, ulaalu mmbo mukundye ifurummya na findo fya mwiili?
A mmbo muleera fyuureny efyo fyoose kisheva kya ruu? A mmbo kishevaa kya ruu dede?
Naasany yeto mwimuniinga Mumuyo na irunda mashora maniini nnang'ani yaany mmbo atana indo kyuuka na mashora a mwiili, ao nshi kimaruma kya iita elyo lyishendee kikusiryo?
Nkimwi sha llya Abrahamu aleirikya Iruva kaeekennywa usumanu.
Kyasia manyiny sheelyi valya va kikusiryo mmbo vana va Abrahamu.

Mareiyo nang'u shaasa aambaye uka elyo sheelyi Iruva mmbo asheekenyaa vandu va masanga usumanu kivaukya efo kikusiryony, mareiyo mmbo alevia Abrahamu Nrumi ya Nsia elyo kasha, kyeyaamba, “Vandu va masanga woose mmbo vashevikywaa mbora yoo kwafo.”
Naasa yewo va kikusiryo mmbo vavikywa mbora ando amwi na Abrahamu yeto etiri kikusiryo.
Shamashika valya woose vakeetana fya uvavaso, mmbo valamywa si nkidengo, mashika nkireiye indi, “Yeto moose nalawarani na efyo fyoose fikee efo uvavasony nafiinutye mmbo akee n-denge.”
Nkyo kyaambany nkwiifo nndu asheekenywaa usumanu mbee ya Iruva kyuuka na uvavaso-fo, mashika yeto wa usumanu mmbo ashekaa na muu kimaruma kya kikusiryo.
Na uvavaso lluleendwa nkikusiryo-fo, kyaindi mwitana indo mmbo ashekaa na muu kimaruma kya vayo.
Kristo mmbo aleluwouwa luuke kidengony kya uvavaso, mashika mmbo alealuwa kidengo kimaruma kyeru, mashika nkireiye kikaambawa, “Yeto moose avanikwa nri-u mmbo akee n-denge.”
Naambo mbora ya Abrahamu ikooye ifikya vandu va masanga kwi Yesu Kristo, naambo luwarye kyaasa kya Mumuyo lwikee na kikusiryo.
Vanavama vakwa, mmbo nkeerera sha nndu wa vandu. Na kyikava ni kyaasa kya nndu, lyo kyikammaa ivangiswa nkwiifo nndu akiminaa-fo ao nta yeengerya-u kindo-fo.
Fyaasa efyo mmbo fileniingwa Abrahamu na mwana wakwe. Nkyaambawa nkwa vana sheelyi mmbo vakee veengyi-fo; kyaindi nkwa umwi, kwa mwana wafo, nawe ni Kristo.
Ekyo shiifo nshambaa nkyo ekyi, kyaasa ekyo mmbo kilevangiswa mbele ni Iruva, uvavaso yelo lulesha ando a myaaka 430 lluleidima yaalasha-u kindo-fo ao ikiuta-u-fo.
Mashika kwakooya ding'u mmbo yasha na uvavaso, nnyikivaa ya kyaasa-fo, kyaindi we Iruva mmbo alesimba Abrahamu efyo emmbikya kyaasa.
A uvavaso nkyokyiny ndesa? Mmbo luleendwa kimaruma kya ukasha lwa vandu kutani asha yeto awonikye kawarya kyaasa ekyo, kikee kyeende ni nsu wa Iruva akee nrumi nasheamba.
Na yeto akee nrumi nshi asanda kimaruma kya nndu umwi nsi-fo, lyo yeto akee umwi ni Iruva.
A ndesa uvavaso mmbo lulariani na fyaasa fya Iruva? Oode, mashika kukooye lweeningywaa uvavaso lushendee muu, naasa usumanu mmbo lwewonikaa lweendwa ni uvavaso.
Kyaindi mareiyo mmbo alesandya fyoose na ifivika finyiny ya ulyamari, naambo yewo vakusirye vaniingwa kyaasa ekyo vekutiri efo iirikyony lya Yesu Kristo.
Lyo kulaore kikusiryo ekyo kyensha mmbo lwekee si ya uvavaso, lukalamywa si kutani iirikyo elyo lyilesukuwa paa.
Kikeeny indo uvavaso mmbo luleva sha nteteri wa ilurwaa kwa Kristo, naambo lusheekennywa usumanu kyuuka na kikusiryo.
Lyo kwankooya kikusiryo kyansha, llukikee-se maakony a nteteri-fo.
Mashika yeni moose mmbo mukee vana va Iruva kyeendwa nkikusiryo kwi Yesu Kristo.
Mashika yeni moose mulebatisyo irina lya Kristo mmbo muree Kristo.
Na yoo nkwiiyo Myuda nta Ngriki-fo. Nta nndu lleke na nndu ishinga-fo. Nta nkwiiyo nndu nndumi na nndu nka-fo. Nnyelyi yeni moose mwammba ngata imwi mukee va Yesu Kristo.
Na kimmba mukee va Kristo, naasany mmbo mwammba ufyari lwa Abrahamu, na veni ding'u shaasa kyaasa kilya kyikai.
Lyo mmbo shikeerera mbony ta iva muni ding'u. Kyeeri muni ding'u akee mwana, nnyatiri kilakaniso na ishinga-fo, na kava mmbwe muni wa fyoose.
Mashika mmbo akee nrambikye vangari na vellela, kufike kyeeri ekyo kikee kideerye ni ndeye.
Kiwo neese kyeeri lwekee vana vadu, mmbo lweekee vakaye ni miishivye ilya ya mbee ya ulana elu.
Na kutani llya fyeeri fileinana, llyo Iruva alelurumya mwanaakwe akee mwiire ni nka si ya uvavaso.
Naambo needimi iwouwa yewo vakee si ya uvavaso, naambo neese lwiidimi iwarya ngata yeyo yeevikwa vana va Iruva.
Na kimmba yeni mwammba vana, Iruva mmbo aleruma Mumuyo wa Mwana wakwe miriminy yeeru yeto avangaa “Aba” nkyo kyaamba “Woi Nde.”
Kimmba ni indo yewe nkukikee-se kishinga-fo, mmbo kukee mwana, na kwankooya kukee mwana naasany, mmbo kukee muni ding'u efo kwa Iruva.
Lyo fyeeri filya fya mbee llya kulaore mwemmanya Iruva, mmbo muleva veerundya maruva alakee iruva dede.
Kyaindi elyi mwammaa imanya Iruva, na mmwasi imanyika kwa Iruva, nkyi kisheengyee muwuiyese filoshyo filya fya mbee fyekee fifwafwa, fyekee fyaanguye, neeni mukakunda iwuyafo-se ulaalu?
Mmbo mweekena mikonu, na miiri, na fyeeri na myaaka.
Shammaawukwa deny nkyany, kulakooye mmbo shikeyaatarika ruu kimaruma kyany.
Vanavama vakwa, shamutereva nnu muve sha yeny, mashika na yeny mmbo shikee sheeni. Mulenshisoka nta kindo-fo.
Lyo mwiishi llya shilepooka imoongoya Nrumi ya Nsia mmbo shekee mfwafwa mwiiliny.
Na kyeeso ekyo mulekiwonisa kimaruma kyakwa mmulekimina, nta ikilema-fo, mmbo muleshiwarya sha nsu wa Iruva, sheelyi mweewaryaa Yesu Kristo muni.
A nshidimaa inda yaamba shitiri ngoma? Mashika mmbo shamukureekya, kukooye kyevaa, mmbo mweeshillwaa miso any mushivike yeny,
A ndesa mmbo shivaa nkiduva waany elyi shamuvia kya dede?
Yewo mmbo valangye imulollya, lyo nshi veetiri kimaruma kisha-fo, lyo mmbo vakundye imuraya poo, naambo yeni mulange ivalollya.
Nalyo nkindo kisha nnu ilanga ilollyo kimaruma kikee kisha, nta nshi kyeeri shikee ando amwi neeni-da-fo.
Fivana fyakwa fidu, shikeemuiya nnu mashoya kutani Kristo amuwonikya;
a nkyema sheshiidimaa ikaa neeni ulaalu, na itundwa unyanga lwakwa! Mashika mmbo shitirwa nnyinyira deny kimaruma kyany.
Nkyeshivieny, yeni mukundye iitoryo mmavavaso, ao mmbo mulaereye mavavaso?
Mashika kikee kireiye sheelyi, Abrahamu mmbo etiri vana vavii, umwi kwa nka kishinga na ungyi kwa nka muni kyeny.
Kyaindi ulya wa nka kishinga mmbo alewonika kyikee kya mwiili-da, lyo ulya wa nka muni kyeny kawonika akee wa kyaasa kya Iruva.
Findo efi mmbo fikeererwa fikee fya kyaaso; mashika vaka yeva mmbo vavakye fyaasa fivii, kimwi kyuukye ifumbuny lya Sinai, nkyo kya Hajiri aleira vana vakee ushingeny.
Mashika Hajiri mmbo avakye ifumbu lya Sinai lyikee urukeny lwa Vaarabu, lyikavaka Yerusalemu yei ya ulaalu, mashika elyi akee ushingeny ando amwi na vana vakwe.
Kyaindi Yerusalemu ya uwe ni muni kyeny, nawe ni maye weeru yese.
Mashika kikee kireiye indi, Fura yewe nka kyuumba, kulandeire mwana, rosa unyanga, kufwe, yewe kulandetire mavina a mwana, mashika vana va nka akee muni ni veengyi, ngota va yeto akee na mmi.
Kyasiany, vanavama yese mmbo lukee vana va kyaasa sha Isaki.
Lyo shaasa ulya alewonika kyuuka na mwiili alesisya ulya wa Mumuyo, ni indo-da kivekai ulaalu.
Kyaindi mareiyo mmbo aamba inda? “Umbuta nka kishinga na mwana wakwe, mashika mwana wa kishinga nnyawonaa ding'u ando amwi na yeto wa nka muni kyeny-fo.”
Kikeeny indo vanavama vakwa, yese llukee vana va nka kishinga-fo, mmbo lukee vana va nka muni kyeny.
Kristo mmbo aleluvika valeke, kwa ekyo salaleny, nta mulasheereiywa muvikwa ushingeny-fo.
Lolen-te, yeny Paulo mmbo shamuvia, kwakooya mwarinwa Kristo nnyatiri mbusha neeni-fo.
Na lyingyi mmbo shikeevia wo nndu akee nrini, mmbo kinkooye iinutya uvavaso loose.
Mmbo mukee varauwe na Kristo yeni moose mukunndye yeekennywa usumanu ni uvavaso, mmbo muwoye mukauka efo isaryeny lya Iruva.
Mashika yese lwiikayo Mmumuyo mmbo luvereye ivika nsia elyo lya usumanu lweendwa nkikusiryo.
Mashika kyeendwa ni Yesu Kristo irinwa llyisheekyaa-u kindo-fo, ao nta nndu ira nalarinwa-fo, kitiri-u mashora ni kikusiryo ekyo kikaaywa ni ikunda.
Mmbo mwekeetammballya nisha, a mmbi alemwiima mulalatye efyo fya dede?
Yaalashika elyo llyuukye kwa yeto amuvaangye yeni-fo.
Ntarang'o munnywa mmbo woomwa imbumba lyoose lya nswa.
Mmbo shimuvikye nsia nnu shikee na Nndumi, sheelyi mmushetiraa nrima wa ngata ingyi-fo. Kyaindi lyo yeto akeemusaveesa mmbo ashewona uvingo lwakwe, na kava vi.
Na yeny, lyo vanavama vakwa, kwakooya shavambisa mbony ta irinwa, a nkikyi elyi shiifo shitendwaa? Yoo nsindara wa nsalaba mmbo wammba ruu.
Kyevaa kyeni kukooye yewo vakeemwishura nyinyira veendekuvanikaa!
Mashika le nyira, vanavama, mmbo mulevaangwa naambo muve valeke, lyo uleke lwany nshi yelo lweelatya mbony ta mwiili-fo, llweetaramana kya ikunda.
Mashika uvavaso loose mmbo lwainutywa yaa irerony elyi lyimwi nsi, lyeyaamba, “Kunda nndu ungyi shaasa kukukundye kumuni.”
Lyo kwakooya mwava sha mafisi mukulye muveni, loleny mulasheekumaa.
Naasany mmbo shaamba, endeny mweendo wany mwiiteterwaa Mmumuyo, nta mulashiinutyaa lango eto ta mwiili.
Mashika to mwiili mmbo utiri lango wikapanaa na Mumuyo, na Mumuyo ukakapana na mwiili; mashika efi fivii mmbo fivikyani kiduva kutani mwalemwa imanya kyeetana.
Kyaindi kwakooya mwateterwa Mmumuyo, mmukikee-se vashillye mmavavaso-fo.
Kyasiany mashora a mwiili nng'u yaa nang'u mmbo amanyikye paa, ni fya urui, ukirinda, uravi.
Iindya maruva a wongo, usavi, ukiduva, myaandu, itira iriso, irooyo nngoo, uriingyi, iraukana, kyama kikasha.

Isuvana, unangwa, italauwa ndeu, na findo fivakye efyo. Kya findo fya ngata yeyo mmbo shasongwa imuvia, shaasa llya shilemmaa imuvia, sheelyi vandu veetana findo fya ngata yeyo mbashewonaa ding'u ya umangyi lwa Iruva-fo.
Kyaindi ndunda ta Mumuyo ni ukundi, ifura, urilalyi, usisiryo, unndu usha, ilyillya, usaari,
ufoo, mwiiyanu, na veetana efyo uvavaso llutiri kyeetana-fo.
Na yewo va Kristo Yesu mmbo valemmaa ikapya miili yaawo nsalabeny veisandye-u na makusaro awo maravi na lango yeto sheesi toose.
Kwakooya lukee na Mumuyo, lweende lwiiteterwaa Mmumuyo,
Nta lulave vekuninga nnduma luveni, lwitanaa fya kitatarwa neetiryana finying'u luveni na veni.
Vanavama wakwa, kwakooya nndu arendeya karenga, yeni mukee va ngata ya Mumuyo viireny nndu yeto mukee na nrima wa ufoo, na ikulola yeni muveni mulasheanga fyeesony.
Taraniny mario any mukooye iinutya ivavaso lya Kristo.
Mashika kwakooya nndu alollya akee ng'waana ya vengyi, nawe nalakee indo, mmbo akulemba we muni.

Kyaindi wo nndu nakulole we muni eshesaa mashora akwe, lyo ashemanyaa kwakooya kivaa nakurumishe we muni, nalyo llyo ashewonaa kimaruma kyeefura efo nriminy wakwe we muni, lyo nshi kwa vandu vengyi-fo.
Kimmba wo nndu mmbo akamaraa irio lyakwe muni.
Mwiiloshwa naakani na mwiillosha wakwe kya mesha moose.
Mulasheelembika, Iruva nnyavaa ilemba-fo, mashika wo kindo nndu ammbaaya nkyo asheilulaa.
Mashika yeto avaaya fya mwiili wakwe mmbo asheilulaa urumato kya mashora yoo; kyaindi yeto avaaya fya ngata ya Mumuyo, kiinani na Mumuyo mmbo asheilulaa-u muu wa llung'anu.
Nta lulasheyaaraa itana mesha-fo, mashika mmbo lusheilulaa elyi kyeeri kya vayo kifikaa, lukanra lulafwa nrima.
Nkyo wo kyeeri luwonaa mwaanya lutannyi vandu woose mesha, mmwasi yewo vakusirye-u.
Loleny shaasa shamureiya na fireiyo finiini na woko lwaka yeny shimuni!
Yewo valangye ikushiisa kya findo fya mwiili, mmbo yewo vakee imwiitikya irinwa, naambo valasheesuka kimaruma kya nsalaba wa Kristo, naasa da.
Shamashika naakwa ni yewo vakee varini mmbakeeinutya uvavaso-fo; lyo mmbo vakundye yeni murinwa-da, naambo vakufurye kimaruma kya vayo-da.
Lyo yeny, nshikundye ifura na kindo kingyi nta kinnywa-fo, kuuta nsalaba wa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, na kimaruma kya vayo ulana loose mmbo lulekapyo nsalabeny yaa kwakwa, na yeny kimaruma kya ulana.
Mashika irinwa ao ira kularinwa nshi kindo-fo, iva kyuumbe kiiya nkyo kikundywa.
Na yewo woose vasoraa irero elyi ufoo na isarya fivakayaa, yee, kwa Israeli ya Iruva.
Kupookya ulaalu, kulakive-se nndu ashaatara-fo mashika mmbo shirye wende lwa Yesu mwiiliny wakwa.
Vanavama wakwa, isarya lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo lyikee ando amwi na mirima yaany. Amen.
Ni yeny Paulo, nrumi wa Kristo Yesu, shaasa kilesennya Iruva, shamureiya yeni veele va Efeso mukusirye na Kristo Yesu,
Isarya lyimukaye na ufoo luukye kwa Iruva Nde weeru na kwa Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
Iruva nang'aniswa, we Nde wa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, yeto aleluvikya mbora takwe ta nriminy, ulaniny elu lwa kimumuyo lukee lwa Kristo.
Shaasa alelusauwa lukee va Yesu uka llya kulaore ulana lwemmbeiywa, naambo lukooye iva veele, luveva vandu valatiri mbese mbee yakwe lukae na ikunda.
Mashika mmbo alesongwa ilusauwa, naambo luvikwa vana vakwe kwi Yesu Kristo, shaasa alekunda we muni.
Itumbe lya isarya lyakwe lyiniingwa nnduma, elyo alelulyimmya kyuuka na Mwana wakwe.
Kyeendwa mmbwe na kimaruma kya samu yakwe yese lukawonisa iwowowa lyeru, na ifwaaywa kya ulyamari kiinani na usimba lwa isarya lyakwe.
Nawe mmbo alelupusuya yefyo kya usaari na urango lwakwe.
Llya alemaa iloora kyama kya ikunda lyakwe shaasa alekunda we muni.
Kyeendwa ni Kristo kavika findo fyoose ushilyiny lungyi, yefyo fya iruveeu na fya ulaniny kiwo, ee, kyeendwa mmbwe.
Yese lukavikwa veni ding'u, mashika shaasa eekundye uka elyo mbee mmbo eelusauye, shaasa akukundya itana fyoose shaasa akundye we muni.
Neese lukee nnang'ani yakwe luve nnduma wa itumbe lyakwe, yese lulesongwa yoora ivika nsia weru efo kwa Kristo.
Na yeni ni kiwo-da kyeendwa mmbwe mmbo mulemmaa iita irero lya dede, lyo Nrumi ya Nsia ya ukiro lwany, mukammaa imwiirikya, na ivikwa wende lwa kiringisyo ni Mumuyo ulya ekee nteerye akee Mweele.
We mmbwe akee kiringisyo kya ding'u yeeru, naambo nalulyimyi ukiro efo umangyiny lwakwe luve nnduma wa itumbe lyakwe.
Kimmba ni indo na yeny, uka llya shileeta mbony ta kikusiryo kyany kwa Nndumi Yesu, na kya ikunda lyany kwa veele woose,
nshikeemanda yaana Iruva kimaruma kyany-fo, shiimukummbwaa efo fiterewony fyakwa.
Iruva Nde wa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo we Nde wa itumbe, namuniinge yeni nrima wa urango na imurambuya immanya we.
Miso any na mirima yaany yeengere imikywa nsa, naambo mumanyi ivika nsia kya uvaango lwany shaasa lukai, na usimba lwa itumbe lwa ding'u yakwe kwa veele shaasa lyikai.
Na utore lwa uniini lwa wiidimi lwakwe lukee nnang'ani yeeru yese lukusirye shaasa lukai, kiinani na urundi lwa finya yakwe.
Llo elo alelwiinutya kwa Kristo llya alennduta kauka kwa vafu, kammbika yoo woko lwakwe usha efo ulaniny yelo lwa mumuyo.
Kanrosa uwe nnu ngota ngyumangyi toose, na wiidimi na finya na ushilyi, kailanya wo irina lyivaa isenda, nta nshi yaa ulaniny-da-fo, naakwa ni yefo ulaniny elo lwiishaa.
Iruva kavika findo fyoose yoo si ya marende akwe. Kaniinga ulyimbi lweesalallya findo fyoose kimaruma kya siri.
Ikee nnyo mwiili wakwe, mmbwe yeto amaye fyoose na iinutya fyoose yoo kwakwe.
Neeni mmbo mwekee vafu kimaruma kya maravi na ngyulyamari tany.
Tilya muleva veetana mwiisoraa mikaaye ya ulana. Mwisoraa mangyi yeyo ya nginiiu-te, mmbwe mumuyo yeto akeerunda mashora a yaallwa vandu filemi.
Yewo naakwa ni yese lweekee nnang'ani yaawo elyo mbee, efo langony ta miili yeeru, llya luleinutya lango ta nrima na mwiili, ngaa teru tikava tefuluta unyafi shaasa yewo vengyi vekai.
Kyaindi we Iruva kimmba akee nnu mwiilyillya, alelukunda ikunda iniini nnu.
Kyeeri kilya yese lwekee vafu kyeendwa ni maravi, mmbo aleluruta ando amwi na Kristo, nkyo kyaamba mmbo mulekirwa kya isarya yeni.
Kaluruta ando amwi nawe-sho, kaluvika ando amwi nawe efo ulaniny llwa lwa kimumuyo lukee na Kristo Yesu.
Naambo fyeeri efi fishaa naore isarya lyakwe paa yelyo lyiilanyi kyeeso kya usha lwakwe kweru yese kwi Kristo Yesu.
Mashika mmbo mukee vakire kwi isarya kyeendwa ni kikusiryo, nakyo nkilemmya kwany yeni-fo, ni simbo ya Iruva muni.
Nta nnyileendwa mmashora mesha-fo, nta kulasheeva-fo nndu akurosa.
Mashika yese mmbo lukee mashora a maako akwe, mmbo luleumbwa kyuuka na Kristo Yesu naambo lurunde mashora mesha yoo Iruva aleludeesya uka elyo mbee naambo luarunde.
Kimmba ni indo kummbweny sheelyi yeni mwekee vandu va masanga elyo kasha, yeni mukeevaangwa mmukee varini na valya vakee varini, urini yelo lwa mwiiliny.
Kasha ekyo mmwetiri Kristo-fo, mmbo mweraukani na vandu va Iruva, mukava sha veny valakwaani na kyaasa kilya. Mmweetiri kindo muvikye nsia-fo, mmweetiri Iruva yaa ulaniny-fo.
Kyaindi ulaalu kimmba mutiri Kristo, yeni elyo mbee mwekee kwaasha ulaalu mmbo mwammendwa kufii nsamu ya Kristo.
Mashika we mbwe urilalyi lweru, yese lwekee maronda avii lukava vamwi, kasammbwa isimamba lya lyelwaavye kavii.
Na llya alemaa yuuta-u ukiduva yelo na mwiili wakwe, kafisha finya ya uvavaso na mavavasyo naambo nalunge vandu woose vave ufyari wiiya lwakwe, kavasimba urilalyi.
Kasanda woose na Iruva, kyuuka na mwiili umwi alya nsalabeny, kamaa ukiduva loose na ishora elyo lya nsalaba.
Kashemongoya yeni mbony ta urilalyi yeni mwekee kwaasha, kiwo na yewo vekee kufii.
Mashika kyeendwa mmbwe yese loose mmbo lulewona mwaanya wa iserikya Iruva Nde kwi Mumuyo yeto umwi.
Kyasiany, kimmba ni indo, mmukikee veny nta vandu vakee iira-fo, mmbo mwammba veni kyeny ando amwi na veele, vandu va kyeny kwa Iruva.
Mmbo mukee vavike yoo uvasheny lwa varumi na vakisuku na Yesu Kristo we muni ni iwe lya ndumba.
Yoo kwakwe nng'u mmba shoose yalungwa nisha kutani yava mmba sheele ya Iruva kyeendwa ni Nndumi muni.
Yoo kwakwe yeni mmbo mukee valunge ando amwi muve mmba ya Iruva ya ngata ya Mumuyo.
Nkyo kimaruma yeny Paulo shikee mfinge kimaruma kya Kristo Yesu kimaruma kyany yeni vandu va masanga.
Kwakooya mulemmiita mbony ta ungari lwa isarya lya Iruva shileningwa kimaruma kyany
sheelyi mmbo shileorwa kyama ekyo, shaasa shilesongwa imuvia kyaangu.
Naasany, elyi musomaa mmbo mushidimaa ilollya imanya lyakwa lwa kyama ekyo kya Kristo shaasa kyikai.
Nkwiifo vandu va fyeeri fingyi valeorwa kyama ekyo-fo, kive shaasa varumi va Yesu veele na vakisuku va kyeeri ekyi kwi Mumuyo,
sheelyi vandu va masanga ando amwi neese ni veni ding'u va ngata imwi nsi, va mwiili umwi, na veakana ando amwi neese kyaasa kilya kya Kristo Yesu kya Nrumi ya Nsia.
Nrumi yeyo ya Nsia shileivaangywa shiifurukannyi, kiinani na simbo ya isarya lya Iruva shilenningwa kiinani na wiidimi lwakwe.
Yeny Paulo, shinyiiye yeto akee n-du wa veele woose, mmbo shilesimbwa isarya elyi naambo shoongoye vandu va masanga mbony ta usimba lwa Kristo lulavaa yeesa.
Na imikya vandu woose naambo vamanyi mbony ta wiidimi lwa kyama ekyo, kyikee efo kwa Iruva yeto aleumba findo fyoose.
Naambo ulaalu kimaruma kya siri, waarya lwa Iruva lukee lwa ngata shiingyi lumanyike ni ngyumangyi na vaitori va ulana lwa ngata ya mumuyo,
kimaruma ekyo kya llunga'nu kyikee kideesye kyuuka na Kristo Yesu Nndumi weeru.
Kyeendwa mmbwe mmbo lutiri ukaari na wiidimi lwa iserikya kyuuka na ivika nsia kyeendwa ni inkusirya.
Naasa mmbo shamutereva mulaute pa kimaruma kya fyuure efi fyakwa fishitiri kimaruma kyany-fo, nato ni nnduma wany.
Naasany we Nde mmbo shamfirya ndi.
Yeto u-nde lwakwe lukeesendwa yaa ulaniny na efo iruveeu.
Nawe namulyimyi iwona finya neevangiswa kiinani na usimba lwa itumbe lyakwe, kyiriyani na mashora a Mumuyo wakwe alukayaa efo nnang'ani.
Kristo nakae efo miriminy yaany na kikusiryony mwiikutiri tapu uvasheny lwa ukundi.
Naambo mwiidimi na imanya ando amwi na veele woose shaasa waasha na ivari, na yeenda uwe na yeenda si,
neemanya ikunda lya Kristo shaasa lying'ani lyikailanya urango lweru shaasa lung'ani, naambo mwiidimi ivangisywa efo wiidiminy lwa Iruva.
Naasany naitikiswa yeto aidima itana findo finiini nnu ngota efyo lwatereva na ikusara, kiinani na finya yeyo yakwe irunda mashora efo nnang'ani yeeru,
yee, naitikiswa kunu siriny ando amwi na Kristo Yesu marika moose a llung'anu na llung'anu. Amen.
Naasany mmbo shamutereva, yeny shikee mfinge kimaruma kya Nndumi, endeny mweendo wany kiinani na uvaango lwany shaasa mulevaangywa.
Mwikunyiisye nnu na ufoo, mwitiri usisiryo, mwisheekyanaa kyuuka na ikunda.
Mwiivekutakuraa nnu iringa umwi wa Mmumuyo, lweendwa ni wiitanu lwa urilayi.
Mwiili umwi na Mumuyo umwi shaasa mulevaangywa ivika nsia lya ngata imwi lya uvaango lwany.
Na Nndumi ni umwi, kikusiryo nkimwi, na ubatiso llumwi.
Na Iruva kaveva nawe ni Nde wa woose, akee uwe ya findo fyoose na nnang'ani ya fyoose.
Lyo wo umwi weeru mmbo alesimbwa isarya kiinani na mwiina wa simbo ya Kristo.
Nkyo kikaambawa, “Llya alerwa na uwe mmbo aletira mifungwa, kalyimmya vandu simbo.”
Naasa irero elyo “Alerwa na uwe”, mmbo lyaamba kyi kulaore ni yaamba we mmbo aleoloka si kafika si deny?
Na yeto aleoloka si deny mmbwe yeto alerwa na uwe kailanya ngina toose, naambo namulemule findo fyoose.
Nawe mmbo alevika vengyi vave varumi; na vengyi ni vakisuku, na vengyi ni vatarami va siri na vengyi ni veesi na veelosha.
Katana indo naambo veele vakooye ikwaaniswa, na mashora a utarami akooye iinutywa, na mwiili wa Kristo uvangiswa.
Neese loose kyeeri lushefikyaa ukulungo lwa iirikyo lyeru neemanya nnu, Mwana wa Iruva, kutani lwavangiswa, neekooya uniini lwa usongovisi lwa Kristo;
naambo lure lulakiva sha vakoku, lwiisingiswaa efo na efo, na iipowa ni wo uraato lwa miloshye ya vandu, na mitambo ya vandu, lwiilatyaa shia ta ulembi.
Naasa lutire dede yeyo lwikee na ukundi naambo lutumae neemfikya we kya findo fyoose, lumfikye we yeto akee nrwe, we Kristo.
Yoo kwakwe we mwiili moose mmbo ukee llunge filungo fyoose fikainiwa nisha na wo kimwi kirunde ishora lya vayo naambo mwiili wiidimi itumarisywa efo ukundiny.
Kyasiany mmbo shaamba indi, shavekureeka shikee na Nndumi, kupookya ulaalu mulashekaa sha vandu va masanga na ngaa shiravi ta mirima yaawo-fo.
Mashika yewo mmbo vavikye ireema miriminy yaawo, vakasuvaniswa na muu wa ki-Iruva, kyeendwa ni urung'ani yelo lukee nnang'ani yaawo, kimaruma kya uumu lwa mirima yaawo.
Nawo vakammaa ifwa ngashari mmbo vakwaataa findony fya uravi naambo vatani findo fya ukirinda fya wo ngata veetiri lango sheesi.
Lyo yeni, nshiindo mulekulosha kwa Kristo-fo.
Kwakooya muleita mukaloshwa mbony takwe, shaasa dede ya Yesu ikai,
kuute-u deny ngata ilya ya mbee na unndu lwa kasha yelo lulyamarikaa kyeendwa ni ilatya lango yeto tilembaa.
Mwaaluwa vaiya efo makusarony na miriminy.
Muveraa unndu wiiya lukee wuumbe lwa ki-Iruva kyikee kya usumanu na weele lwa dede.
Naasa kuuteny wongo, murere dede sheni wo nndu na ungyi, mashika yese loose mmbo luvakye filungo fya mwiili umwi nsi.
Kwakooya mwarooyo ni unyafi, lyo loleny mulashelyamara,mwi ulasheoloka neeni mwiivavyoo miriminy.
Nta mulasheniinga yeto nkumbi mwaanya.
Nndu mwiiva, nalakiive-fo; kyaindi nakutakure irunda na nrike we muni, naambo nawoni na kindo kyeniinga nndu aanguywa.
Irero iravi lya ngata shoose lyilasheuka kaniny kany-fo, lyo kuuke-fo marero mesha ashidimaa yeekya nndu akee nting'i, na valya vashitaa vakooye ivikywa mbora.
Loleny deny naambo mulashevavisa Mumuyo Mweele wa Iruva, yeto yeni mulevikwa wende mmbwe mufikye nkonu yeto wa iwowowa.
Nrima uvavaa na unyafi na irooywa nngoo na marero na firumu fyuuke kwany deny, ando amwi na uravi lwa wo ngata,
na lyingyi veny velyilyana muveni na veni, muvesaryana shaasa Iruva nawe alemusarya kyeendwa ni Kristo.
Naasany, latyeny Iruva, muve sha vana vakunde;
mukae na ukundi shaasa na Kristo alevelukunda yese, kutani akuvika-u kimaruma kyany, kava kiraso kwa Iruva, kive nrungo nsha ufwamaa.
Lyingyi utuusi lulasheesendwa nta kinnywa kwany-fo, nta uravi lwa ngata shoose-fo, nta lango sheesi, muve vandu veele;
nta findo fya sony na urung'ani na itira ngashile, mashika efyo mfisenyi-fo, lyo mukummbwe yaana Iruva.
Mashika lyo irero elyi mulyiishi nisha nnu, sheelyi nkwiifo ntuusi ao nkirinda nta mwilanga na mwiindya maruva a wongo, ashewonaa ding'u efo umanginy lwa Kristo na Iruva Nde-fo.
Kulave nndu amulemba na marero a ing'ana; mashika unyafi lwa Iruva mmbo lwasheya vana yewo va uravi.
Kyasiany, mulaakani nawo-fo.
Mashika elyo mbee mmbo mwekee ireeminy, kyaindi ulaalu mmbo mukee seny mukee na Nndumi, naasa endeny sha vana va sa.
Kimmba ndunda ta sa ni usha lwa wo ngata na usumanu na dede;
mwimanyaa na nshushwa nkyokyi kisenyi Nndumi.
Nta mulaakani ngaa shikasha titiri ndunda ta ireema-fo, kyeemminy findo fya ngata yeyo;
mashika efyo vakeetana kirika ni sony ifisenda.
Kyaindi lyo efyo fikekyeemmywa mmbo filollyo paa yoo seny, mashika ekyo kyalollyo paa mmbo kyamikywa nsa.
Nkyo kikaambawa, “Marukya yewe kukeerengeya, kuruke kuuke ufuny, naambo Kristo nakumikye.”
Kyasia loleny nnu shaasa mushendaa; nshi sha vandu valatiri urango-fo, kyaindi muve vandu vatiri urango;
muvekira fyeeri mashika fyeeri efi mfya uravi nnu.
Kimmba ni indo mulasheeva varung'ani-fo, mumanyi nkyokyi kisenyi Nndumi.
Nta mulave veenangwa mmbwari nato utiri nnu ufullwe, lyo lalakyeny iishurwa Mumuyo.
Muumburani na fiimbo fya zaburi na fiimbo fisongosye fya nriminy, mwiishimbaa na ikapya Iruva ukoru efo miriminy yaany,
muveana Iruva Nde mikonu myoose kya findo fyoose, kwi irina lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo.
Neeni muveni na veni mwiikunyisaa mwiireiye Kristo.
Yeni vaka, indyeny womi vany kimwi sha iindya Nndumi weeru.
Shamashika nndumi mmbo akee nrwe wa nka, shaasa na Kristo akee nrwe wa siri, nawe mmbo akee mwiikira wa mwiili.
Na shaasa siri yaindya Kristo, kiwo indo na vaka vendye womi vawo findony fyoose.
Yeni womi, kundeny vaka vany, shaasa na Kristo nawe alevekunda siri, kakuuta we muni kimaruma kya vayo.
Naambo nayiilyise neeisangya na mura uriyani na irero lyakwe;
Naambo nakuwonisye siri itiri itumbe ilatiri ivara nta mbese nta uravi sha elo; naambo ive sheele ilatiri ivara.
Naasa ni indo kisumani womi vakunde vaka vawo shaasa vakundye miili yaawo veni. Nndu akunda nka wakwe mmbo akukunda we muni.
Mashika nkukaa-fo nndu asuaa mwiili wakwe muni-fo, kyaindi mmbo auwuutisa na iuvavara, shaasa na Kristo nawe avetanya siri.
Mashika mmbo lukee fyilungo fya mwiili wakwe.
Kimmba ni indo nndu mmbo asheraa ndeye na maye, nandekutira na nka wakwe na yewo vavii vashevaa mwiili umwi.
Kyama ekyi nkiniini nnu, lyo yeny mmbo nkeerera kya Kristo na siri.
Lyo wo nndu nakunde nka wakwe shaasa akukundye we muni, nta nka nalare nalaindya mmi wakwe-fo.
Yeni vana, indyeny vamiku vany kimaruma kya Nndumi, mashika elu llo usumanu.
Indya nde wafo na mae wafo, ivavaso elyi llyo lya mbee lyitiri kyaasa.
Kuwoni ngoma, kuwoni suku shifumbutu yaa ulaniny.
Na yeni vande va vana, mulatavise vana vany, kyaindi valeleny vang'ani veetiri vio vaveringa mavavaso a Nndumi.
Na yeni varundi va vandu, indyeny vanndumi vany yewo va yaa ulaniny mwiireiye neereremya-u, mwiikunyiisye nriminy, kimwi sha iindya Kristo muni.
Nshi sha wiindi lulollyo na miso lwa vandu vakeekukundisa kwa vandu-fo, kyaindi muve sha mashinga a Kristo, mutani findo fisenyi Iruva na nrima umwi nsi;
mwikee na nrima nsha sheelyi mukeerundya Iruva na kilave sheelyi nkya vandu-da-fo.
Mwiimanyaa sheelyi wo kindo kisha nndu atana mmbo ashekitawaa ni Nndumi evirywaa ekyo kyeni, kwava ishinga ao nndu lleke.
Na yeni vanndumi va vandu, kevetanyiny varundi vany efyo fyeni, nta mulavatavise ao ivamatwa, mwiimanyaa sheelyi Nndumi yeto waawo na waany ni yeto umwi wa iruveeu, nawe nnyatiri ikundya-fo.
Na kingi-se, engereny iva vakaari mukee na Nndumi na wiidimi lwa finya yakwe.
Raeny fisha fyoose fya Iruva, mwiidimi ivinga mitambo ya Satana.
Mashika fira lutiri yekapana nshi ya samu na mwiili-fo, ni fira yekapa ngyumangyi na finya, na vaniini veshillya efo ireeminy, na ya matorito a mimuyo mikasha ulaniny lwa mumuyo.
Kimmba ni indo ipoony fisha fyoose fya Iruva, naambo mwiidimi ikapana na uravi, na mukammaa iinutya fyoose musalaleny.
Kyasia kwiipony shu, muveraa dede, neeraa kisha kiringaa mbafu kya usumanu.
Na marende any nakudeesye yeenda sere indeamba Nrumi ya Nsia yeyo ishendee urilalyi.
Mmwasi ya fyoose mwiipoo ngao yaany nnyo kikusiryo, nayo nnyo imwekyaa irummya mife yeyo ya muro ya yeto nravi.
Na lyingyi muvewarya wende lwa ukiro na usu lwa Mumuyo llo irero lya Iruva;
na fiterewo na fyeerero fyoose mwiiterevaa wo kyeeri mukee na Mumuyo, muvelala shoovi kya efyo mwiiterevyaa veele woose.
Kiwo neeny da muveshiterevya, naambo shiidimi irera nisha, na yaamba kyama ekyo kya Nrumi ya Nsia shikee na ukaari.
Mashika nkimaruma kya efyo shilevaangwa shive nrumi kutani shafingwa, kutani shawona ukaari lweerera shaasa kishikooye irera.
Naasa neeni mukooye imanya mbony takwa, shaasa shiifo, Tikiko mwanama nkunde, nndundi nsaari wa Nndumi, yeto mmbo ashemuviaa mbony toose.
Nawe mmbo shikeenruma kwany kimaruma kya vayo namuvie mbony teru, navemuviirya muu.
Siri ikae na urilalyi na ukundi, ando amwi na kikusiryo, kyiluukya kwa Iruva Nde na kwa Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
Isarya lyikae woose yewo vakunndye Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo kyikee kya dede.
Ni yeny Paulo na Timoteo, lukee mashinga a Kristo Yesu, lwamureiya yeni veele va Kristo Yesu mukee Filipi ando amwi na vesalallya siri na vatarami va vayo.
Isarya lyimukaye na urilalyi luukye kwa Iruva Nde na kwa Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
Wo kyeeri shamukumbwa yeni mmbo nkeyaana Iruva.
Wo nkonu shavemuterevya yeni shiiterevaa na ifura,
kimaruma kya wiitanu lwany ivambisa Nrumi ya Nsia, uka nkonu ulya wa mbee na kufike inu.
Na kindo shivikye nsia ni ekyi, sheelyi yeto alepooka ishora elyo isha indo efo miriminy yaany nkuti nashelyiinutya kufike nkonu yeto wa Kristo Yesu.

Na shaasa kivekee kuti yakwa shimukusarye kya efyo fyoose, mashika yeni mmbo mukee kunu nriminy wakwa, kimmba kyeeri kya ikaa lyakwa kifingyony neefo ishoreny elyo lya ikureekya Nrumi ya Nsia na iivangisa, yeni moose mmbo muleakana neeny isarya elyi.
Mashika na Iruva ni nkureekyi wakwa shaasa shitirwa ni nsia kimaruma kyany yeni moose shikee na nrima wa Yesu Kristo.
Na kiterewo kyakwa nkyo ekyi, ikunda lyany lyeengere ing'ana nnu mwikee na waarya na umanyo loose;
muwarye yefyo fikee fisha, naambo mutire mirima myaa, ilatiri ivara, kufike nkonu yeto wa Kristo.
Indo muvekaa-fo mwiishwe ndunda ta usumanu kyeendwa ni Yesu Kristo, kya itumbe na nnduma wa Iruva.
Lyo vana vama vakwa, mmbo shikundye mumanyi sheelyi filya fyoose fileshikooya mmbo fileenda indo mmwasi kyeendwa ni ikwaanisa Nrumi ya Nsia.
Naakwa ni ifingwa lyakwa mmbo lyilekoora paa kwi Kristo, vasikari vakalollya, na vandu vengyi-da.
Na veengyi va yewo vakusirye Nndumi, kyeeri vakeekaariswa kyeendwa ni ifingwa lyakwa, vakeengera ikaarya yaamba irero lya Iruva kulaiyoo weerei.
Mashika kwiifo vengyi vakeevambisa mbony ta Kristo kimaruma kya uriingyi na ukasha; na vengyi lyo kikee kya usha.
Wo mmbo vakeyaamba Kristo na ukundi, veishi sheelyi yeny mmbo shikee nsauwe naambo shikureekye Nrumi ya Nsia;
kyaindi kwiifo yewo vakeamba Kristo na uriingyi kilakee kya nrima mwaa, naambo vafumbute ngatara ta ifingwa lyakwa.
A kyamaany-kyi? Lyo na kyikava inda, kwakooya nkwa ntambo, ao kwakooya ni kya dede, lyo Kristo akee yaambawa tupu, nkyo neeny shitirwa ni nsia, na sheengere ifura.
Mashika shiishi shamanya efyo mmbo fisheshiwuiyaa five ukiro kwakwa, kyeendwa ni fiterewo fyany neesimbwa Mumuyo wa Yesu Kristo;

shaasa sheevikye nsia deny, na ilanga, sheelyi nshiwonaa isuka-fo, indi shiishi na nshushwa wo nkonu, na ulaalu-da Kristo nkuti nawoni iitikiswa mwiiliny wakwa, kwakoya shikee na muu ao kwakooya shifiiye.
Mashika kyakwa yeny ikaa na muu ni Kristo na ifwa ni mbusha.
Lyo kwakooya ikaa na muu shikee indi na mwiili ni ndunda ta mashora akwa, naasa ekyo nsauwaa nshikiishi-fo.
Mmbo shikee nsisirye yoo nnang'ani ya findo fivii, mmbo shilangye yeenda shindekaa na Kristo, mashika mmbo kyevaa kyisha mmwasi.
Neekaa na mwiili mmbo lyikee kisha mmwasi lyo kimaruma kyany.
Neeny shambikya efyo nsia, shiishi sheelyi mmbo nkaa-u na yaakana neeni, naambo mukooye yeengera ifura efo kikusiryony;
naambo mweengere ifura mukee na Kristo Yesu kimaruma kyakwa kyeendwa ni ishekaa neeni lyingyi.

Llyo mikaaye yaany ive shaasa kiisumanyi Nrumi ya Nsia ya Kristo. Naambo kwakooya shasha neemulollya, yeni, ao kwakooya shilaiyo, shikooye iita mbony tany, sheelyi mmbo muselelyi shumu mwikee na nrima umwi nsi, mwiikapanyaa iirikyo lya Nrumi ya Nsia.
Mure mulairyaa vakiduva vany kya kindo kyoose, kwa yewo ni wende lulollyo paa lweereka, lyo kwany yeni ni ukiro yelo luukye kwa Iruva.
Mashika mmbo muleniingyo kimaruma kya Kristo, nshi naambo mumwiirikye-da-fo, ni ando amwi neelyiswa ukyiva kimaruma kyakwe;
mwiikee na fira ilya sheni muleilollya kwakwa, na iita sheelyi shikeekapana fika ulaalu.
Kyasia kwakooya kyiiyo iviryo muu kwi Kristo ao ikaariswa lya ngata shoose lya ikunda, na kwakooya kwiiyo yaakaniswa Mmumuyo na kwakooya kwiiyo isaryo na ilyillyo,
ishuryeny ifura lyakwa, naambo muve va nrwe umwi nsi, na ikunda lyimwi, na nrima umwi, mwikusaraa kimwi.
Mulasheetana kindo kyoose mwiiwakyanaa nta mwikung'anisaa-fo, kyaindi taniny fyoose mwikunyiisye, wo nndu nalollye yeto ungyi sheelyi mmbo akee ng'waana ngota we muni.
Kulave nndu ava mwiisara mbony takwe muni, kyaindi wo umwi waany nave mwiikusara kya yeekya vengyi.
Veny na nrima wa ngata yeyo sheni shasa yekee nnang'ani ya Kristo Yesu,
mashika we muni lllya kipooka mmbo ekee na ngata ya Iruva, lyo we nnyalelollya iva wa ngata ya Iruva nkindo kyeekutira nakyo-fo;
llyo we muni mmbo aleva sheelyi nalatiri itumbe, kava sha ishinga, karaa ngata ya nndu wa vandu;
lyingyi-se llya alelollyo mmbo atiri fwana ya nndu wa vandu, mmbo alekunyiisa we muni katira wiindi kutani akooya ufu, yee, ufu lwa alya nsalabeny.
Naasa Iruva kanng'anisa nnu, kansimba irina lyiilanyi marina moose;
naambo wo nndu nashefiirya irina lya Yesu ndi, va iruvee-u na va ya ulaniny, na va efo si ya ulana.
Na wo ulumi lwaambe paa sheelyi YESU KRISTO NI NNDUMI, naambo Iruva Nde naute-u ing'aniswa.

Kyasiany vakunde vakwa, shaasa muletira wiindi mikonu myoose, nta nshi kyeeri kilya shekee neeni-da-fo, kyaindi kive indo mmwasi elyi shilaiyo, moore ukiro lwany yeni muveni mwiitirwa ni usau na irerema.
Mashika ni Iruva akeerunda mashora nnang'ani yaany, ikunda lyany na irunda lyany, mushiinutyaa mesha yoo akundye.
Rundeny findo fyoose kulaifo nkunung'unu ao iwakyana,

naambo mukooye iva vana vesha va Iruva valatiri mbese, nta ulembi, mulatiri nta ntambo yaa irikeny elyi lyikee ilyang'a lyikeenda mwiiri, neeni elyi mukee nnang'ani yaawo mmbo mulollyo sha sa niini ya ulaniny yelu,
muvetira irero lya muu; naambo shiidimi iwona nrima wa ifura elyi nkonu wa Kristo ufikaa, kyoore sheelyi nshilekutakura ruu-fo, nta nshilekwaarisa ruu-fo.
Ee, naakwa shaaluwa kiraso kyeepusuwa kimaruma kya kikusiryo kyany, mmbo shitirwa ni nsia; neeny shitirwa ni nsia ando amwi neeni moose.
Neeni kevefureny indo, muvefura ando amwi neeny.
Kyaindi shivikye nsia Nndumi Yesu ashiidimisyaa shirumi Timoteo nashe kwany fyeeri fya kufii, naambo neeny shiviiryo muu, elyi shimanyaa mbony tany.
Kimmba shilatiri nndu ungyi akee kindo kyimwi neeny, ashiidimaa imanya deny mbony tany shaasa tikai.
Mashika vandu vengyi mmbo vakeeruuya mbony tawo veni, na nshi mbony ta Kristo Yesu-fo.
Lyo mwiishi nnduma wa Timoteo sheelyi mmbo alerundya Nrumi ya Nsia ando amwi neeny, kava sha mwana neeny sha ndeye.
Naasany mmbo nshenrumaa uviny, shammeemanya efyo fikaa fishikooye.
Neeny shikusirye sheelyi Nndumi ashiidimisyaa naakwa nnyeny isha uviny.
Lyo shavelollya kuti iruma Epafradito kwany, akee mwanama wakwa, avekee mwaakana mashora ando amwi neeny, nsikari uroyaakwa, nawe ni nrumi waany na mwifurukanya filya fishitinyi.
Mashika mmbo eelangye imulollya yeni moose, karovyo deny, mashika elyi muleeta sheelyi mmbo elwee.
Mashika mmbo elwee nnu deny, kufii nafwe, lyo Iruva kallyillya, nta nshi we muni-da-fo, neeny da, nta nshikundye iting'wa nnu shifuluye-fo.
Naasany mmbo shikee ikutakura nnu inruma, naambo elyi mushellolla lyingyi mufure, neeny ting'wa yakwa yaangwe.
Mmbwaryeny na ifura kimaruma kya Nndumi, nndu sha yeu mulollye ni nndu asumani iindyo.
Mmbo alefikya kufii ifwa kimaruma kya ishora lya Kristo, naambo tupu nainutye filya fyeyaanguye efo utaraminy lwany kwakwa.
Numa ya efyo vanavama, fureny mukee na Nndumi. Imureiya mbony tilya sheni nkishirovyaa yeny-fo, mashika kyivaa mbusha kwany.
Kwiiseny na vandu vavakye fite, kwiiseny na veetana maravi kevekwiiseny na vekurumbwa mwiili.
Mashika vandu vakee varini kya dede ni yese, lukaveva veinndya Iruva kyikee kya ngata ya Mumuyo neewona ifura nnu elyi lutiri Kristo Yesu, nta lluvikye findo fya mwiili yeu nsia-fo.
Kulakooye yeny sheshiidima ivikya findo fya mwiili nsia. Kwakooya nndu moose alollya kuti yeevikya findo fya mwiili nsia, yeny ni mmwasi.
Mashika mmbo sherinwa shiitiri mikonu nyanya, nndu wa ufyari lwa Israeli, va mmba ya Benyamini, Mwisraeli va Vaisraeli, efo kweeringa uvavaso shava Mfarisayo,
efo kwa utakusu, shava mwiisisya siri, kya usumanu luwonikaa kimaruma kya iringa uvavaso, nsheetiri mbese-fo.
Kyaindi lyo findo filya sheefilollye mmbusha kwakwa, mmbo shilefilollya nruu kimaruma kya Kristo.

Ee, kyailanya yefyo, kwakwa yeny mmbo shilelollya findo fyoose ni ruu kwainanisa na usha yelo lwiilanyi kyeeso lweemanya Kristo Yesu, Nndumi wakwa, yeto kimaruma kyakwe shilelollya findo fyoose ni ruu neefyaallwa sha mando naambo tupu shiwoni Kristo.

Na lyingyi shilollyo shikee nawe, naambo shilasheetira usumanu lwakwa shimuni yelo lushuka uvavasony, kyaindi shiwoni usumanu yelo lushaa na kikusiryo kwa Kristo, llo usumanu luukye kwa Iruva, kyeendwa nkikusiryo.
Naambo shimmanyi we na wiidimi lwa iruka lyakwe na kya iitana nawe kya makyiva akwe, naambo shivakaniswa na ifwa lyakwe.
Naambo na kyikakyi shiidimi ifikya iruka lya vafu.
Lyoony nshi sheelyi shammaa ifika-fo, ao shammaa isongovika-fo, oode, mmbo shikeengera iwaana naambo shikooye iwara kilya Kristo Yesu ashikunndya llya aleshivaanga.
Vanavama, nshikusarye sheelyi mmbo shammaa itira-fo; lyo shitiri irero lyimwi nsi, fingyi fyoose shafiviira numa, shatamballya yefyo fikee mbee yakwa;
mmbo nkeyaangusya, nambo nshewonisa ureto lwa simbo yeyo ya uvaango lwa kiiruveu lwa Iruva luukye kwa Kristo Yesu.
Kyasiany, yese lukee vasongovisi lusoongye yefyo; naakwa mwakusara ngata ingyi kya kindo kyoose, Iruva mmbo ashemusukuyaa neekyo.
Lyo yaa lufikye ulaalu lweende lwikee indo.
Vanavama vakwa, shilatyeny yeny, muvelola na valya vakeesora kyaaso kilya lulemoora.
Mashika lyo kwiifo vengyi shaasa shilemmaa imuvia mbony tawo na ulaalu shimuvye lyingyi na misoru, sheelyi mmbo vakee vakyiduva va nsalaba wa Kristo.
Yewo mmbo vashefurumyaa na urumato, mashika iruva lyawo nndeu, na itumbe lyawo ni usutu elo lwaawo, valangye findo fya ulana.
Lyo yese kweru kwekaa ni iruveeu, na yoo nng'u luvikye nsia ilollya Mwikira, we Nndumi Yesu Kristo;
mmbwe yeto ashealashaa miili yei yeeru ifwaa, ivake mwiili yeto wakwe wa itumbe, na wiidimi yelo lwakwe lushevikaa findo fyoose yoo si ya marende akwe.
Naasany vanavama vakwa, mukee vakunde vakwa, shimulangye nnu, mukaveva ifura lyakwa na ureto lwakwa, salaleny indo shumu mwiikutiri na Nndumi, ee-te vakunde vakwa.
Mmbo nkeetereva Euodia, shooka-fo shatereva Sintike, vave na nrwe umi nsi vekee na Nndumi.

Ee-da, shikundye na yewe, ishinga uroye wakwa wa dede, kweekye vaka yewo, mashika mmbo valekapannya Nrumi ya Nsia ando amwi neeny, ando amwi na Klementi, ando amwi na yewo vengyi valeakana neeny nawo marina awo akee efo kitabuny kya muu.
Fureny na Nndumi mikonu myoose, shaamba-se, fureny.
Ufoo lwany lulollyo ni vandu woose, mashika Nndumi nkufii nashe.
Mulakwaatare na kindo nta kimwi-fo, lyo wo kindo kimuting'aa mmbo muterevaa Iruva, ando amwi neemwaana, Iruva nakooye imanya yefyo fyamwaanguya.
Na urilalyi lwa Iruva lwiilanyi urango lweru, lo lumweekye iringa mirima yaany na makusaro any kyeendwa ni Kristo Yesu.

Na kya ifurumya vanavama vakwa, kwakooya kwiiyo mbony shoose ya dede, fyoose fikee fya waarya, fyoose fya usumanu, fyoose fikee fya usha na fisenyi, neefyo fyoose fikee fya nnduma nsha, kwakooya kwiiyo usha loose, kwakooya kwiiyo nnduma nsha, langeny nnu mikaye ya ngata yeyo.
Findo filya mulewarya kwakwa neekulosha, na iita na ifilollya kwakwa, fitaniny, na Iruva yeto wa isarya nakae neeni.
Nndumi mmbo aleshiniinga ifura nnu, mashika elyi ulaalu mwammaa ivangisa mirima yaany kimaruma kyakwa, shaasa llya mwekeekusara kyakwa, lyo mulawonise mwaanya.
Nshi nkeerera indo mashika elyi shaanguywa nkindo-fo, mashika shilemmaa iishivya na iirikya ikaa na mwiina yeto wakwa.
Shiishivye yaanguywa, shavemanya na iwonisyo, ngata shoose na kya findo fyoose, mmbo shiishi iwuura na itirwa nshaa, itira fiingyi na yaanguywa.
Neefyo fyoose mmbo shaidima kyeendwa ni yeto mwiishisimba finya.
Lyo mmbo muletana kyisha nnu elyi muleakana neeny efo ngatareny takwa.

Na yeni-da, yeni Vafilipi mwiishi muveni, sheelyi kyeeri shileuka Makedonia llya mapookyony a ivambisa Nrumi ya Nsia, nkwiifo nta siri ingyi ileakana neeny kunu urundiny yelu lwa iningya neewarya kuuta yeni muveni-fo.
Mashika fika kulya Tesalonike mmbo muleshirikya ngarami naambo shilaanguyo, na nta nshi lyimwi da-fo.
Nta nshi shilangye mweengere ishitannya indo-fo, lyo mmbo shifurye kimaruma kya simbo yeto tany tikeengera ifumbuka efo kwany.
Lyo yeny mmbo shitiri findo fyoose na mmwasi, shaishwa shapu; findo filya fileuka kwany mmbo shilefityo ni Epafradito fikava nrungo nsha, kikaveva kiraso kyikee kiirikye kikasennya Iruva.
Nawe Iruva yeto wakwa mmbo ashemeengeryaa wo kindo ekyo kyamwaanguya kiinani na usimba lwakwe na efo itumbeny lyakwe kwi Kristo Yesu.
Ulaalu Nndumi we Nde weeru nang'aniswa, akee wa llung'anu na llung'anu. Amen!
Idikireny veele woose na irina lya Kristo Yesu. Wooroye wany yeva vakee neeny vamwiidikira nnu.
Veele woose vamwiidikira, mmwasi yewo vakee va mmba ya Kaisari.
Isarya lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo lyimukaye efo miriminy yaany.
Ni yeny Paulo shikee nrumi wa Kristo Yesu kyeendwa ni isarya lya Iruva shikee na Timoteo mwanamaye weeru.
Shamureiya yeni vanavama mukee veele, vasaari va Kristo mukee muriny wa Kolosai. Isarya lyimukaye na urilalyi yelo luukye kwa Iruva Nde weeru.
Mmbo lukeyaana Iruva, Nde wa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo wo nkonu lwiimuterevyaa.
Kipookya kyeeri luleita mbony ta kikusiryo kyany kwa Kristo Yesu, na kya ikunda elyo lyany kwa vandu va Iruva woose.
Kyeendwa ni ivika nsia eto mulesurummyo iruveeu, eto mbony ta vayo muleita llya mbee efo dedeny ya irero lya Nrumi ya Nsia.
Nnyo yeyo ilemufikya shaasa ivekee ulaniny koose, ikavevika ndunda tilollyo, shaasa ikeeng'ana efo kwany uka llya muleiita na imanya nnu isarya elyo lya Iruva kya dede.
Shaasa Epafra akee ishinga urooye wany na nkunde waany alemulosha. Kaveva mwifurukannya Kristo akee nsaari kimaruma kyany.
Mmbwe yeto aleluvia kya ikunda lyany lyikee lya ngata ya Mumuyo.
Kimmba ni indo naakwa ni yese, uka nkonu ulya lulepooka iita llukeederya itereva kimaruma kyany-fo, naambo mukooye iishurwa urango lwa ikunda lyakwe na waarya na imanya lya efo nriminy.
Naambo mukee shaasa kimusumannyi mbee ya Nndumi mukooye insenya deny, muvevika ndunda shisha efo mashoreny mesha moose, na yeengera urango lweemanya Iruva.
Mwishidimisywaa deny, kiinani na finya ya itumbe lyakwe, muvewona usisiryo lwa wo ngata muvereyaa mukee na ifura;
mwishanaa Nde yeto alemuniinga iwarya waavi lwa ding'u ya veele efo seny yeyo.
Nawe mmbo aleluuta efo finyiny ta ireema, kalusamisa-fo kalwaata efo umangyiny lwa Mwana yeto muni ikunda lyakwe.
Na efo kwakwe mfo lutiri iwowowa na llyo ifwaayo ngyulyamari.
Nawe mmbo avakye Iruva yeto nalavaa ilollya na miso, kasongoya fyuumbe fyoose ikaafo.

Mashika fyuumbe fyoose mmbo fileumbwa mmbwe, yefyo fikee iruveeu na efyo fikee uwe ya uruka efyo filollyo na miso na filalollyo, fikava fitima fya itumbe, ao umangyi, ao wiidimi, findo fyoose mmbo fileumbwa kyeendwa mmbwe, na kimaruma kyakwe.
Nawe mmbo asongoye findo fyoose ikaafo, na fyoose ni efo kwakwe fikutiri.
Nawe mmbwe nrwe wa mwiili, nnyo siri, nawe ni mapookyony, na wa mbee yuuka kwa vafu, naambo nave nsongoru wa findo fyoose.
Mashika mmbo alekunda findo fyoose nafyo mmbo fishefurumyaa yoo kwakwe.
Nawe nashesanda findo fyoose nafyeende yoo kwakwe, elyi alemaa yeende urilalyi na samu yakwe alya nsalabeny, yoo kwakwe ni indo, kwakoya ni kya findo fya yaa ulaniny ao fya iruveeu.
Na yeni elyo mbee mwekee vatarakanise mukavikyana fiduva, mukatana filasumani, ulaalu mmbo ammaa imusanda;
kyeendwa mwiili wakwe llya alefwa, naambo namoomwi na yoo akai, muve veele, mulatiri kiteve nta mbese;

mukaarye efo kikusiryony ekyo mwiikee uvasheny, muvangiswa, nta mulashiindutwaa mure ivika nsia lya Nrumi ya Nsia ilya muleeta mbony ta vayo, ilya ileongoyo fyuumbe fyoose fikee kwasi ya ngina, nnyo yeyo yeny Paulo shileva mwiifurukannya.
Ulaalu mmbo shikeefura nnu kya makyiva yaa ashitiri kimaruma kyany, neeny shaveinutya-u filya filewiika-u fya makiva a Kristo efo mwiiliny wakwe, nnyo siri yakwe.
Nayo mmbo shilevikwa shive mwiifurukannya kiinani na ungari lwa Iruva shilerambikywa kive mbusha kwany, naambo shiinutye irero lya Iruva.
Kyama ekyo mmbo kyekee kirike uka mbee ya marika moose, kyaindi ulaalu mmbo kilesukuyo veele vakwe.
Nawe Iruva kakunda iwoora shaasa usimba na itumbe lya kyama ekyi efo vanduny va masanga, nawo ni Kristo akee nnang'ani yaawo, ivika nsia kya itumbe elyo.
Nawe mmbwe yeto lukee ivambisa mbony takwe, lwishiikimbaa wo nndu, neelosha wo nndu lukee na waarya loose, naambo lweende nndu asongovikye kwa Kristo.
Neeny mmbo shikeekuvinisa nnu kimaruma kya irero elyo yeni, shavekutakura kiinani na iidimisywa ni yeto mwiirunda na finya nnang'ani yakwa.
Mashika mmbo shikundye mumanyi ikutakura lyakwa shaasa lying'ani kimaruma kyany, na kya valya va Laodikia na kya valya valashilollye na miso yaa,
naambo vaviiryo muu miriminy yaawo, velungwaa ukundiny, naambo vawonise usimba loose lweemanya songosiny, vaute-u imanya nisha deny fyama efyo fya Iruva, mmbwe Kristo;
mmbwe yeto kwakwe usimba loose lwa urango lukusurumyi
Mmbo shaamba irero elyi, naambo tupu kulasheeva nndu amulembaa na marero emuleleveya.
Mashika ra elyi shilaiyo shimuni, kyaindi efo nriminy mmbo shikee neeni, shilangaa na ivereya uramba lwany na ukaari lwa kikusiryo kyany efo kwa Kristo.
Naasany shaasa mulewarya Kristo Yesu, we Nndumi weeru, endeny indo indo mwikee nawe;
mwiikulungye neekutira nawe, muveva vakaari efo iirikyony, shaasa muleloshwa; muveengera iva va kyaanu.

Loleny mukwiise kulasheeva nndu amukamara mifungwa na urango lwa ing'ana neemulemba, shaasa miishivye ya kivandu ikai, na filoshyo fya uraatony efyo fya kiulana filya fya mbee, filakee fya ngata ya Kristo.
Mashika yoo kwakwe nng'u usongovisi loose lwa Iruva lukai, efo mwiiliny.
Na yeni mukasongoviswa yoo kwakwe we akee nrwe wa itumbe na wiidimi loose.
Yoo kwakwe mmbo mukee sha vandu varini lyo urini lulakee lwa mwiili, sheelyi kwara mwiili wa kinndu, llo urini lwa Kristo.
Mmbo mulerikwa ando amwi nawe llya mulebatiswa; na yoo ubatisony mukarutwa ando amwi nawe, kyeendwa ni iirikya wiidimi lwa Iruva yeto alennduta auka kwa vafu.
Na yeni llya mweefiiye kimaruma kya makasha any na ira mularinwa, kamuviirya muu ando amwi nawe, ekyimaa imfwaaya makasha moose,
kamaa na yaangata barwa ilya yeemutya uvingo ikavika kiduva kweru, kayuuta-u deny neikapya nsalabeny;
kavinga ngyumangyi na wiidimi, kataallwa ruu ekee na ukaari, katirwaa alya nsalabeny.
Naasany kulave nndu amuutya uvingo kimaruma kya fyeelya ao fyeena-fo, ao kimaruma kya mikonu miniini ao ilollyo lya mwiiri-fo, ao nta kya sabato-fo;
yefyo fyoose m-firishe fya findo efyo fishaa; lyo mwiili ni wa Kristo.
Kulave nndu amusoka simbo yaany, kya ikunyiisya efyo akundye we muni, na iindya vasu, ekuvikaa efo mooryeny neekung'anisa we muni kya ruu, na urango lwa kivandu;
nta nalasoraa Nrwe yeto ukee ntire na ilungyo ando amwi na miraarii nato ukalungika indo kyuuka na Iruva.
Naasany kwakooya mmbo mulefwa ando amwi na Kristo na ira filoshyo filya fya mbee fya kiulana, nkikyi elyi mukaa si ya mavavaso, sha vandu va kiulana,
mulapaani, mulakombe, mulatire;
(findo efyo fyoose mmbo filyamarikaa elyi fyarunda), mwiisoraa ngyufundo na filoshyo fya kivandu?
Findo efyo mmbo fivakye sheelyi mmbo fikee fisha, efo urambeny lwa miindye yeyo mulekusongosya muveni, mukaiindya, na ishillya mwiili na unyaasi; lyo filashiidimaa iima lango ta mwiili.
Naasa kyimmba mukee varute ando amwi na Kristo, ruuyeny efyo fikee uwe efo Kristo akai, akee rembo woko usha lwa Iruva.
Kusareny efyo fikee uwe, nshi yefyo fikee kunu si-fo.
Mashika mmbo mulefwa, na muu wany mmbo ukee nsurumi amwi na Kristo kwa Iruva.
Kyeeri Kristo asheorwaa paa, yeto akee muu weru, llyo neeni musheorwaa paa ando amwi nawe efo itumbeny.
Kyasia, lakaniny na lango sheesi ta ya ulaniny, utuusi na uravi, na ilanga, llyo iindya maruva a wongo;
kyeendwa mfindo yefyo unyafi lwa Iruva mmbo lumusheyaa.
Findony efyo mfo mwekai elyo mbee llya mweifo.
Lyo ulaalu reny deny efyo, mfyo unyafi, irooyo nngoo, uravi, firumu, na iing'asha filooke kaniny kany-fo.
Mulaviani wongo-fo, mashika elyi mwankwaatwa deny unndu lulya lwa mbee ando amwi na mashora a vayo;
muraa unndu wiiya, yelo lulealuwa wiiya luve lwa ngata ya yeto aleluumba.
Yoo nkwiiyo Mgriki nta Myuda-fo, irinwa ao ira irinwa-fo, nndu nnrango ao itondo, ishinga ao nndu lleke-fo, mashika Kristo mmbo akee fyoose nnang'ani a fyoose.
Naasany, kimmba mukee vasauwe va Iruva, veele mukakundwa nnu raeny nrima wa ilyillya, unndu usha, ikunyiisa, ufoo, usisiryo,
muvesisiryana neesaryana, na kwakooya nndu asuuye na ungi, shaasa Nndumi alemusarya yeni, neeni kiwo.
Mmwasi ya fyoose tireny ukundi mashika llo kyeeso kya usongovisi.
Na urilalyi lwa Kristo lumusalallye miriminy yaany, nkyo mulevaangyo, muveva vandu va kyaanu.

Irero lya Kristo lyiwalyi-walyi miriminy yaany na waarya loose, muvekulosha na iikimbana na zaburi na fiimbo, na mbony shisongosye yeto tipanaa nrima, kimmba mwansaryo indo muveimbya Iruva miriminy yaany.
Na wo kindo mutanaa, na kikava kyeerera ao kyerunda, taniny fyoose na irina lya Nndumi Yesu, muveana Iruva Nde kyeendwa mmbwe.
Yeni vaka, indyeny vomi vany shaasa kisennyi Nndumi.
Na yeni vomi kundeny vaka vany nta mulakee na nrima muu nawo-fo.
Na yeni vana, indyeny vamiku vany kya findo fyoose; mashika ekyi nkyo kisennyi Nndumi.
Na yeni vande va vana nta mulatavise vana vany, naambo valasheuta pa yoo kwany.
Na yeni mashinga, irikyen vanndumi yewo vany va yaa ulaniny kya findo fyoose, nta nshi naambo kive kindo kyeelola kya ikukundisa vanduny-fo, kyaindi kive kya nrima muni, mwiireiye Iruva.
Wo kindo mutanaa kitaniny na nrima deny, sheelyi mwatannya Nndumi muni nta nshi vandu-fo,
mwiimanyaa sheelyi mmbo mushewaryaa weesi lwany luve ding'u yaany. Mmbo mukerundya Nndumi ake Kristo.
Mashika yeto mwiitannya vengi fya ukasha mmbo ashetaiywaa kya ukasha lwakwe, nta nnyashesaryoo kya ruu-fo.
Na yeni vanndumi va vandu, tanyiny mashinga any fya usumanu na fya wiindi, mwiimanyaa sheelyi naakwa ni yeni mutiri Nndumi waany akee wa efo iruveeu.
Laleny shoovi nnu mwiiterevaa, ando amwi na yaana Iruva,
muveluterevya neese kiwo, naambo Iruva naluruye mwaango wa irero lyakwe, luvambise kyama ekyo kya Kristo na nkyo ekyo kyileengye shafingwa.
Naambo shikyoore paa shaasa kishisumanyi irera.
Kaeny na urango kwa yewo valakee vakristo, mularetaa nta fyeeri.
Marero any ave a mbora kyeeri kyoose, arolaa, muvemanya shaasa kisumani irouwa wo nndu.
Tikiko we mwanamaye weeru nkunde akee nsaari na mwiakana neeny mashoreny a Nndumi, mmbo ashemoongoyaa mbony takwa toose.
Nawe mmbo shanruma kwany kimaruma kya vayo, naambo mumanyi mbony teru, namuviirye nato muu.
Mmbo ashaa na Onesimo mwanamaye weeru ungyi akee nkunde na nsaari, nawe mmbwa efo kwany. Yewo mmbo vashemuviaa mbony toose ta yaa kweru.
Na Aristariko ulya alefingwa ando amwi neeny amwiidikira, ando amwi na Marko mwanamaye wa maye wa Barnaba, ulya mulevavaso mmbwe, naasany kansha mwaambyeny.
Na Yesu yeto avaangwaa Yusto; yewo ni vandu va Kiyuda. Yewo wo veni ni vandu veakana neeny mashoreny yoo a umangyi lwa Iruva; nawo mmbo valeshiviirya nnu muu.
Epafra ulya wa kwany, nawe akee ishinga lya Yesu Kristo, amwiidikira, nawe mmbo akeevina nnu kimaruma kyany imuterevya, naambo mukooye isalala na ivanga nisha shaasa Iruva akundye.
Mashika mmbo nkenkureekya deny sheelyi mmbo akee ikuvinisa nnu kimaruma kyany na kya valya vakee Laodikia, na kya valya vakee Hierapoli,
Na Luka ulya akee mwaanga nkunde, na Dema vamwiidikira nnu.
Na yeni idikireny nnu siri ya Laodikia, na Nimfa, na siri yeyo ya mmba yakwe.
Mukammaa isoma barwa yei, niingyeny indesomwa se kulya siriny ya Laodikia, na barwa ilya ya Laodikia nayo isomwa ni yeni.
Vieny Arkipo indi, “Salallya nnu urundi yelu Nndumi alekurambikya naambo kulwiinutye.”
Yefi mfyo fiidikiro fyakwa yeny Paulo shareiya na woko lwakwa shimuni. Mukummbwe nnu ifingwa lyakwa. Isarya lya Iruva lyimukaye yeni.
Ni yese, Paulo, Silvanu na Timoteo lwareiya kwa siri ya Vatesalonike ikee siri ya Iruva Nde na Nndumi Yesu Kristo. Isarya na urilalyi fikae neeni.
Mmbo lukeana Iruva kyeeri kyoose kimaruma kyany yeni moose, lwimukumbwaa efo fiterewony fyeru.
Nta llurekywaa ishora lyany iirikyo na ngatara yaany imusheye kimaruma kya ikunda-fo, ando amwi na usisiryo lwany luriani na ivika nsia efo kwa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, na mbee ya Iruva Nde weeru."
Mashika-le vanavama mukunndyo ni Iruva, lwiishi sheelyi mmbo mukee vasauwe.
Mashika nrumi yeeru ya nsia nnyilemusheya ikee marero a ruu-fo, mmbo ilesha iitiri finya ya Mumuyo Mweele na ukaariso luvangyi, shaasa mulevelollya mikaaye yeeru efo kwany.
Neeni mmbo mulelusora yese na Nndumi, llya mulewarya irero mwikee ngatareny shiroo, lyo Mumuyo Mweele kamulyimya ifura.
Kutani mwava kyaaso kyisha kwa valya vairikye va kulya Makedonia na Akaya.
Mashika irero lya Iruva mmbo lyilerumwa lyuuka kwany, na nshi lyilefika Makedonia na Akaya-fo, ni wo ando kikusiryo kyany kwa Iruva kilefika, nta yese llutiri-u kya mmwasi kyeyaamba-fo.
Ni elyi wo veni vakeevambisa mbony teru, shaasa lulesha kwany, na shaasa mulera maruva a wongo mukalatya Iruva, naambo murundye Iruva yeu muni muu akee wa dede;
muvevereya Mwana wakwe nooke iruveeu, mmbwe yeto alennduta kooka kwa vafu, we Yesu, yeto ashelukiraa unyafi yelo lusheshaa.
Mashika-le vanavama, yeni muveni mwiishi shaasa lulesha kwany, sheelyi nkileva kya ruu-fo;
kyaindi lwikimaa ilyiswa ukyiva na itannywa fya kiila, efo Filipi, mwiishi, mmbo lulekaarya yaamba Nrumi ya Iruva ya Nsia kwany, lukaiwaanya nnu.
Ni elyi wiikimbi lweru kwany lulakee lwa ruu, nta ukasha nta llutiri ntambo-fo
Llyo shaasa Iruva alekunda lurambikyo Nrumi ya Nsia neese niindo luyaambaa, nshi sheelyi lukesennya vandu-fo, kyaindi lwikee vandu vasenyaa Iruva yeto aishi mirima yeeru.
Mashika yese lluleamba marero ekukundisa luveni-fo, neeni mwiishi indo, nta llulerera marero esikya unyuku-fo, nawe Iruva eeshi ekyo.
Nta lluleruuya nnduma kwa vandu-fo, nta kwany-fo, nta kwa vandu vengyi-fo, elyi lukee varumi va Kristo kive mmbo lwamurovya-fo,
mmbo luleva vafoo sau efo kwany, lukavaka nde mwiilela vana vakwe muni.
Neese kiwo lukammuvika nsia indo, lukakunda imuniinga fyoose, Nrumi ya Nsia sanda na mirima yeeru, mashika elyi mukee vakunde veru.

Mashika-le vanavamaye veru, mmbo mukumbuye kya waataro na ngatara teru, mashika yese mmbo lulerunda mashora kio na nsanyiny naambo lulasheerovya nta nndu na kava vi, kyeeri ekyo lwekee imoongoya Nrumi ya Iruva ya Nsia.
Yeni muveni mmbo mukee vakureekyi, na Iruva kiwo, shaasa lulekaa kwany yeni mwiirikye, lukee vaarya, va usumanu, lulatiri kyeekumbwa.
Lyingyi-se shaasa muvekumbuye, shaasa luleikimba wo umwi waany shaasa nde wa vana aikimba vana vakwe muni, lukamutumarisa, lwiimukureekyaa neemwitika;
naambo yeni mukooye ikaa shaasa kimusumanyi mbee ya Iruva, yeu amuvaangye naambo mwaange umanginy lwakwe lwa itumbe.

Kikeeny indo yese mmbo lukee yaana Iruva kulaifo ideerya mashika uka kyeeri mulewonisa irero elyo lya Nrumi shisha lya Iruva lyuuka kweru, nshi mulelyiwarya lyiikee ni irero lya vandu-fo, mmbo mulemanya ni irero lya Iruva, na niindo lyikai dede deny, lyikarunda mashora nnang'ani yaany yeni mukusirye-u.
Shamashika yeni vanavama veru mmbo mulelatya siri ta Iruva ta Uyuda, kwi Kristo Yesu, mashika naakwa ni yeni mmbo mulewonisa makyiva yoo meni kyuuka kwa vandu vany, na Vayuda yewo kiwo;
na mmbo yewo veni valewaa Nndumi Yesu, na vakisuku, vakalusisya neese-da, valatani kyeesenya Iruva nta vandu vengyi,
vakavelwiima lularere na vandu va masanga naambo vakirwa, vakatana indo kya yaawutya uravi lwawo nkonu simu, lyo unyafi lwa Iruva mmbo luvakaaye fika mafurumyony.
Lyo ulaalu, vanavama, elyi luraukani neeni ando a kirambo kidu, lyo mmashika elyi lulamulollye, lluraukani nriminy-fo mmbo lulangye nnu imulollya.
Kyasia mmbo lweekundye isha kwany, ee, yeny Paulo, shilenkunda isha lyimwi na lya kavii, lyo mmbishwa kakukikyisa-u.
Mashika ivika nsia lyeru, na ifura lyeru, na ureto lwa nsia weru nkyoki? Ndesa nshi yeni mbee ya Nndumi Yesu kufike elyi asheshaa?
Mashika yeni mmbo mukee itumbe lyeru na ifura lyeru.
Naasa kyikeeny indo, lwiikyilemwa isisirya mmwasi, lukalollya nkyeni lurewa Atene yese luveni.
Lukaruma mwanamaye weeru Timoteo akee nndundi wa Iruva mwiirundya Nrumi ya Nsia ya Kristo, naambo namuvangise neemuviiryaa muu kikusiryony kyany;
kulave nndu asavaa kimaruma kya ngatara eti, mashika lyo yeni muveni mwiishi sheelyi mmbo tiluvereye.
Mashika kyeeri lweekee kwany mmbo lwesongwa imuvia sheelyi ngatara tisheshaa, nakyo kikaveva indo, mukamanya.
Nkyo kimaruma kyeeri shilelemwa isisirya mmwasi, shileruma nndu nashemusaiya nalole kikusiryo kyany, kulakooye nkumbi ashemweesa, yeni na usisiryo lwany luve ruu.

Kyaindi kyeeri Timoteo alesha auka kwany, mmbo alelweengye mbony shisha ta kikusiryo kyany, na ta ukundi lwany, kaveluvia shaasa mukee ilukumbwa nisha nkonu simu, na ilanga nnu ilulollya shaasa neese lulangye imulollya.
Kyimmba ni indo vanavama, kya mbony yeto tany mmbo lulewuiyo nnu mmuu, lla elyi lweetirwa nngatara shiroo, kikusiryo kyany kyikafweera fyoose.
Yese mmbo lukee na muu kwankooya neeni muselelyi kwa Nndumi.
A ndesa nkyoki lushidimaa itaa Iruva kive kyaanu kimaruma kya kikusiryo kyany mashika a ifura lyilutiri mbee ya Iruva weeru?
Kio na nsanyiny mmbo lukeetereva Iruva naambo lwiidimi imulollya, na iishurya-u fyilya fyaanguye-u efo iirikyony lyany.
Naasany we Iruva Nde weeru muni, na Nndumi weeru Yesu namusongoye shia naambo lushe kwany.
Nndumi namuvangise na imwengerya ikunda muveni na veni na kwa vengyi woose, shaasa neese lumukundye;
naambo navangise mirima yaany ikae ikee mivaramise ilatiri kyiteve mbee ya Iruva, Nde weeru, ivereye isha lya Nndumi weeru Yesu ando amwi na veele vakwe woose.
Kyasaa-u ulaalu vanavama mmbo lwamwiikyimba na imutereva: musore Nndumi Yesu, shaasa lulemoora yese shaasa kisumani musenyi Iruva, shaasa yeni mukai, mweengere itana indo.
Mashika mwiishi ni mavavaso-kyi lulemuniinga musore Nndumi.
Mashika ni indo Iruva akundye, mukooye iilyiswa, mulakani na utuusi.
Wo umwi waany namanyi shaasa akaa na nka wakwe muni nakae akee mweele naveva na wiindi,
nta nalasoraa lango sheesi, sha vandu va masanga valaishi Iruva-fo.
Kulave nndu alemba ungyi kindo nta illyamarya kya efi-fo, mashika Nndumi mmbwe yeto ataiyaa findo fyoose shaasa lulemuvia uka mapookyony lwimukureekyaa nnu.
Shamashika Iruva nnyaleluvaangya ngata ya ukyirinda-fo, mmbo akundye lukooye iilyiswa.
Kyasiany, yeto alema yefi nshi alemmya nndu wa vandu-fo mmbo alemmya Iruva yeto amulyimmya yeni Mumuyo wakwe Mweele.
Kya mbony ta ikundana nta nshitiri kimaruma kya imureiya-fo, mashika yeni muveni mmbo mukeevaloshe ikundana ni Iruva muni.
Mashika mmbo mukeyoora ekyo kwa vakristo woose va Makedonia koose. Naasa lukamuterevany mweengere deny itana indo.
Na kingyi-se, kutakureny irunda mashora any, murunde mashora na maako any muveni shaasa lulemuvia;
naambo moore wiindi kwa yewo valakee Vakristo na nta mulatafukwaa nkindo.
Lyo vanavama, llukundye mure mulamanya kya valya valellala-fo; naambo elyi numa mulasheesokyo mfyoova sha vandu valatiri kindo vavikye nsia.
Mashika kwakooya lwiirikye sheelyi Yesu mmbo alefwa karuka, naakiwo neewo valellala vekee na Yesu, Iruva mmbo ashevaviiraa-se ando amwi nawe.
Ekyi mmbo lwamuvia na irero lya Nndumi, sheelyi yese lukee na muu ulaalu lushesaa-u fika nkonu yeto Nndumi ashewuyaa nato, dede lyo llushesongoyaa yewo valellava ilala kya ufu-fo.
Mashika Nndumi we muni mmbo asheolokaa auka iruveeu na unyanga luvangaa, lwa nsu ulya nniini na iranda lya Iruva, na valya valefwa vekee na Kristo mmbo vashesongwaa irutwa mbele.
Numa llyo yese lukee na muu, lusee-u, lusherakuwaa-u lusandwa nawo efo mafishiny lundeambya Nndumi efo uwe; naasa lushekaa na Nndumi llung'anu.
Naasany, viiryaniny muu na marero yoo.
Lyo vanavama, Kya mbony ta mikonu na fyeeri nshitiri kimaruma kya imureiyafo.
Kimmba yeni muveni mmbo mwiishi ninsha sheelyi nkonu yeto wa Nndumi weewuya mmbo usheshaa sha inyinyi kyeeri kya kio.
Kyeeri ekyo vandu vakusaraa mmbo kukee kusha kukatira urilalyi, llyo urumato lusheshaa tiny, shaasa usu lwasheya nka llemwa, nalyo mmbashekirwaa-fo.
Kyaindi lyo yeni vanavama, mmukee ireeminy kutani nkonu yeto ushemusheyaa tiny-fo.
Mashika yeni mmbo mukee vana va sa, mmbo va nsanyiny; ee, yese llukee va ireema nta va kio-fo.
Kyasiany, lulalale sheewo vengyi-fo, lukae na mwiiyanu lusinde luvereyaa Nndumi.
Mashika yewo velala mmbo valala kio, neewo veenangwa mmbo vanangwa kio.
Kyaindi yese lukee va nsanyiny luve vandu va mwiina, luveraa kikusiryo na ikunda five sha fisha ando amwi na ivikya ukiro nsia.
Mashika Iruva nnyaleluvika yaa ulaniny luvereye unyafi lwakwe-fo, kyaindi naambo luwoni ukiro efo kwa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo;
yeto alefwa kimaruma kyeru naambo lusinde nawe lukee na muu ulaalu kwakooya lwafwa.
Naasany, kuviiryeny muu neekukaarisa wo nndu na ungyi shaasa mwiifo mutanaa.
Na kingyi-se vanavama, lukunndye mumanyi valya vakekwaatara kimaruma kyany, valya valemusalallya na irina lya Nndumi vemwikimbaa;
naambo muveendye nnu mukee na ikunda kimaruma kya ishora elyo lyawo. Muveva vandu va urilalyi yeni muveni na veni.
Vanavama, mmbo lwamutereva mwikimbe yewo valakee vasaari, muvekaarisa yewo vakee vafwafwa, neevikya kilyilyika yewo vafiiye nrima, muvesisirya vandu woose.
Kevekwiiseny naambo kulakae-fo nndu ataiya makasha na makasha, mmbo muvaa vandu vetana mesha kyeeri kyoose, muveni na veni na kwa vandu woose.
Veny vefura wo nkonu;
tereveny kulaifo iderya.
Veny veana Iruva kya wo kindo, mashika efyo mfyo Iruva akundye kwany kimmba mukee va Kristo Yesu.
Mulaimi Mumuyo mwaanya.
Nta mulasheemina ukisuku;
eseny findo fyoose, musauwe-u ekyo kikee kyisha;
muvekwiisa na uravi lwa wo ngata.

Naasany Iruva yeto wa urilalyi namwiilyise nakamwi, naambo ngoo tany na mirima yaany na miili yaany mukooye iringwa nisha, mukae-fo mulatiri kiteve, kufike nkonu yeto Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo asheshaa nato.
We Nndumi yeto amuvaangye mmbo akee nsaari nawe mmbo asheinutyaa fyaasa fyakwe.
Vanavama, keveluterevyeny,
Idikireny vanavama na kimimindo kyeele.
Mmbo shamuvavasya shikee na Nndumi, vakristo woose vasomywa barwa yei.
Isarya lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo lyimukaye yeni moose.
Yeny Paulo na Silvanu na Timoteo, mmbo lwamureiya yeni va siri ya Tesalonike, siri ya Iruva Nde weeru na Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
Isarya lyimukaye ando amwi na urilalyi luukye kwa Iruva Nde na kwa Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
Vanavama, mmbo kilukooye lwaani Iruva kyeeri kyoose kimaruma kyany, shaasa kilusumannyi, mashika elyi iirikyo lyeru lyikee inga'na nnu, na ikunda lya wo umwi waany lyikang'ana nnu.
Neese luveni mmbo lutirwa ni nsia nniini kimaruma kyany yeni va siri ta Iruva kyeendwa ni usisiryo lwany, na kya usisiryo lwany kya ngatara na waataro lukee kwany.
Elo llo ukureekyi loora uvingo luukye usumanuny lwa Iruva, naambo kyoore shaasa musumanyi yaanga umanginy lwa Iruva yelo yeni mukeelyiswa ukyiva kimaruma kya vayo.
Mashika ni kindo kisumani mbee ya Iruva valya vakeemulyisa ukyiva nawo valyiswa ukyiva.
Neeni mukeelyiswa ukyiva mutawa nsia ando amwi neese kyeeri ekyo Nndumi Yesu asheorwaa paa akee na finya eriyani na vasu va efo iruveeu.
Ekee na kipalapala kya muro, etaiyaa yewo valaishi Iruva neewo valairikye Nrumi ya Nsia ya Nndumi weeru Yesu;
vasheorotwaa ni urumato lwa llunganu, irauwa deny vauke kisanguny kya Nndumi na itumbe lya wiidimi lwakwe.
Kyeeri we asheshaa narumishwa ni veele vakwe, na yaambyo ni valya vamwiirikye nkonu yeto, (mashika ukureekyi lweru mmbo luleirikyo efo kwany).
Nkyo kimaruma lukamuterevya mikonu myoose, naambo Iruva weeru nairikye uvaango lwany, naveinutya na wo kindo kimutinnyi na wo ishora lyuukye kikusiryony na finya yakwe.
Irina lya Nndumi weeru Yesu lying'aniswa nnang'ani yaany, neeni nnang'ani ya vayo, kyeendwa ni isarya lya Iruva weeru na lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
Kyasiany vanavama, lwamooshora, kya isha lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, na kya ishekuumbya yoo mbee yakwe,
mulaatarike nnu mure kilya mukee ivinya-fo, nta mulaawukwa efo nriminy-fo ao nta na marero-fo, ao na barwa mukusare nkweru yauka-fo, kyeyaamba sheelyi nkonu yeto wa Nndumi mmbo ulemmaa isha-fo.
Kulave nta nndu umwi amulemba-fo, mashika nkonu yeto mmbusheshaa kulaore mbele umini llwa lwansha-fo, na nndu yeto kilemi noorwa paa yeto akee mwana wa ureti;
yeto akee kilemi, yeto mwiikurosa muni mbee ya Iruva yeto mwiindyo, nawe muni kakutemira yoo mmba ya Iruva kakwaalwa mmbwe Iruva.
A ndesa mmbo mulakumbuye sheelyi kyeeri shekee neeni shilemuvia mbony yeti?
Neekyo kikee iima nravi yeto nalamanyike ulaalu mukiishi kutani kyeeri kya vayo kyasha.
Mashika kyama kya urekwa elo kikee ikoora ulaalu lyo kwiiyo umwi akee iima finya ya vayo, na kutani kyautwa-u deny.
Lyo yeto akee kilemi asheorwaa paa, nawe Nndumi Yesu ashemwiviaa mumuyo wakwe ummbwaa, na inrumata deny elyi aiyo.
Isha lya kilemi ekyo mmbo lyivakye elyo lya mmbishwa, na wiidimi lwakwe ekooraa na wongo uniini;
neefo ulembiny lwa yewo vakee ireka, mashika elyi kulaore valekunda dede yeyo naambo vakirwa.
Nkyo kimaruma kavaora finya ya ureti shaasa ikai, vengere ikutira na wongo;
naambo yewo woose valelema iirikya dede yeyo vautyo uvingo, mashika elyi valefurya uravi.

Kyaindi yese kilukooye yaana Iruva wo nkonu kimaruma kyany, yeni vanavama mukundyo indo ni Nndumi, mashika elyi alemusauwa yeni uka elyo mbee naambo muwoni ukiro, mushillyiswaa Mmumuyo na iirikya dede;
yefyo Iruva alemuvaangya na Nrumi ya Nsia yei yeru, naambo muwoni itumbe lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo.
Kyasiany, vanavama, salaleny kyuumi, muwarani na mikaye ilya muleloshwa, kyikee kya marero ao kya barwa yei yeeru.
Na Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo we muni, na Iruva Nde weeru, yeu alelukunda kalusimba iviirywa muu yelyo lyishendee ivika nsia lya llung'anu kyeendwa ni isarya lyakwe,
namuviirye muu efo miriminy yaany, na imuvangisya efo irerony na ishoreny isha.
Na kya ifurumya, vanavama, luterevyeny, naambo irero lya Nndumi lyeende na mbee, nerumishwa kiwo shaasa kyikee efo kwany;
naambo lwauwa maakony a vandu valakee va usumanu, varavi, mashika vandu woose mmbatiri kikusiryo-fo.
Kyaindi we Nndumi ni nsaari mmbwe yeto ashemukaarisaa nemuringa mulaevetwa ni nravi yeto.
Neese mmbo lulevika Nndumi nsia kimaruma kyany, elyi muletana kilya lulemulosha, na mweengere itana indo.
Nndumi namutetere efo miriminy yaany naambo muwoni ikunda lya Iruva na usisiryo lwa Kristo.
Vanavama, mmbo lwamwiikimba na irina lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo, kwiiseny na wo nndu nkristo akee nroko, nta nalasoraa mikaaye ilya lulemulosha.
Yeni mwiishi shaasa kimusumannyi ilulatya mashika naakwa ni yese llulekaa kwany lulatiri waarya-fo;
nta llulelya shoonga ya nndu ruu-fo, mmbo lulelya shoonga lwannyivinnya nnu, lwirundaa kio na nsanyiny, naambo lulasheeva irio kwa nndu wa kwany na kava vi.
Nshi mashika elyi kulore lweetiri mumu-fo, kyaindi naambo lumureeye kyaaso kyeelola, mulusore yese.
Mashika naakwa nkyeeri kilya lweekee kwany mmbo lulemuvia mbony yei, sheelyi, kwakooya nndu nalakundye irunda, naasa, na shoonga nalailye-fo,
mashika lwiitye efo kwany kwiifo vandu valatiri uramba, valatiri ishora vakeerunda, kyaindi vakakwaataa-ata findony fya vengyi.
Kyasia yewo lwavaikimbany na ivavia na irina lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo, varunde mashora na usaari neelya shoonga vaivinnya wo veni.
Lyo yeni vanavama, mulafwe nrima kya itana mesha-fo.
Na kwakooya nndu moose ara nalawarya kirero kya barua yei yeeru na kava vi, kwiiseny nawe, nta mularere nawe-fo, naambo nasuke deny;
lyo mulamwaallwe nkiduva-fo, mmbo mumwiikimbaa sha umwi waany.
Kyasiany, Nndumi muni urilalyi we muni namulyimmyi urilalyi wo kyeeri shieny toose. Nndumi nakae neeni moose.
Yefi mfiidikiro fyakwa yeny Paulo, shareiya na woko lwakwa shimuni. Ekyi nkyo kiringyisyo barueny takwa toose, llo woko lwakwa.
Isarya lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo lyimukaye yeni moose.
Yeny Paulo, nrumi wa Kristo, kwi ivavaso lya Iruva akee Mwiikira weeru na Kristo Yesu akee ekyo luvikye nsia,
shakureiya yewe Timoteo, mwana-kwa efo kikusiryony. Isarya lya Iruva lyikee neewe, na ilyillyo, na urilalyi luukye kwa Iruva Nde na kwa Kristo Yesu Nndumi weeru.
Shaasa shilekutereva kukae Efeso, kyeeri kilya shekeenda Makedonia, naambo kwiikimbe vengyi valashelosha ngyufundo tingyi;
nta valeshearanya ngyuraawe na nganunganu tilatiri umando, tishendee makusaro meengyi nta tilaryani na uvavaso lwa Iruva lwa iirikyo, naasa vaikimbe indo.
Na kyeefinga ivavaso elyo ni ukundi luukye nriminy nsha na makusaro mesha, na iirikyo lyilatiri ukunang'ari.
Vandu vengyi vakanra valalatya efi mmbo vankaa marerony a ing'ana.
Vakalanga iva veelosha va mavavaso, lla elyi valaishi songosiny efyo vakeerera.
Lyo lwiishi sheelyi uvavaso ni usha kwakooya nndu arunda nalo kya usumanu.

Navemanya irero elyi, sheelyi uvavaso llutiri mwaandu na nndu nsumanu-fo, kuuta yewo veerenga veni, neewo valakee vaarya, valaishi Iruva, valyamari, na vatefusu, neewo valashinndyaa Iruva, na veekapa vandeye vawo, na veekapa vamaye vawo, na vewaa.
Na vatuusi, vasodomi na veiiva vandu, vaongo, veelya mboo kya wongo; na kwakooya kwiiyo kindo kingyi kilaryani na ufundo lutiri muu.
Shaasa kikee kirere efo Nruminy ya Nsia ya itumbe lya Iruva yeto akee iitikiswa, yeyo shilerambikywa.
Neeny mmbo shaana Kristo Yesu akee Nndumi weeru, yeto aleshisimba finya mashika aleshilollya shikee mwaarya kashivika efo urundiny lwakwe.
Na kikava elyo mbee shekee nndu mwaarara, shafuluta vandu vengyi, shava nndu llyang'a, lyo shawonisa ilyillyo, mashika elyi shetana indo kikee kya urung'ani neelyi kulaore shetiri kikusiryo.
Na isarya lya Nndumi weeru mmbo lyileng'ana nnu kweru ando amwi na kikusiryo na ikunda yelyo lyuukye kwa Kristo Yesu.
Ni irero lyisumani iirikywa nalyo mmbo lyisumani ikusiryo deny, nalyo llyo elyi, Kristo Yesu mmbo alesha ulaniny nashekira valyamari, na wa mbee waawo ni yeny.

Lyo kimaruma kya vayo mmbo shilewona ilyillyo, naambo shikee yeny ni yeto wa mbee, Yesu Kristo noore-u usisiryo lwakwe loose, shiveva na kyaaso kyeelola kwa yewo vashenkusiryaa numa, naambo vawonise muu wa llung'anu.
Naasany ulaalu Mangyi yeto wa llung'anu, nalashidimaa ifwa, nta nalalolyoo mmiso, akee Iruva we muni, nawoni iindyo na nnduma mmbwakwe llung'anu na llung'anu. Amen.
Mwana-kwa Timoteo, mmbo shakurambikya ivavaso elyi kulyiringe kimaruma kya irero lya ukisuku llwa lulenkusongoya, naambo kimaruma kya vayo kukooye ikapana fira yeyo sheele;
kuraa kikusiryo na nrima nsha, efyo vandu vengyi valafisarye nawo vakarumaka elyi vauwa kikusiryo.
Nnang'ani ya yewo ni Himenayo na Iskanda, neewo mmbo shilevaniinga mmbishwa naambo navaloshe valasheyaarara-se Iruva.
Naasany kindo kya mbee kive ni fyeerero na fiterewo neeterevya vengyi Iruva ando amwi na fyaanu, efyo mufitani kimaruma kya vandu woose.
Kimaruma kya vamangyi neewo woose vatiri ushilyi, naambo luwoni suku shisha na ta urilalyi, lukee na waarya na utele.
Ekyi ni kindo kisha kikakundika neefo kwa Iruva akee Mwikira weeru.
Nawe mmbo akundye vandu woose vakirwa neekooya imanya ekyo kikee kya dede.
Kimmba Iruva ni umwi, na nsandi wa Iruva na vandu ni umwi, mmbwe Mwana yeto wa Nndu we Kristo Yesu;
mmbwe yeto alekurambikya-u we muni nave ukiro kwa woose, na ukiro elo mmbo lushevikyoo ukureekyi elyi kyeeri kya vayo kifikaa.
Na kimaruma kya vayo mmbo shilevikwa shive mwiivambisa na nrumi (mmbo sharera dede nta nshi wongo-fo), shive llori wa vandu va masanga efo kikusiryony kya dede.
Kimmba ni indo, mmbo shikundye vomi vaate miindye wo ando, veshiipoo maako awo vavikye vandu mbora kulaiyo ulai nta unyafi.
Na kiwo vaka, nawo vakushope na masara esikya mwiili ando amwi na wiindi usha, na nrima wa mwiiyanu, utore lwawo lulave lwa yooka fii, nta lweekwaamba mafura a wuuru ao lwa soori ta wuuru uniini.
Lyo luve lwa mashora mesha, shaasa kisumanyi vaka valya vatirye Iruva vyo.
Nndu nka nave mwaaranya sau needimi ikulosha findo, nave mfoo kyeeri kyoose,
Nndu nka nalaniingwa mwaanya wa ilosha-fo, nta ishillya nndumi-fo, namalallye sau.
Shamashika Adamu mmbwe alepooka yuumbwa na Eva kasorya.
Nta nshi Adamu alelembwa-fo, lyo nka mmbo alelembwa deny kaanga urekweny.
Lyo mmbo ashekirwa kimuukya efo vaniny vakwe, kwakooya vasinda iirikyony na ukundiny na ikwiilyisa, ando amwi na nrima wa mwiiyanu.
Nkindo kya dede, kwakooya nndu alanga iva askofu mmbo alanga ishora isha.
Kyasiany kindo kikooye askofu ni iva nndu nalarerwa kikasha, nndumi wa nka umwi, nave wa mwiiyanu na araiye urango, naveva nndu mwaarya, mwiambya vandu naveva nndu eeshi ilosha;
nta nalave nndu wa wari ao mwiikapana; lyo nave nndu mfoo; nta nalave nndu mwiillya ulai na vandu, nta nalave nndu mwiikunda fesa-fo;
naveva mwiisalallya kyeny kwakwe nisha neelosha vana vakwe vatire vyo;
(mashika lyo le, nndu nalashidimaa isalallya mmba yakwe muni, mmbo ashidimaa inda ivavara siri ya Iruva?)
Nta nalave nndu aangye siriny mikonu ya kufii, nalasheekurosa nawe uvingony lwa yeto nkumbi.
Lyingyi mmbo kisumani nave nndu akureekyo mesha mmbandu vengyi; naambo nalasheewa uvingony na nreiyony wa yeto nkumbi.
Kiwo na mashemasi nawo vave vandu vavaa iindyo; valatiri ulumi lwa ntambo, nta valave veena nnu mfinyo-fo, nta valalangaa fesa ya ntambo.
Vatire ngata ya iirikyo vekee na nrima nsaari.
Yeva nkuti valolwa mbele, llyo varundeny mashora a ushemasi, elyi vammaa imanyika mmbatiri kyiteve.
Na vaka vawo naawo, vave vasaari, nta valave vevikya vengyi ureeree, vave va mwiiyanu, vave vaarya findony fyoose.
Mashemasi nkuti vave vomi va nka umwi, vesalallya vana vawo nisha, na poo kwawo.
Mashika yewo veerunda mashora a ushemasi nisha mmbo vashewonisaa nnduma nsha, neewona ukaari usongovisi lwa iirikyo valuuta efo kwa Kristo Yesu.
Efi mmbo shafikureiya lyo shiivikye nsia wesha kwafo mikonu ya kufii.
Lyo kwallollya shakyeeyo, lyo manya-da shaasa kisumanyi vandu ikaa efo mmba ya Iruva, ikee nnyo siri ya Iruva muni muu, kaveva mmbwe ngo na uvasha lwa dede.

Na kyama yekyo kya weele nkiniini. Iruva mmbo aleorwa paa kwi ngata ya mwiili na ngata yeyo ya mumuyo ikammanya mmbo akee nsumanu. Kalollyo mmbasu kavambiswa masangeny, kavikwa nsia kunu masangeny. Kavikwa uwe efo itumbeny.
Naasany Mumuyo mmbo arera paa deny kyeyaamba sheelyi fyeeri fya ifurumya vandu vengyi mmbo vashelakanaa na iirikyo, vakutire na mimuyo yeyo ilembaa, na ngyufundo ta varumu;
veeriwa ni ukunang'ari lwa vandu va wongo, mirima yaawo ikorwaa mmuro;
veshimaa vandu valaore vaka, neevavikya ishingo lya shoonga eto Iruva aletivika-fo naambo lutiwarye lumwaani neewo vatiri kikusiryo vengere imanya dede yeyo.
Shamashika lyo wo kyuumbe kya Iruva mmbo kyikee kisha, nta nkwiifo kivaa ilema-fo kuuta ni ifiwarya lwishaanaa.
Mashika mmbo kikee kiilyise ni irero lya Iruva na fiterewo.
Kumbura Vakristo mbony yeto, neewe llyo kushevaa nndundi nsha wa Kristo Yesu, kuvemanya nisha ufundo lwa iirikyo ando amwi na ufundo lwa dede llwa kuleloshwa.
Lyo ngyuraawe ta kimiku tilakee ta siri, nkuti kutilemi, kuvekwiishivira iva nsaari.
