Shamashika ikwiishivira iwona finya ya mwiili nkisha-da kyaindi usaari mmbo lukee usha kyeeri kyoose, mmbo lukee uvikye kyaasa kya muu wa ulaalu na ulya ushaa numa.
Ni irero lyeevikyo nsia, nalyo lyisumani iirikyo deny;
mashika mmbo lukee ikuvinisa nekwaatara kimaruma kya efi, mashika elyi lukusirye Iruva yeu muni muu, yeu avekee Mwiikira wa vandu woose, mmwasi yewo vakusirye.
Vavasya mbony yeti neetilosha.
Lola nndu moose nalasheemina ukoo lwafo-fo, mashika nkuti kuve kyaaso kwa yewo vakusirye, kwiireraa na kwiitanaa, na yoora ikunda na kikusiryo kisha.
Kutani elyi nshaa, kutakure isoma na iikimba neelosha.
Kulare kularunda na simbo yeyo kulesimbwa, nkimaruma kya ukisuku neelyi kuleekeryo maako a vamiku.
Swaangya nnu efyo, kukutire nafyo; naambo ivesyo lyafo lyikooye ilollyo mmbandu woose.
Kuringe kumuni kutire ufundo lwafo. Kusinde ufundony yelo mashika kwatana indo mmbo kusheashuka yewe kumuni ando amwi na yewo vekwaaranya.
Kulakyeemyi nndu mmiku-fo mmbo kumwiikimbaa sha ndoo, na vakoo sha vanavamau,
vaka vakuu kuvaikimbe sha mau, na vana va kyika sha vamfwamau, kutani indo na waarya nnu.
Indya nnu vaka va ding'u yewo vatiri wiindi.
Kyaindi kwankooya nka wa ding'u atiri vana ao vashuku, yeva vakuloshe itana efyo fivasumanyi efo kyeny kwawo veni, varundye vamiku vawo. Mashika ekyi nkyo kyisenyi kwa Iruva.
Na yeto akee nka wa dingu deny karewa muni, yeto we mmbo avikye Iruva nsia, kavesinda etereva na yeererya Iruva kio na nsanyiny.
Kyaindi yeto nalakuvavaraa muni mmbo afiiye na kikava akee na muu.
Naakwa ni efi fivavasye, naambo valawoni kiteve.
Lyo nndu yeto nalalolaa vandu vakwe, mmbo yewo va kyeny kwakwe muni, yeto mmbo amina iirikyo, kooka-fo kava nkasha ngota nndu nalakee nkristo.
Nka wa ding'u nalafitye myaaka 60 nalavaangwa nka wa ding'u-fo nawe nave ekee nka wa mmi umwi-nsi.
Nawe nkuti nakooye akureekyo mesha, kwakooya alerosa vana, neyaambya veny neesangya veele marende, na yeekya velyiswa ukyiva, neetana findo fisha etiri usau.
Lyo vaka va ding'u vakee vakoo kulavawarye-fo, mashika elyi vatirwa llango valalatya Kristo mmbo vashelangaa yoorwa.
Nawo mmbo vakaa uvingony mashika elyi vara kikusiryo kyawo kya mbee.
Na kya mmwasi mmbo vakulosha iva varoko, vakaringitya efo neefo mmba ku mmba, nta nshi vakee varoko-da-fo mmbo vavikya vengyi ureeree needola mbony ta vandu, vakooka-fo vakarera urere.
Kyasiany mmbo shaamba vaka yewo va ding'u valandenkwa, vaorwa vaire vana, vaidimi ikallya kyeny kwawo, naambo valasheelekeiya nkiduva yeto mwaanya wa ivautya kiteve.
Mashika kwiifo vengyi valemmaa iinduka vakasora mmbishwa.
Nka nkristo, kwakooya atiri vaka va ding'u, naveekye we muni, naambo Siri ilasheerovyo; naambo yo siri yeekye yewo vakee vaka va ding'u deny.
Vamiku yewo vakallya findo nisha vendyo nnu kavii kararu, mmwasi yewo vekwaatara ivambisa mbony neelosha.
Mashika mareiyo mmbo aamba, “Ng'umbe ikapaa nganu nnyivaa ifinga kana-fo.” Na kingyi-se, “Mwiirunda mmbo asumani weesi lwakwe.”
Kulawarye mwaandu wa nndu akeesalala na mmiku-fo, nkuti mbele kukee-u vakureekyi vavii vararu indi.
Valya vakeengera itana ulyamari vakyeemyi yoo mbee ya woose, naambo vengyi vaute-u iiryaa.
Mmbo shakuvavasya mbee ya Iruva, na mbee ya Kristo Yesu, na mbee ya vasu vakwe veele, salallya findo efyo nta kulaute uvingo uviny, nta kulatani kindo kweekundya-fo.
Kulaekyerye nndu maako kuladeesye nisha-fo, nta kulaange ulyamariny lwa vandu vengyi-fo. Kuringe kumuni kuve mwaarya deny.
Kipookya ulaalu kulani mura mweni-fo sanda-u mfinyo mwaangu kimaruma kyeevavyo nndeu, ando amwi na ndwari yeto takwaatara llya na llya.
Ngyulyamari ta vandu vengyi mmbo timanyikye paa, tikoora shaasa tikeerwaa vandu uvingony, vengyi ngyulyamari tawo tikavasora.
Kiwo indo na mashora mesha mmbo amanyikye paa, nta filya filalollyo paa mfishiidimaa ikusuruma-fo.
Valya woose vakee vafinge vakava mashinga, vairikye vanndumi vawo na ivaniinga wiindi loose, naambo irina lya Iruva lyilaararwa ando amwi na kiloshyo kyeru.
Na valya vanndumi vawo vakee Vakristo valavamini-fo; nkyeni vengere ivarundya, mashika yewo vakeefura kya urundi lwawo mmbo vatiri iirikyo lyeru vakaveekundwa. Losha findo efi na iikimba deny.
Kwakooya nndu moose alosha ufundo lungyi neera nalairikya irero elyo lya muu lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo na ufundo yelo lusheendee weele,
yeto mmbo ankurosa; nalaishi nta kindo, mmbo alyamarikye nrwe vakakusara mbony ta ivesa-vesa, na ulai lwa marero, neefo mfo kuukaa usuvanu, myaandu, na fyaararo, na nyinyira shikasha;
na ulai lwa vandu mirwe yaawo ilasongovye vakatura fya dede vakakusara sheelyi usaari ni shia ya iwonisa mbusha.
Kyaindi usaari na ira ifwaiya mmbusha niini.
Shamashika llulesha na kindo yaa ulaniny-fo, nta llushukaa-u na kindo-fo;
lyo kwakooya lutiri shoonga na soori teeraa mmbo lufuraa nafyo,
Indi yewo valangaa itira masaa mmbo vawee nreiyony na fyeesony, na langony shiingyi tilatiri nrwe, tivavisaa, yeto tirwaa vandu uretiny na urumatony.
Mashika kimayeny kyimwi kya uravi lwa wo ngata ni ikunda fesa, nayo elyi vengyi vanyiilanga nnu vakalakana na iirikyo, neekwaatara na mavavyo meengyi.
Lyo yewe, kukee nndu wa Iruva, kutirishe findo efyo; kusore usumanu, usaari, iirikyo, ukundi, usisiryo, ufoo.
Kapana fira yeyo sheele ya iirikyo, tira muu eto wa llung'anu kukee mmbaangye, kutani kulekureeka ukureekyi llwa usha mbee ya vakureekyi veengyi.
Mmbo shakuvavasa na irina lya Iruva, yeto aniinga fyuumbe fyoose muu, na lya Kristo Yesu, ulya alekureeka ukureekyi llwa usha mbee ya Pontio Pilato.
Ringa ivavaso elyi nisha, kulaiyo kiteve, kutani nkonu yeto Nndumi Yesu Kristo asheorwaa paa.
Nawe elyi kyeeri kyakwe kifikaa eshekooraa paa, niwe yeto akee iindyo, kava mmbwe muni wiidimi, kaveva Mangyi ya vamangyi, na Nndumi wa woose;
mmbwe muni nalasheywaa ni ufu, mmbo akee itumbeny lyilavaa ifikya, nta kulaifo nndu alemmulollya na miso yaa, nta nalashidimaa illolya. Wiindi na wiidimi llwakwe fika llunganu. Amen.
Yewo vakee masimba yaa ulaniny yelu vavie valakushope-fo, nta valakusirye usimba elo lulakee lwa dede-fo, kyaindi vavike Iruva nsia yeto aluniinga findo fyoose shapu naambo lurunde nafyo neefura.
Vavie vatani mesha, vave masimba kyeetana mesha, vavetira maako iniingya masaa awo, vasange na vandu vengyi veetiri nrima mwaa.
Ni indo vasurumi umasi usha efo lukeenda nafo, vashewonisaa muu yeto ukee wa dede deny.
Ewe Timoteo, ringa nnu isaa elyo; kukwiise na marero alakee a ki-Iruva, alatiri urango, na fiwakyanu fya urango lulakee urango dede,
na vengyi elyi vakeisora vakara kikusiryo kya dede. Isarya lya Iruva lyimukaye.
Ni yeny Paulo, nrumi wa Kristo Yesu, shaasa Iruva akundye; kimaruma kya kyaasa kya muu yeto wa Kristo Yesu.
Shakureiya yewe Timoteo mwana-kwa nkunde. Isarya lyikae neewe, na ilyillyo, na urilalyi luukye efo kwa Iruva Nde na kwa Kristo Yesu we Nndumi weeru.
Mmbo nkeyaana Iruva, yeto nkemwiindya na nrima mwaa uka elyo kyeeri kya vakuu vakwa, shaasa shikeekukumbwa yewe kyeeri kyoose shiiterevaa kio na nsanyiny.
Shavelanga nnu ikulollya, shaishwa ifura nnu elyi nkumbwaa kya misoru yafo.
Na kikusiryo kyafo kilatiri ukunang'ari, shaasa kikusiryo kya kyekuwo Loisi kyeekai na mau we Eonike, neeny shiishi neewe kutiri kikusiryo sheekyo.
Kyikeeny indo, mmbo nkeekukumbura kunangise nnu simbo yeyo ya Iruva kulesimbwa llya kuleekeryo maako akwa.
Mashika Iruva nnyaleluniinga nrima wa weerei-fo, mmbo aleluniinga nrima wa ukaari na wa ikunda ukaveva wa mwiiyanu.

Naasany kulairyee sony ukureekyi lwa Nndumi weeru-fo, nta kulashiirye sony yeny shikee mfingwa wakwe-fo, lyo sisirya makasha yoo ando amwi neeny kimaruma kya Nrumi ya Nsia, kiinani na wiidimi lwa Iruva;
mmbwe alelukira kalweengye uvaango weele, nshi kimaruma kya mashora eru-fo, kyaindi nkya isarya lyakwe shaasa alekunda we muni. Isarya yelyo mmbo lulesimbwa kyuuka na Kristo Yesu uka llung'anu,
kyeeri ekyi kikaorwa paa llya Kristo Yesu Nkira weeru alefumirwa paa kweru, yeto alevinga ufu na iloora muu na uvingyi kyeendwa ni Nrumi ya Nsia
na kimaruma kya vayo llyo shilealuwa mwiivambisa na nrumi na mwiilosha.
Na kimaruma kya vayo shawona ngatara yeti, nta nshitirwa nnyinyira-fo, mashika shiishi yeto shinkusirye, neemanya deny sheelyi ashiidimaa isheekya iringa ekyo shilerambikywa kufike nkonu yeto ushaa.
Tira kyaaso kya marero yoo atiri muu kuleeta kwakwa efo kikusiryony na ukundiny lwa Kristo Yesu.
Ringa nnu ekyo kulerambikywa ni Mumuyo Mweele yeto akee nnang'ani yeeru.
Shikusara kwiishi sheelyi valya va Asia mmbo valelakana na yeny, nnang'ani yaawo ni Figelo na Hermogene.
Mmbo shatereva Iruva navikye mbora valya va mmba ya Onesiforo; mashika mmbo aleshiviiryaa muu keengyi nnu, nta nnyaleshiirya sony mashika elyi shikee mfinge-fo.
Lyo kyeeri ekee kunu Roma mmbo aleshiruuya na sina katana ashikooya.
Nndumi nanniinge iwona ilyillyo misony akwe elyi nkonu weefurumya. Na shaasa aleshifurukannya nnu kulya Efeso yewe kwiishi nnu.
Kyasiany, yewe mwana-kwa wona ikaariswa ni isarya lya Kristo Yesu.
Na mbony tilya kuletiita kwakwa kwiiyo vakureekyi veengyi, tirambikye vandu yewo vasaari yewo vashidimaa ilosha na vengyi.
Sisirya ngatara ando amwi neeny, kuve sha nsikari nsha wa Kristo Yesu.
Nkwiifo mwiikapana fira akwaata ngusaniny ta ulana elu needimi isenya yeto mwimmbika-fo.
Na nndu mwiiwakyana efo fitavanuny nnyawonaa ureto kanra nalawakyana kisumani-fo.
Mmbo kikooye nremi ankwaatara na mashora akwe nasonngwe we iwona-u waavi lwakwe.
Soongya nnu yeki nkeekuvia, mashika ni Nndumi ashekurangusaa kya findo fyoose.
Nkye kummbwa Yesu Kristo ulya aleruka auka kwa vafu, akee wa ufyari lwa Davidi shaasa Nrumi ya Nsia yaamba.
Neeny mmbo shilelyiswa ukiva kimaruma kya vayo kutani shifingwaa sha nndu mwiitana maravi; lyoony, irero lya Iruva llyivaa ifinga-fo.
Kyeendwa llyo mmbo nkeesisirya fyoose, kimaruma kyeewo vasauwe, naambo nawo vakooye ukiro elo lweendwa ni Kristo Yesu, ando amwi na itumbe lya llung'anu.
Ni irero lyisumani iirikyo deny. Shamashika kwakooya lwafwa nawe, mmbo luverutwaa ando amwi nawe.
Kwakooya lwasisirya, mmbo lusheshillyaa ando amwi nawe. Kwakooya lwankana we naakwa niwe mmbo ashelukanaa yese;
Kwakooya yese lulakusirye-u we mmbo eengera iva nsaari. Mashika we nnyashiidimaa ikukana we muni-fo.
Nkye vakumbure mbony yeto kuvevaikimba na irina lya Iruva, naambo valashellya ulai lulatiri mbusha, yelo lulyamaraa yewo vearanya.
Kaarya nnu yoora sheelyi ni Iruva akusauye, kwaveva nndundi nalatiri nyinyira, kwavesalallya irero lya dede.
Kwiise nnu na marero a ing'ana alakee a ki-Iruva, mashika yewo mmbo vasheengeraa nnu na uravi,
na marero awo mmbo ashekwaanaa ree sha itiinga ikasha. Vandu va ngata yeyo nsha Himenayo na Fileto,
nawo mmbo valenreta ekyo kya dede, vakaveamba mwaandu wa ifurummya ulemmaa iira indo kikava nkyo kyeeveta iirikyo lya veengyi.
Kyaindi lyo irero lya Iruva lyivangyi, lyikavikywa na kiringisyo ekyi, kyeyaamba, Nndumi eeshi yewo vakee vakwe, na kingyi-se, yeto moose mwiisenda Irina lya Nndumi nare uravi lakwe.
Kyasiany efo mmba ya Nndumi nshi kwiifo fiiya fya saabu na fya fesa-da-fo, kuveefo na fya firi na fya uteeri, fingyi fitiri nnduma deny, na fingyi mfitiri-fo.
Naasany kwakooya nndu akusongosye elyi akwiisa na vandu yewo, mmbo ashevakaa kiiya kilya kitiri nnduma, kyisennyi Nndumi, kyikee kideesye kirunde mashora mesha.
Naasany kukwiise lango yeto ta ukoony, kusore usumanu na iirikyo, ukundi, urilalyi kwikee na valya vakeevaanga Nndumi vekee na nrima wa dede.
Lyo marero a utondo evesa-vesa alemi mashika nshi a urango-fo, nang'u mmbo ashendee myaandu tupu.
Na nkivaa nndundi wa Nndumi nave nndu wa myaandu-fo. Mmbo akundyo nave nndu mmamiri kwa vandu woose, eeshi ilosha, atiri usisiryo.
Na vandu yewo vawakyanaa nawe navaikimbe na ufoo, naambo kwakooya kiivaa naambo Iruva naveekye vakurye neemanya dede yeyo.
Naambo urango luvawuiye, vauke efo nreiyony wa yeto nkumbi alevareiya, vakatana efyo finsennyi.
Lyo manya mbony yei, sheelyi kyeeri kya ifurummya mmbo kusheshaa mikonu yeeresye.
Mashika vandu mmbo vashekukundaa wo veni, valange nnu fesa, vave vekurumisha veni, veekung'anisa, vearara, valashinndyaa vamiku vawo, nta valakee vandu va kyaanu, valakee va miriminy,
valakundye va kyeny kwawo, nta valakundye isaryana na vengyi, vakava vevikya ureeree, valasiraa ngoo vakava vanyaasi, nta valalangye ngata shoose ya usha na umamiri.
Mmbo vakee veeriingya vengyi, vakatira utiilyi, neekung'anisa, vakakunda lango ta mwiili ngota ikunda Iruva.
Vakava sheelyi ni vandu vesha ate lyo mmbo valemmyi ekyo deny. Yewo woose kukwiise nawo.
Nnang'ani yaawo mmbo kwiifony na valya vakwaataa efo mmbeny ta vandu, vakakamara-fo mifungwa vaka yewo varavi varye maryo a ulyamari, na ilamyo ni lango ta ngata shiingyi;
vakakwiishivirya-fo indo wo nkonu naambo valasheefikya dede yeyo irye urango.
Na kivaka llya Yane na Yambre valesalala na Mose kyellema, ni indo neeva mmbo vakelemana na dede yeyo; yewo ni vandu vallyamarikyo mmirwe, vakakaa kwaasha na mbony ta iirikyo.
Lyo nshi vafikaa kwaasha nta-fo, mashika urung'ani elu lwawo lwammelollyo mmbandu woose, shaasa na urung'ani lwa yewo lulelollyo paa.
Lyo yewe mmbo kulelatya ufundo lwakwa, na ngaa yakwa, na kilya shikundye itana, na iirikyo, na usisiryo,
na ukundi, na ivereya, na ngatara eti takwa na makyiva yaa, na filya fileshikooya kulya Antiokia, na Ikonio na Listra, ngata toose ta ngatara yeto shiletisisirya; nawe Nndumi kashaauwa efo koose.
Ee deny, neewo woose valangye muu mweele mmbo vasheminwaa.
Lyo vandu vakasha na velemba vasheengeraa ikaafo, na yeengera iraveeka, velembaa neelembwa.
Kyaindi yewe kutire na filya kuleloshwa neesununndyo, mashika kwiishi ni kwa vaki kulekulosha kwawo;
neewe lyo uka udu lwafo mmbo kuleloshwa mareiyo meele kwaamanya, nang'u ng'u akurangusaa kuwoni ukiro lukuukya efo kikusiryony kwa Yesu Kristo.
Mareiyo moose atiri Mumuyo wa Iruva mmbo avaa kwa ilosha, na kwa iikimba vandu makasha awo na kwa ivatetera, neevavika ngeeny ya songosiny ikee ya usumanu.
Naambo nndu moose akee wa Iruva nasongovike neekaariswa naambo needimi itana findo fyoose nisha.
Mmbo sheengera ikuvavasa-se na irina lya Iruva, na lya Kristo Yesu yeto asheutyaa vakee na muu na vafu uvingo, elyi ashelolywa paa we na umangyi lwakwe;
vambisa irero lya Iruva, kyeeri kyisenyi na kyeeri kyilasennyi, sakira na ikyeemya, na iikimba kwikee na usisiryo loose kwiloshaa.
Mashika kwiikaa kushe fyeeri vashelemaa kiloshyo ekyo kirye muu, lyo kimaruma kyeesora makusaro awo veni mmbo vashekuwonisyaa veelosha nkuka maronda na maronda, ni elyi vatiri maarwi enunnwa.
Nawo mmbo vashekwiisaa naambo valeete efyo fikee fya dede, vendukye ngyuraawe ta wongo.
Kyaindi yewe, va na mwiiyanu findony fyafo fyoose, sisirya makasha, runda ishora lya mwiivambisa Nrumi ya Nsia, kwiinutye urundi lwafo.
Mashika yeny ulaalu nkimwi sheelyi nkeepusuwa sha mura, nkyo kyeeri kya ifwa lyakwa mmbo kyamfika.
Mmbo shikapanaa fira shisha shyaawutye kyaaro kyakwa, shiringe iirikyo.

Mafurumyony a vayo mmbo shikee n-deesye ureto lwa usumanu, elo Nndumi yeu mwirummbwa usumanu asheshiniingaa nkonu yeto, nta nshi yeny shimuni-fo, ni ando amwi na vandu woose yewo valelanga ilollya ifumirwa lyakwe.
Kutakure isha kwakwa uviny.
Mashika Dema mmbo alelakana neeny, kalanga ulana elu, kakwiipoo keenda Tesalonike, na Kreske mmbo aleenda Galatia; na Tito Dalmatia,
ni Luka muni akee yaa ando amwi neeny. Ipoo Marko kushe nawe, mashika ashisennyi nnu urundiny lwakwe.
Kyaindi we Tikiko mmbo shilenruma Efeso.
Osho na ikoti lya shilelyira kwa Karpo efo Troa, ando amwi na fitabu filya, mmwasi filya fya shony.
Mfuru ulya wa minya ya arera we Iskanda mmbo aleshitannya findo firavi nnu; nawe Nndumi mmbo ashentaa kiinani na mitannyi yakwe.
Neewe kwiise nawe, mashika mmbo alemina nnu ufundo lweru.
Kindo kya mbee shilelollya, nkwiifo nndu alesalala taari yakwa-fo. Woose mmbo valeshira. Neeny mmbo shatereva Iruva nalasheevautya uvingo kimaruma kya vayo.
Lyo Nndumi mmbo aleshisalallya kashiniinga finya, naambo, kyeendwa ni urundi lwakwa naambo nrumi yeyo yaambawa kisumani, naambo vandu va masanga moose veete; neeny lyo shaauwa efo kaniny ka miiso.
Nawe Nndumi mmbo asheshaauwaa efo nrengeny toose, neeshiringa kutani shafikya umangyi lwakwe lwa iruvee-u. Nnduma mmbwakwe we fika llun'anu na llung'anu. Amen.
Shiidikirya Priska na Akila, na valya va kyeny kwa Onesiforo.
Erasto mmbo alekaa Korinto. Trofimu mmbo shilenra Mileto elwee.
Kutakure isha kulaore kyeeri kya mbeo kyansha. Eubulo akwiidikira, na Pude na Lino, na Klaudio na vakristo woose da.
Naasa Nndumi nakae na nrima wafo. Isarya lyimukae.
Yeny Paulo, shikee ishinga lya Iruva, na nrumi wa Yesu Kristo, kimaruma kya kikusiryo kya vasauwe va Iruva, na wiidimi lweemanya dede ilya ishendee muu nsha.
Na ivika nsia kya muu wa llung'anu, yeto Iruva yeu nalashambaa wongo aleluvikya nsia uka elyo mbee.
Kavasukuya irero lyakwe elyi kyeeri kyakwe kyileinana kya nrumi ilya shilerambikywa kwi ivavasyo lya Nkira weeru we Iruva.
Yewe Tito, mwana-kwa kunu iirikyony elyi lukee ilyivambisa. Isarya lyikae neewe na urilalyi luukye kwa Iruva Nde na kwa Kristo Yesu Mwiikira weeru.
Nkyo kimaruma shilekura Krete, naambo kutumbani filya fyeanguye, neevika vamiku va siri wo muri shaasa llya shilekuvavasya;
kwakooya nndu nalatiri kiteve nawe ni nndu wa nka umwi, na vana vakwe vatiri iirikyo, nta valarerwaa kya ukasha nta valakee valyang'a.

Mashika mmbo kisumani askofu nave nndu nalatiri kiteve, mashika mmbo akee nngari wa Iruva; nta nalave nndu akukundye we muni-fo, nalave mwaangu irosa unyafi-fo ao mwinangwa mmbwari na mwikunda myaandu-fo, nta nalave mwikuwonisya kindo kilasumani-fo.
Lyo nave nndu alangye yaambya vandu, alangye mesha, wa mwiiyanu, wa usumanu, mweele, ashiidimaa isira ngata yakwe muni.
Mwikallya irero elyo lya kikusiryo shaasa llya aleloshwa, indo llyo ashiidimaa ilosha vandu evaikimbaa na ufundo elo lwa muu naveidima ivinga yewo vesalala ao vekukyikyisaa nawe.
Mashika veefo veengyi valakeekiita kindo vavioo, vatiri marero alatiri urango, valembaa vengyi, mmwasi ni yewo veerinwa, na yewo lyo nkuti vafindikirwa kana.
Yewo mmbo vakee ireta vandu va mmba shoose, vevaloshaa findo filavasumannyi kimaruma kya ikuwonisya findo fya sony.
Kwiifo nndu umwi wa kwawo ekee nkisuku karera indi kyawo, “Vakrete ni vandu va wongo kyeeri kyoose, mmbo vavakye mafisi maravi, veetalauwa ndeu vakaveva varoko.”
Ukureekyi yelo ni lwa dede. Kikeeny indo vakyeemyi na finya, naambo vakooye itumaa iirikyony;
valashearanya nganu nganu ta Kiyuda, nta ilatya mavavasyo a vandu vareeye filya fikee fya dede.
Findo fyoose mmbo fikee fyeeremutu kwa yewo va usumanu; lyo nkwiifo kyikee kyeeremutu kwa yewo vakyirinda, na kwa yewo valairikye-fo, mashika makusaro awo mmbo akee matefusu na mirima yawo kiwo.
Vakaamba mmbo vaishi Iruva, lyo na ngaa tawo mmbo vakee inkana; mmbo vatanaa fya yeende unyafi, vakava filemi, valavaa nta kwa kindo kisha.
Kyaindi yewe rera findo efyo fikwaani na ufundo elo lutiri muu,
kyeyaamba vamiku vave na mwiiyanu, vakae na wiindi, na waarya vantumaa kikusiryony na ukundiny neeva na usisiryo.
Kiwo na vamiku va kyika vakae na mikaaye myeeele; valave vevikya vengyi ureeree, valave veena nnu wari, lyo valoshe vengyi findo fya usumanu;
naambo varanguse vaka vakoo naambo vakunde womi vawo na vana vawo nisha.
Vave na mwiiyanu, na waa lwa nrima, varundye kyeny kwawo, vave vasaari, vendye womi vawo; naambo Irero lya Iruva lyilawoni yaararwa.
Ni indo na vana vakoo va kyuumi kuvaikyimbe vave na mwiiyanu;
yewe kumuni kuve kyaaso kyisha kyeelolwa kwikee na mweendo usennyi findony fyafo fyoose, neefo ufundony lwafo koore woorotu na usaari.
Kuvetira na marero atiri muu nalavaa yuutyo uvingo, naambo yewo velema efyo vakooye isuka kyeeri vakooyaa valatiri kikasha kyeerera uwe yeeru.
Yewo vakee mashinga vaindye vanndumi vawo, vavasenyi findony fyoose; valatire ng'anyi.
Valave veevi; lyo vaore usha lwawo woose, naambo vashope ufundo lwa Mwikira we Iruva weeru findony fyoose.
Mashika isarya lya Iruva yelyo lyikiraa vandu woose lyammaa yoorwa paa;
nalyo mmbo lyalulosha ilema uravi na lango ta kiulana; naambo lukooye ikaa na mwiiyanu, usumanu, usongovisi, yaa ulaniny yelu lwa inu,
lwiivereyaa na nsia ekyo kyeende mbora na yoorwa itumbe lya Kristo Yesu, Iruva mmbwe akee Mwiikira weeru;
yeto alekuuta we muni kimaruma kyeru, naambo naluute efo maraviny moose, nelyise vandu yewo va ushilyi lwakwe muni, vatiri umale lweetana mashora mesha.
Ongoya vandu mbony yeti, ikimba na isakyira nookaari loose, nta kulave nndu akumina.
Kumbura vandu yewo ikunyiisya yewo vatiri wiidimi na ushilyi, vavaindye, neekunda itana mashora mesha;
valave vearara vandu, valave veruuya myaandu, vave vasaari, vaore urilalyi lwawo kwa vandu woose.
Mashika elyo mbee naakwa ni yese llweetiri urango-fo, mmbo lwekee varavi, lukalembika, lwiirundyaa lango sheesi ta wo ngata, lwiisindaa uraviny na ukasha neesuvana na vengyi.
Kyaindi kimaruma kya usha lwa Iruva yeu akee Mwikira weeru, na ukundi lwakwe kwa vandu yelo luleorwa paa kalukira;
nshi kimaruma kya mashora mesha luletana yese-fo, nkimaruma kya ilyillya lyakwe, luleona llya luleirwa lya kavii na ivikwa wiiya kyuuka na Mumuyo Mweele.
Yeto luleirityo shapu kyeendwa ni Yesu Kristo Mwikira weeru;
naambo elyi lukee ekenywa usumanu kyeendwa ni isarya lyakwe, lukooye ivikwa veni ding'u ya muu wa llung'anu, shaasa iirikyo lyeru lyikai.
Ni irero lya iirikyo dede; na mbony yeto mmbo shikundye kutaambe na ukaari, naambo valya valeirikya Iruva vakummbwe ikaa na mweendo nsha. Efyo mfisha nafyo fitiri mbusha kwa vandu.
Kyaindi lyo marero a ulai kukwiise nang'u na nganunganu, na myaandu, na ulai lwa mbony toorokye. Mashika efyo mfitiri mbusha-fo nta urango-fo.
Nndu wa urere, kwammwiikimba lyimwi, kavii, llemi.
Kwammemanya nndu sheeto mmbo eevekye katana ulyamari neekuutya uvingo we muni.
Elyi shirumaa Artema ao Tikiko kwafo kutakure isha kwakwa kunu Nikapoli; mashika mmbo shikundye ikaa kunu kyeeri kya mbeo.
Ruma Zena ulya mwivavara mbony, na Apolo kwa ifura deny, valaanguyo nta nkindo-fo.
Vandu veru vakuloshe itira maako neetana findo fisha naambo valave sha vandu valavikaa ndunda.
Yeva woose shikee nawo vakwiidikira. Lwiidikirye valya valukundye efo iirikyony. Isarya lyimukaye yeni moose.
Ni yeny Paulo, mfingwa wa Kristo Yesu, na Timoteo mwanamaye weeru shakureiya yewe Filemoni nkunde weeru, mwaakana mashora yaa neese,
na kwa Afia, mwanamaye weeru, na Arkipo nsikari uroyeeru, na kwa siri yeyo ikee efo mmba kwafo.
Isarya lyimukaye na urilalyi lyuukye kwa Iruva Nde weeru na kwa Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
Mmbo nkeyaana Iruva wakwa nkonu simu, shiikukumbwaa efo fiterewony fyakwa.
Elyi nkeeiita mbony ta ikunda lyafo na kikusiryo kyafo kwa Nndumi Yesu na kwa veele woose.
Naambo ukulungo lwa iirikyo lyafo lurunde mashora mesha a urango kwi Kristo.
Mashika mmbo shiletirwa ni ifura iniini na iviiryo muu kimaruma kya ikunda lyafo, mashika mirima ya vandu veele mmbo ilevangiswa nnu mwanamaye weeru.
Naasany, lla elyi shitiri ukaari uniini efo kwa Kristo kyeeri nkekuvavasya efyo fikwani na yewe,
nkyo kimaruma kya ikunda lyeru mmbo shakutereva, shaasa shifye, yeny Paulo yaa ukuuny lwakwa, shivekee mfinge, kimaruma kya Kristo Yesu.
Mmbo shikee ikutereva kimaruma kya mwana yeto wakwa Onesimo yeto shilemwiira shikee mfinge.
Yeto mapookyony kulaore etiri mbusha kwafo lyo ulaalu mmbo akweekyaa deny, yewe na yeny-da.
Na yeny shanruma kwafo, kasha we muni, ekee na nrima wa ngata yakwa deny.
Na yeny lyo mmbo shelanngye nakae mbele kunu kwakwa naambo nashirundye ando afo elyi nkee kifingyony ekyi kya Nrumi ya Nsia.
Lyo nta nshilekunda itana kindo kulore shakuvesa mbele-fo, naambo usha lwafo lulasheeva sha kindo kwaitikywa, kyaindi kive kya ikunda.
Mashika kulakooye nkyo kimaruma ekaa kwaasha neewe ando a kirambo, naambo nashekaany kwafo deny.
Uka ulaalu nshi akyikee-se ishinga-fo, lyo ni mmwasi ya ishinga, mwanamaye-akwa nkunde, kwakwa yeny na kwafo yewe ni mmwasi lukee na mwiili.
Naasany kwakooya kulollye yeny shikee umwi neewe, warya yeu shaasa kweeshiwaryaa yeny.
Na kwakooya alenkulemba kindo, ao kwakooya atiri sye yafo, findo efyo reiya shitaa yeny.
Ni yeny Paulo shareiya na woko lwakwa shimuni, yeny mmbo nshekutaa. Nta nshikeekuvia mmbo kukee wa sye kwakwa-fo.
Naasany mwanamaye wakwa, na shiwoni mbusha kwafo kimaruma kya Nndumi, shiviirya muu kimaruma kya Kristo.
Kimmba shikwiirikye kya wiindi lwafo nkyo kimaruma neeny shakureiya barwa yei, shiivikye nsia sheelyi mmbo kutanaa nisha mmwasi ngota efi nkeekuvia.
Ando amwi neefyo mmbo shakutereva kushideesye ando ekaa, mashika mmbo shivikye nsia sheelyi kyeendwa ni fiterewo fyany, mulyimyoo ishiwonisa.
Epafra yeu akee mfinge ando amwi neeny akwiidikira.
Na Marko na Aristariko, na Dema na Luka, vakee veerunda ando amwi neeny.
Isarya lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo lyimukaye miriminy yaany.
Iruva mmbo alerera neese kasha kalya ka vande veru wo vakisuku, karera na shia shiingyi na kundo kwiingyi.
Matika yaa a ulaalu mmbo arera neese na shia ya Mwana wakwe, yeto alemmbika nave muya ding'u wa fyoose, na kyeendwa mmbwe kaumba ulana loose.
Kimmba we akee ngyesa ya usuri lwakwe na wende lwakwe, eshipoo fyoose na ivavaso lya wiidimi lwakwe, ekimaa ivika wiilyiso lwa ulyamari, mmbo alekaa rembo woko usha lwa Uniini lwakwe efo iruveeu;
mmbo alevikwa nailanyi vasu woose, shaasa irina elyo lyikee ding'u yakwe lyileng'annya lyawo.
Mashika lyo mmbo alemmivia nsu ungau nta lyimwi, Nnyewe mwana-kwa, “Inu mmbo shakwiira.” Na lyingyi, “Neeny mmbo nshevaa Nde kwakwe nawe kwakwa nave mwana.”
Na lyingyi-se, elyi aende mwana wakwe mmbee ulaniny kaamba, “Vasu woose va Iruva vamfiirye ndi.”
Na kya vasu kaamba, “Yeto avika vasu vakwe vave va ngata ya mumuyo, na varundi vakwe vave fipalapala fya muro.”
Kyaindi kya mbony ta mwana mmbo aamba, “Kitima kyafo kya itumbe, woi Iruva nkya llung'anu na llung'anu; na rungu ya umangyi lwafo ni ya usumanu.
Mmbo kwalanga usumanu, kwasua uravi. Naasany Iruva, we Iruva wafo, ankwaamba mafura, mafura a nsia ngota a wooroo.”
Na lyingyi, yewe, Nndumi, llya kipooka mmbo kulevika uvasha lwa ulana, “Na iruveeu mmashora a maako afo.
Yefyo fyoose fishelyamarikaa, lyo yewe kushesalala-u, nato shoose tisheekaa sha soori.
Kushetilemaa sha masara, nato taalashike. Kyaindi yewe mmbwe ulya da, na fyeeri fyafo mfishemandaa-fo.”
A ndesa kwiifo nsu alemmuvia nta lyimwi, “Kaa yewe yoo woko lwakwa usha, kutani shavika vakiduva vafo yoo si ya ngyayo tafo?”
A yeyo myoose nshi mimuyo mifurukani, yeerumwa indefurukannya valya vashevaa veni ding'u ya ukiro?
Kyasiany mmbo kilukooye ilola nnu efyo fileitiwa naambo lulasheefitura.
Mashika kwankooya irero llya lyilererwa ni nsu lyekee iniini, na wo urekwa na uravi lukawonisa weesi lwa usumanu,
a yese mmbo lusheturunyaa inda, lukanra lulasara ukiro elu uniini indi? Nalo Nndumi alerera kya vayo mapookyony, numa lukakoora kweru paa kyuuka kwa valya valeita.
Iruva nawe evikaa ukureekyi ando amwi nawo na ngyende na findo filandelollyo na finya ta ngata shiingyi, na yaavyo Mumuyo Mweele, shaasa alekukundya we muni.
Mashika ulana llwa lukeesha lukeerera mbony ta vayo nnyaleluvika si ya vasu-fo, mashika kwiifo nndu umwi alekureeka kya vayo kaamba,
A nndu wa vandu nkyokyi kutani kwankumbwa, ao mwana wa nndu, kutani kwallola?
Mmbo kulemuumba nave n-du deny ngota nsu kwambika ureto lwa itumbe na wiindi kwambika uwe ya mashora a maako afo.

Mmbo kuvikye findo fyoose yoo si ya uvayo lwakwe. Mashika elyi kulevika findo fyoose si yakwe nnyalera-fo kindo nta kimwi kilakee si yakwe-fo. Kyaindi lyo llwalelollya findo fyoose fivikwa si yakwe-fo,

lyo yeto aletanwa n-du deny ngota vasu lullollye, mmbwe Yesu, mashika a ivavyo fika ufu, kavikwa ureto lwa itumbe na nnduma, naambo kyeendwa ni isarya lya Iruva na shoshe ufu kimaruma kya vandu woose.
Mashika yeto kyeendwa mmbwe na kwa kimaruma kyakwe findo fyoose fiiyo, mmbo kyilenkooya nawoni vana veengyi vafikye itumbe, na yaawutya yeto nniini mweende ukiro na shia ya makiva.
Mashika yeto mwiilyisa na yewo veilyiswa, woose nkwa umwi vammyi. Kimmba kya ekyo nnyalollye sony ivavaanga vanavamaye-fo;
llya aamba, Mmbo nshevambisaa irina lyafo kwa vanavama. Efo mmba ya Iruva nshekwimbyaa kyerumisha,
Na lyingyi, Mmbwe yeto nshemmbikaa nsia. Na lyingyise, Lola, yeny shikee yaa na vana yewo Iruva aleshivaniinga.
Naasany, kyimmba vana valeakaniswa samu na mwiili, nawe ni indo-da aleveakana efyo fyeni, naambo kyeendwa ni shia yeyo ya ufu narumate yeto atiri finya ta ufu, we Nkumbi,
naambo naleke yewo woose muu wao wekee ushingeny kimaruma kya weerei lwa ufu.
Shamashika lyo n-dede, nnyatiri ngata ya vasu-fo, mmbo aleipoo ngata ya ngyeeri ya Abrahamu.
Nkyo kavakaniswa na vanavamaye kya findo fyoose, naambo nave nkohani nniini araiye ilyillya, akutiri na ngata ya Iruva, naambo naleke vandu vakwe kya ngyulyamari tawo.
Na kimmba we muni alelyiswa ukiva esheeswaa, mmbo ashidimaa yeekya yewo vakeeyeeswa.
Naasany, vanavama veele, mukee vaakanise uvaango lwa iruveeu, kusareny nnu kya Nrumi na Nkohani Nniini wa kikusiryo kyeru, we Yesu.
Yeto aleindya yeto mwinruma, shaasa na Mose ekai, kulya mmba koose kwa Iruva.
Mashika we mmbo akee nninge itumbe mmwasi ngota Mose, kimwi sha nndu mwisongosya mmba awona nnduma ngota mmba yeyo.
Mashika wo mmba mmbo ikeeshisongosye ni nndu; kyaindi yeto mwisongosya findo fyoose ni Iruva muni.
Na Mose dede lyo mmbo aleindya fyoose kulya mmba ya Iruva, ekee mwifurukannya-u; nave nkureekyi wa findo fyoose fishererwaa numa;
lyo we Kristo, akee mwana, mwikallya mmba ya Iruva, yeto mmba yakwe ikee nnyo yese, lyo kwakooya luwaranaa nnu na ukaari lweru na itumbe lya ivereya lyeru fika mafurumyony.
Naasany shaasa Mumuyo Mweele arera, “Inu yeni kwakooya mwaita unyanga lwakwe.
Mulasheumisa mirima yaany, sha kyeeri kya yeende unyafi sha nkonu wa kyeeso kulya kasa.
Llya vande valya vany valesheesa, vakashiisa, vakalollya mitannyi yakwa ando a myaaka 40.
Nkyo sharooyo ni unyafi kimaruma kya irika elyi, shaamba, ‘Kyeeri kyoose mirima ya vandu yeva mmbo yeevekye, mmbalemanya shia takwa-fo.’
Kimaruma kya unyafi lwakwa shalya mboo, ‘Mmbashangaa ifureny lyakwa-fo.’ “
Kyasia, loleny vanavama vakwa, nnang'ani yaany kulashekaa-fo nrima muumu ulatiri kikusiryo; kimaruma kya ikurauwa na Iruva yeu akee na muu.
Naasa ikimbaniny nkonu simu, naambo kulave-fo nta umwi waany ava muumu elembwaa nnulyamari.
Mashika mmbo lwammba veakana ando amwi na Kristo, kwankooya lwavandama na ukaari lweru lwa finya uka mbee fika mafurumyony;
shaasa kyaambawa, Inu yeni kwakooya mwaita unyanga lwakwe mulasheumisa mirima yaany sha kyeeri kya yeende unyafi.
Mashika ni vakyi valeende unyafi kyeeri valeita? Nshi woose-se valya valeuka Misri veeteterwaa ni Mose?
A ndesa ni vakyi alerooywa ni unyafi kimaruma kyawo ando a myaaka 40? Nshi valya valelyamara, minying'a yaawo ikawa kulya kasa?
A ndesa ni vakyi alevalyiiya mboo sheelyi mbashangaa ifureny lyakwe, kulaore ni valya valelyang'aa?
Naasany mmbo lwakooya sheelyi mbaleidima yaanga ifureny-fo, kimaruma ira valakusirya-u.
Naasany, kwakooya kyaasa ekyo kyeyaanga ifureny kyisalalyi-u, lweereye, nta kulave umwi waany asheturaa ifura elyo.
Mashika naakwa ni yese mmbo luleongoyo Nrumi ya Nsia kimwi sha wo. Lyo irero elyi lyileitiwa llyilevasenyafo, mashika elyi lyiletura-u kikusiryo kyeelyiwarya.

Mashika yese lulekusirya-u mmbo lushangaa ifureny elyo shaasa aleamba, Shaasa shilelya mboo kya unyafi lwakwa, mmbashangaa ifureny lyakwa-fo; na kikava ishora elyo lyilemarisyo uka elyo uvasha lwa ulana lulevikwa.
Mashika kwiiyo ando alesenda nkonu wa mfungare kaamba, “Iruva mmbo aleimuya nkonu wa mfungare, karau mashora moose.”
Na yoo nang'u, “Mmbashangaa ifureny lyakwa-fo.”
Kyasiany, kimmba irero elyi lyiiyo-da kyeyaamba veefo vasheangaa-fo, na valya valeongoywa mbony yeto kasha vakalemwa yaanga-fo kimaruma kya ulyang'a lwawo,
kavika nkonu ungyi, kaamba na kana ka Davidi numa ya fyeeri fyaasha, “Inu”shaasa kyilererwa uka kasha, Inu yeni, kwakooya musheita unyanga lwakwe, mulasheumisa mirima yaany.
Mashika kukooye Yosua evaniinga ifura, nnyesendaa nkonu ungyi wa numa-fo.
Naasany mmbo kusaye-u ifura lya nkonu wa iimuya kwa vandu va Iruva.
Shamashika yeto aleanga ifureny lyakwe mmbo akeekyesa we muni kya mashora akwe, shaasa na Iruva nave alefura kya mashora akwe.
Kyasiany neese lukutakure yaanga ifureny elyo, naambo kulashekaa-fo nta nndu afwa kimaruma kya ngata yeyo yelyang'aa.

Shamashika Irero lya Iruva mmbo lyitiri muu, lyikatira finya, lyikaveva lyoovi ngota usu lukee unnwe kunu na kunu, lyikaidima ikora na yaavanisa miili na mirima, na filungo na mafura a vayo. Na lyingyi kwa vayo nkyaangu imanya makusaro na fyama fya mirima.
Nta nkwiiyo kyuumbe kilalollyo paa mbee ya vayo-fo, na findo fyoose mmbo fikee mbereto yoo misony a yeto arye mbony teru toose.
Kyasiany, kimmba lutiri Nkohani yeto aleanga na iruveeu, we Yesu, Mwana wa Iruva, lukutire deny na iirikyo lyeru.
Mashika Nkohani yeu weeru Nniini nnyalelemwa itamballya neese kunu ufwafweny lweru-fo, mashika we mmbo aleeswa kimwi sheese-da kya findo fyoose, lyo nalatani ulyamari.
Kyikeeny indo, luserikye kitima ekyo kya isarya lukee nookaari, naambo luwoni ilyillyo, na iwona isarya yelyo lyishelutaramaa kyeeri kya yaanguywa.
Mashika wo Nkohani Nniini akee imwiipoo efo vanduny mmbo akeembike kimaruma kya vandu navafurukannyi mbee ya Iruva, naniingye firaso na fyaanu kimaruma kya ulyamari.
Yeto ashidimaa ivallya nawo waarya yewo varung'ani na vakeereka, kimmba naakwa ni we avekee na ngata ya ufwafwa.
Na kimmba ni indo mmbo kyinkooye naute firaso kimaruma kyakwe we muni na kya vandu vengyi kya isangywa ulyamari.
Nta nkwiiyo nndu ashidimaa itafurau nnduma yeufo, kuuta yeto Iruva ammuvaanga, shaasa alevaanga Aron.
Na kiwo-da naakwa ni Kristo nnyalekurosa we muni kava Nkohani Nniini-fo, mmbo kwiifo yeto alemmbia, Ni yewe Mwana wakwa. Inu mmbo shakwiira.
Na ando engyi kaamba, Nnyewe Nkohani llung'anu kuvakye Melekizedeki.
We kyeeri ekyo ekee na mwiili, yeto ashidimaa imwauwa ufuny mmbo alensheya, kimaruma kya fiterewo na fyeerero na misoru miingyi, kaaranywa kimmba aleirikya Iruva.
Na lla elyi akee Mwana, mmbo alesisirya makyiva yoo alenkooya;
Na kyeeri alemaa iinutya, kava mmbwe mweende ukiro lwa llung'anu kwa yewo vemwirikya.
Na Iruva kaamba mmbo akee Nkohani Nniini kimwi sha Melekizedeki.
Kimaruma kya yeto mmbo lutiri findo fiingyi fyeyaamba, lyo kikava kyuumu mashika elyi mukee varoo iita.

Mashika alya kyemukooye muve yeni mmbo velosha (mashika kwamiira-u fyeeri fyaasha), lyo fika ulaalu mmbo mukee veloshwa ufundo lwa mbee deny lwa mbony yeti ta Iruva, mukava sha vana vanaa malela vakalemwa shoonga shuumu.
Shamashika yeto moose mwiina malela nnyamanyaa deny marero a usumanu-fo, mashika ni mwana nndu.
Kyaindi shoonga shuumu nnya vandu vaniini, yewo kimaruma kyekwishivira urango lwawo lwammidima itambashwa kyisha na kyikasha.
Kimmba ni indo, lukara lulasenda ufundo lwa mbee lwa Kristo, lwangusye yeenda lwaawutye, lulasheva-se vekaa uvasheny lwa mashora alakee a muu, neera kikusiryo kwa Iruva,
na ufundo lwa ubatiso, na yeekeryo maako, neeruka lya vafu na mwaandu wa llung'anu.
Na efyo mmbo lutanaa kwakooya Iruva alwiidimisya.
Mashika yewo valemmainingwa sa, na ishosha simbo yeyo ya iruveeu na iwona yaakaniswa na Mumuyo Mweele,
na ishosha irero yelyo lyirolaa lya Iruva, na wiidimi lwa fyeeri efyo fishaa,
vakawuya iwa-da numa ya efyo, nkikiidimikaa-se ivaviira wiiya kutani vakurya-fo, mashika mmbo vakeekapya Mwana wa Iruva nsalabeny lya kavii, na insuta wo veni.
Mashika naakwa ni sumbai yeyo yana mura wa mmbwa yeyo ikapaau wo kyeeri na ivikya yewo varema ndunda shisha, wo mmbo vawaryaa mbora tishukaa kwa Iruva;
lyo kwakooya sumbai yeyo yauta miinga tupu na mooro, mmbo ivaa sheelyi yadengwa nyishirikyoo-fo, nayo mmbo ishelyamarwaa.
Kyaindi vakunde vakwa, lla elyi lwaamba indo, mmbo lwiishi mbony tany, tikee shisha mmwasi, tikee ta ukiro.
Mashika Iruva nshi nrekwa kutani arekyo mashora any-fo, na ukundi lulya muleora kimaruma kya irina lyakwe, llya mulefurukannya veele, na fika ulaalu ni indo-da mukeetana.
Neese mmbo lukee mwikima nnu naambo mutire usasari yelo weni na yaawutya ekyo luvereye fika mafurumyony;
naambo mulasherokwa, naambo musheva vamwi neewo va fyaasa efyo vekee na kikusiryo sanda na usisiryo.
Mashika kyeeri Iruva alevika kyaasa na Abrahamu, mashika elyi kulaore eiyo ungyi nniini ngota we wellyisa mboo, mmbo alelya mboo we muni,
kaamba, ni dede ivikya mbora nshekuvikyaa, na ikufumbuta nshekufumbuta.
Na kyeendwa ni ivika nsia kashefityo kyaasa ekyo.
Mashika nndu mmbo alyee mboo na yeto amwilannyi, na yekyo kyailanya marero moose ni ilya mboo, evikaa kyiringyisyo.
Kyikeeny indo Iruva ekundye yoora valya vashewaryaa kyaasa kilya, shaasa fyaasa fyakwe filashaalashikaa, kavika-u kyaasa.
Naambo kimaruma kya findo fivii filashaalashikaa, nang'u Iruva nalashambaa wongo, lukaariswa lwivirywaa muu, yese lukeetamballya efyo luvikye nsia fikee mbee yeeru,
nakyo mmbo kivakye kya nrima, kyeluuta nrengeny, itiri finya, yeelwaata efo nnang'ani ya ando eele,
yefo Yesu aleanga nafo kimaruma kyeru, nsongoru weeru, kava Nkohani Nniini fika llung'anu avakye Melekizedeki.
Mashika mangyi yeto wa Salemu we Melekizedeki ekee nkohani wa Iruva akee uwe, yeto alekwaananya na Abrahamu llya ekewuya ooka ikapa vamangyi valya, kammbikya mbora.
Mmbwe ulya Abrahamu alenninga kyenga kya ikumi kya findo fyakwe fyoose; (udongo lwa irina lyakwe ni “Mangyi wa usumanu”, na lyingyi “Mangyi wa Salemu”, nkyo kyaamba ni mangyi wa urilalyi.
Nnyatiri ndeye nta maye-fo, nnyatiri kyeeri apookye-fo, nta mafurumyony a muu wakwe-fo, lyo mmbo alevakaniswa na Mwana wa Iruva); yeto mmbo akaa llung'anu.
Naasa, loleny shaasa nndu yeto ekee nsuri, yeto Abrahamu nkuu weeru, alenninga kyenga kya ikumi kya masaa akwe.
Neefo kwa vana va Levi valya vetira ukuhani, mmbo vatiri ivavaso ipoo kyenga kya ikumi kive kya vandu vawo, mmbo va ufyari lwawo, ni ivavaso, lla elyi vaukye kwa Abrahamu.
Lyo we, ufyari lwakwe lulaukye kwawo, mmbo alewarya kyenga kya ikumi kwa Abrahamu, yeto atiri kyaasa ekyo kammbikya mbora.
Mmbo kimanyikye deny, yeto mwivikya mbora mmbo ailannyi yeto avikyo mbora.
Na Vakohani yewo vawaryaa kyenga ekyo kya ikumi vakee vandu vashefwaa, lyo nkwa yeto akureekyo sheelyi eefo na muu.
Na lyo ivaa yaamba kyeendwa ni Abrahamu, naakwa Llevi mwiwarya kyenga kya ikumi mmbo aleniingya kyenga kya ikumi;
mashika mmbo aukye kwa ndeye, yoo Melekizedeki alekwaananya nawe.
Naasa kukooye kweiyo usongovisi efo ukuhaniny lwa Levi, (mashika vandu yewo mfo valewonisa uvavaso); nkuti ki se yeiyo yewonisa nkohani ungyi avakye Melekizedeki, nta nare nalavakaniswa na Aron?
Mashika ukuhani lulya lukammaalashika, na ivavaso nalyo mmbo lyishalashikaa.
Mashika yeto mbony takwe tilererwa mmbo aleakaniswa na ufyari lungyi, neefo nkweifo nndu ungyi mwirundya kitara kyeerasya-fo.
Mashika nkindo kya paa Nndumi weeru mmbo ookye efo ufyariny lwa Yuda, na Mose nnyalererau kya ufyari yelo kikee kya ukuhani-fo.
Yefyo lukerera yese mmbo fimanyikye mmwasi, kyimmba alewonika nkohani ungyi avakye Melekizedeki;
nalakee nkohani kyeendwa ni ivavaso lya uvavaso llwa lwa ngata ya mwiili, akee wa wiidimi lwa muu ulamandaa.
Mmbwe alekureekywa kyeyaamba, Nnyewe Nkohani llung'anu kuvakye Melekizedeki.
Mashika kwiiyo yuuta-u ivavaso llya lya mbee, kimaruma kya ufwafwa lwa vayo, neelyi kulore lyilemaa;
(mashika ivavaso llya lya mbee lyileinutya kindo-fo); na ando amwi na efyo mmbo kulesha-u ivereya iiya isha mmwasi lyelusembera kufii na Iruva.
Na kimmba kulaore kweiyo ilyiswa mboo,

(mashika valya mmbo valevikwa vave makuhani kulaiyo ilya mboo, kyaindi we, ando amwi neelyiswa mboo kwa yeto alemmbia, Nndumi mmbo alelya mboo nta nnyashalashaa-fo, yewe mmbo kukee nkohani llung'anu);
naasany kiinani na efi Yesu mmbo aleva mwisalallya kyaasa ekyo kyikee kyisha mmwasi.
Na valya valevikwa makuhani veengyi, mashika elyi valeimwa ni ufu valakee-u.
Kyaindi we, kimmba aiyo llung'anu mmbo atiri ukohani lwakwe lulamandaa.
Kimmba ni indo we mmbo ashidimaa ikira deny yewo vasheyaa Iruva na irina lyakwe, mashika we akee na muu mikonu myoose evaterevyaa.
Mashika mmbo kilelukooya lutire Nkohani nniini wa ngata yei akee mweele, nalatiri uravi, nalatiri nta ivara, akee nrauwe na varavi, kavekaa uwe kairya iruveeu;

nalatiri kimaruma kya yuuta mbele kiraso kimaruma kyeekwilyisa ulyamari lwakwe muni shaasa makuhani valya vengyi vaniini valetana, numa nooteny kiraso kimaruma kya ulyamari lwa vandu yewo, mashika we mmbo aletana indo lyimwi nsi llya alekuuta we muni.
Mashika uvavaso mmbo lwavika vandu vakee vafwafwa vave makohani vaniini, kyaindi irero elyo mboo yeyo ilesha numa ya uvavaso mbo lyilevika-u Mwana, yeto amaa fyoose fika llung'anu.
Naasa, nnang'ani ya efyo lukeeamba, irero isongoru llyo elyi, mmbo lutiri Nkohani Nniini indi, akee rembo woko usha lwa kitima kya itumbe kya uniini iruveeu,
mfurukani wa ando eele, na wa yeema llya dede lyilevikwa ni Nndumi muni nta nshi nndu-fo.
Mashika Nkohani Nniini moose mmbo avikwaa naambo naniingye simbo na firaso, kweekyo yeu nawe nkuti natire findo fyeeyuuta.
Kukooye ekee uwe ya uruka, nnyevaa nkohani-fo; mashika veefo yewo vaniingyaa firaso kimaruma kya ivavaso,
verundya-u sha ando a kirishe kya iruveeu, shaasa Mose alevavasyo ni Iruva, llya emma ivavasyo nadeesye yeema llya, mashika mmbo aamba, Lola kusongosye findo fyoose shaasa kuleorwa kulya ifumbu-u.
Lyo ulaalu mmbo ambonisa urundi usha mmwasi, kiinani na shaasa nrumi wa kyaasa kiniini mmwasi, kyikee kivavasye nkyaasa ekyo kisha mmwasi,
Mashika kukooye kyaasa ekyo kya mbee kulaore kyeetiri unana, mmbwekaa-u mwaanya wa iruuya ekyo kya kavii-fo.
Mashika evasakiraa mmbo aamba, Lola, mikonu iifo ishaa, ni Nndumi arera, neeny nsheinutyaa kyaasa Kiiya kwa mmba ya Israeli na mmba ya Yuda.
Nakyo nkishevaa sha kyaasa kilya shilevikya vandeyaawo-fo, nkonu ulya shilevatira woko shavauta urukeny lwa Misri. Mashika mbalewarana na kyaasa kyakwa-fo neeny nshilevasara-fo, ni indo Nndumi aamba.

Mashika ekyi nkyo kyaasa nshevikaa na mmba ya Israeli, numa ya mikonu ilya ni indo Nndumi aamba, Nshevavikya uvavaso lwakwa makusarony awo, nshereiya efo miriminy yaawo neeny nshevaa Iruva waawo, nawo vave vandu vakwa.
Nawo mbasheloshanaa wo nndu na uroye-fo, na wo nndu na mwanamaye, veshambaa, irikya Nndumi-fo, mashika woose vasheshiirikyaa. Uka yeto akee n-du waawo fika yeto akee nniini waawo.
Mashika mmbo nshevafwayaa maravi awo na ngyulyamari tawo nshishetikumbwaa-sefo.
Llya aleamba, ni Kyaasa Kiiya, mmbo aleallwa kilya kya mbee kive kikuu. Na lyo kindo kikampooka iva kikuu mmbo kyamfika kufii na imanda.
Naasany naakwa nkyaasa kilya kya mbee mmbo kyevikye uramba lwa miindye, na ando a vayo eele a yaa ulaniny.
Mashika yeema mmbo lyilesongosyo, llya lya kipooka, lyikavikyo ekyerya taa, na mesa, na mikate ya Myoorye, ng'ng'u alevaangwa Eele.
Na yoo numa ya isullya elyo lya kavii, yeema llya lyivaangwa Eele kwa Kweele,
lyitiri kirembo kya saabu, na isanduku lya kyaasa lyikee isengetye nsaabu riti, mfo kweiyo na ikopo lya saabu lyetiri mana, na nsengye ulya wa Aron ileshau, na mapoo alya a kyaasa.
Na uwe ya vayo kukaa-u makerubi na itumbe, akavikya kitima ekyo kyesarya nruve; naasa nta llutiri mwaanya wa yaamba mbony ta findo efyo fyoose kimwi kimwi-fo.
Naasa findo efyo fikimaa isongosyo indo, wo kyeeri makohani mmbo veshangaa efo yeeminy elyo lya kipooka, vakainutya mirumwa ya miindye.
Kyaindi efo yeeminy yelyo lya kavii nkohani nnini mmbo eshangaa-fo we muni, na lyimwi nsi wo mwaaka, na samu yeyo yeningyaa kimaruma kyakwe muni na kya ngyulyamari ta itura imanya lya vandu yewo.
Mumuyo Mweele eshoraa mbony yei, sheelyi shia ya yaanga ando eele nnyensukuwa paa-fo, yoo yeema llya lya kipooka lyeiyo.
Elyo llyo kyaaso kya kyeeri ekyi kya ulaalu, kyeeri ekyo fyaanu na firaso fyekora na muro, nayo filashidimaa isongovisa nndu yeto akee iindya,
kyimmba ni uvavaso lwa ngata ya mwiili-da, fyeelya na fyeena neesamba yefyo fyekee fivavasye fika kyeeri kya usongosyo wiiya.
Kyaindi elyi Kristo ammaa isha, akee nkohani nniini wa findo efyo fishaa, atiri yeema iniini na lyawutye fyoose, lyilakee lyisongosye mmaako, nkyo kyaamba lyilakee lya yaa ulaniny elu.
Nta kilakee kya samu ya mburu na ngashe, kyaindi kya samu yakwe muni, mmbo aleanga lyimwi nsi ando yoo Eele, ekimaa itira iwouwa lya llung'anu.
Shamashika kwakooya samu ya mburu na ya shau na ifu lya ngashe ya ng'umbe yeyo valefwallyo yewo vetirwa nkyirinda kya mwiili nawo vakasambika,
a samu ya Kristo nshi mmwasi, yeto kyeendwa ni Mumuyo wa llung'anu mmbo alekuuta we muni kwa Iruva kava kiraso kya ulyamari, mmbo ishemusangyaa makusaro any na mashora any mafu.

Kimmba ni indo mmbo akee Nrumi wa Kyaasa Kiiya, naambo, ufu lukammekaa-u kimaruma kya yuuta filya fikasha filetanwa kyeeri kilya kya kyaasa kilya kya mbee, yewo vakee vavaange vawarye kyaasa kya ding'u ya llung'anu.
Mashika alya kyaasa kya ding'u kikai, nkuti ufu lwa yeto alekivika lukee-u.
Mashika kyaasa kya ding'u yeyo mmbo kitiri finya alya ufu lwa nndu (we Kristo) lulesheya; mashika kilya kilatiri finya, elyi ulya alekivika akee na muu.
Naako nkyaasa kilya kya kipooka nkilevikwa kulaiyoo samu-fo.

Mashika wo ivavaso shaasa lyilererwa ni Mose kwa vandu yewo woose, shaasa uvavaso luleamba, mmbo alewarya samu ya ngashe na ya mburu ando amwi na mafwaa a yaari adodorye na hisopo, kananatya kitabu ekyo kyeni, na vandu yewo woose,
kaamba, “Yei nnyo samu ya kyaasa ilevavasyo ni Iruva.” "
Na yeema elyo nalyo na fiiya fyoose fya miindye kafinanatya samu kiwo,
neefo uvavasony kufii findo fyoose mmbo fyasangyo nsamu, na kulaiyo samu yapusuka nkwiiyo ifwaaywa-fo.
Naasa kikava nkuti mareiyo a mbony tikee iruveeu tifitwa-fo, kyaindi mbony ta iruveeu tiilyiso mfiraso fisha ngota to. "
Mashika Kristo nnyaleanga ando kweele kukee kusongosie mmaako-fo, nkyo kyaaso kya ando eele a dede, we mmbo aleanga iruveeu kweni, nalollyo yoo mbee ya kisangu kya Iruva kimaruma kyeru yese.
Nta nshi akuutaa lyingyi na lyingyi-fo, shaasa llya nkohani nniini aleanga ando eele wo mwaaka na samu ilakee yakwe;
kukooye ni indo, mmbo elyisoo ukyiva keengyi uka elyo ulana luumbwa; kyaindi ulaalu lyimwi nsi elyi kyeeri kyileinana, kaorwa paa, namaa ulyamari na kiraso kya muu wakwe.
Na shaasa vandu vakee vavikye ufu lyimwi nsi, na numa yeefwa ni yaanduywa;
na Kristo nawe, mmbo aleutwa kiraso lyimwi naambo neepoo ngyulyamari ta vandu veengyi, nawe mmbo asheshaa lya kavii, kulaiyo ulyamari, kwa yewo vembereya vaoni ukiro.
Naasa kyimmba uvavaso ni kyirishe kya mesha yoo asheshaa, lulakee fwana sheni ya findo efyo, kya firaso filya fya iniingywaa wo kyeeri mwaaka moose, nkimaa nta kinnywa isangya deny yewo vashaa-u-fo.
Kwankooya ni indony, a kukooye firaso fyemandaa, mashika yewo veindya vakammaa iilyiswa lyimwi, mmbekilollyaa-se vatiri ulyamari?
Lyo ando amwi na firaso efyo mmbo kwiiyo ikummbwa kya ulyamari wo mwaaka.
Mashika samu ya shau na mburu nnyimaa yuuta ulyamari-fo.
Nkyo elyi asha ulaniny mmbo aamba, Firaso fyekora na muro na fyaanu nkukundye-fo, lyo mwiili ukashideesya.
Firaso fyekora na muro na firaso fya ulyamari nkulesennyo mfyo-fo.
Llyo shileamba, Lola, shansha (mmbo shilereiyo efo kitabuny) shitani filya kukundye, woi Iruva wakwa.
Yoo uwe aamba, Firaso fyekora na fyaanu fya yuuta ukulefikunda-fo (filya fikee fivavasye ni uvavaso),
llyo aleamba, “Lola te, mmbo shasha nshetana efyo kukundye. Mmbo auta-u kilya kya mbee kavika-u kilya kya kavii.”
Yoo efyo akundye fikai ng'u lulewonisya iilyiswa, yoo mwiili wa Yesu Kristo ulerambikywa-u lyimwi nsi.
Na wo nkohani mmbo asalalaa wo nkonu navike miindye, neeningya firaso efyo fyeni keengyi, nafyo filashidimaa nta yuuta ulyamari.
Kyaindi yeu, kyeeri alemaa kiraso kimwi kimaa yuuta ulyamari llung'anu, mmbo alekaa rembo woko usha lwa Iruva;
ukau navereye kutani vakiduva vakwe vavikwa yoo si ya marende akwe.
Mashika kwa yuuta lyimwi nsi mmbo alesongovisa deny yewo vasheilyiswaa fika llunganu.
Na Mumuyo Mweele mmbo alukureekya, mashika ekyaamba,
Ekyi nkyo kyaasa nshevikaa nawo numa ya mikonu ilya. Nshevika mavavaso akwa miriminy yaawo. Na efo makusarony awo nsheareiya-fo.
Lyo kaamba, Ngyulyamari tawo na ulyang'a lwawo nshishelukumbwaa-se-fo, "
Naasany, kwankooya yefyo fisheutwaa-u, nkukyiifo-se kiraso kimaruma kya ulyamari-fo.
Kyasiany, vanavama, kyimmba lutiri ukaari lwa yaanga ando eele kyeendo nsamu ya Yesu,
shia ilya aleloora shiiya, itiri muu, ishiraa isulyeny, nto mwiili wakwe;
na iwona Nkohani nniini wa mmba ya Iruva,
luserikyeny ng'u na nrima wa dede, na kikusiryo kivangyi, lukee vasangye mirima yeeru lure makusaro makasha, lukee vasangye miili yeeru na mura mweele."
Lutire nnu ikusirya lya filya luvikye nsia, lyilashaalashikaa, mashika lya aleluvikya kyaasa ni wa dede.
Lukukaarise luveni na veni neekwitika itana mashora mesha a ikunda.
Nta lulare ikwaanannya ando amwi-fo, shaasa vengyi vaishivye, lyo lwiikimbani; na yeengera itana indo, shaasa mulollye nkonu yeto ukee kufii.
Mashika kwakooya lwatana ulyamari naambo lukammaa imanya ekyo kya dede, nkukisaa-u kiraso kimaruma kya ulyamari-fo;
lyo isheshaa ngapo yeeresye, na waami lwa muro yeto ushelyaa yewo valyang'a.
Nndu amina uvavaso lwa Mose mmbo ashefwaa kulaiyo usari, na irero lya vakureekyi vavii ao vararu.
Mwalollya inda? Ndesa nndu yeto ashewaryaa Mwana wa Iruva nnyashewaryaase ngapo niini mwasi, neemina samu yeyo ya iilyisa sheelyi nshi kindo-fo, neemina Mumuyo mwiisarya?
Mashika lwiishi yeto aleamba, Itaiya kiduva ni ishora lyakwa, yeny nshetaiyaa. Na lyingyi, Nndumi mmbo asheanduyaa vandu vakwe.
Ni kindo kyeeresye iwoya maakony a Iruva muni Muu.
Lyo kumbweny mikonu ilya ya mbee, llya kyeeri mulewona sa, mmbo mulesisirya isisirya lying'ani lya mavavyo.
Kyeeri mulelamyo ivikywa ureeree na fyuure, na kyeeri muleakaniswa na vetanywa efyo.
Mashika valya vekee fifingyony mmbo mulevaiya mashoya, mukairikya na nsia yuuta masaa any, mwiishi sheelyi efo nnang'ani yaany mmbo mutiri masaa ailannyi yoo, alamandaa.
Kyasia mulashereta ukaari lwany, mashika lutiri simbo niini.
Mashika mukundye usisiryo, naambo mukammaa itana filya Iruva akundye muwonise kyaasa kilya.
Mashika nkyeeri kyaangu deny kiiyo. Yeto avereyo asheshaa, nta nalakeywa.
Lyo yeto wakwa wa usumanu mmbo ashewonaa muu na iirikyo, kwakooya atirwa nnyinyira, nrima wakwa mmbutiri ifura nawe-fo.
Kyaindi lyo yese llusangyi na yewo vatirwa nnyinyira na vakeereka-fo, mmbo lukee na yewo vakikusiryo ekyo kikiraa mirima yeeru.
Naasany ikusirya ni ivika nsia deny kya efyo fikaa fishe, kulaore fyallollyo.
Na vamiku veru mmbo valekureekywa kya ekyo.
Kyeendwa ni irero lya Iruva ulana mmbo luleumbwa, ni indo lukusirye, naakwa mfindo efi filollyo mfileumbwa mfindo fingyi-se.

Eetiri kikusiryo, Abeli mmbo aleutya Iruva kiraso kyisha ngota Kaini, kakureekyo sheelyi mmbo akee wa usumanu; Iruva kakureekya firaso fyakwe, kimmba ni indo, na kikava alemmaa ifwa, mmbo eefo areraa.
Kyeendwa nkikusiryo Enoki mmbo aleipowa-u, nalalollye ufu, nta nnyalelollyo-fo mashika Iruva alemwiipo-u: Mashika elyo kulore emmipowa-u mmbo ekureekye sheelyi mmbo alesennya Iruva.
Lyo kulaiyo kikusiryo nkushiidimaa insenya-fo; mashika nndu asheengyaa Iruva nkuti mbele neerikye sheelyi eefo, na sheelyi we mmbo alyimyaa mbora yewo vensheya.

Ekee na kikusiryo, Noe llya alemaa iikimbwa ni Iruva kya findo efyo fikaa fishe numa filandelollyo, shaasa aleirikya Iruva, mmbo aletana mmba ilya ya isanduku, naambo nakire va mmba yakwe. Nkyo kautya ulana uvingo neeva muya ding'u wa usumanu yelo lwawonika kimmya efo kikusiryony.
Kyeendwa nkikusiryo Abrahamu mmbo aleirika llya alevaangwa, nakupoo neende iwonisa ando alya kushevaa ding'u yakwe, kakwiipoo naleeshi kundo akeenda.
Na kikusiryo kakaa kulya urukeny llwa weny lwa kyaasa, urukeny lulakee lwakwe, kakaa yeeminy we na Isaki na Yakobo, veni ding'u ando amwi nawe va kyaasa kilya kyeni.
Mashika mmbo evikye nsia ilollya muri utiri uvasha, ukee n-deesye neetanwa ni Iruva muni.
Kyeendwa nkikusiryo Sara muni mmbo alewona wiidimi lwa ikufinga lla llya emiilanya kyeeri kyakwe, mashika llya alevika nsia yeto mwiimbikya kyaasa ni wa dede.
Kyeendwa ni efyo vakairwa ni nndu umwi nawe kava sheelyi amfwa, vakawonika vandu veengyi sha nyinyiri ta efo nginiiu-te, sha nsanga wa mbai ya nruva ulavaa yekyena.
Yewo woose vakafwa na kikusiryo, valandewarya fyaasa filya, lyo vakafilollya vekee kwaasha na iirikya, neiirikya sheelyi wo ni veny na va kyaaro kunu urukeny.
Mashika yewo veamba findo sha yefyo mmbo woora paa sheelyi mmbo vakeeruuya uruka lwawo veni.
Na kukooye veekumbwaa uruka lulya kundo valeuka, mmbo veshidimaa iwuya nafo.
Kyaindi lyo ulaalu mmbo valangye uruka usha mmwasi, llo elo lwa iruveeu. Kweekyo Iruva nnyasuaa ivaangwa Iruva waawo-fo; kimmba mmbwe yeto alevatannya muri.
Kwi kikusiryo Abrahamu llya aleeswa mmbo aleuta Isaki nave kiraso, neeto alewarya fyaasa efyo mmbo ekeniingya mwana wakwe wa ngitany.
Ee-da, mmbo emmivyo, Yoo kwa Isaki ng'u ufyari lwafo lushepookyaa,
kikallollyo sheelyi Iruva mmbo ashidimaa innduta ooke kwa vafu, nammbonise lyingyi.
Ekee na kikusiryo Isaki mmbo alevikya Yakobo na Esau mbora, naakwa nkya findo efyo fisheshaa numa.
Ekee na kikusiryo llya Yakobo emfikya ifwa, mmbo alevikya vana va Yosefu mbora, keendya Iruva ekwinyikye yoo runguny ya nsengye wakwe.
Ekee na kikusiryo llya Yosefu alefikya yoo mafurumyony akwe, mmbo alesenda mbony ta vana va Israeli yuuka Misri kavavasya kya mafua akwe.
Na kikusiryo llya Mose alewonika kasurumwa mmbamiku vakwe ando a miiri iraru, llya valellollya nkinkoku kyisha, nta valairyae ivavaso lya mangyi.
Ekee na kikusiryo ekiva nndu nniini kalema ivaangwa mwana wa mfu wa Farao;
kalollya nkyeni ilyiswa ukyiva ando amwi na vandu va Iruva ngota ifurya ulyamari ando a kirambo kidu;
kalolya Kristo iteendwa ni usimba uniini ngota umasi loose lwa Misri, mashika nfyo evereye natawa.
Na kikusiryo kooka Misri nalairyee unyafi lwa mangyi, kasisirya evikye nsia yeto nalalollyo.
Na kikusiryo kavika Pasaka, na yaamba samu ilya, naambo ulya asherumataa fyuumbe fivee fyoose wo nalavapaani.
Na kikusiryo vakaira kulya yeeveny lya Shamu sha ando oomu; Vamisri vakunda nawo itana indo vakamirwa mmura.
Kyeendwa nkikusiryo isimamba lya Yeriko ukawunduka, llya muri uleringityo ando a mikonu mfungare.
Ekee na kikusiryo Rahabu ulya ntuusi nnyalerumatwa ando amwi na valyang'a valya-fo; mashika llya alewarya vandu valya va sa na ufoo.
A yeny shaambe-se kyi? Mashika mwaanya mmbushimaa shaambe mbony ta Gidion na Baraka na Samson na Yefta na Davidi na Samweli na ta vakisuku,
yewo kyeendwa ni iirikyo valevinga ngyumangyi ta vamangyi, vakatana usumanu, vakatira fyaasa, vakafinga kana ka miiso,
vakavinga muro, vakakya iwaawa na usu. Vakaniingwa finya llya vekee vafwafwa, vakakaarya fireny, vakoombuta vamisa woose.
Vaka nawo vakawaarya vafu yewo valerutwa. Lyo vengyi vakawondorwa fika ifwa, valairikye iwouwa, naambo vaoni irutwa.
Vengyi vakeetwa fyeesony fyeteendwa neekapwa, yee neefingwa, neevikwa kifingyony;
vakakapwa na mawe, vakaparwa na misumenu, vakavikwa fyeesony, vakawaawa noosu, vakaringitya-ringitya veree masara a moonri na mburu; vakaanguyo mfindo, vakalyiswa ukyiva, vakatannyo uravi;
(vandu yewo kulore vesumani ikaa yaa ulaniny), mmbo valeraa-raa kulya kasa na kulya mafumbu-u neefo mbangeny na midesheny.
Na vandu yewo woose mmbo valekureekywa kyeendo nkikusiryo kyawo, lyo valawarye kyaasa.
Kimmba Iruva elludeesya yese ekyo kikee kyisha mmwasi, naambo wo valashesongwa iwaryo ngota yese.
Kiwo neeseny-da, kimmba lukee varingitye ni vakureekyi veengyi indo, lukurwe mario yoo maroo, na ulyamari, lutamballye yeenda mbee lwikee na usisiryo efo kivakyanuny kya muu yeu.
Lwiilolaa Yesu, yeto mwipooka na mwiinutya kikusiryo kyeru; kimaruma kya ifura elyo aleniingwa we mmbo alesisirya nsalaba neemina sony, nawe mmbo akee rembo woko usha lwa kitima kya itumbe kya Iruva.
Nkye kusareny nnu kya yeto alesisirya iteendwa iniini indo lya vetana ulyamari, mulasheyaaraa-fo, nta ifwa nrima-fo.
Mulekapana fira mukafikya nta ipuswa samu, mwiwanaa na ulyamari-fo;
lyingyi mmbo mwanrekyo wiikimbi lulya, lukeerera neeni yeni mukee vana, Mwana-kwa kulaile umbiri lwa Nndumi, nta kulafwe nrima kyeeri akeekukyeemya,
Mashika yeto Nndumi ankundye mmbo ankapa, na mwana yeto mumwirikya mmbo ankapa.
Mmbo musumani ikapwa, Iruva mmbo ammutanya sha vana; mashika lyo ni mwana-kyi yeto nalakapwaa n-ndeye?
Naasa kwankooya mulakapwa shaasa kikee kwa woose, mmbo mwava vana valakee veni kyeny, nshi vana va dede-fo.
Ando amwi na efyo mmbo lutiri vande veru va ngata ya mwiili nawo vakalukapa, neese lukairikya, a nshi kyeni deny luwarani na Nde yeto wa mirima yeeru lukie muu?
Mashika lyo dede yewo ando a mikonu myaangu mmbo valelukapa shaasa valelollya wo veni kivaa, nawe kya pule yeeru, naambo lwaakaniswa weele lwakwe.
Wo ngapo kyeeri kilya nnyilelollyo nkindo kya ifura-fo, nkyeevavisa, kyaindi kwa yewo vakee veeshivire indo numa vakawonisa ndunda ta usumanu titiri ufoo.
Kyasia orweny maako yoo akee mafwafwa na ndi yeto shipooru,
sumanisyeny marende any shia, naambo ekyo kikee nketekete kilareke shia, naambo kikirwa.
Kundeny na nrima moose ikaa na urilalyi na vandu woose, nalo weele yelo kulaifo nndu ashidimaa ilollya Nndumi kwakooya alutura.
Mulole nnu deny kulasheva nndu amina isarya lya Iruva, kwiiseny nnu naambo nri yeto uvavaa ulasheemya kwany ushemwaatara na veengyi vaone itefuswa.
Kulakae-fo nndu ntuusi nta nndu naleshiindya Iruva-fo, sha Esau llya alekumba ding'u yakwe ya mwana mmbee kimaruma kya shoonga ikee imutu lyimwi nsi.
Mashika mwiishi llya numa alekunda iwona mbora, nkilekiva-fo, (mashika nnyalewona mwaanya wa ikurya-fo), lla shaasa aleiruuya na misoru deny.
Mashika mmulefikya ifumbu lyivaa ipaana-fo, lyileaka muro, nta ifishi yuu, na ireema, na uraato lwa finya,
na unyanga lwa iranda na unyanga lwa marero, yelo valya valelwiita valetereva valakivyo kindo kingyi-fo,
mashika mbaleidima isisirya marero alya valevavasyo-fo. Naakwa ni ifisi lyikapaana ifumbu elyo mmbo lyikapwaa na mawe.
Na efyo filelollyo shaasa fyeeresye, kutani Mose aamba, “Shantirwa mmbwerei neererema.”
Kyaindi yeni mmbo mwasheya ifumbu lya Sion, na muri wa Iruva akee na muu, Yerusalemu ya iruveeu, na maronda meengyi a vasu fiku fiingyi,
na ikwaanu iniini na siri ya vana vavee vakee vareiye iruveeu, na Iruva mwileta vandu woose, na mirima ya vandu va usumanu vasongovikye,
na Yesu nrumi wa kyaasa kiiya, na samu ya inanatywa, yeyo ireraa mesha ngota ilya ya Abeli.

Loleny mulashelema yeto akeerera. Mashika kwakooya kulaore valekirwa valya valelema yeto alevaikimba yaa ulaniny, ni mmwasiny deny llushekirwaa kwakooya lwaindukya mbai neeto aleuka iruveeu elwikimbaa;
yeto unyanga lwakwe lulereremisa uruka kyeeri ekyo, lyo ulaalu mmbo avika kyaasa kyeyaamba, ulaalu mmbo shireremisaa lyingyi lyimwi nshi uruka-da-fo na iruveeu-da.
Kyaindi irero elyi, “Lyingyi lyimwi”, mmbo lyoora paa filya fisheutwaa-u elyi fireremiswaa, mfyo filya fikee fyuumbe, naambo filya filavaa ireremiswa fyo fisalale-u.
Naasany kimmba lukeewarya umangyi yelo lulavaa ireremiswa, lukaeny na isarya, na kyeendwa llyo luvikye Iruva miindye insenyi, ando amwi neekunyiisa na vio;
mashika Iruva weeru nsha muro.
Ukundi sha lwa vana va nka lukee-u.
Mulare mulawarya veny-fo; mashika indo kwiifo vengyi valembwarya vasu va Iruva valaishi.
Kummbweny yewo vakee vafinge kimwi sheelyi mukee vafinge nawo; neewo vakeesisyo da muveekye, kimmba neeni mukee vandu.
Usando lwa nndu na nka luindyo ni vandu woose, na ando elala ashie; mashika vatuusi na vakirinda Iruva mmbo ashevautyaa uvingo.
Mulatire ngaa yekunda fesa-fo; fureny neefyo mutiri; mashika we muni mmbo aleamba, “Nshishekwaanguyaa nta-fo, nta nshishekuraa-fo.”
Kutani lwaidima yaamba, Nndumi mmbwe mwishitarama, nshishiryaa-fo; nndu wa vandu nkyoki asheshitannyaa?
Kummbweny vasongoru vany, valya valemoongoya irero lya Iruva. Na lyingyi, mwiilolaa nnu masiiyony a ngaa tawo, musore kikusiryo kyawo.
Yesu Kristo ni we yeto muni da aiyoo, ukwau na inu na fika llung'anu.
Mulashekurikwa ni ngyufundo tingyi shive na shive, na ta veny, mashika nkyisha nrima utumariswa ni isarya nta nshi shoonga-fo, mashika valya valeenda indo mbalewona-u pule-fo.
Lutiri kitara kyerasya ekyo valya vakee ifurukanyau yoo yeeminy elyo valatiri mumu wa ilya findo fya vayo.
Mashika findo filya samu ya vayo yeendwaa ando yoo eele ni nkohani nniini kimaruma kya ulyamari, firimbiti fya vayo mmbo fyakoryo efo kipoo ya ulale.
Kwa kimaruma ekyi Yesu nawe naambo nailyise vandu na samu yakwe muni, mmbo alelyiswa ukyiva kipoo ya muri.
Naasa lweende lunsheye kipoo ya ulaleny lwakwe, lwiirye uvingo lwakwe.
Mashika yaa llutiri-u muri ukaa-fo, mmbo lukeeruuya ulya ushaa.
Naasany, kyeendwa mmbwe, luniinge Iruva kiraso kya nnduma kyeeri kyoose, nkyo kyaamba, eto nto ndunda ta kana eko kakeindya irina lyakwe.
Lyo mularekywa itana fya usha na yaakana amwi-fo; mashika firaso sha efi mfyo fisenyi Iruva.

Indyeny vasongoru vany neevatirya vio, mashika wo mmbo vakeelala rembo kimaruma kya mirima yaany, sha vandu vasheveswaa kyany, naambo vatani indo vemusongoyaa na ifura nta valarosaa uuwo, mashika nkishemukyau kyisha-fo.
Luterevyeny; mashika lwiishi mmbo lutiri nrima nkesi, lukakunda itira ngaa shisha findony fyeru fyoose.
Neeny mmbo shamutereva nnu mutani indo naambo shiviirwa kwany uviny.
Naasany, Iruva wa urilalyi yeto aleviira Mwisi Nniini wa ironda lyakwe auka kwa vafu, na samu ya kyaasa kya llung'anu, we Nndumi weeru Yesu,
namusongovise yeni mutani wo kindo kyisha, mwitanaa shaasa akundye; nawe natani efyo finsennyi nnang'ani yeeru, kwi Yesu Kristo, Nnduma mmbwakwe llung'anu na llung'anu. Amen.
Lyo shamutereva vanavama, musisiryani na irero elyi lyirye wiikimbi; mashika mmbo shamureiya na marero maangu.
Manyiny sheelyi mwanamaye weeru Timoteo alemmaa iporomuwa, nawe kansha uviny, mmbo nshekwanannyaa na yeni ando amwi nawe.
Idikireny vasongoru vany woose, na veele woose; yewo va Italia nawo vamwiidikira.
Isarya lyikae na yeni moose.
Ni yeny Yakobo, ishinga lya Iruva na Nndumi Yesu Kristo, shamureiya na imwidikira nnu yeni ngyufyari ikumi na ivii ta Israeli tinyanyankye.
Vanavamaye vakwa, lollyeny sheelyi ni ifura yeni kyeeri mwavikwa fyeesony five na five.
Mwiimanyaa sheelyi kikusiryo kyany kikambikwa kyeesony mmbo muwonaa ivika nsia.
Ivika nsia lyoore usongovisi lwa vayo, naambo mukooye iva vasongovisi na vasaari mulakee vaanguye nkindo.
Lyo nndu wa kwany kaanguywa ni urango, atereve iruva yeto aniinga woose kwa vingyi, nta nnyakyeemmya-fo, nawe mmbo aniingwaa.
Lyo natereve etiri kikusiryo deny, nalatirwa nnyinyira nta shinnywa-fo; mashika yeto atirwa nnyinyira mmbo avakye matundulu a mura avivitwaa ni uraato, evivitwaa efo na efo.
Nndu wa ngata yeyo nalasheekusara awonisaa kindo efo kwa Nndumi-fo.
Nndu akee ilasa kuvii mmbo atirwa nnyinyira shieny takwe toose.
Kyaindi nndu nalatiri nnduma we nafure mashika we ammaa ing'aniswa;
kyaindi kimmba isimba lyansisirwa mmbo lyivakaa kivaro kya mbuveny ekyo kisherumakaa.
Mashika elyi mwi wavaa mmbo ukoraa mare, kivaro kya vayo kikaangara, na usha lwa vayo lukareka, isimba ni indo kishendaa.
Ngoma ni ya yeto asisirya fyeeso; mashika elyi ammaa iirikywa ni Nndumi mmbo ashewonaa ureto lwa muu, yelo Nndumi adeesye yewo vankunndye.
Kyeeri nndu akee yeeswa nalasheamba, “Ni Iruva akee isheesa.” Mashika Iruva nnyeswaa ni uravi-fo, nta we muni nnyesaa nndu-fo.
Mashika wo nndu mmbo eswaa llango takwe muni timoommwaa na illemba.
Lango ilya ikammaa ivanga ikeende ulyamari, na ulyamari llwa lukankuvamba lukaende ufu.
Vanavama vakwa vakunde, loleny mulalembike.
Wo ngata ya iniingya yeyo ikee shisha, na wo kindo kyaniingywa kikava kisongovisi, mmbo kyauka kwa Iruva, yeto muni sa, yeto kwakwe kulaifo yalashika, nta iveruka-veruka.
Llya alekunda we muni mmbo alelwiira kyeendwa ni irero lyakwe lya dede, lukava vasongoru va fyuumbe fyoose.
Efyo mufiishi ninsha, vanavama vakunde, kyasiany wo nndu nave mwaangu yaaranya, lyo nalave mwaangu irera ao iswa-fo,
mashika unyafi lwa nndu wa vandu llutanaa fya usumanu shaasa Iruva akundye-fo.
Kyasia kwiiseny deny na uravi na ukasha lwa wo ngata, mukooye iwarya irero llya lyilesongwa kwany mukee vafoo sau, nalyo llyo lyisheidimaa ikira mirima yaany,
Lyo veny vandu vatanaa kindo nta nshi vearanya-da-fo, mwilembikaa muveni.
Mashika, kwakooya nndu ava mwiiranya-da nalatanaa, nndu wa ngata yeyo mmbo avaa sha nndu akulolaa yoo kiloleny.
Mashika nndu mmbo akulolaa kawuya kakweengya, karekyo shaasa akai.
Kyaindi nndu yeto ammaa iringa ivavaso elyo lyishyallwa nndu nave lleke na ilyitira, nalavaa mwiiranya arekywa, kyaindi kava mwiitana, yeto mmbo ashevaa wa ngoma efo mirundyeny yakwe.
Kwakooya nndu moose akusara mmbo eshi Iruva, lyo nalasiraa ulumi lwakwe, kava indo mwikulemba we muni, ngata ya nndu yeto nshi yemanya Iruva-fo.
Imanya Iruva lya dede lyilatiri kiteve mbee ya Iruva Nde llyo elyi, “Ni indesaiya vana va ngwera na vaka va ding'u efo ngatareny tawo, na ikuringa kumuni kulawoni-fo fiteve.”
Nyira vanavama, mulashetira iirikyo elyi lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo akee Nndumi wa itumbe kikee kya ikundya vandu maata-fo.
Mashika mmbo lulolyaa kwakooya aanga nndu efo mwiindyeny aree pete ya saabu na soori shisha; elyi yeni naange nafo nndu nkiva, aree soori shikuu.
Na yeni mukaniinga ulya aree soori shisha wiindi, na immbia, “Yewe kaa rembo yaa kusha.” Na ivia nndu yeto nkiva, “Yewe salala alya, ao kaa ya si marendeny akwa.”
A ndesa mmwatana kindo kitiri teve miriminy yaany, mukavetira makusaro matefusu a yaava vandu?
Vanavama vakunde, aranyiny-te, mwiishi sheelyi Iruva mmbo alesauwa vakiva va ulana yelu vave masimba a iirikyo na veni ding'u ya umangyi yelo adeerye kyaasa yewo venkunda?
Kyaindi yeni mukamina vandu vakiva. A vandu masimba nshiwo yewo vakee imufota na imurwaa mundeutyo uvingo?
A ndesa nshi vakee yaarara uvaango lwany?
Kyaindi lyo kwakooya mwainutya ivavaso elyo lyisenyi llya lyikee ireiye indi, “Kunda nndu ungyi shaasa kukukunndye kumuni,” mmbo mutanaa nisha.
Lyo kwankooya mmbo murauwaa vandu mwivakundyaa, mmbo mwatana kya ulyamari na yeni mmbo musheutywaa uvingo mwikee verenga.
Shamashika wo nndu asheringaa mavavaso moose, lyo kafisha-u lyimwi nsi-da, mmbo amfisha moose.
Kimmba yeto aleamba, “Kulatuuse”, mmbwe yeto-da aleveamba, “Kulawae.” Kyasiany kwakooya kulaore kwatuusa, lyo kwawaa, mmbo kwamfisha mavavaso.
Rereny na itana sha vandu yewo valeke mmavavaso.
Mashika uvingo llutiri usari kwa yeto nalasaryaa-fo. Isarya vengyi mmbo lyitiri itumbe ngota yuutya uvingo.
Nyira vanavama, mmbo kwiiyo mbusha kyi kwakooya nndu aamba atiri iirikyo, lyo nalatanaa nta kindo? A ndesa iirikyo yeni lyishidimaa inkira?
Kwakooya nndu weeru wa kyuumi ao wa kyika nalatiri kyeraa ao anguywa nkya ilya,
na nndu wa kwany navavie, “Kweengyeny na ufoo, mundeora muro na iwuura, lyo nare nalavanniinga filya fiwaanguye, mmbo kyeekya-u-kyi?
Na kiwo-da na kikusiryo, kwakooya kilatiri mitannyi misha mmbo kifiiye.”
Lyo nndu ashidimaa yaamba, “Yewe kutiri kikusiryo, na yeny shatira mitannyi misha. Shoorany kikusiryo kyafo kilatiri mitannyi, na iny shikoore kikusiryo kyakwa na shia ya mitannyi yakwa.
Nkisha deny elyi kwiirikye sheelyi Iruva ni umwi. Naakwa ni mmbishwa na vasu vakwe veerikye indo na ireremya-u.
Kyaindi langa imanya yewe nndu wa vandu kulamayi nta kindo, sheelyi kikusiryo kilaryani na mitannyi nkitiri ndunda?
A nde weeru Abrahamu nshi aleekenywa usumanu kyuukana na mitannyi misha, llya aleniingya mwana ulya wakwe Isaki kava kiraso?
Yoo mmbo lwalollya kikusiryo mmbo kilerunda mashora ando amwi na mitannyi yakwe, na kikusiryo kilya kikavangiswa ni mitannyi ilya yakwe.
Mareiyo alya akainutywa alya eambaye, Abrahamu mmbo aleirikya Iruva, kikava nkyo kyamweekenya usumanu, kavevaangwa Mbuya ya Iruva.
Mmbo mwallollyany sheelyi nndu mmbo asheekenywa usumanu kimuukya efo mitannyiny yakwe, nshi kyuuka na kikusiryo kyeni-da-fo.
Naakwa Rahabu nawe, we nka ulya ntuusi a mmbo kulore aleekenywa usumanu kya mitannyi yakwe, llya alewarya varumi valya nisha, na ivakira evasomutaa na shia ingyi?
Kyasiany, shaasa mwiili wamfwa elyi mumuyo ulaiyo, ni indo-da na kyikusiryo mmbo kifiiye kwakooya kulaiyo mitannyi misha.”
Vanavama, mulakuvike velosha muveni, mashika mmbo musheutywaa uvingo uniini nnu.
Mashika mmbo lwawona misindara yese loose keengyi nnu. Nndu nalawonaa nsindara efo mireryeny yakwe, yeto ni nndu nsongovisi, yeto ashiidimaa ilammya mwiili wakwe moose.
Mwiishi mmbo frasi tivikwaa ukova kaniny naambo tisore kilya lukunndye, na itiinduta teende efo lukunndye.
Lyingyi loleny shaasa ngalava ing'ani, na irawa ni ngyuraato niini, mmbo tiindutwa ni usukani unnywa nsele ikeenda kundo koose efo nsongoru akunndye.
Naakiwo na ulumi niindo lukee kilungo kidu, lyo mmbo lweendee ikurosa iniini nnu. Loleny shaasa muro munnywa ukoraa nsito nniini nnu.
Ulumi nalo mmuro, ni uravi lukwaani koose, ulumi mmbo lukee kilungo kyeru, kyaindi llo lutefusaa mwiili moose, nalo mmbo lwaataa muro ularumikaa uvakye wa gehena.
Mashika wo ngata ya ifisi, na ya ndeye, na ya fyuumbe firufukaa si, na yefyo fikee yeeveny, fyoose efyo fivaa ilammya fivikyo, nafyo filemmaa yaavikwa ni vandu.
Lyo ulumi lluvee yaavika-fo, ni uravi lulamalalyaa, mmbo lwiishwe uroi lweende ufu.
Mmbo lwidimaa iindya nalo Iruva Nde weeru, lukavewuya idenga nalo vandu valya alevaumba kwa fwana yakwe.
Kaniny eko keni mfo kushuukaa mbora na kidengo. Vanavama, nkivaa kive indo-fo.
A ndesa usoka lumwi lwidimaa yuuta mura nsha na mura wa mmbala?
Vanavama, ao ndesa nri wa nkuu ushidimaa ivika ndunda ta mafura, ao nsabibu uvike ndunda ta nkuu? Kiwo indo-da usoka llushidimaa yuuta mura wa mmbala na mura nsha-fo.
Mmbi kwany araiye urango na umanyo? Naasa yeto noore mashora akwe a ngaa shisha, ekee na ufoo na urango.
Lyo mukantira kififi na irovyo miriminy mwiruyaa myaandu, naasa mulakuroseeny-fo, nta mulasande wongo na dede-fo.
Urango lwa ngata yeyo lluukye uwe-fo, llwa kiulana, lwa ngata ya kivandu na lwa kimmbishwa.
Mashika ando kukee kififi na myaandu, nng'u kuiyo mirauko na wo ngata ya uravi.

Kyaindi urango luukye kwa Iruva mmbo lukee usha, lwa urilalyi na ufoo, lwa waarya, lulangye yaranya vandu vengyi, lukaishwa ilyillya na itira ndunda shisha, lulatiri uriingi, nta lulatiri ukunang'ari.
Ndunda ya usumanu mmbo yavakywa ni urilalyi kwa yewo veende urilalyi.
A fira nkwi tikeyuuka ando amwi na ngapanu eto tikee kwany? A nshi kunu kwany kweni efo langony eto tikapanaa na malungo any?
Mmbo mukee ilanga, lyo mulatiri kindo, mukawaa na ilollya kinying'u, nta mulawonisaa kindo. Mmbo mwakapana lyo mmuwonaa kindo-fo mashika elyi mulaterevaa!
Naakwa mwatereva, mmuwonisaa-fo mashika elyi muterevaa kikasha, naambo murundye nafyo lango eto tany.
Yeni vetuusa, a mmbo mulaishi itira mbuya na ulana ni iva nkiduva wa Iruva? Nkyo wo nndu akunda iva mbuya ya ulana mmbo akwallwa nkiduva wa Iruva.
A ndesa mareiyo mmbo arera kya ruu? Mumuyo yeto akee nnang'ani yeeru mmbo alulangye kindo kyamaa yeende kififi?
Kyaindi mmbo alusimba yese isarya elyo lyiilannyi kyeeso; nkyo kaamba, Iruva mmbo akingya yewo vekung'anisa veni, kaniinga yewo vakunyiisye isarya lyakwe.
Kikeeny indo indyeny Iruva. Umbuteny mmbishwa, nawe mmbo ashemurishaa.
Serikyeny kufii na Iruva nawe mmbo ashekaa kufii na yeni. Maako any nalatani makasha-fo, kimmba mulakee va nrwe umwi.
Muverovyo nting'wa na ikapa kiiyo. Ikyesa lyany lyaaluke kiiyo, na ifura lyany lyive yaanguywa.
Kunyiiseny mbee ya Iruva Nndumi naambo nawe namurose.

Nyira vanavama, mulavikyani ureeree-fo, yeto mwivikya ungyi ureeree ao imuutya uvingo mmbo avikya usumanu ureeree na iluutya uvingo. Nkyoony kwammuutya usumanu uvingo nkwatana kya usumanu-fo, mmbo kwankwallwa mwirumbwa myaandu.
Mwiniingya usumanu akee na mwirumbuya vandu mwaanduny ni umwi nsi, mmbwe yeto ashidimaa ikira ao irumata. A ni yewe vi kwaidima yuutya ungyi uvingo?
Kyasiany-te yeni mwambaa, “Inu ao ndesi mmbo lushendaa muriny mmbe na ikaa-fo ando a mwaaka sele, lukapye-fo mbusha na iwona masaa”;
lyo nta mmwiishi mbony ta ndesi-fo. A muu wany mmbo ukee inda? Mashika yeni mmbo muvakye murwe wa mura ulollyo ulaalu-da numa mmbukiyo-fo.
Yeni ando a yaamba, “Kwakooya Nndumi akunda, mmbo lukaa-u lwitanaa kive na kive”,
lyo ulaalu mmbo mwakurosa mwirumanaa, ikurosa lyoose lya ngata yei mmbo lyikee ikasha.
Kyasiany yeto eeshi kyisha kyeetana nawe kara nalakitana, kwakwe yeto ni ulyamari.
Naasany-te yeni masimba iyeny, moongore kimaruma kya nyinyira yeyo imusheyaa.
Masaa any mmbo akee mapooru, na soori tany mmbo tikee shilye nkurukuru.
Saabu yaany na fesa yaany mmbo yantirwa nkurere, na kurere ya vayo mmbo ishemusutaa, ishelya miili yaany sha muro. Mmbo mwankuvikya kiraambu kya nkonu wa ifurumya.
Loleny-te, weesi lwa varemi yewo valeilula marema any mukalurwaa na ntambo, weesi yelo mmbo lukeevaanga, na fiiyo fya yewo valeilula mmbo fileanga marwiny a Nndumi muni matorito.
Mmbo mukeekureka ulaniny, na ikushangala efo langony ta mwiili, mukawuutisa mirima yaany indo.
Mmbo mukeyuutya yeto wa usumanu uvingo mukammbwaa, nta nalashidimaa isalala na yeni.

Kimmba ni indo nyira, sisiryeny kufike nkonu eto Nndumi ashaa. Mwiishi, nremi mmbo avereyaa na nsia fimu fya uruka fikee fya wuuru, kavereya kimaruma kya vayo kutani fimu fyawonisa mbua ya mbee na ya ifurumya.
Na yeni kevesisiryeny-te mukaarise mirima yaany, mashika isha lya Nndumi mmbo lyikee kufii.
Nyira, mulakunung'uni-fo, naambo mulasheutywa uvingo. Loleny-te, mwileta mwaandu nyoo mwaangony akai.
Nyira, soreny vakisuku valya valerera na irina lya Nndumi, vave kyaaso kya yewo vasumani iwona makasha, vavesisirya.
Loleny-te yewo veevereya mmbo lwavio vatiri ngoma. Mmbo muleeta mbony ta usisiryo lwa Yobu, mukavelollya shaasa Nndumi atana yoo mafurumyony, sheelyi Nndumi mmuni ulyilyi na muni isarya.
Kyaindi mmwasi ya efyo fyoose, vanavama, mulalye mboo-fo, nta na iruveeu nta na ulana-fo, nta na ngata ingyi-fo, kyaindi yee yany ive yee na oode iveva oode, naambo mulasheanga uvingony.
Kwakooya nndu waany awa rengeny, natereve Iruva. Kwakooya akyesye nriminy, eembe fiimbo fya yaarafuma.
Na kwakooya nndu wa kwany alwee navaange vamiku va siri; nawo vashenterevya na imwaamba mafura meele na irina lya Nndumi.
Na itereva kwa kyikusiryo mmbo lyishekiraa nndu yeto alwee na Nndumi namwipoo, na kwakooya elyamarye nakooye isaryo.
Kuryeny ngyulyamari tany muweni na veni na iterevyana, naambo mukooye ishiiswa. Itereva lya nndu wa usumanu mmbo lyikee isha nnu, kwakooya atereva na sina.
Nkisuku Elia mmbo ekee nndu wa ngata yeeru yese, katereva na sina mbua ikamanda; mmbwa ikara ilakapa ando a myaaka iraru na kyenga.
Kooka-fo katereva-se, kulya iruveeu kukarwiika mmbwa ikakapa, na uruka lukaende ndunda ta vayo.
Vanavama, kwakooya nndu waany ameenda mbai neekywa kikee kya dede, na ungyi kansongosia,
manyiny sheelyi yeto asongosyaa nndu allyamara kutani ooka efo shieny yakwe ya ureti, mmbo akira nrima ukie ufu, na isikya ulyamari wiingyi.
Yeny Petro, Nrumi wa Yesu Kristo, shamureiya yeni Vakristo munyanyakye mukakaa kundo kweny efo Ponto na Galatia, Kapadokia na Asia na Bitinia.
Shaasa Iruva Nde alesongwa imumanya llya alemwiilyisa na Mumuyo, mukatana mwakunyiisa mukaletywa samu ya Yesu Kristo. Nndumi namweengerye urilalyi na isarya.
Iruva naitikiswa, we Nde wa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, yeto alelwiira lya kavii kyuuka na isarya lyakwe naambo luwoni ivika nsia elyo lyeende muu kimaruma kya iruka lya Yesu Kristo auka kwa vafu;
Naambo luwoni ding'u yeyo ilalyamarikaa, ilatiri ivara, ilashuumaa, ikeeshisurumi iruveeu kimaruma kyany.
Na yeni mmbo mukeeringwa ni finya ya Iruva kimuukya kikusiryony kutani mwawona ukiro yelo lushelolywa paa kyeeri kya ifurummya.
Mmbo mufuraa nnu kyeeri ekyo, na kikava ulaalu kyeeri ekyi kifii mmbo kimukooye irovyo ni fyeeso fya ngata shive na shive.
Naambo elyi kikusiryo kyany kisheeswaa, nakyo mmbo kiilanyi saabu shoose yeyo yeeswa na muro, kushe nnduma na itumbe na wiindi, elyi Nndumi Yesu Kristo ashelolywa paa.
Nawe mmbo munkundye, lla elyi mulandellollye na miso, na kikava mmullollye ulaalu, lyo mumwiirikye, na ifura nawe nnu deny ifura lyilavaa imina nta, ifura lyitiri itumbe,
kya iwarya ekyo mushefurumya nakyo kya iirikyo lyany, llo ukiro lwa mirima yaany.
Kya mbony ta ukiro elo vakisuku mmbo valeruuyaruuya, nesununda-sununda, vakaawuya kisuku kya isarya elyo lyishekaa lyimusheye yeni.
Vakaruuya ni indii na ni kyeeri kyi kileorwa ni Mumuyo wa Kristo yeto ekee nnang'ani yaawo, yeto alepooka ikureekya makiva yoo ashekoyaa Kristo, na itumbe elyo lyisheshaa numa ya vayo.

Vakaorwa sheelyi nshi kimaruma kyawo veni-fo, kyaindi kimaruma kyany nkyo vakafurukannya efyo, na mfyo muleongoywa ni valya valemoongoya Nrumi ya Nsia vekaywa ni Mumuyo Mweele yeto alerumwa auka iruveeu. Mbony eti naakwa ni vasu mmbo valangye itilola.
Kyasia, kaaryeny efo miriminy yaany, muve na mwiina findony fyany muvikye isarya elyo nsia deny eto muleorwa paa lya Yesu Kristo alesha.
Veny sha vana vatiri wiindi mure mulasora lango tilya ta mbee teeriyani na utondo.
Muvevaka yeto alemuvaanga akee mweele, neeni muveva veele efo mikaayeny yaany;
kimmba kikee kireiye indi, mmbo mushevaa veele shaasa neeny shikee mweele.
Na kimmba mwambaanga Nde, nawe mmbwe yeto ashaanduyaa wo nndu kulaifo ikundya shaasa akunda we muni, naasa kaeny na usau kyeeri ekyi mukee yaa ulaniny mukee veny.
Muvemanya sheelyi nshi mulewowowa na findo filyamarikaa-fo, sha fesa ao saabu, naambo muuke efo ngaany ya ureti mulewarya kwa vande vany-fo.
Kyaindi mmbo mulewowowa na samu ya wuuru, shaa ya ngurana ilatiri ivara nta mfere, nnyo ya Kristo.
Nawe mmbo aishiwa deny uka elyo mbee kulaore ulana elu lwemmbeiywa, nawe kaorwa paa fyeeri efi kimaruma kyany.
Yeni muleirikya Iruva kyeendwa mmbwe, nawe mmbo alennruta auka ufuny kaniinga itumbe, naambo muwoni kikusiryo neevika nsia efo kwa Iruva.
Mukammaa ikwiilyisa mirima yaany na iirikya dede yeyo, muvefikya ikunda lya Kikristo lyilatiri ukunang'ari, mukundani na nrima.
Mashika mmbo muleirwa lya kavii, nshi kyuuka ufyariny yelo lukeesia-fo, nkwa yelo lulasiaa, na irero lya Iruva lyitiri muu, elyo lyakaa llung'anu.
Mashika, Mwiili wa nndu mmbo uvakye mare, na itumbe lya vayo lyoose nkimwi sha kivaro kya mare, mare mmbo ashumaa na kivaro kyaangare.
Kyaindi irero lya Iruva mmbo lyakaa-u llung'anu. Na irero elyo ni irero llya isha lyileongowa kwany.
Naasany, rweeny kwaasha uravi loose na ntambo moose, na ukunang'ari na ukasha na ivikyana ureeree loose.
Mukee sha vakoku vaonika ulaalu indi, langeny urango luvakye malela alakee malonge-longe, naambo mwiidimi itumaa efo ukirony.
Kimmba mwammaa ishosha ulyilyi lwa Nndumi.
Endeny kwa yeto akee iwe lyitiri muu, yelyo vandu valelyilema, kyaindi kwa Iruva mmbo lyikee isauwe, lyikavetira nnduma.
Neeni mukee sha mawe atiri muu, mmbo mukee vatani muve mmba ya Mumuyo, ukohani weele mukooye yuuta firaso fya mirima, efyo fishiirikywa ni Iruva, kwi Yesu Kristo.
Mashika mmbo kikee kireiye efo mareiyony indi, Lola-te yoo Sion mmbo shavika-u iwe iniini lya ndumba, lyikee isauwe lyitiri nnduma na yeto mumwiirikya nnyashefiyaa sony-fo.
Naasany nnduma yeu ni wany yeni mukusirye-u. Kyaindi kwa yewo valakusirye-u, Iwe elyo veetana mmba valelyilema, mmbo lyilealuwa iwe iniini lya ndumba.
Na lyingyi-se, lyikava iwe lyekapa urende, na lyitulaa. Mashika irero elyo mmbo lyileva nsindara kwawo, valalyiirikye, nawo mmbo vekee vadeesye efyo.

Kyaindi yeni mmbo mukee ufyari usauwe, lukee ukohani lwa kimangyi, ufyari lwa vandu veele, vandu va ushilyi lwa Iruva, naambo mwiidimi ivambisa isarya lyakwe yeto alemuvaanga naambo muuke ireeminy na yaanga seny yakwe iilanyi;
yeni kulaore mbee mwekee ufyari elyo, kyaindi ulaalu ni ufyari lwa Iruva, mwekee vandu valaishi isarya lya Iruva, kyaindi ulaalu mmbo mwammaa iwarya isarya.
Vakunde vakwa, mmbo shamwiikima mwikee sha vandu va kyaaro valaiyo kyaasha, kwiiseny na lango ta mwiili yeto tikapanaa na mumuyo.
Kaeny na ngaa shisha efo kwa vandu va masanga, naambo kwakooya vamweekerya fya wongo sheelyi mukee veetana makasha, elyi valolaa mikaaye yaany misha, vang'anise Iruva elyi nkonu ufikaa.
Indyeny wo ivavasyo mwaniingwa, mwishiryaa Iruva, kwakooya mmbo kyauka kwa mangyi, yee mmbo atiri ushilyi uniini.
Kwakooya ni vaniini, yee, mmbo varumwa mbwe naambo vaorote yewo veetana makasha na irumisha yewo vetana mesha.
Mashika ni indo Iruva akunndye, naambo kyeendwa ni itana mesha mufindikire kana ka vandu yewo varung'ani;
muve sha vandu valeke, lyo mure mularunda na uleke lwany kyikee kya isikya makasha, kyaindi mukae sha vana va Iruva.
Indyeny vandu woose. Kundeny Vakristo vengyi. Ishikeny Iruva. Niingyeny mangyi wiindi.
